email_chain.subject: Insurance Estimate Inquiry for December Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fahmy,

Can you provide an estimate for ship-borne insurance for 2,500 containers of garments travelling from Hong Kong to San Francisco in late December? Additionally, I would like to know your limit for cargoes booked as 'ship’s temperate'.

Many thanks,
Feisal

email_chain.subject: RE: Insurance Estimate Inquiry for December Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Feisal,

We received your enquiry concerning the shipping insurance. We will estimate the cost and inform you as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Customer Support, Insurance Division

email_chain.subject: Insurance Details and Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Please be informed that our underwriter has approved the insurance with the following details:
Sum insured: USD 125,000.00
Limit: USD 100,000.00
Commission: 1% of the sum insured. Our commission amounts to USD 1,250.00.

Best regards,
Sadat Fahmy

email_chain.subject: Approval of Ship's Temperate Limit
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I am pleased to inform you that our underwriters have approved the ship’s temperate with a limit of USD 100,000.

Looking forward to your reply.
Best regards,
Alexander Chin
Adjuster, Insurance Division

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Insurance Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

We would like to confirm the details of the insurance as approved:
Sum insured: USD 125,000.00
Limit: USD 100,000.00
Commission: 1% of the sum insured, totaling USD 1,250.00.

Please confirm that these details are correct. If there are any other requirements, please let us know.

Thank you.
Shadi Malik
Underwriter

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about wheat transport from Odessa to Barcelona in early August
email_chain.body: Morning Vicente, I have 4,300MT of wheat that needs to be shipped from Odessa to Barcelona. Could you confirm if you can accommodate this shipment in early August? Additionally, could you clarify your standard demurrage clause? Best regards, Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about wheat transport from Odessa to Barcelona in early August
email_chain.body: Dear Max, Yes, we can accommodate the shipment in early August. Regarding the demurrage terms, we operate under the standard FIOS terms. Please confirm if you would like me to send you the full contract for your perusal. All the best, Vicente

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about wheat transport from Odessa to Barcelona in early August
email_chain.body: Dear Vicente, Thank you for the information. I only need the details of the demurrage clause at this stage. We will send you a draft of our offer within the next two days. Warm regards, Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about wheat transport from Odessa to Barcelona in early August
email_chain.body: Dear Max, Understood. I'll await your draft offer. Our proposal will be based on FIOS terms. Please confirm if this is acceptable, and I'll prepare the draft offer accordingly. All the best, Vicente

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation: Fertilizers Shipment from Sohar to Jebel Ali
email_chain.body:
Hello Yasir,

Can you provide a quick quote for transporting 18,700MT of fertilizers from Sohar to Jebel Ali with delivery before the 20th? Please let me know if this cargo is a good fit for your services, and we can proceed with the booking.

Best wishes,
Zeinab

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Fertilizers Shipment from Sohar to Jebel Ali
email_chain.body:
Hello Zeinab,

Attached is the initial quote and shipment details for your request. Please also find attached the P&I certificate that you might need.

Shipment/Forwarding/Cargo Confirmation
Carrier: Kobe Kaiun
ETD: November 17-18 (Abu Dhabi)
ETA: November 22 (Jebel Ali)
Quantity: 18,700MT
Freight: U.S. $100,000.00

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Fertilizers Shipment from Sohar to Jebel Ali
email_chain.body:
Hello Yasir,

Can you send me a link to the P&I certificate? We want to ensure that Kobe Kaiun is an acceptable carrier for our insurers.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Fertilizers Shipment from Sohar to Jebel Ali

P&I Certificate for Cargo: To whom it may concern, this is to confirm that Kobe Kaiun is a safe and reliable carrier.

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Shipment Details and P&I Certificate

Hello Yasir,

Thank you for providing the P&I certificate. After reviewing your quote and details, I've concluded that this cargo arrangement is not a good fit for our company at this time.

Best wishes,
Zeinab

Attachment:
Shipment/Forwarding/Cargo Confirmation
Quantity: 18,700MT
Freight: U.S. $100

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Shipping Rates for Palm Kernels

email_chain.body:
Hi Jose,

Following our recent communications, I would like to proceed with arranging a shipment of 1,600MT of soya beans in January 2015. The delivery location will be Antwerp. Could you please send me a quote for using your vessel?

email_chain.body:
Hi Jose,

Thank you for the quotes you provided; they are within our budget. However, we’d like to discuss the details over the phone. Could you please contact us at +1 555-555-5555 at your earliest convenience?

email_chain.body:
Jose,

Great hearing back from you! We’re ready to book the shipment of 1,600MT of soya beans, to be delivered to Antwerp in the first week of March 2015. Could you provide a written quote for this arrangement?

email_chain.subject: Availability Inquiry for 12,000 DWT Coaster
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Kim,

Could you please confirm the availability of a 12,000 DWT coaster, and what's the earliest possible sailing date?

Best,
Minh

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability Inquiry for 12,000 DWT Coaster
email_chain.body:
Hi Minh,

Thank you for your email. The earliest available date for the 12,000 DWT coaster is 2023-10-10. The vessel will be ready to load cargo on this date, with the specific loading and discharging ports to be discussed further as needed. However, this time slot might not align with your required timeline. The next available date for booking the coaster would be 2023-11-10.

Please let me know if this fits within your schedule or if you have any other questions.

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: We'd like to get a freight quote for 1,400mt of automotive steel plates from Houston to Antwerp. Our laycan is 12th September and can only handle a minimum of 2 days demurrage. Could you provide your best quote as soon as possible? Sincerely, Celia

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Received
email_chain.body: We have received a freight quote from our ocean freight vendor for the transport of 1,400 MT of automotive steel from Houston to Antwerp. If the quote is acceptable, we are prepared to sign the contract now, with the vessel's planned departure after October 7. The Bill of Lading will be drafted based on FOB terms in Rotterdam. Thank you and best regards, Carl J.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Email Sent to Vendor
email_chain.body: We have received your email regarding the transportation of 1,400 MT steel plates. An email with the details has been sent to our ocean freight vendor today. Could you confirm that you received our forwarded email? Thank you, Mike.

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Email Sent to Vendor
email_chain.body: We did not receive your email. Could you please send it again? Regards, Carl.

email_chain.subject: Resending Email
email_chain.body: I am resending the email now. Please let me know when you have received it. Mike.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Freight Cost Estimate for Sugar Transportation
email_chain.body: How much will it cost to move 2,500 MT of refined sugar from Colombo to Amsterdam? Your shipping services team has to answer this type of question almost every day, so it’s important you can write shipping emails like a pro. To help you become a shipping emails expert, we’ve created this course. It covers the basics of shipping emails, including email design and structure. We’ve also included examples and tips to help you craft professional, error-free emails. Thanks for joining us for the 'Become a Shipping Emails Expert' course. We hope you found the information helpful and useful. Enjoy the rest of your day, Brian

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Freight Cost Estimate for Sugar Transportation
email_chain.body: Thank you for your request regarding the transportation of 2,500 MT of refined sugar from Colombo to Amsterdam. We are currently preparing the freight estimate and will send you a detailed PDF document shortly. Thank you for choosing North Sea Shipping. Best regards, John Doe North Sea Shipping Logistics Coordinator

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on RO-RO vessel routing and stowage options
email_chain.body: Good day, I would like to inquire about the possibility of routing a RO-RO vessel from Bay City, MI to Grand Bahama via New York, including options for cargo stowage. Regards, Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on RO-RO vessel routing and stowage options
email_chain.body: Hello Victor, Could you please confirm the vessel and equipment details for your request as follows: 1 x 52' or 52'+7' RO-RO vessel, CONEX or other vessel equipment. Also, all related handling charges will be at the consignee's cost as per our standard contract. Best regards, Lisa A. Broad

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on RO-RO vessel routing and stowage options
email_chain.body: Dear Lisa, Thank you for your response. Please quote the RO/RO rate from Bay City, MI for a 40' HSC. Suggested routing should be to either New York or Charleston. Below are the detention details for Bay City: 1st 7 days: +$0.00, 8-21 days: +$100.00, 22 days+: $0.00. For your reference, the cargo will include 1 x 52' or 52'+7' RO-RO vessel equipment. Regards, Victor

email_chain.subject: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Receiver,

We have the following cargo available and would like to discuss potential freight terms. Could you please provide your quotation for the specified cargo?

Thanks in advance,
Sender

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Sender,

Thank you for your inquiry. Here is our quotation for the cargo under the terms you specified. Our prices are competitive, listed below. We would like to know if you are considering any discounts on volume. Additionally, could you advise on the timeline for delivery?

I await your reply.

Regards,
Receiver

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Receiver,

Thank you for the prompt response and the detailed quotation. We are currently reviewing it and will get back to you soon regarding the discount and confirm the delivery schedule.

Best regards,
Sender

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Rates and Space Availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Eddie,

Could you please provide the rates and space availability for shipping 200MT of adhesives from Hamburg to Aarhus? Could this be combined with any existing fixture? Additionally, could you inform us of the demurrage rate?

email_chain.subject: Request for Ballpark Shipping Estimates
email_chain.body:
Hi Eddie,

I was just wondering if you could give us a rough idea of how much it would cost to ship approximately 200MT - 300MT from Hamburg to Aarhus by sea. I understand it is difficult to be precise at this stage, but it would be useful for our finance team to have some idea of ballpark figures.

Many thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Ballpark Shipping Estimates
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Following your request, I’ve run an RFQ and the total comes to a little over $18,000. At this point, we would need approval from our managers to proceed.

Best regards,
Eddie

email_chain.subject: Request for Coffee Bean Shipment Quote
email_chain.body: Could you arrange the shipment of 3,100MT of coffee beans from Ho Chi Minh to Busan, slated for mid-month? Also, do you typically charge extra for reefer plugs? Respectfully, Kurt

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Coffee Bean Shipment Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Kurt, Yes, we can arrange the shipment for you. Can you confirm the following details about the shipment? - Quantity of coffee beans: 3,100MT - Packing: Is it in 50kg bags on pallets? - Price per MT? - Exact loading port in Ho Chi Minh? - Exact discharge port in Busan? - Desired shipping date? - Preferred type of vessel? - Estimated demurrage rate? Best, Kerry

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Coffee Bean Shipment Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Kerry, Thank you for the prompt response. Yes, we plan to ship 3,100MT of coffee beans in 50KG bags, each pallet containing 1,600 bags. The products are to be packed on pallets and loaded onto containers at Ho Chi Minh port, with discharge in Busan port. We're aiming for the containers (2,500MTs in 40FT containers) to start loading by mid-month. Could you please provide the estimated shipping cost for this arrangement? Regards, Kurt

email_chain.subject: Request for FOB Price and Details for Crude Palm Oil Cargo
email_chain.body: Hi Capt. Hu, We’re organizing a 7,700MT cargo of crude palm oil from Makassar to Surabaya. Could you please send your FOB price and delivery details for delivery on the 20th? Regards, Zoe

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for FOB Price and Details for Crude Palm Oil Cargo
email_chain.body: Thank you, Zoe. I will send our price list by email shortly. Can we discuss further details over a call or in a meeting? Regards, Hu Gang.

email_chain.subject: Additional Details Required
email_chain.body: Dear Capt. Hu, To proceed further, we need to discuss more about your cargo: Is the cargo washed, solvent-free or not? What are the cargo condition and appearance? Can you specify the cargo viscosities, oxidation, and moisture content? Does the cargo have any special requirements? Can you provide the API gravity of the cargo? Do you have a cargo test report, certificate of origin, and delivery? What is the cargo smell like? What about the cargo condition? What is the cargo color? Please respond to the above. Regards, Zoe

email_chain.subject: Responses to Cargo Details Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Zoe, I have just sent you our prices list and additional contact details by email. Our team is keen to know if the prices are acceptable and when you can provide feedback. Regarding the terms of payment for this cargo and the parties involved in the loading operation, we would like to discuss them as well. Additionally, are there any special inspection requirements for your cargo? Thanks! Regards, Hu Gang

email_chain.subject: Cargo Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Capt. Hu, Do you currently have any cargo available for transport? Regards, Zoe

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Zoe, Currently, there is not much cargo available, and I cannot confirm any specifics at the moment. Any potential deal must remain confidential. How much cargo are you projecting, and when would you be able to load? Regards, Hu Gang

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for LPG Shipment in July
email_chain.body:
Hi Derek,
We have received an inquiry for transporting 15kMT of LPG from Spain to Mombasa in July. Could you let me know if you have available shipping capacity during this period and what the pricing would be? Please reply at your earliest convenience.
Regards,
Ajay

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for LPG Shipment in July - Extension to Tanzania
email_chain.body:
Hi Derek,
Following up on the initial request, we’re exploring a medium-term charter for about a month that might include an extension of the shipment to Tanzania in addition to Mombasa. Could you please provide detailed pricing and information about the ship as well as your management conditions? We are looking forward to your prompt response.
Best regards,
Joseph Tensu

email_chain.subject: Re: Medium Term Charter in June
email_chain.body:
Dear Joseph,
We will be ready to proceed with a 45-60 day charter in June for a vessel that can carry 5000MT of LPG in cargo tanks. We are also preparing a larger shipment for an LPG carrier that can handle up to 11,000MT. Please send us a draft contract reflecting the voyage time, LPG capacity, and your pricing. Additionally, to better understand your needs, could you clarify whether your operations involve oil or chemical trading and how many days the vessel would be required to anchor prior to reaching the loading port?
I look forward to your reply.
Best regards,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Year-End Award Notification
email_chain.body:
Dear Recipient,

We are thrilled to inform you that on 2023-09-01, your exemplary performance has resulted in your selection as an award winner at this year's Year End Awards. Congratulations on your hard work and significant contributions over the past year. Your dedication has been instrumental to our department’s success and you stand as a prime example of employee achievement.

In recognition of your efforts, you are invited to the Employee Appreciation Banquet scheduled for 2023-10-15. The event will include a presentation in your honor, followed by dinner and dancing. The suggested dress code is business casual.

We look forward to celebrating your achievements.

Best regards,
[Award Committee Name]

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Transporting Agricultural Products
email_chain.body:
Dear Tony,

Could you handle 10,000MT of agricultural products from Santos to Newport News? Additionally, what are your typical dispatch rates?

Sincerely,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Transporting Agricultural Products
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Transportation of 10,000MT of agricultural products from Santos to Newport News can be arranged; however, pricing will necessarily be determined by the chosen carrier. Dispatch rates are dependent on factors such as timing and quantity, and these can vary; I would recommend contacting the shipping company directly for the most accurate information.

If you have further inquiries, please reach out at any time.

With regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Request for Assistance with Carrier Communication
email_chain.body:
Dear Tony,

Could you please connect with your carrier to check if they can transport 10,000MT of agricultural products from Santos to Newport News, and relay the details to your local office?

Thank you so much.
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Assistance with Carrier Communication
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

I have reached out to several carriers and I'm awaiting their confirmations and detailed terms. I will update you as soon as I receive further information.

Best regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: October Berthing & Demurrage Inquiry for Crude Oil Cargo
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. McKinney, I am looking to transport a 3,500MT cargo of crude oil from Milford Haven to Gibraltar this coming October. Could you please inform me if there is sufficient berthing space available during that period and provide an estimate on potential demurrage costs? Many thanks, Maja

email_chain.subject: Re: October Berthing & Demurrage Inquiry for Crude Oil Cargo
email_chain.body: We are currently unable to internally address your request as most of our team has left the office. Could you please resend your inquiry on Monday? We appreciate your understanding. Best regards, Kiel R. Shank Operations Coordinator / HICS EPIC Team Representative (504) 355-2236 Kiel.shank@neo-group.net

email_chain.subject: RE: Berthing in October 2018 - Adequacy of facilities and availability
email_chain.body: Hello Maja, Unfortunately, I am unable to provide a detailed response to your berthing and demurrage query at this moment. I will be out of the office this afternoon. Please expect a comprehensive answer by Monday morning. Sincerely, Tara

email_chain.subject: RE: Berthing in October 2018 - Adequacy of facilities and availability
email_chain.body: Thank you, Maja. I did receive your initial inquiry. I earlier sent a brief acknowledgment but will follow up with a more detailed response by Monday afternoon due to my current unavailability. Regards, Tara

email_chain.subject: Query on Berth Congestion at Mundra and Long Beach Ports
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Peter, We need to arrange a shipment from Mundra to Long Beach. Could you please confirm whether there is any anticipated berth congestion at either port? Many thanks, Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Query on Berth Congestion at Mundra and Long Beach Ports
email_chain.body: Hi Michael, Hope you are well. There will be no berth congestion at Mundra throughout the year. However, for Long Beach, the container volume is increasing consistently. The transshipment movement from West Africa and other major US destinations to Long Beach will cause an increase of more than 10% this year. Although there's less congestion expected in the early months, starting from April, the prospects of high congestion are significant unless CBP regulations are adjusted. Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Additional Information on Port Operations
email_chain.body: Hi Michael, Here is a brief comparison overview of container handling for the previous years at Long Beach, showing a tangible increase in volume. Detailed data cannot be provided here, but you can view it through our official port operations link at https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=605746. Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Changes at Long Beach Port
email_chain.body: Hi, Please be informed of the following upcoming changes at Long Beach Port: All Ship-to-Shore (STS) operations used previously to alleviate congestion will cease by the end of March 2019. The focus will thus shift towards optimizing logistics like using wagons, trucks, and special containers (e.g., Transponders, Chilled, Refrigerated) for exports at Ocean Terminal, Pier 400, and Long Beach Container Terminal. The terminal aims to enhance efficiency and container throughput via improved gate operations. Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Initial Inquiry About Shipping Policy
email_chain.body: Hi B, could you please provide the details on our current shipping policies? Thanks, A.

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Inquiry About Shipping Policy
email_chain.body: Hi A, I’ll need to check the latest updates and get back to you shortly. Regards, B.

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Inquiry About Shipping Policy
email_chain.body: Thank you, B. Please keep me posted. Best, A.

email_chain.subject: Update on Shipping Policy
email_chain.body: Hi A, the latest shipping policy includes [specific policy changes or updates]. Please review and let me know if you need further details. Best, B.

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Shipping Policy
email_chain.body: Thanks for the update, B. Could you clarify [specific point] in the policy? Cheers, A.

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Shipping Policy
email_chain.body: Hello A, regarding your question about [specific point], here is a detailed explanation. Let me know if this clears up your concerns. Regards, B.

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification on Shipping Policy
email_chain.body: Hi B, that was very helpful. Thanks for clarifying! Best, A.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Freight Move Inquiry from Pointe-Noire to Veracruz
email_chain.body: Greetings Mr. Ochieng, Could you handle an urgent freight move from Pointe-Noire to Veracruz? It’s 6,500MT of chemical drums, loaded onto 35 trucks, which need to be in Veracruz by June 5. Will you offer a fixed rate and 6 days of ETA flexibility? Thanks, Harsha

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Freight Move Inquiry from Pointe-Noire to Veracruz
email_chain.body: Hi Harsha, I’m sorry for the delayed response, I had a family emergency. I’d like to assist you with the 6,500 MT freight move. The quoted price is 5.4 million USD. I can offer you 10 days of ETA flexibility. Do you agree with these terms? Best regards, Joseph

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Freight Move Inquiry from Pointe-Noire to Veracruz
email_chain.body: Hi Joseph, Unfortunately, I am unable to accept your terms. I had other freight moves lined up, but I’ve recently had to scale back my operations. I can only offer a fixed rate and 6 days of ETA flexibility, as we initially discussed. Please let me know if you can accept these terms. Regards, Harsha

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Freight Move Inquiry from Pointe-Noire to Veracruz
email_chain.body: Hi Harsha, I can accept your terms. I will share the details with you soon. Best regards, Joseph

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Freight Move Inquiry from Pointe-Noire to Veracruz
email_chain.body: Hi Joseph, I’m happy to accept your offer. If you can send the invoice details to me as soon as possible, we’ll be able to proceed with the booking. Looking forward to hearing from you soon. Regards, Harsha

Schedule: 17-21 November 2022.

Regards,
Marcelo

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation of Offer Validity and Additional Charges Inquiry

Marcelo,

Just to confirm this offer will be valid until today as per my email from yesterday. Please confirm if there are any additional charges and what would be the mode of payment.

Thank you very much.
Hinson

email_chain.subject: Final Rate Confirmation and Draft PO Request

email_chain.body:
Dear Steve,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to discuss the potential costs associated with moving our cargo. Please consider the following aspects throughout our communication:
- Carrier
- Charterer
- Ship Type
- Feeder line
- Terms
- Nominated vessel
- Berth
- Draft
- Quantity
- Destination
- ETA
- D/O
- Payment
- Laytime
- Harbour Charges
- L/D Charges
- Line Speed
- Chargeable weight
- Discharge Delivery
- Additional details and context
- Timing considerations

As an economist with extensive industry connections, I'm excited about the prospects of collaborating with you. Looking forward to your insights on how we might proceed.

All the best,
Charles

Regards,
Rob

Hi Rob,

Thank you for your response. Regarding your query, the insurance policy I am quoting does not cover cargo loss. You can review my policy details here: [Ship the Box Insurance Policy](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/5f0f50a4d746a5642fe1f64a/5f4f66f7d957cd00018cd78e_Ship_the_box_Insurance_Policy.pdf).

Please note, as per our agreement, any claims will be the responsibility of you and the broker, while I provide compensation. Regarding the pricing and terms, these areas are agreeable and can be discussed further if necessary.

You have a couple of options:
1. Liaise with the ship's broker for market pricing. Be aware that the favorable pricing might not prompt quick responses.
2. Place the current proposal on your sales sheet and forward it to my agents.

Looking forward to your decision.

Best,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Queries Regarding the Estate of Elaine Thompson
email_chain.body:
Dear Shari, 

In the matter of the Estate of Elaine Thompson, Deceased, I have questions regarding the will referenced above. 

1. In your opinion, does the Will meet the legal requirements to be admitted to probate? 
2. What assets did Elaine own at the time of her death? Are any of those assets not subject to the terms of the Will? 
3. What are the necessary steps to commence the administration of the Will? What are the tax implications of this administration? 

Please call me at your earliest convenience at (415) 599-2483 or email your response. I look forward to your guidance. 

Sincerely, 

[Attorney's Name] 

Admitted in the State of California. The State of Oregon does not permit attorneys to practice under the same terms as other states. 

NOTICE OF ELECTRONIC RECORDING: Please be aware that this communication may be recorded.

email_chain.subject: Re: Queries Regarding the Estate of Elaine Thompson
email_chain.body:
Dear [Attorney's Name], 

Thank you for your inquiry. I appreciate your questions concerning the estate of Elaine Thompson. 

Elaine’s Will does meet all legal requirements for probate. Regarding her assets, she owned several investments and properties, details of which can be further discussed. Some assets, such as certain insurance policies, are not subjected to the Will’s terms. 

To commence administration, an application for probate must be filed, followed by detailed asset collection and assessment. The tax implications can vary, and it might be beneficial to consult a tax professional. 

For a more detailed conversation, please feel free to call me, or I can also arrange a meeting with my colleague, who specializes in estate planning if needed. 

Sincerely, 

Shari

email_chain.subject: Enquiry: Rice Shipment from Colombo to Matadi (13,000MT)
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Morris,

We have an enquiry for a shipment of 13,000MT of rice, routed from Colombo to Matadi. Could you provide a berth congestion forecast for Matadi? Additionally, how does the laytime allowance work in case of port delays at Matadi?

Many thanks,
Robert

email_chain.subject: RE: Enquiry: Rice Shipment from Colombo to Matadi (13,000MT)
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

Matadi is frequently busy with cargoes often experiencing congestion. There is no guaranteed transit time for discharging ships, and it is typical for vessels to wait from 2-4 days to berth. The number of ships in line is unpredictable, as vessels can arrive without prior notice. When two berths are open, the terminal typically manages the berthing order based on the arrival timing of the ships. If your vessel reaches the berth as scheduled, your slot will likely be honored. However, if your arriving ship is delayed due to port congestion and misses the reserved berth time, it may be reassigned to another vessel, and yours will need to wait for the next available slot.

Best regards,
Ms. Morris

Your Honors,

On behalf of Indian Towers, LLC, we submit this correspondence to express our intentions to compel the deposition of United States Attorney, David Pincus. The deposition has been requested for October 29, 2019. We believe his testimony is crucial for our case, however, we acknowledge that we have not sufficiently demonstrated good cause as required. Consequently, we submit this letter to outline our reasons and seek your approval for said deposition.

email_chain.subject: Re: Motion to Compel Deposition of United States Attorney
email_chain.body:
Dear Kirk M. Stansel, Peter A. Sickels, and Joshua R. Hasty,

We have received your request to compel the deposition of Mr. David Pincus scheduled for October 29, 2019. After an initial review, it is noted that the motion lacks the demonstration of good cause. As such, unless further justification is provided, the motion is likely to be denied.

I have attached our vessel's specification and enclosed the Statement of the cargo. I haven't received your confirmation yet, and would appreciate it if you could let me know whether your vessel is suitable and available.

Many thanks,
Barry

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Soya Bean Shipment from Paraguay to Valencia
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Yu,

Could you provide the logistics for shipping 3,000MT of soya beans from Paraguay to Valencia? We would appreciate it if you could include the price details and the estimated time of arrival in Valencia.

Best wishes,
Rita

email_chain.subject: Invitation to Visit a Solar Farm in Spain
email_chain.body:
Hey Jessica!

Guess what? I'm visiting a solar farm here in Spain that produces over 50MW of energy and spans more than 1km². I hope you can join me to explore this fascinating place sometime soon.

Good luck with your Master's degree!
Best wishes,
Nico

email_chain.subject: Request for Interview on Your New Role
email_chain.body:
Hi Nigel!

Can we schedule some time for a face-to-face interview regarding your recent promotion? I'd like to capture a brief overview of your new role. The interview will be longer than one minute, and I will record both audio and visual. I plan to edit the footage and send it to you for approval before we use it in our feature.

Looking forward to your response!
Victor

email_chain.subject: RE: Order Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,
The details of the dresses

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for cargo shipment from Singapore to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Good day,

Would you be able to handle a 2,000MT cargo of oil from Singapore to Hamburg next month?

Thanks,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for cargo shipment from Singapore to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Good day Anthony,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can arrange the transport of 2,000 MT of Fuel Oil with 0.5% Sulphur on a time charter basis to Hamburg, with 180 days bunker credit. Please provide the TEU count as we might be able to arrange an additional vessel for container shipment.

Furthermore, please ensure that the following documents are sent via DHL Express on the morning the vessel is due to berth at Hamburg:
a) Invoices for cargo
b) Bill of Lading (B/L), blanket basis
c) Inspection Certificate
d) Agency Copy of manifest
e) Charter Party

Please let us know your suggestions and confirm if you agree with these terms.

You can contact me directly at Tel No: +852 2869 2131 or via email.

Best regards,
William Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for cargo shipment from Singapore to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Confirming receipt of your proposal. Please provide me with the usual terms and conditions of the charter party. It is imperative that your vessel complies with MARPOL 73/78 regulations, equipped for the separation of oily waste and the containment, recovery, and processing of oily residue onboard.

The vessel must be certified as per MARPOL 73/78 and seaworthy.

Awaiting your detailed charter party conditions.

Best,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Storage fees for chemical shipment from Bilbao to La Coruña
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

We are planning to transport 6,000MT of chemicals from Bilbao to La Coruña. Could you please inform us whether storage fees are applicable for this shipment? We would appreciate a prompt response.

Best regards,
Celia

email_chain.subject: Vessel availability for shipping from Ho Chi Minh City to Manila
email_chain.body:
Hi Marc,

We intend to ship 2,500MT of chemicals from Ho Chi Minh City to Manila. Could you let us know about the availability of vessels for this route as soon as possible?

Thank you,
Azmi

email_chain.subject: Freight estimate for plastic materials shipment from Kaohsiung to HMM
email_chain.body:
Hey Angela,

We need to arrange the shipping of 3,500MT of plastic materials from Kaohsiung to HMM. Could you provide us with a freight estimate and inform us about the storage fees in case we miss the tight laycan?

Thank you,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Request for freight estimate from Bilbao to Gdansk
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

We are looking to ship 3,800MT of chemicals from Bilbao to Gdansk. Can you provide a preliminary freight estimate and clarify any additional fees that may be applicable?

email_chain.subject: Loading Window Query for Fuel Oil
email_chain.body: Hi Don, Could you inform me about the loading window for 40,000MT of #2 fuel oil from Haldia to Singapore? Additionally, please advise on the laycan. Regards, Mike

email_chain.subject: Urgency on Loading Window and Laycan Details
email_chain.body: Don, To clarify, we need to coordinate the loading of our product with the disembarking of another 90,000 tonnes of cargo. It is crucial to stick as closely as possible to the current laycan for logistical reasons. We must confirm the schedule by 20:00 Hong Kong time on the 12th due to these constraints. Thank you for your understanding. Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Loading Window and Laycan Information
email_chain.body: Hi Mike, The laycan for loading 40,000MT of #2 fuel oil at Haldia is scheduled from 12th Aug to 14th Aug. The estimated time of arrival (ETA) in Singapore is between 15th Aug and 16th Aug. Regards, Don

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Exact ETA for Singapore
email_chain.body: Hi Don, Thank you for the details. As the exact dates are crucial for our operation, can you confirm the exact ETA for Singapore? Additionally, please note that the vessel will be loading two different cargoes. Regards, Mike

email_chain.subject: Appreciation for Assistance
email_chain.body: Don, Thanks again for your prompt support on this matter. This scheduling should help ensure a smooth operation. Best regards, Mike

email_chain.subject: Urgent Freight Quote Request from Marseilles to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Hello CQAS,

Is your vessel, QAS Chongqing, currently at Chongqing? We need to urgently schedule the shipment of 3,000MT of barium nitrate from Marseilles to Dalian. Please provide us with a freight quote, and also send your terms and conditions at your earliest convenience.

Kind regards,
Stephen

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Freight Quote Request from Marseilles to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Dear Stephen,

Thank you for reaching out. We confirm our vessel QAS Chongqing is currently in Chongqing. We can ship your cargo for €4,000 per tonne, including all duties. Payment is due upon collection, and we will send monthly invoices for the cargo transported.

Attached are our terms and conditions. Please let us know if you need any further documents such as bills of lading.

Best regards,
CQAS Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Documents Request
email_chain.body:
Dear CQAS,

Thank you for your prompt response. Could you please send me the original bill of lading and two copies of it for our records, along with two copies of the invoices from the last shipment?

Best regards,
Stephen

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Documents Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Stephen,

Attached are two copies of the bill of lading along with the invoices for the last two weeks of shipment as requested. Please confirm receipt.

Best regards,
CQAS Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Bill of Lading Required
email_chain.body:
Dear CQAS,

Thank you for the documents. However, I require the original bill of lading to acquire a letter of credit from our bank. Could you please provide this at your earliest convenience?

Best regards,
Stephen

email_chain.subject: Re: Bill of Lading Required
email_chain.body:
Dear Stephen,

Apologies for the oversight. I am sending you the original bill of lading now. Please confirm its receipt.

Best regards,
CQAS Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Delivery Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear CQAS,

Could you confirm when the cargo was delivered? I am having some difficulties tracking that date.

Best,
Stephen

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Delivery Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Stephen,

We do not issue a statement of receipt but you can track the delivery status by calling our cargo tracking service. However, I can confirm that the cargo was delivered safely.

If you need the consignor's signature on the bill of lading, please let me know and I will send it to you.

Best regards,
CQAS Shipping

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vanadium Pentoxide Shipment from South Africa to Fos Sur Mer
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Sylvia,

I hope all is well. I am inquiring about a shipment of 3,500MT of vanadium pentoxide from South Africa to Fos Sur Mer, with a targeted late-July laycan. The preferred lead time is around ten days. Could you please inform me about the port of loading in South Africa?

Many thanks,
Jaye

email_chain.subject: Need Confirmation on Vanadium Pentoxide Purchase
email_chain.body:
Ms. Sylvia,

If you accept our offer, please let me know so I can forward the shipment documents to you.

Best regards,
Jean-Christophe Constantinou
Hydrodec Plc
Bellevue House, 27th Avenue
Neston, Chester
CH64 3RH
England
Tel: +44 151 356 7972
Fax: +44 151 356 8393
Website: http://www.hydrodec.com
Email: jconstantinou@hydrodec.com

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Vanadium Pentoxide Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Jean-Christophe Constantinou,

Thank you for your inquiry about vanadium pentoxide. We can offer loading at Fos Sur Mer in late July. The port of loading will be Secunda, South Africa. We are prepared to load 3,500MT in bulk, packaged in 25kg bags. Upon confirmation, we will provide the following documents: Proforma Invoice, Commercial Invoice, Bill of Lading, and Packing List. The payment terms will be L/C at sight.

We specialize in facilitating trade in chemicals, pharmaceuticals, and related materials, offering comprehensive support to producers, traders, and brokers alike.

Best regards,
Ms. Sylvia

email_chain.subject: Availability and Freight Inquiry for Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Elliot,

We’d like to load 9,000MT of crude palm oil from Port Klang to Chennai. Could you confirm your earliest availability and share a ballpark lumpsum freight?

Kind regards,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability and Freight Inquiry for Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Raj.

We are currently available. Could you specify which product exactly you require? 

Kind regards,
Mari

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability and Freight Inquiry for Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mari.

We are specifically looking for mixed bleached and deodorised palm olein (MDB).

Kind regards,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Product Specifications Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Raj,

For mixed bleached and deodorised palm olein, could you confirm the specifications regarding the percentage of free fatty acids (%FFA), the percentage of acid value (%AV), and any mention of gum level?

Kind regards,
Mari

email_chain.subject: Re: Product Specifications Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Mari,

For MDB, it's FFA max 0.1% and AV max 3.0%. There is no mention of gum level.

Kind regards,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - CIF Chennai
email_chain.body:
Hello Mari.

Our buyer would like to proceed with CIF terms to Chennai. We are preparing to send an offer with the FOB price. Please let me know if your seller is open to this.

Best regards,
Alastair

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - CIF Chennai
email_chain.body:
Hi Alastair,

RBD stearin might be more appropriate for your requirements as we currently don't stock the exact grade you're looking for. Would this alternative be suitable for your buyer?

Kind regards,
Mari

labels.commodity: Mixed Bleached and Deodorised Palm Olein

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Container Receipt
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. White, As you know, we are importing 2,500MT of coffee bags from Sao Paulo to Rotterdam and are expecting to receive them within 10 days. Can you confirm if you have received the full complement of containers? If there are any delays, please let us know the reasons and the expected arrival time. Best regards, Ann

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Container Receipt
email_chain.body: Hello Miss Ann, I have received all containers as scheduled. I will bring the warehouse master invoice this coming Tuesday. Please find attached our short-term bank guarantee. Thank you very much. Yours sincerely, E.

email_chain.subject: Update on Warehouse Master Invoice
email_chain.body: Dear Ann, Though I previously confirmed the receipt of all containers, I must inform you that the warehouse master invoices have not yet been delivered. You are expected to provide the master invoices no later than 9 August. Please confirm if this timeline is acceptable. Yours sincerely, E.

email_chain.subject: Job Opportunity for Software Engineer
email_chain.body: Hi, I am seeking an experienced software engineer for a significant project involving a team of 10 people over approximately 6 months. The project will utilize UML and involve J2EE/J2SE technologies. Candidates should possess strong proficiency in UML and J2EE. If you are interested, please respond for further details. Thank you, Michael.

email_chain.subject: Re: Job Opportunity for Software Engineer
email_chain.body: Hi Michael, I have some experience in software engineering and am eager to take on more responsibility in a large-scale project. Could you provide more details regarding the nature of the project? Is it oriented towards development or maintenance? Regards, Raymond.

email_chain.subject: Following Up: Inquiry About Project Details
email_chain.body: Hi Michael, To add to my previous message, I am deeply interested in your project and have previous experience working with large software projects. I would like to discuss this opportunity with you in detail. Thanks, Raymond.

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Xylo,

My client has 20,000MT of cargo for transportation. Please quote for carriage on single voyage terms from Houston to Antwerp.

Best,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Validity
email_chain.body:
Hi Xylo,

This is the third quote we received for this job. The rates you offered are close to the lowest we have seen. Could you please confirm that your proposal will remain valid for three days from today?

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Best,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Validity
email_chain.body:
Hello Elena,

This confirmation serves to verify that our offer stands valid for three days from today's date. This is subject to the condition that the cargo passes final inspection. All relevant documents including the Bill of Lading will be sent by email on the day of shipment. Please note, we accept no liability for errors in email transmissions and reserve the right to withhold payment in respect of cargo received in less than perfect condition. Additionally, as per our discussion, full payment of $65,000.00 is required in advance.

Best regards,
Xylo

email_chain.subject: Query on Payment Terms and Contract Updates
email_chain.body:
Dear Xylo,

Could you please share your legal terms as we have not seen them before proceeding? Regarding the payment terms, would a partial advance payment of $20,000.00 be acceptable?

Best,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Cargo Space Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Vanessa,

We'd like to load 12,000 MT of crude palm oil from Port Klang to Chennai this weekend. Could you please let us know if you have space available? Looking forward to your prompt response.

Regards,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Interest in Palm Kernel Oil Purchase
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

We are interested in purchasing palm kernel oil. Could you please provide the terms and conditions for shipping to the port of Brazil?

Sincerely yours,
Rosalind

email_chain.subject: Offer for Palm Kernel Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Jose,

We have 6,000 MT of palm kernel oil that will be ready for loading at the end of this month. We are open to your offer.

Best regards,
Antonio

email_chain.subject: Starting Conversation
email_chain.body: Initiating our discussion on the upcoming project.

email_chain.subject: Re: Starting Conversation
email_chain.body: Thank you for reaching out. Looking forward to working together.

email_chain.subject: Finalizing Details
email_chain.body: "All set from my side. Please confirm all the details at your end."

email_chain.subject: Arrangement for 100,000MT HFO Delivery
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Habib,

Would you please help arrange for a 100,000MT parcel of Heavy Fuel Oil (HFO) to be delivered from the Panama Canal to Port Qasim? Could you also provide the Landed Freight and Goods (LFG) rate and the expected transit time?

Regards,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Update on Vessel and Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Habib,

The vessel Sun Dragon we arranged to charter has sucessfully taken the HFO cargo on board at the Panama Canal. However, it is currently delayed at Port Qasim due to damaged ship-to-ship transfer hoses from a recent collision. The ship's owner has opted to order a new set of hoses, which will take a couple of weeks to be delivered and installed.

Is there any alternative loading method that we can use? I will try to make the necessary arrangements to comply with your request.

Regards,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Discharge Arrangements
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Habib,

This morning, we received confirmation that the shipment can be discharged as scheduled into our own terminal at Port Qasim.

Regards,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Smith,
Our office is arranging a 2,400MT freight of fresh fruit from South Africa to Antwerp, departing next week. Could you please confirm the earliest available dates for loading and inform us if you have a standard demurrage rate?
Thank you,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear John,
As you are probably aware, we regularly ship fresh produce from South Africa to Antwerp. Our two available ships are being loaded and are scheduled for departure next week. If the vessel of your choice is not available, we can provide an alternative. Attached is a charter summary for your information, and we confirm our standard rates as per your inquiry.
We look forward to your decision.
Yours sincerely,
Juan Du Preez
Umschlagskontor
P.S. We understand the urgency and have facilities to conduct expedited quality checks through our certified biological agency.

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear John,
We confirm receipt of your inquiry regarding a new vessel for your cargo scheduled for loading on 1st December. Currently, our bookings are full. However, with the journey taking only 21 days, our southbound vessel should return promptly and be available for an early charter. For further discussions, please contact Mr. Du Preez or myself.
Yours sincerely,
Nicol Kohn
Schiffahrtkontor

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Shipment Update
email_chain.body:
Dear John,
We regret to inform you that the vessel 'Daanen de Jong' was detained by the USCG in New York. Given the heavy congestion at Antwerp, we recommend an earlier departure for your shipment. Sadly, our southbound vessel 'Baedeker' has been chartered by our German branch for a new deep-sea voyage and is en route to the USA. The vessel 'Winkelhuis' has been loaded and will depart on 5th December. Our dispatch department is checking for a temporary substitute vessel's availability. Attached is a chart for your reference.
Please inform us of your intentions at your earliest convenience.
Regards,
Nicol Kohn

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Adhesive Transport Rates and Possibilities
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Ferrara,

We’re exploring rates for transporting 4,500MT of adhesives from Hamburg to Aarhus. Is it possible to combine our cargo with any existing fixture? Additionally, could you please inform us about your demurrage rates?

Thanks,
Ivy

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Transport Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Ferrara,

Following up on my previous email, I wanted to inquire if there might be a possibility of negotiating a lower rate given that we have multiple shipments of this cargo?

Thank you,
Ivy

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Transport Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Ivy,

For the fixture in question, I cannot offer a lower rate. However, I am interested in understanding if you would consider utilizing any future fixtures that might have space for your product. Please let me know your thoughts.

Regards,
Ms. Ferrara

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Meeting Regarding Business Negotiations
email_chain.body:
Hi Ivy,

We would like to invite you to discuss your requirements further with our business manager. Could you please let us know your availability for a meeting?

Best regards,
Ms. Ferrara

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Chartering from Portland to Lagos Next Month
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Ling,

Do you have a suitable vessel for transporting 3,400MT of oilcake from Portland to Lagos next month, with a slight laycan buffer? Could you please provide the approximate freight quote for this route?

Best regards,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Chartering from Portland to Lagos Next Month
email_chain.body:
Dear Jose,

I just spoke with our Chartering Manager in Hong Kong. We have an 18-year-old vessel available, equipped with AIS, which fits your requirements. The freight rate is approximately $19,000.

Should you have any questions or need further assistance, you can reach out to Gary Ngai, our Insurance Manager, at: Mobile: +852-9555-4136, Direct line: +852-3109-7528.

Best regards,
Liu Ling
Chartering Manager
Nippon Yusen Kaisha Hong Kong Limited

email_chain.subject: Query about Insurance and Freight Rate Per Metric Ton
email_chain.body:
Hi Gary,

Could you please confirm the freight rate quoted by the brokers for the vessel? Additionally, what would be the total insurance cost? Could you also specify the overall freight rate per metric ton?

Best regards,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Insurance Confirmation and Freight Rate Clarification
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Ling,

I am concerned as I couldn't find the overall freight rate per metric ton in the quote you provided. Can you confirm that the vessel is fully insured for the route from Portland to Lagos?

Kind regards,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Ownership and Contact Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Gary,

According to the Nippon Yusen Kaisha company website, the ships were managed by Kyokuyo Sangyo Co., Ltd. as of September 4, 2014. Who currently owns the vessel and what is the contact number for that company?

Best,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Options and Rate for Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Pandey,

Could you provide some vessel options for a 15kt shipment of methanol from Rotterdam to Montevideo under CFR terms and the corresponding rate?

Best regards,
Andy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Ethanol Shipment Terms
email_chain.body:
If we consider a 250 MT cargo of Ethanol (44 kg/cu m density and 22 cents per liter), transported from Moin, Honduras; What would be the total cost of freight, and the shipping time if it is 5 days?

Can you please provide the figures before midnight today?

Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Ethanol Shipment Terms
email_chain.body:
I assume this is for shipping to Montevideo, Uruguay.

Based on the given data, and assuming the routing via Mediterranean and Atlantic Ocean, our preliminary assessment suggests a freight cost estimate of USD 700.00 per ton for Ethanol loading at Moin. The mentioned FOB in Hamburg rate of USD 420.00 per ton would apply with a port rotation in Moin, Santos, and Constanza.

For a detailed and accurate quotation covering all your commercial requirements, please allow us to send a complete proposal. We are happy to provide more information and discuss competitive shipping costs to transport Ethanol to Montevideo, Uruguay.

Best regards,
Mr. Pandey

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Steel Coils from Karachi to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Hello Sir,

How much would it cost to ship 23,600MT of steel coils from Karachi to Mumbai?

Best regards,
Antoni

email_chain.subject: Shipping Coal to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Could you let me know if you ship to Rio de Janeiro/Brazil? Will you ship 30,000 Metric tons of Coal to the Port of Santos-Brazil? Could you let me know if you need any documents or other materials to complete the shipment?

Iuri Pernett

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Steel Bars from Shanghai to Salem Port, India
email_chain.body:
Hello,

We would like to know if you can ship 150,000 tons of steel bars from Shanghai, China to Salem Port in India? Please let us know the details; we are waiting for your prompt reply.

The Manager

email_chain.subject: Shipping Steel Coils from Karachi to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sirs,

We would like to ship 20,000MT of steel coils from Karachi to Shanghai. Please advise the total costs involved and if you could handle the shipment.

Jintao

email_chain.subject: Transporting Coal from Ukraine to India

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,
Can you arrange 500 MT of bread wheat shipment from Aqaba to Rouen?
Regards,
Nuts

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Nuts,
Yes, I can arrange that for you. Could you please specify the delivery date?
Best,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,
I need the delivery date to be 1st March for 500 MT of bread wheat.
Thanks,
Nuts

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Nuts,
Confirmed, I can deliver by 1st March. Do you wish to finalize with cash payment and on an FOB basis?
Best regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,
Yes, I'd prefer to pay in cash. Please arrange the shipment on an FOB basis.
Thanks,
Nuts

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Nuts,
FOB arrangement is possible. However, we could increase the shipment to either 1000 MT or 2000 MT if preferred, since finding a suitable shipper might be easier with a larger cargo. Let me know your preference.
Best,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,
Let's proceed with 2000 MT of bread wheat on 1 March. Please arrange for the increased volume.
Thanks,
Nuts

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Nuts,
I will proceed as confirmed for 2000 MT FOB on 1 March. Looking forward to completing this smoothly.
Best,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Time for Bid - Contact Ms. Jayne Smythe for Appointment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Jones,

This is just a quick note to say that we need to keep the bid for this charter coming in scope. Could you check your availability for a 40-foot container from London to Southampton? Your expertise would be appreciated in formulating this bid.

I am available for a call next Tuesday or Thursday morning. Please let me know if these times work for you as well.

Kind regards,

Patrick

email_chain.subject: Requesting a Bid - Your Prompt Reply Will Be Greatly Appreciated
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Jones,

I would appreciate it if you could send a bid to Ms. Jayne Smythe for this shipment. We need to ensure it reaches her by Wednesday afternoon. The shipment involves a 40-foot Less than Container Load (LCL), utilizing a roll-on roll-off service. Please remember that the bill of lading should be ready by Monday.

Kind regards,

Patrick

email_chain.subject: Requesting a Quote ASAP - Ms. Jayne Smythe is Expecting a Prompt Response
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Jones,

Could you please prioritize making time to get a bid out to Ms. Jayne Smythe? We need this done by Tuesday afternoon. Keep in mind the bill of lading should be ready by Monday.

Kind regards,

Patrick

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Shipping Rates: Guangzhou to Hamburg

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Booking and Rate Inquiry: Guangzhou to Hamburg
