Regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Sines, Portugal to Santos, Brazil
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. DeCosta,

We are planning to load 4,300MT of Urea from Sines, Portugal to Santos, Brazil. Could you confirm your earliest vessel availability and provide an initial ballpark freight estimate (lumpsum)?

Kind regards,
Monika

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Inquiry: Sines, Portugal to Santos, Brazil
email_chain.body:
Dear Monika,

Thank you for reaching out. We can offer the vessel EC LASH with an availability window from the 28th of February to the 2nd of March for loading in Sines, expected to depart a day earlier. Please review the attached details in our PDF file and let us know if you wish to proceed.

Best Regards,
Jose

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Inquiry: Sines, Portugal to Santos, Brazil
email_chain.body:
Dear Monika,

Adding to my colleague Jose's message, our vessel will be ready in Sines between the 27th of February and the 1st of March, with loading set to commence a day earlier. We are looking forward to your confirmation.

Best Regards,
Jimmy

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Inquiry: Sines, Portugal to Santos, Brazil
email_chain.body:
Dear Jimmy,

Thank you for the details. Please confirm the exact loading day in Sines and the minimal possible laytime. Additionally, we are considering another shipment from Huelva, Spain to Santos; what are the earliest possibilities for this route?

Best Regards,
Monika

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Inquiry: Sines, Portugal to Santos, Brazil
email_chain.body:
Dear Monika,

The loading in Sines is scheduled for the 26th or 27th of February, with an estimated laytime of 36 hours. For the route from Huelva to Santos, our earliest available ship would be suitable for your needs on the 10th of March with a 5-day loading period.

Best Regards,
Jimmy

email_chain.subject: RE: Proposal for Other Shipments
email_chain.body:
Dear Jimmy,

Can you confirm if your offer for the Sines-Santos via Lisbon route is fixed? We also have additional shipments varying in size destined for Santos. We would appreciate knowing your earliest shipping options from Huelva.
We are not interested in routes involving Thailand at this time.

Regards,
Monika

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cardboard Shipment from Gladstone to Tokyo
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. McAdoo,

We are interested in purchasing 3,500 MT of cardboard for shipment from Gladstone to Tokyo. Could you please provide your pricing, terms and conditions options, and confirm availability for this cargo? Your earliest response would be appreciated as we are looking to finalize the terms soon.

Many thanks,
Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Request for Terms and Invoice Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. McAdoo,

As a long-standing customer, I am writing to request the latest terms, conditions, and detailed invoice for our ongoing deals. A prompt reply would help in aligning our records.

Yours truly,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: Urgent Price Request for Immediate Fax
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. McAdoo,

I hope this message finds you well. As your frequent customer, I am urgently in need of the pricing for our recent discussions. We need to include this in our fax to partners today. A quick response would be greatly appreciated.

Sincerely,
Dave

email_chain.subject: Request for a New Quotation - Change of Supplier
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. McAdoo,

We are considering a change in our supplier roster and are looking at new quotations to compare with our current deals. Your reference number for our last interaction was LD454233. We await your competitive offer.

Best regards,
Eric
DHL – Germany

email_chain.subject: Terms and Conditions Approval Needed
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. McAdoo,

Thank you for your recent quotation. Attached are the required contract terms and conditions along with the original T/C for your approval. We look forward to moving forward upon your confirmation.

Yours truly,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Suppliers in Japan
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. McAdoo,

Could you kindly confirm which suppliers you are handling in Japan as per our ongoing supply requirements? This information will crucially aid our logistics planning.

Yours truly,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Lam, Could you send me a list of price quotations on shipping bulk cargoes from China to any port in Malaysia? Thanks, Rosaline

email_chain.subject: Detailed Request for Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Lam, Could you send me a list of price quotations for shipping 100,000 metric tons of raw cotton from China to any port in Malaysia? Thanks, Rosaline

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Long-Term Barley Supply From Constanta to Genoa
email_chain.body:
Good morning Gloria, 

We are planning to load 4,800MT of barley from Constanta to Genoa. Given our interest in a long-term partnership, I've attached a questionnaire to better understand your requirements and expectations. Please review and let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Francisco

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Approval of the Attached Questionnaire
email_chain.body:
Good morning, 

Following up on my previous email, I’ve attached the questionnaire again for your approval and reconfirmation. Looking forward to your feedback.

Best regards,
Francisco

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Long-Term Barley Supply From Constanta to Genoa
email_chain.body:
Good morning Francisco,

Thank you for your email. I have reviewed the questionnaire and confirm my understanding. I propose we prioritize assignments based on our long-term business objectives as discussed. Attached below are my responses for your reference.

Thank you!
Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Training and Regular Update Meetings
email_chain.body:
Hi Gloria,

Congratulations on moving forward! As part of our commitment, please ensure regular attendance at training sessions to better align our operations and maximise efficiency. Your punctuality is appreciable.

Thanks,
Francisco

email_chain.subject: Request to Preview the Operational Model
email_chain.body:
Morning Francisco,

Could you provide a preview of the operational model that we discussed earlier? This would help us better prepare for the integration of our work processes.

Regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Offer for Gasoil Load - Ras Tanura to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Hi Matthew,

We have 32,500MT of gasoil available for shipment from Ras Tanura to Port Sudan. The cargo can be loaded in early June. Could you please confirm if the price is acceptable for you? Also, please confirm the demurrage terms.

Regards,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Gasoil Load - Ras Tanura to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Dear Henry,

Yes, the price is acceptable. Could you please provide the exact loading dates available in early June?

Regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Gasoil Load - Ras Tanura to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

The cargo is indeed available from early June. The specific loading date will depend on the buyer's preference. Please discuss with the buyer and let us know their preferred loading date.

Regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Gasoil Load - Ras Tanura to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

We would like to propose the 2nd of June for loading the cargo. Please let us know if this date is acceptable.

Regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Gasoil Load - Ras Tanura to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Unfortunately, the buyer cannot accommodate the 2nd of June as they have prior commitments. Would the 4th of June be a feasible alternative for loading?

Regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Gasoil Load - Ras Tanura to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

We will endeavor to make arrangements for the 4th of June. I will confirm once I've ensured availability and discussed further with our buyer.

Regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Invitation to End-of-Year Party
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

We're excited to invite you to the end-of-year party on Friday, 22 December 2024, at the ballroom of the Park Plaza County Hall. If you have any questions, or if you can't make it, please reply to this email.

Regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Invitation to End-of-Year Party
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam,

Thank you for the invitation to the end-of-year party on Friday, 22 December 2024, at the ballroom of the Park Plaza County Hall. Unfortunately, I already have plans and will not be able to attend.

Regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Invitation to End-of-Year Party
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam,

I wanted to confirm that I have received your invitation for the 22nd December party. However, I regrettably will not be able to attend due to prior commitments. Thank you for the invite!

Best Regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for 35,000-ton Tanker
email_chain.body:
Good morning Dr. Beckmann,

We would like to charter a 35,000-ton tanker for 60 days to ship 250,000MT of crude oil from Algiers to Marseille. Do you have a vessel available?

Best regards,
Amy

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for 35,000-ton Tanker
email_chain.body:
Hi Amy,

I think I could send you the relevant details of the chartering options that might be appropriate for your requirements.

Best wishes,
Sandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for 35,000-ton Tanker - Additional Details Requested
email_chain.body:
Dear Sandy,

Thank you for your prompt response. We are considering the following charter options:
(a) Time charter for 60 days, or
(b) A long-term contract spanning 3 months, which includes one voyage with an option to charter for two additional voyages.

Could you provide options that align with these requirements?

Best regards,
Amy

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Freight and Storage Pricing
email_chain.body:
Hello Andy,

I am suggesting we add a comprehensive package to your current offering that includes a high-volume freight service (around 2k in volume) along with corresponding storage options. This package should also account for deductibles, commission, and anticipated profits. Could you please send us your most recent proposal reflecting these additions?

Regards,
Jennifer

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Freight and Storage Pricing
email_chain.body:
Hello Andy,

Your initial offer seems promising! Could you also include a week of equipment rental in the deal? This addition would really solidify our interest.

Regards,
Jennifer

email_chain.subject: Final Offer for Freight and Storage Package
email_chain.body:
Hello Jennifer,

Here's my final offer based on our discussions: $3,200 for freight, $1,100 for storage, and a $250 deductible. Please review and let me know if this meets your expectations.

Regards,
Andy

email_chain.subject: RORO Transport Request from Turkey to Germany
email_chain.body: Hello, I'd like to inquire about booking a RORO transport for a vehicle measuring 26 meters and with 4 axles from Turkey to Germany. Could you please provide more information on availability and requirements? Thanks, Elio

email_chain.subject: Re: RORO Transport Request from Turkey to Germany
email_chain.body: Hi Elio, currently, we only have availability for RORO and axle trucks from Holland to South Africa, and 16-meter, 3-axle options from Holland to Morocco and Romania. To assist you further, could you please provide the dimensions of the cargo? Best, Logistics Team

email_chain.subject: Re: RORO Transport Request from Turkey to Germany
email_chain.body: Hi, the dimensions of the container are 9.56m in length, 2.5m in width, and 3.8m in height, with an empty weight of 2800 kg. We intend to transport a centrifuge system that exceeds the dimensions of a standard 20-foot container. Thank you for your assistance, Elio

email_chain.subject: Re: RORO Transport Request from Turkey to Germany
email_chain.body: Hello Elio, based on the information provided, the total weight and dimensions exceed our current capacity for RORO vehicles. Our available vehicles handle up to 28 tons, while your cargo has an overall weight of 35 tons. Unfortunately, we cannot accommodate a 4-axle, 40-ton vehicle as needed. Please let me know if there's anything else we might assist you with. Regards, Logistics Team

email_chain.subject: Re: RORO Transport Request from Turkey to Germany
email_chain.body: Thank you for the clarification. It seems we will need to explore alternative options or adjust the specifications of our cargo. I appreciate your assistance. Best, Elio

labels.cargo_size: 9.56 m long x 2.5 m wide x 3.8 m high, 2800 kg empty weight

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Charter: Port Lagos to Mina Al Ahmadi
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Jones,

We are in need of a vessel to transport 7,000MT of refined crude oil from Port Lagos, Nigeria to Mina Al Ahmadi, Kuwait. We would like to discuss a lumpsum deal and are interested in your vessel availability from October 19 to November 2. Looking forward to your response.

Regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter: Port Lagos to Mina Al Ahmadi
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Anders,

Thank you for reaching out. Our vessel, the MV Khaleej, could ship 7,000MT of refined crude oil from Port Lagos for an FOB price of USD 55 million. We can offer a charter rate of USD 120,000/day. The vessel, currently on charter in Galveston, Texas, has an average speed of 14.6 knots, and the voyage would take approximately 11 days. Your agents in Galveston would need to make all arrangements for the charter.

Regards,
Mr. Jimmie Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter: Port Lagos to Mina Al Ahmadi
email_chain.body:
Hi Jimmie,

Could you clarify how long you need the charter for? Also, considering potential weather conditions, what is the estimated total voyage time? Could you please provide your company profile as well?

Regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter: Port Lagos to Mina Al Ahmadi
email_chain.body:
Hi Anders,

Thanks for your questions. The charter period would cover the 11-day voyage which factors in average weather conditions. I've attached our company profile for your review. Please let us know if there are any more details you require.

Regards,
Jimmie Jones

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Transport and Insurance Costs for PET
email_chain.body: Good day, We are seeking 50 tons of PET from Taipei to Singapore, with a preferred loading date of 11th December. Could you please provide the airfreight and insurance costs? Best regards, Chuck

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transport and Insurance Costs for PET
email_chain.body: Dear Chuck, Please allow me some time to calculate the airfreight and insurance costs. I expect to have the details ready for you within two days. Thank you for your patience. Best, Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transport and Insurance Costs for PET
email_chain.body: Good day, The airfreight cost from Taipei to Singapore is estimated at $4,000 per ton, and the insurance cost is about $1,000 per ton. The loading date of 11th December is confirmed. Are we able to secure a slot for 50 tons on this date? Additionally, could you provide the total cost including airfreight and insurance? Best regards, Chuck

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transport and Insurance Costs for PET
email_chain.body: Dear Chuck, I noticed your estimated costs; the airfreight appears considerably lower compared to the insurance costs. Could you elaborate on why the insurance is priced at $1,000 per ton? Best regards, Chris

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Cost Proportions
email_chain.body: Dear Chuck, To ensure we proceed correctly, could you help clarify why the insurance cost constitutes about 20% of the airfreight cost? Thank you, Chris

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Voyage Charter Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Zara,

We are prepared to load the gasoline at Jubail on April 15th. Could you provide the terms for the voyage charter? We note that a typical contract includes 24 hours as the benchmark for demurrage/laytime, with the charterer becoming liable for demurrage for each day beyond this benchmark.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Freight Rates
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain Ford,

I noted your early availability for loading gasoline at Jubail. I am currently assessing market interest for this cargo. Could you please provide your freight rate?

Regards,
Mona

email_chain.subject: Freight and Charter Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Mona,

We can deliver gasoline on a 35-day FOB basis and provide a voyage charter with 35 days' notice. Our freight rate ranges from $3,000 to $3,200 per metric ton, free on board Rotterdam.

I await your response.

Best regards,
Captain Ford

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Gasoline Purchase CIF Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

We would like to confirm the purchase of 80,000 metric tons of gasoline CIF Rotterdam at $7,000 per metric ton. Could you confirm your availability? We will discuss freight and charter details subsequently.

Please advise soon as my colleague is keen to confirm this price.

Best regards,
Zara

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Gasoline Purchase CIF Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Zara,

We regret to inform you that arranging the gasoline supply via FOB Rotterdam is not feasible at this time. However, we are prepared to supply the gasoline in 35 days and on a voyage charter. We could alternatively supply CIF Rotterdam at the same freight rate of $7,000 per metric ton, overcoming the FOB limitation.

Please confirm that this arrangement is acceptable. Our principal would like to proceed with payment via letter of credit.

We await your prompt response.
Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Corn Oil Shipment Opportunity from Puerto Alegre to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Chang,

We have space available for 11,100 MT of corn oil from Puerto Alegre to Shanghai. The earliest date for lifting is on the 20th, while your open vessel is expected to arrive on the 26th. The freight charge is 22.5%, and payments will be processed in USD from our Taiwan account. We look forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. Chan,

Could you please let us know if you have any availability for shipments? We are looking to transport 11,100 MT of corn oil, with open delivery terms and payment to be made in USD in Shanghai.

Best regards,
Albertina Silva

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Could you clarify how we can arrange loading of corn oil under terms of open delivery and payment? Also, please provide your commercial terms for the transaction.

Regards,
Wayne

email_chain.subject: Availability of Corn Oil for Immediate Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. Chan,

We would like to confirm the final agreement as we have availability for 16,000 MT of corn oil. The shipment is planned from the 20th of this month to the 3rd of next month, originating from Argentina to Shanghai, payment in USD.

Best Regards,
Marta Maffei

email_chain.subject: Loading Inquiry for Open Delivery and Payment
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Following up on your last message, could you guide us on how we can proceed with loading the 11,100 MT of corn oil on our barge with open delivery and payment terms?

Thank you and regards,
Adolphus

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Needed on Corn Oil Requirement
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. Carl Chan,

Could you please update us on the final agreement? We have 18,000 MT of corn oil available for your needs, with payment options open in USD and shipment from Puerto Alegre to Shanghai.

Best regards,
Helena

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Transport 50,000L Transformer Oil from Dunkirk to Ancona
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Helmen,

We have an urgent requirement to move 50,000L of transformer oil from Dunkirk to Ancona within two days. Could you provide me with a rate for a Danish flag vessel? What are your payment terms, if any?

Regards,
Tim

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Transport 50,000L Transformer Oil from Dunkirk to Ancona
email_chain.body:
Dear Tim,

Thank you for your query. We can offer the transportation of the transformer oil on a Danish flag vessel similar to vessel name [Vessel Name], which was built in 2007. This vessel has a length of 72.00m, beam of 13.30m, and draft of 5.00m, navigating at a speed of 14.5 knots. Please confirm if this vessel meets your requirements so we can proceed to discuss the rate and payment terms.

Best regards,
Mr. Helmen

email_chain.subject: Cargo Consolidation Opportunities from UK/Benelux/Germany to Mexico Next Week
email_chain.body:
Hey Edd,

Could you please let me know if there is any cargo we can consolidate for you out of London next week? We are planning shipments from the UK, Benelux, and Germany to Mexico. Our available vessels for this route include the 'Cap Othello' at 11,000 metric tonnes and two feeder vessels, each capable of carrying 4,000 metric tonnes. Let me know if there are opportunities for consolidation.

Cheers,
Ariel

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Consolidation Opportunities from UK/Benelux/Germany to Mexico Next Week
email_chain.body:
Hi Ariel,

Thank you for reaching out. There's a cargo available in Rotterdam suitable for your feeder vessel: 20 metric tonnes of carbon steel coils. The cargo will originate from Romania and is available for loading starting tomorrow. Could you please provide the deadweight tonnage of the feeder vessel and your shipping rates so that I can make further arrangements?

Thank you.
Edd

email_chain.subject: Re: Possible Loading in Rotterdam for Feeder Vessel
email_chain.body:
Hi Edd,

Can you provide a full offer including the Estimated Time of Berthing (ETB) for our load in Rotterdam on January 11, 2018? Looking forward to your detailed proposal.

Cheers,
Ariel

email_chain.subject: Re: Full Offer Details Required for Rotterdam Load
email_chain.body:
Dear Ariel,

Thank you for your request. Please find the full offer details enclosed for the 20 metric tonnes of carbon steel coils. We are preparing all the necessary documents and will ensure everything is set for the January 11th loading date. We look forward to a successful partnership.

Yours faithfully,
Amber

Attached: Offer_Details.pdf

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: 7,000MT of Grain from Tampa to Gibraltar
email_chain.body:
Hi Jay,
Could you provide me with an estimated rate for shipping 7,000MT of grain from Tampa to Gibraltar on an FOB basis? I would also like to see options for CIF and DAP. Additionally, can you specify which insurance provider you use? Thank you.
Best regards,
Phil

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote: Cargo Update
email_chain.body:
Hello Phil,
I've discussed with my line manager, and it appears there was a misunderstanding about the cargo size. The actual cargo size will be 14,000MT, not 7,000MT. I will get back to you with the new rates and options shortly.
Best regards,
Jay

email_chain.subject: Additional Details and Confirmation of Cargo Size: 14,000MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Jay,
Thank you for the update. Indeed, the cargo will be 14,000MT of foodstuffs from Tampa to Gibraltar. The vessel will need to be equipped with hatch covers for weather protection, and we also require shipment in FCL containers. Please adjust the quote accordingly.
Additionally, I will be sending you an LOC (Letter of Credit) within the next 2-3 weeks. Could you confirm your line of insurance once more? 
Best regards,
Phil

email_chain.subject: Updated Shipping Quote for 14,000MT from Tampa to Gibraltar
email_chain.body:
Dear Phil,
Based on the new cargo specifications, I can offer a rate of 28 USD per metric ton for shipping the 14,000MT of foodstuffs from Tampa to Gibraltar. This rate includes the requirement for hatch covers and FCL containers.
Regarding the insurance, we predominantly use Zurich Financial Services for our shipments.
Please review this quote and confirm at your earliest convenience.
Kind regards,
Nada

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Further Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Nada,
Thank you for the updated quote. The rate of 28 USD per metric ton is satisfactory. Can you please provide additional details or a policy document from Zurich Financial Services regarding the insurance coverage?
Best regards,
Phil

email_chain.subject: Insurance Details from Zurich Financial Services
email_chain.body:
Dear Phil,
Attached are the details and policy documentation from Zurich Financial Services regarding the insurance coverage for your upcoming shipment. We trust this provides all the information you need.
Kind regards,
Nada

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for Equipment Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Saeed,

We have a 5,000MT parcel of equipment to move from Montevideo to Isla Margarita. Could you please send a freight quote for this shipment? Thank you.

Regards,
Lacey

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request for Equipment Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Lacey,

Good afternoon! We have reviewed your request regarding the shipment. We are currently working on the details and will provide you with a quotation shortly. Apologies for the delay, we are observing a short holiday.

We are committed to offering you the best solution for your cargo needs.

Best regards,
Joseline

email_chain.subject: Freight Quotation for Montevideo to Isla Margarita Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Lacey,

Please find attached the quotation for the shipment from Montevideo to Isla Margarita (Vargas Free Zone, Venezuela). As discussed previously, the current quote uses the transportation of a passenger vessel which is quite expensive. However, we can suggest an alternative solution using the MS Francy, a passenger ship that operates between Brazil and Venezuela. This could be more convenient for your needs.

Please review the attached quote and let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Joseline

email_chain.subject: Follow Up: Montevideo to Isla Margarita Shipment Proposal
email_chain.body:
Hi Lacey,

Following up on yesterday's proposal, I have attached an updated quotation for the voyage from Montevideo to Isla Margarita, scheduled to depart on 22 July and arrive on 25 July. There is a high probability it will be chartered. This vessel offers a more economical option using 20' pallets instead of containers, which reduces costs substantially.

Please review this option and let me know how you wish to proceed.

Kind regards,
Joseline

email_chain.subject: Alternative Vessel for Montevideo to Isla Margarita Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Lacey,

The vessel originally scheduled for your shipment from Montevideo to Isla Margarita on 27 June is now fully booked. We have secured an alternative cargo vessel departing from the port of Valparaiso on 24 July and arriving on 27 July in Isla Margarita. We recommend using 20' flat racks and trucks to be driven aboard, which will be the most cost-effective method for transporting your cargo.

Please let us know if you need a quote for this new proposal.

Best regards,
Joseline

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Charter Vessel Transport for Paper Cargo
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Ms. Kirila,

We are looking to hire a charter vessel to transport 1,500MT of paper from Cork to Chester. Could you please provide us with an estimated charter cost? Also, are your fuel prices included in this estimate?

Best regards,
Derek

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Charter Vessel Transport for Paper Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Derek,

Regarding your request for the transportation of paper from Cork to Chester, I have asked our sales manager in Chester, Johan Karwowski, to contact you on Monday. He will provide a more accurate quote for the fuel costs as they can vary weekly. The overall price will be discussed by him to ensure the most accurate information.

Kind regards,
Ms. Kirila

email_chain.subject: Export and Insurance Paperwork Completed
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Kirila,

We have completed all required export and insurance paperwork for shipping 1,500MT of paper from Cork to Chester. Could you please inform us of the full transportation cost including VAT? Additionally, we need a quote for the insurance.

Kind regards,
Derek

email_chain.subject: Insurance Verification Request
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I see that your company provides insurance coverage of £10,000,000. However, our contract includes a clause stating that your company cannot be held liable for any accidents or damages. Could you please provide proof that your company fulfills the requirements of this clause?

Thank you,
Derek

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote and Terms
email_chain.body: Mr. Lo, We will ship 3,500MT of potassium hydroxide from Yantai to Tianjin before the end of next month. Could you provide a preliminary quote and confirm if you handle port dues under FOB terms? Regards, Elaine

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote and Terms
email_chain.body: Hello Elaine, We can facilitate shipments under FOB, CNF, and CIF terms. For CNF and CIF, we will cover the port dues and insurance. Please send us the original bill of lading once the goods are transferred. If FOB terms are agreed, ensure that the original bill of lading is sent to our freight forwarder by the end of next month. Thank you for your cooperation. Best Regards, Mr. Debatoy Lo Elegant Trading Co., Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed: Pickup Locations
email_chain.body: Hi, Could you specify from which ports in South China, like Xiamen or Nansha, can we pick up the goods? Best regards, Elaine

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed: Pickup Locations
email_chain.body: Hi Elaine, You can pick up the goods from any major South China ports including Xiamen and Nansha. Please confirm the details and place your order accordingly. We aim to transport the goods by the end of September. Could you confirm which specific port in South China you will utilize? Thanks very much! Best Regards, Mr. Debatoy Lo Elegant Trading Co., Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Request for Crude Oil Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Chen,

We have been monitoring the price of crude oil in the market, and the latest available data shows that the rate is about $62. Please send us a recent quotation. We anticipate getting a response from you as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Helen

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed Before Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Helen,

Thank you for your email. Could you please clarify the following details before we proceed with the quotation?
1. Kindly let us know the product specifications of APU6000-125W.
2. The type of materials you would like to use to encapsulate the chip.
3. The minimum order quantity and delivery schedule.

We are looking forward to receiving your specifications so we can send our quotation as soon as possible.

Thanks in advance for your assistance and cooperation.

With kind regards,
Alen

email_chain.subject: Meeting Confirmation for Mr. Green's Handover
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Daniel,

Thank you for your confirmation to assist with the handover of Mr. Green. I would be delighted to meet with you on Thursday at 10 AM in our office. We have a canteen here if you would like a light lunch.

Regards,
Maggie

email_chain.subject: Re: Meeting Confirmation for Mr. Green's Handover
email_chain.body:
Dear Maggie,

Thank you for the invitation. I believe I have understood everything correctly. It seems that the Chair of the General Board has given us the go-ahead to proceed with our plan, and I am now responsible for the handover of the estate. As mentioned in our telephone conversation, I intend to meet with the Board before taking further actions.

Kindest regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Availability for Meeting on Thursday
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I'm currently in London but will be in Cambridge on Thursday next week and can meet with you then, if that's convenient. I suggest that we meet at the Library in Great St. Mary's Church. It is very close to the University Offices and has some quiet rooms which are typically available during the morning and can be used to avoid interruptions.

Kind regards,
Walter

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rates from Tampa to Tokyo
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Smith, We're looking to arrange the transportation of 7,000MT of soybean from Tampa to Tokyo in early May. We're hoping to secure a good rate, and will appreciate your input. Thanks, Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rates from Tampa to Tokyo
email_chain.body: Hi Yasmine, Hope you're having a great day. Please find our rates to Tokyo attached. We can advise more on the best port to ship from, once we know the quantity and port of origin. Looking forward to hearing back from you, Regards, Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rates from Tampa to Tokyo
email_chain.body: Hi Rob, Thank you for the rates! We'd like to ship from Houston instead of Tampa. What do you think of this option? Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping from Houston to Tokyo
email_chain.body: Hello Yasmine, Thank you for your patience. I've attached our new rates for shipping from Houston. Can you please let me know if this works for you? Regards, Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping from Houston to Tokyo
email_chain.body: Hi Rob, That's perfect, thanks for the prompt response! We'll be shipping 5,000MT to Tokyo in early May from Houston. Let me know if there's anything else we need to do to finalize the booking. Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Booking
email_chain.body: Hi Yasmine, Great news, we've received your booking request. We'll get back to you once we've confirmed the details. Thanks, Rob

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation and Contract
email_chain.body: Hi Rob, Thanks for confirming our booking. Here's the confirmation number for your records: 12345. I've also attached a copy of the contract. Please review and let us know if there's anything that needs to be adjusted. Regards, Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Vessel Availability and Rates to Vietnam
email_chain.body: Mr. Gupta, could you inform whether your vessel has availability to a port in Vietnam? Additionally, could you provide the rates for this service? Warm regards, Richard

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Vessel Availability and Rates to Vietnam
email_chain.body: It's always a pleasure to assist you. I am pleased to inform that we can provide coverage from Hong Kong to Hai Phong. The vessel is available to start on the 12th of April, with a transshipment at Shenzhen or Zhuhai, provided you confirm the booking of slot and hand over the goods within the mentioned ports. Our offered rate excludes costs relating to handling at Shenzhen or Zhuhai. I have enclosed the rate details herewith for your reference.

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Additional Charges
email_chain.body: Could you clarify whether an additional fee of 250 USD for handling at Shenzhen or Zhuhai is included in your quoted rate or will it be charged separately?

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification on Additional Charges
email_chain.body: To ensure clarity, could you please confirm if the 250 USD handling fee at Shenzhen or Zhuhai will be included in the total charge? If not, could you provide a new quote including this cost?

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification on Additional Charges
email_chain.body: The handling fee at both Shenzhen and Zhuhai is an additional cost of 250 USD. This amount is detailed in the rate calculation I previously provided.

email_chain.subject: Sample of isopropanol 99.9% for our customer in USA
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, We are manufacturers of petroleum products. We have a customer in the USA that requires 4800MT of isopropanol 99.9% from Houston. We are ready to negotiate on your best price; however, we will need your bank account details before we proceed. Regards, Mahesh Nambiar

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for Isopropanol from Houston to Cartagena
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. John, I am seeking a freight quote for transporting 4,800MT of isopropanol from Houston to Cartagena. Could you please provide us with the necessary details? Regards, Markus Leidinger

email_chain.subject: Isopropanol Shipping Quote from Houston to Cartagena
email_chain.body: Hi Mahesh, Below is the quote as requested for the shipment: Loading: 4800MT Isopropanol 99.9%, FOB Price: 0.44USD/MT, Origin: Houston, Destination Port: Cartagena, Payment Terms: 20% advance TT and balance against copy of B/L upon arrival. Please provide your bank details so I can issue an invoice for the advance payment. Regards, John Xu

email_chain.subject: Challenges and Alternatives for Isopropanol Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Markus, I have consulted with an agent in Cartagena, and he warned about the dangers of transporting isopropanol, suggesting an alternate product instead. The US suppliers are not willing to sell at the previously quoted prices. For this reason, our deal cannot proceed under the current terms. I kindly ask for a refund of the advance payment of $1,200 USD that was previously made. Thank you for your understanding and assistance in this matter. Best Regards, Mahesh Nambiar

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Charter from Dalian to Eregli
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Cohn, Could you assist with a suitable vessel for 10,000MT of urea from Dalian to Eregli? We aim to ship by the end of January, and would appreciate receiving your preferred freight rate for this cargo. Many thanks, Amelia

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability and Freight Rate
email_chain.body: Hi Mary, From Mr. Huang: We are looking to book a charter for 10,000MT of urea from Dalian to Eregli. Our vessel is available for loading at the end of January. Could you please provide us with the available vessels and your proposed freight rate? Many thanks, Harvey

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability and Freight Rate Offer
email_chain.body: Hi Harvey, The vessels we have available for late January are: Monte Mediolana, Monte Rascal, and Monte Apollinare. The rate for urea on any of these would be $7.10 per metric ton. Many thanks, Mary

email_chain.subject: Vessel Preference Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Mary, Thank you for the information. Could we book the Monte Rascal for our shipment? Many thanks, Harvey

email_chain.subject: Vessel Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Harvey, Yes, our Monte Rascal is still available for the desired period. Please proceed to confirm the booking as soon as possible. Many thanks, Mary

email_chain.subject: Finalizing Charter Details
email_chain.body: Hi Mary, Great. I'll arrange to sign up the Monte Rascal and let you know as soon as we have it confirmed. Many thanks, Harvey

email_chain.subject: Charterparty Confirmation Through NY Agent
email_chain.body: Hi Harvey, Please ensure that you confirm the charterparty through our NY agent. Many thanks, Mary

email_chain.subject: Anticipation of Charterparty
email_chain.body: Hi Harvey, Good to hear that. We look forward to receiving the signed charterparty soon. Many thanks, Mary

email_chain.subject: Charterparty Submission
email_chain.body: Hi Mary, We have just sent our draft charterparty for your review and signature. This document has already been forwarded to our NY agent. Regards, Harvey

email_chain.subject: Request for Styrene Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. James,

Would you be able to provide a quote for freight of 5,200 MT of Styrene from Singapore to Surabaya next month? As I am new to shipping, I would appreciate your best possible rate for this movement. Thank you.

Sincerely,
Shelley

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Styrene Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Shelley,

Please find our prices for next month as below:

- FOB Cargo Discharging Terminal Charge: US$14/MT
- WSF: US$18.5/MT
- Brokerage: US$18.5/MT
- Others: US$0

Additional costs for safety certificates (MED cert) are US$50 per piece for Indonesian flag vessels, and US$150 per piece for foreign flag vessels.

For more details on our pricing system, please feel free to contact our office directly.

Best regards,
Kudet Prawanto

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Freight Charges
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kudet,

Could you please confirm the freight charges for 5,200MT of Styrene from Singapore to Surabaya? If more information is needed, do let me know.

Many thanks and regards,
Shelley

email_chain.subject: Competitive Offer for Styrene Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelley,

In response to your interest in shipping MT Styrene from Singapore to Surabaya, we are pleased to offer diverse shipping services tailored to meet your requirements.

Kindly confirm so we can proceed with the clearance procedure for loading. Here are our offers:

- (FCL) 40ft HC = $1,800.00 (approx. $30.90 per ton)
- (FCL) 40ft HC = $1,480.00 (approx. $28.00 per ton)

Thank you for considering our services.

Best regards,
Mr. James

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Freight for 1,800 MT of Styrene
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. James,

Could you provide the freight charges for transporting 1,800 MT of Styrene from Singapore to Surabaya? Looking forward to your details.

Thank you,
Shelley

email_chain.subject: Request to Load Ammonium Nitrate
email_chain.body:
Hi Li, 

Would you be able to load 3,100MT of ammonium nitrate from Damietta to Karachi this coming Friday? As for demurrage, do you typically require 72 hours of laytime? 

Thanks,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Load Ammonium Nitrate
email_chain.body:
Thank you very much, Jenny. 

My cargo is around 30MT and needs to be delivered to Lahore. Karachi is very far from my desired destination. I would appreciate if you could let me know if there are any available slots for coming Monday or Tuesday. Can you also share the terms with me? 

Thanks,
Li

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Cargo Delivery Schedule Update Needed
email_chain.body:
Dear Jenny,

Please refer to my last email. Is there any possibility that we can deliver the cargo by this Friday? If not, please inform us of the earliest time you can load our cargo.

Thanks,
Li

email_chain.subject: Clarification Required on Payment
email_chain.body:
Thank you, Jenny. We would appreciate your help with this. Please let me know once you've made the payment.

Thank you,
Li

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Freight and Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Jenny,

Thank you for your reply. We have the following inquiries regarding the freight:
1) Can you please share with us the documents that are required for customs?
2) Can we proceed with FOB? If so, what are the costs?
3) Who will be responsible for the loading? Will you need a representative for this?
4) What are the costs for demurrage? Do you charge in advance?
5) Do we have to settle the demurrage within the terminal?
6) Do we have to pay in advance for freight?
7) Do you provide storage?

Thank you,
Li

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Freight Rate: Cocoa Powder Shipment from New Orleans to Genoa
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Gould,

We are planning to move approximately 10,000MT of cocoa powder from New Orleans to Genoa. Could you please provide us with a ballpark freight rate? Additionally, could you inform us if you typically offer quotes on an FIO (Free In and Out) basis?

Kind Regards,
Nicky

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: Transportation of Special Vehicles from Manila to San Diego
email_chain.body:
Good day,

I would like to request your assistance with transporting two special vehicles, a Yaris GX and a Yaris Cross EX, from the Port of Manila, Philippines to the Port of San Diego, California, USA. Attached you will find the specifications and photos of the vehicles. I would appreciate it if you could send me a quote for the shipping of these two vehicles.

Please let me know if there are any more details you need.

Best regards,
Sue

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Transportation of Special Vehicles from Manila to San Diego
email_chain.body:
Hello Sue!

It is our pleasure to hear that you are considering our services for your shipping needs. We are a US-based subsidiary of a large UK-based shipping company, specializing in various forms of international shipments.

Please provide us with more details regarding the shipment, such as dimensions and weight, and we will promptly provide you with a detailed quote.

Regards,
Marta
Sent from my iPad

labels.commodity: cocoa powder, special vehicles (Yaris GX, Yaris Cross EX)

Our next available sailing date is May 2nd. We have included these terms along with the freight rate in our quote. Please review it and let us know your decision.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about availability for cargo shipping in May

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about shipping REOil-MB 90 in August
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Lopez,

Thank you for the clear and concise information on your website. It's very helpful. email_chain.subject: Thanks for STCW Training Assistance
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lopez,

I would like to extend our appreciation for your support in understanding the STCW training mechanisms at ITM and aiding us in preparing for future qualifications. This training has significantly enhanced our safety knowledge and risk management capabilities.

If you are planning to visit Asia, I would be glad to arrange a meeting at my workplace.

Thank you once again for your contribution.

Sincerely,
Takeshi Iwasaki
Principal Chemical Engineer
Nippon Steel Corporation

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Cement Transport from Ashdod to Bombay
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Jang,

Could you please confirm if we can arrange the transportation of 1,400 tonnes of cement from Ashdod to Bombay? Additionally, what would be the base FOB rate for this shipment?

Kind regards,
Matt

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Cement Transport from Ashdod to Bombay
email_chain.body:
Hello Matt,

We are able to handle up to 100,000 tonnes per year on an annual contract basis. Our best rate for you would be $60 per tonne with an additional $5 in surcharges. These extra charges result from discounts provided by the Israeli port authority conditioned on shipments of at least 100,000 tonnes per year.

We also offer a discount if you opt for shipping insurance, which would add an extra charge of $3 per tonne. Prior to starting the shipment, a deposit of $20,000 is required. Note, our freight terms are FOB, implying that you will cover all expenses from the terminal to your warehouse or another desired location.

Please let me know if you are interested. I am preparing the necessary documents for your agreement.

Yours truly,
Ha

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for FOB Karachi Freight Availability on 25th October
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Brown,

My name is George, and I am inquiring about freight availability for FOB Karachi covering 5,000 MT of LPG on October 25, 2005. Could you please confirm if the vessel is available on this date and also the deadline for firm order confirmation?

Thank you,
George

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for FOB Karachi Freight Availability on 25th October
email_chain.body:
Dear George,

In response to your inquiry for FOB Karachi freight on October 25, 2005, I can confirm rates as $32 per MT for either LPG or coal. The details required for confirmation are as follows:
- 5,000 MT of LPG
- 30,000 tonnes of coal
Freight will be delivered ex-Karachi.

Please confirm these details at your earliest convenience so I can arrange for an LOI from our FOL.

Thank you,
Mike Brown
DHL Pakistan

labels.cargo_size: 30,000 tonnes of coal, 5,000 MT of LPG

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Costs and Load Time
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. De Anda,

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: Bananas, La Plata to Southampton
email_chain.body: Good morning. I have a 70,000mt/400,000 sq. mt. reefer shipment of Bananas in Feulucca (FCL) scheduled for 22-02-2008 from La Plata to Southampton. Could you please provide pricing and CFR for each shipping option, along with the typical timescales for handling and dispatch? Thanks, Derek

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote: Bananas, La Plata to Southampton
email_chain.body: Hi Derek, Thank you for your enquiry. For the sailing on 22.02.08, we can offer transportation on the following vessels: 1. Vessel: PANAPEMA, Destination: London, Voyage: LSH, ETA at Limehouse: 07.03.08, Transit time: 14 days, Cost: 4700 USD/2800 GBP/4000 EUR. 2. Vessel: MACARA, Destination: London, Voyage: LSH, ETA at Limehouse: 13.03.08, Transit time: 19 days, Cost: 4000 USD/2400 GBP/3000 EUR. Please let us know your preferred option or if you need more information.

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: Additional Banana Shipments, Montevideo to Southampton
email_chain.body: Good morning. I have two additional 70,000mt/400,000 sq. mt. reefer shipments of Bananas in Feulucca (FCL) scheduled for 27-02-2008 from Montevideo to Southampton. Please provide pricing and CFR for each option, along with the usual handling and dispatch timescales. Thanks, Derek

email_chain.body: Derek, please provide a quote for the transport of a 70,000mt/400,000 sq. mt. reefer shipment of bananas from Guayaquil to Southampton on the following dates: 28-02-2008, 11-03-2008, 25-03-2008, 08-04-2008. Regards, Ernesto

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgment of Shipping Inquiry from Guayaquil to Southampton

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for freight rate

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Dried Fish Meal Shipment in June

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Dried Fish Meal Shipment in June

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Dried Fish Meal Shipment in June

Here are the call-in details for those who might not have a Zoom account: Zoom Link: https://zoom.us/j/95414780315, Zoom Meeting ID: 954 1478 0315, Zoom Passcode: 538332. Thanks again, Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Dried Fish Meal Shipment in June
email_chain.body: Hi Susan, That will work for us. I have confirmed the availability with our partners, but should there be any changes, I will get in touch immediately. Regards, Maua

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry: 5,000MT Waste Plastic Film
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Scott,

We have a 5,000MT shipment of waste plastic film from Fuzhou to Tianjin scheduled to complete loading by July 28. Could you please inform us of the best lead time you can offer? Additionally, is it possible to cover the cost of our last two shipments within the budget of $2,500?

Regards,
Annabelle

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 5,000MT Waste Plastic Film
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Annabelle,

Thank you for your email. I am able to accept the 5,000MT shipment starting from July 28. The lead time will be approximately four days. We will handle loading, stuffing, and lashing, while you will need to manage the fixing and sealing of the hatch. Please advise whether the cargo will utilize hatch covers or be double-containerized to facilitate proper arrangements.

Regarding the coverage of the last two shipments within $2,500, unfortunately we cannot accommodate this due to included terminal handling fees and port storage costs. A rate adjustment could be a viable alternative.

Best regards,
Mrs. Scott

email_chain.subject: Update on Cargo Requirements
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Scott,

Our cargo, using hatch covers, is set to arrive in Tianjin tomorrow. We expect the same quality as previous shipments. Please proceed with loading and aim for delivery to our designated terminal before August 15. If the quality aligns with expectations, we will proceed with planning for the second shipment.

Best regards,
Scarlett

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Cargo Requirements
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Scarlett,

Thank you for your email. Our storage tanks are now prepared for your cargo, which will be loaded using a 10-ton forklift. Current construction on site has limited space availability; however, we expect to manage the operations smoothly. Further updates will follow regarding the loading schedule.

Regards,
Mrs. Scott

email_chain.subject: Cargo Loading Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Scarlett,

The cargo was successfully loaded yesterday. We are now scheduling delivery to Tianjin port. Although there are pending construction works that may cause slight traffic, our team is stationed to ensure timely delivery. We hope this does not interfere with the schedule.

Regards,
Mrs. Scott

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgment of Cargo Delivery
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Scott,

Please be informed that the cargo was delivered at Tianjin port at 10 a.m. this morning. Our team will monitor the cargo continuously and keep you informed about any needs to expedite the delivery process. We appreciate your efforts and look forward to future transactions.

Best regards,
Scarlett

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry - PC Granule Shipment from China to Antwerp

email_chain.subject: Impact of Seablue Grounding
email_chain.body: Hi Kathy, Has the grounding of the Seablue had any impact on your crude fixing level for the short term? Thanks, Blayney

email_chain.subject: RE: Impact of Seablue Grounding
email_chain.body: Hi Blayney, Not at all. Seablue is a crude vessel and almost all crude cargoes have been fixed by the other time-chartered tankers from Chinese yards. As I mentioned previously, if Seablue did not resume operations in China, other tankers would compensate by departing Chinese docks. These tankers would operate at a price level set by the most competitive time charter, which is the drydocked Seablue. Therefore, the price level at which cargoes are fixed in China would not differ even if Seablue was operational. LPG cargoes are different since we cannot use crude tankers for them, and crude cargoes are more complex to arrange as many producers have set contracted prices. Best, Kathy

- Product: Unbleached sugar, 7,400MT in jumbo bags
- Quality: 98.7% purity, 0.13% molasses content, 0.3% free moisture
- Packaging: 50kg polyethylene jumbo bags with metal ties, batch number printed

- Port of Loading: Tema

email_chain.subject: Financing for Gasoline Shipment
email_chain.body: Dr. Al-Bashir, we are eager to proceed with our transaction. We can finance 50% of the $800,000 total; however, we need clarification on how you intend to finance the remaining $400,000. As a gesture of good faith, I am prepared to wire $100,000 to you on the condition that you will forward the remaining $300,000 and the shipping documents within 10 days of receiving this deposit. Should you be unable to complete the transaction, this amount should be returned within 14 days. I am dispatching this cash transfer request via express courier today, and I look forward to your confirmation of receipt.

email_chain.subject: Re: Financing for Gasoline Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Raymond, I apologize for the delayed response as I was out of office due to personal reasons. We have ample funds as all our dues are clear now. Could you please provide your bank's Swift Code and account number? We are ready to proceed with the payment today. Regards, Mohammed al-Bashir, Managing Director, World Holdings

email_chain.subject: Banking Details for Transaction
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Al-Bashir, thank you for your swift reply. My bank in the Bahamas will be expecting $300,000 today for your company. Once these funds are received, I will wire you $100,000 promptly. I'll inform my bank to await your transfer. Thank you, again. Sincerely, Raymond

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Additional Funding
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. al-Bashir, as previously discussed, please note that we can only provide the funds for the oil itself and its shipment. Your company must handle the delivery payment from your own resources. I hope this arrangement is acceptable to you. Regards, Raymond

email_chain.subject: Reefer Slot Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body:

Could you please let me know if you have any slots available for a 150MT reefer from Salalah to Algeciras in the period from March 31 to April 15? Additionally, I would appreciate details regarding your terms and conditions and laycan.

Susie

email_chain.subject: Re: Reefer Slot Availability Inquiry

Ms. Santos

email_chain.subject: Additional Inquiry regarding Reefer Voyage

email_chain.subject: Re: Additional Inquiry regarding Reefer Voyage

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for 6000MT from Vancouver to Halifax

Can you please quote a lump sum freight rate for 6000MT of materials from Vancouver to Halifax? I also want to know if partial loads are feasible.

Kind regards,
Tim

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry - Additional Services Required
email_chain.body:
Hi Tim,
Thank you for the previous quote. However, I need a door to door rate, including transit times, not just the ocean freight. Please include details for customs declarations, insurance, vessel transshipment fees, and any other applicable costs.

email_chain.subject: Comprehensive Door to Door Freight Quote

Dear Yong,

Tim

email_chain.subject: Request for Best Offer on Gasoline Cargo to Singapore

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Fuel Supply for Jordan and Kuwait
email_chain.body:
Could you provide the details for the following two vessels: one carrying 1909 MT IFO 180 CST, 1788 MT MGO 180 CST, and another with 1904 MT fuel oil and 1414 MT Dme? The fuel oil is for Amman (Jordan) with a requirement date of 14th May, and the other items are for Kuwait Port, needed by 28th May at Bahrain Port.
Looking forward to your earliest reply.
Thanks,
Mutagani,
CEO

email_chain.subject: Offer Request for 95 RON Unleaded Gasoline
email_chain.body:
I am interested in purchasing your 95 RON unleaded gasoline for immediate delivery. I prefer unloading in Luanda. Please respond with your offer including price, quantity, and ETA.
Yours sincerely,
Zara

email_chain.subject: Response to 95 RON Unleaded Gasoline Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good day,
We received your email regarding the supply of 95 RON unleaded gasoline. We propose loading at Dunga and would like to discuss payment terms, including a sample which we will fund via Mastercard. Please confirm the letter of guarantee from your bank, and specify the final price including transport, taxes, and duties. Upon agreement, we will finalize the payment via a bank transfer upon loading the goods.
We are expecting your prompt reply.
Yours faithfully,
Stalber
Please reply back to info@coalzora.com

email_chain.subject: Freight Request for Palm Kernel Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

I have a load of palm kernel oil scheduled for shipment from Port Klang to Male, totaling 5,000MT. I've recently been in touch with a local freight forwarder in Port Klang, and it seems like we could use some advice on the freight aspect. Could you provide me with an indicative freight cost? 

Cheers,
Mona

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Request for Palm Kernel Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mona,

Thanks for reaching out for a freight quote to move 5,000MT of palm kernel oil from Port Klang to Male. To provide an accurate quote, I'll need some additional details about the cargo, including:

- The quality and cleanliness of the cargo,
- The minimum required temperature for the cargo during transit,
- Whether a refrigerated vessel is required,
- The specific type of stowage needed.

Additionally, information about who will arrange for the stowage, loading, discharge, and clearance will affect the charges. Please send these details at your earliest convenience. 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Offer for Container Transport from Algeciras to Marseille
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Walton,

Hope this email finds you well. It has come to our attention that you may be in the market for container capacity from Algeciras to Marseille. We have available container vessels that operate between these ports and also have ample capacity to transport your cargo. If you're interested, please let us know, and we can provide a quote.

Best regards,
Giorgio

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rates and Vessel Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Fred, We are planning to ship 5,000 tons of methanol from Houston to Rotterdam. Could you please provide your best shipping rates and available vessel options for the second quarter of 2021? Best regards, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rates and Vessel Availability
email_chain.body: Hi Pedro, Happy New Year! Thank you for reaching out. Regarding your request for shipping 5,000 tons of methanol from Houston to Rotterdam, we have several vessel options available in the second quarter of 2021. The options include a Panamax vessel available in June, a Suezmax vessel from April to June, a Post-Panamax vessel and a Panamax with VLSFO/MGO available from April to July, a LCAT with 3000 sq. m and 4000 sq. m available respectively from April to July and May to July, and an Aframax with a capacity of 15 cbm suitable for various fuels including VLSFO, MGO, DME, and LFO available from May to July. Additionally, we have a Suezmax available from July to September, and another Suezmax with a 25 cbm capacity available in August. Please let us know if any of these options meet your needs or if there is anything else we can assist with. Regards, Fred

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About G20 Finance Ministers' Meeting Outcomes
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Moloney,

I hope you are doing well. Could you inform me where I can find the outcomes of the recent G20 finance ministers' meeting? Specifically, I am keen on understanding their discussions on future financial regulations.

Best regards,
Lawrence

email_chain.subject: Regarding Economic Models Related to G20's Impact on Regulation
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Moloney,

I am currently writing a paper on the G20's influence on economic regulation. Are you aware of any economic models that analyze the impact of G20 decisions on regulatory frameworks? Your insights would be extremely helpful.

Best regards,
Lawrence

email_chain.subject: Key Highlights and Agreements at Recent G20 Meeting
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Moloney,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm interested in learning more about the key findings and agreements from the recent G20 meeting, specifically regarding financial regulations. Were there any standout discussions or decisions made? Additionally, do you think these recommendations will adequately address the issues discussed?

Thank you for your insights.
Best regards,
Lawrence

email_chain.subject: Role of the G20 in Promoting Financial Stability
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Moloney,

I hope you are well. I am writing to inquire about the G20's role in financial regulation. The G20, as a coalition of major global economies, plays a crucial role in setting guidelines for the global financial system. Could you elaborate on the specific roles or actions taken by the G20 to promote financial stability, particularly in terms of transparency and accountability?

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lawrence

email_chain.subject: Client Satisfaction Survey Results Inquiry
email_chain.body: Good day Sir, I am following up on our recent client satisfaction survey. Could you please inform me how many clients are not completely satisfied with our services? Additionally, I would appreciate a detailed explanation of the reasons for their dissatisfaction. Thank you for your time and consideration. Regards, Yuma

email_chain.subject: Re: Client Satisfaction Survey Results Inquiry
email_chain.body: Thank you for your inquiry, Yuma. I will provide you with the details about what our customers have been addressing. However, it appears there are specific complaints regarding your company's delivery service in certain areas of Australia. I will compile a list of these areas requiring urgent attention to avoid further issues. Should you need more information, please let me know, and I'll continue to assist. Best regards, Amanda

email_chain.subject: Re: Client Satisfaction Survey Results Inquiry
email_chain.body: Thanks, Amanda. That information is crucial, and we need to address these issues promptly. Could you tell me who in your team would be able to provide more details? I would like to discuss this matter as soon as possible. Kind regards, Yuma

email_chain.subject: Request for Funding Assistance
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're well. We have a new venture with our Singapore client, Singapore Energy, looking to transport 2,800MT of naphtha from Baltimore to Dahej. Currently, we're short on funds for the required margin fee. Could we possibly arrange for some financial assistance on your end? Looking forward to your feedback. Best regards, Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Funding Assistance
email_chain.body: Hello Kim, Regretfully, I am unable to fulfill the request for financial assistance at this moment. Could you provide more details on the transaction and its specifics? Warm regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Funding Assistance
email_chain.body: Dear John, Thank you for your prompt reply. Our client, Singapore Energy, collaborates with Osaka Gas, a major Japanese refiner, in this project. The margin fee involved is relatively high, totaling USD 1,000,000. I can send over the contract and detailed payment procedure to better clarify our position. Have a great day, Kim

email_chain.subject: Further Discussion Required on Naphtha Transport Project
email_chain.body: Dear John, My apologies for the confusion earlier with the messages, my name is Alihac, and I am the Assistant to the CEO at Singapore Energy. I would love to go over the project details with you at your earliest convenience. Could you please let me know your available times? Kind regards, Kim

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for 8,000MT Gasoil from Durban to Walvis Bay
email_chain.body:
Hi Katty,

I need a vessel for 8,000MT of gasoil transportation from Durban to Walvis Bay. Could you confirm if a mid-June laycan works for you, and whether port dues are included in your quote?

Many thanks,
Precious

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for 8,000MT Gasoil from Durban to Walvis Bay
email_chain.body:
Hi Tamir,

Please see the inquiry below.

Regards,
Katty

email_chain.subject: Draft Agreement and Costs Estimation
email_chain.body:
Hi there,

As discussed on the phone, here are our chartering costs for you:
- Estimated freight (CIF-MRC): 91.00 USD / pmt
- Estimated bunkers consumption: 160 pmt/day
- Estimated port dues: 1400 USD (Durban), 500 USD (Walvis Bay)
- Estimated freight commission: 2% on freight

Total Costs:
- Freight: 70000 USD
- Bunkers: 16000 USD
- Port dues: 1900 USD
- Freight commission: 1400 USD

Total: 90500 USD

With the exception of port dues, these are all estimates. Bunker consumption will be updated based on your data. We will also submit a draft chartering contract for your reference in the next few days. If you have any questions, please let us know.

Thanks,

email_chain.subject: Re: Draft Agreement and Costs Estimation
email_chain.body:
Dear Tamir,

Thank you for your reply, the chartering costs sound reasonable. We will check with our Principals and come back to you if we have any questions.

Regards,
Katty
FAL

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipment of Women's Clothing from Australia to Shanghai
email_chain.body: Good day Mr./Ms. Yang, we currently have 27 containers of women's clothing ready for shipment from Australia to Shanghai. Please advise on the soonest possible shipping dates as we are looking to expedite this shipment. We are open to paying additional charges for expedited services. Thank you, Tanya

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Shipment of Women's Clothing from Australia to Shanghai
email_chain.body: Hello Tanya, I am currently checking the transit times with our office in Shanghai. Once I have the details, you can confirm if you would like to proceed with the expedited shipping by paying additional charges. Expect to receive a shipping quote shortly. Best regards, Yang

email_chain.subject: Update: Shipment Pending Departure
email_chain.body: Dear Tanya, we are pleased to inform you that we have received instructions for your shipment. Our customer service team is now finalizing details. The containers are scheduled to be loaded and depart shortly. We will keep you updated. Sincerely, Customer Service at Shanghai Shipping

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Urea Shipment
email_chain.body:

Christina

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Urea Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Cui,

The vessel can depart from Latti on August 12th. Please confirm if this arrangement works for you and if you would like to proceed with the booking at Latti.
We look forward to your confirmation.
Yours sincerely,
Johnson

email_chain.subject: Request for Discharge Slot Exchange and Prepayment Details

Hi Miguel,

Our client has a vessel carrying 12,000MT of sugar bound for Mumbai. The planned discharge was set for June 29th, but the discharge terminal will only be operational from July 2nd. We're interested in utilizing your discharge slot if possible. Could we also discuss the possibility of a rolling basis prepayment?

email_chain.body:
Hi Ryan,

How are you? Could you please provide more details regarding the shipment? Specifically, the delivery location, the sugar name, the origin of the sugar, and the shipment number.

Miguel

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Discharge Slot Exchange and Prepayment Details

Looking forward to your response.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 40,000MT Molasses Transport from Santos to Jawahar Nagar

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 40,000MT Molasses Transport from Santos to Jawahar Nagar

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Letter of Intent (LSA)

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Letter of Intent (LSA) Approval

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Open Space Availability

labels.broker: Questar Maritime Corp - Dennis B. Allen

email_chain.subject: Can we talk?
email_chain.body:
Hey,
Quick question for you: Would you like to make some extra cash?

There's some freelance web work I need done, and I think you'd be really good at it. I have a few others in mind, but I thought of you first.

This is totally confidential and I won't ask anything of you unless you're interested. But if you want to get a head start and make some extra money, this could be a great opportunity.

If you're interested, please reply to this email and we can discuss further.

Best,
Scott

email_chain.subject: RE: Can we talk?
email_chain.body:
Hi Scott,

Thanks for thinking of me for this opportunity. Can you tell me more about the payment terms for this freelance work?

Best regards,
[Recipient's Name]

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Chlorosilane Shipment Details
email_chain.body: Good afternoon Terry, I wanted to follow up on our previous discussion about the chlorosilane shipment. It appears the shipping might be delayed slightly. Could you provide additional details regarding your offer? Specifically, we are interested in a freight rate between $150-170/MT and the structure of the B/L. I look forward to your response. Regards, Alan

email_chain.subject: Re: About Chlorosilane Freight Rates
email_chain.body: Hi Alan, Based on our observation of mixed traffic in clinker/coal, I believe we can better refine the freight rates for your shipment. When can we expect to finalize the pricing? We have a timeline set with the customer, and there might be slight adjustments required. Best, Jonathan

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Chlorosilane Price Negotiation
email_chain.body: Alan, It's crucial that we get a finalized price on the chlorosilane soon. Our customer may be able to delay the shipment by a few days, providing us with a window to potentially reduce costs. Could you please provide more detailed information in your next communication? Thanks, Joh

email_chain.subject: Charter Requirement from Singapore to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Armitage,

I would like to discuss options for a scheduled bulk charter from Singapore to Jakarta, with the intention to load 15,000 MT of rice. Looking forward to your proposals.

Thank you,
Sally

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Requirement from Singapore to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hi Sally,

In reference to your inquiry, we can organize a chartered vessel from Singapore with loading scheduled between 20th to 22nd November and an expected delivery ETA around 10th to 12th December. I have attached the charter party agreement and telex release copy for your reference.

If you are interested in proceeding with this option, I will provide further updates as they become available.

Best regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Additional Charter Option: Immediate Response Required
email_chain.body:
Hi Sally,

There will be another charter available, departing from Singapore to Jakarta on 18th November. If you are interested, please advise by 15th November at the latest.

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Crude Carriage - Atlantic Destination
email_chain.body: Hi Alicia, We have 2 contracts for 5k Crude to Atlantic from Dalian to Rotterdam. Do you have anything that could load to that same laycan? Regards, Sherry

email_chain.subject: Available Cargoes for Atlantic and Baltic Routes
email_chain.body: Alicia and Sherry, The crude cargoes are sold but we have CIF Baltic cargoes for 36k/50k in that time frame with offers from Dalian, Bohai, Huangdao, and Fuzhou. MIR 5K + 9,500 in each WCI area + single run 8K with options available in Shandong. Regards, M.I.

email_chain.subject: Market Availability Update
email_chain.body: Alicia, Davoud, We will be back in the market Monday after the weekend. Regards, M.I.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Baltic Product Cargoes
email_chain.body: Hi Sherry, I discussed your inquiry from last week about Baltic cargoes that could load in Dalian's laycan with M.I. We do have product cargoes that could load during your laycan. Regards, Alicia

email_chain.subject: Booking for Coal Shipment from Santos to Sibenik
email_chain.body: Dear Dan, Please book our 3,000 metric tons of coal for shipment from Santos, Brazil to Sibenik, Croatia. Thanks, Nana

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed for Coal Shipment Details
email_chain.body: Dear Nana, Thanks for your email. I will proceed with the booking. Can you please clarify how the coal is divided for the shipment? Aare, could you provide details? Best regards, Dan

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed for Coal Shipment Details
email_chain.body: Hi Dan, Of the 3,000 tons of coal, 1,500 tons are allocated for the port and 1,500 tons are for the bill of lading. Best regards, Aare

email_chain.subject: Further Details Required on Bill of Lading
email_chain.body: Hello Aare, Thanks for the update. Please confirm if the remaining 1,500 metric tons for the bill of lading follow the same conditions as the first half handled by the port. Regards, Dan

email_chain.subject: Confirmation on Bill of Lading Details
email_chain.body: Hello Dan, Yes, the bill of lading covers the same amount of 1,500 metric tons as the port. It is handled similarly to ensure cargo consistency. Regards, Aare

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Grain Transshipment from New York to Vladivostok
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Cooper,

We are considering two options for transshipments of grain from New York to Vladivostok. Please advise your ETA for your next sailing from each port and the expected transit time for each option.

Regards,
Marina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Grain Transshipment from New York to Vladivostok
email_chain.body:
Hello Marina,

Please find our upcoming ETA schedule for departures from New York:

- Nov 23 - 1 day
- Nov 26 - 1 day
- Nov 27 - 1 day
- Nov 28 - 1 day
- Nov 30 - 1 day
- Dec 2 - 1 day
- Dec 3 - 1 day
- Dec 4 - 1 day
- Dec 5 - 1 day
- Dec 7 - 1 day
- Dec 8 - 1 day
- Dec 9 - 1 day
- Dec 11 - 1 day

Kind regards,
Cooper

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Grain Transshipment from New York to Vladivostok
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Cooper,

Thank you for the schedule. Could you please clarify the following:

1. What does the above schedule imply for transit times?
2. How many times per year can you load at New York?
3. Can you accept transshipments of grain from Europe (Netherlands, Belgium, Germany)?
4. How many times per year can you transship from Europe to Vladivostok?
5. What services do you provide?
6. Can you store bulk products in your vessels?
7. Do you have terminals at New York or Vladivostok?
8. What is your exact transshipment capability?

Thank you for your assistance!
Marina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Grain Transshipment from New York to Vladivostok
email_chain.body:
Hello Marina,

Apologies for the delay. Here are the answers to your inquiries:

1. The average transit time is approximately 4 weeks.
2. We can handle up to 52 loadings per year at New York.
3. Yes, we can accept grain transshipments from Europe, with departures every two weeks.
4. We transship to Vladivostok once a month from Europe.
5. Our services include grain transshipment from the United States and Europe to Vladivostok. 
6. Our vessels can store bulk products.
7. We do not have terminals in New York or Vladivostok.
8. Our transshipment capacity is 70,000 tons.

Best regards,
Cooper

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Grain Transshipment from New York to Vladivostok
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cooper,

Thank you for your comprehensive responses, they are very helpful. Your unique services are of great interest to us. Could you please provide further information on the following:

1. Your average transshipment capacity in the United States
2. Your average transshipment capacity in Europe

Thank you once again.

Best regards,
Marina

email_chain.subject: Shipping Request: Pulp Sacks from Egypt to Romania

Can you arrange transportation for 200 containers of pulp sacks, each weighing 5kg, from Egypt to Constanta, Romania within 12 days? Looking forward to your confirmation.

Can you take on an urgent shipping task? We need to transport one 20' container of polycotton to the Gambia. Please let me know your terms and availability.

Just want to confirm that you can handle the transportation of 10 containers of potatoes from Ukraine to Spain, with an arrival window between September 14th and 21st. Please confirm your capability and provide the costs involved.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Deadline Confirmation

I just wanted to stress that the cargo of potatoes to Spain must arrive by the 16th of September at the latest. Please ensure arrangements are made accordingly.

Regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Shipping Terms Confirmation

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request: Taichung to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Nelson,

We have 400 kgs of bearings from Taichung to Busan. Could you please provide a lump sum freight quote and confirm if partial discharge is allowed?

Sincerely,
Alma

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request: Taichung to Busan
email_chain.body:

Regarding the import from Korea to Hong Kong (HKG), the Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) at HKG is December 15th, and ETA for Korea is December 22nd. The total consignment weight is 403.5 kgs including packaging. Are the handling charges for HKG ready to be finalized? I will send you the billing details once I receive the confirmation on charges.

email_chain.subject: Re: Charges Confirmation
