email_chain.subject: Payment Details Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Alma,

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for 25,000MT Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Woo, 
Could you please provide a 7-day freight estimate for 25,000MT of oil from Copenhagen to Lagos? 
Thanks,
Felipe

email_chain.subject: Clarification Required on Freight Estimate
email_chain.body:
Dear Felipe,
It's quite an extensive volume to be shipped in such a short span. Just to confirm, you need a freight estimate for shipping 25,000 tons of oil by sea in seven days? Please confirm this detail so I can provide a more accurate quote.
Thanks,
Perry

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Required on Freight Estimate
email_chain.body:
Dear Perry,
Yes, my request is indeed for shipping 25,000 tons of oil in seven days to Lagos, Nigeria. Could you please provide a quote for this request?
Thanks,
Felipe

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate and Options
email_chain.body:
Dear Felipe,
Shipping 25,000 tons in seven days is quite unusual. For such a significant shipment via sea, you would need to load onto a tanker at a port in Copenhagen. Currently, I don't have direct contacts with major oil companies like Shell, Chevron, or Exxon who can accommodate such a capacity. Additionally, arranging transport by road in such a short timeframe is impractical due to storage space and legal constraints.
I suggest submitting your request directly to one of the large oil companies. I've also contacted the Copenhagen seaport and will inform you once I receive their response.
Regards,
Perry

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate and Options
email_chain.body:
Dear Perry,
I appreciate your efforts and understand the constraints. Please go ahead with the seaport contact, and I will also reach out to the oil companies as you suggested.
Thank you,
Felipe

email_chain.subject: Update on Seaport Contact
email_chain.body:
Dear Felipe,

The tanker can load from January 28, 2022 to February 7, 2022, and discharge from February 18, 2022 to March 2, 2022. Regards, Sam

I have reached out to my other clients and currently, there are no other alternative loads available. I will keep this file active and inform you if anything changes. Thanks again. Best regards, Liza

It allows for up to 15 cargo changes, operating between Xylophylas and Gavdos Island, loading on February 21, 2022, and discharging on March 4, 2022. Please let me know if this meets your requirements. Regards, Sam

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Urea from Port Qasim to Cat Lai
email_chain.body:

We are planning to ship 2,000MT of urea from Port Qasim to Cat Lai and are currently assessing potential challenges related to delays and port congestion. Could you please inform us about the standard waiting time clause at Port Qasim?

Best regards,
Akram

email_chain.subject: Details of the Urea Cargo - Port Qasim to Cat Lai
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rajan,

Further to my earlier email, here are the details of the urea shipment:
- Description: 70% granular, 29% prilled, 1% powder
- Moisture Content: Average 3.2%
- Packing: Poly-lined bags of 50kg and 100kg
- Load Quantity: 5,000 bags, spread over 1,000 bags per hold
- Temperature Maintenance: 50-60°C.

Could you suggest your preferred vessel type for this cargo?

Best regards,
Akram

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Urea from Port Qasim to Cat Lai
email_chain.body:
Hi Akram,

Thanks for providing the cargo details. For the shipment, you can load 70% of the urea in the hold and 30% on the hatch of a general cargo ship. Regarding your question, the standard wait time at the loading port is typically 2-3 days. May I know the expected waiting period at Cat Lai?

Best regards,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Shipment Details for 4% Polyurethane to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Guan,

We are scheduled to ship 3,000MT of 4% polyurethane for automotive leather from Tianjin to Hamburg. The cargo is marked with “A3” on its marine bills, B/L, and packing list. Additionally, there are 7 pieces marked “A1” on both documents. Please be informed that all A3 units are packed separately from A1 units, where “A1” denotes ordinary polyurethane, as verified with your sales agent.

Furthermore, the shipment includes 6 different types of packing boxes for both A1 and A3 classifications. Each type of box is identified with a unique paper number. Should any issues arise during shipment or delivery, we will require a report, detailing the box numbers clearly.

With warm regards,
Steven

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Details for 4% Polyurethane to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Steven,

Thank you for providing the detailed shipment information. I confirm the receipt of details about the A3 and A1 marked polyurethane batches, their separate packaging, and unique numbering for the boxes. Should we encounter any issues at the port, we will compile and send the necessary report following the guidelines provided.

We appreciate your efforts to ensure a smooth delivery. Please let us know if there are further updates or requirements.

Best regards,
Ms. Guan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Freight Rates for Oil Seed Cake from Saint Petersburg to Seoul
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Lewis, Can you confirm the rates for transporting 7,500MT of oil seed cake from Saint Petersburg to Seoul? Additionally, could you provide details on the length of laycan and any additional costs associated with accelerated discharge? Regards, Katherine

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Freight Rates for Oil Seed Cake from Saint Petersburg to Seoul
email_chain.body:
Hi Katherine, The following freight rates apply: 
- Spot: $50 per mt with IFM over 20% for a laycan of 7-10 days, 
- Extended: $40 per mt with IFM over 20% for a laycan of 10-14 days, 
- Longer: $30 per mt with IFM over 20% for a laycan of 14-21 days.
The rates include a fixed delay rate (FDR) of $5 per day for the first 7 days, then $10 per day thereafter (e.g., if vessel delayed 8 days, FDR totals $70: $5x7 + $10x1). These rates do not include charges for accelerated discharge.

email_chain.subject: Additional Information
email_chain.body:
Hello Katherine, Thanks for your inquiry and your interest in working with us.
Please note that the above rates do not include charges for accelerated discharge for cargo overdue beyond 35 days, which would need to be paid by the Seller. Additionally, I must inform you that vessel availability is quite limited during April to May 2023 due to the busy season. We do have a few vessels that can offer these rates but they are already committed in their previous trades and would need a 20-30 days notice to arrange a ballast leg back to Russia. I would recommend considering booking a vessel now to secure these rates.

email_chain.subject: Suezmax Crude Tanker for Sale

email_chain.subject: Flexibility Inquiry for Timber Lashing and Nailing at Montevideo
email_chain.body:
Hello Min,
How flexible are you on the nailing and lashing at Montevideo for the timber project? Thanks,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Flexibility Inquiry for Timber Lashing and Nailing at Montevideo
email_chain.body:
Dear Scott,
Montevideo is flexible on this issue provided the requirements of the Church History Museum are met. The museum is constructing a rock wall with hand hewn timbers for the base to support the rocks. This wall will be constructed inside the museum for display. They plan to hang two of our timbers from the inside of this rock wall with chains, and the nailing requirements for these timbers will be strictly adhered to for the display. The museum has requested that the side of the timber facing the rock wall be prepared with a protective material. However, the museum will ultimately decide on the type of protective coating to be used. Best, Min

email_chain.subject: Timber Transportation to Denmark Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Scott,
We are planning to take the timber to Denmark. Could you advise on the shipping options? Alternatively, would transporting them across Europe in a pick-up truck be feasible? If you can provide guidance on this, I would really appreciate it. Thanks, Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Timber Transportation to Denmark Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Bob,
For transporting the timbers to Denmark, we recommend shipping over driving across Europe in a pick-up truck. Our current brochure on timber transport options, including pricing and descriptions, can be found on our website. Additionally, you will find an order form in the attachments which you can fill out and return to us with payment. Arranging the transport via FedEx will cost approximately 1,000 Danish Kroner. Please let us know if you are interested in the display materials we have available as well as the additional display materials recommended by our representative in Denmark. Regards, Scott

email_chain.body:

Henrik

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Required on Shipping Charges
email_chain.body:

Thank you for your inquiry. The transportation costs are divided into three sections: freight ($2.3 million), BAF (which covers fluctuating fuel prices), and other surcharges. The weight limit of 150 tons applies to the maximum safe operational capacity of the vessel. Please let me know if you need further details or clarification.

Best regards,
Sergey

email_chain.subject: Payment Form and Instructions
email_chain.body:
Here is the form for your company's payment of $4,700. You should make the payment to our company's Rotterdam branch. In the field on the form for Terms, please fill in EXW Rotterdam. We expect payment within 30 days. Please send the completed form and the payment to our Rotterdam office at the address below.

Again, thank you for your business.

Best regards,
Mr. Ng

email_chain.subject: Payment Method Query
email_chain.body:
I would like to pay for this shipment using my business credit card. Could you provide the necessary paperwork or instructions for this method of payment?

Best regards,
Masiyakurura

email_chain.subject: Re: Payment Method Query
email_chain.body:
Of course. Here are the forms and instructions for payment using a business credit card.

Regards,
Mr. Ng

email_chain.subject: Credit Card Payment Details
email_chain.body: Thank you. Please find attached my credit card details for the payment.

email_chain.subject: Issue with Credit Card Payment
email_chain.body:
Unfortunately, your credit card details could not be processed as valid. Can you please verify your details and send them again in a secure manner?

Best regards,
Mr. Ng

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Merger Discussion
email_chain.body: Hello John, I’d like to schedule a meeting to discuss the merger with Broker Inc. Please let me know which days are best for you and I’ll schedule the meeting right away. Warm regards, Camila

email_chain.subject: Merger Meeting Invitation
email_chain.body: Hello John, Here is the event invitation for the merger meeting with Broker Inc on the 18th of May, 11 AM EST.

email_chain.subject: Availability Check for Merger Discussion
email_chain.body: Hello John, Is this a good time for us to talk about the merger with Broker Inc? Looking forward to hearing back from you. Best, Camila

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Broker Inc Meeting
email_chain.body: Hi John, How did the meeting with Broker Inc go? Did they have any questions for us? Let me know if you need anything. Best, Camila

email_chain.subject: Legal Approval for Merger Finalization
email_chain.body: Hi John, I got approval from the legal department to finalize the merger with Broker Inc. Do you think we should send out a press release or keep it internal? Let me know your thoughts. Best, Camila

email_chain.subject: Draft Press Release for Broker Inc Merger
email_chain.body: Hi John, The press release for the merger with Broker Inc is ready. Do you think we should include the names of the founders and key executives in the release? Let me know what you think. Best, Camila

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Corn Shipment from Wilhelmshaven to Xiamen
email_chain.body:
Hello Ian,

We need to ship 3,000MT of corn from Wilhelmshaven to Xiamen on a barge. Can we arrange for delivery from Xiamen, and do you have any price information?

Regards,
Sally

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Shipping Order Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Ian,

To confirm, we have an order from Paul Bunyan Farms in South Carolina for the 3,000MT of corn. The corn will initially be shipped from Wilhelmshaven to Hamburg on a barge, before it's transferred for final delivery to Xiamen. Could you please confirm the shipping availability and provide a price quote?

Regards,
Sally

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Corn Shipment from Wilhelmshaven to Xiamen
email_chain.body:
Hi Sally,

I've reviewed your requests regarding the shipment of 3,000MT of corn. It appears there might be some misunderstanding or possibly a security issue, as I've received similar emails from different sources. Before proceeding, could you please confirm the legitimacy of this request directly?

Best regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote - Mumbai to Yokohama
email_chain.body: Hi there, We have 9,000MT of plastic pellets to move from Mumbai to Yokohama. Please quote and advise your earliest available sail date. Thanks, Fred.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote - Mumbai to Yokohama
email_chain.body: Hi Fred, Unfortunately, our current available sailings are from Yokohama to San Francisco, with departures on April 19 and May 3, priced at $0.12 FAS. We do not have sailings from Mumbai to Yokohama at this time. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Quote Request - Yokohama to San Francisco
email_chain.body: Hello, We need to ship 5000MT of plastic pellets from Yokohama to San Francisco before April 18. We are considering a price of $0.13 C&F, CIF or ex-Tokyo FOB. Please provide your best quote. Best regards, Bob.

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Needed - Mumbai to Miami
email_chain.body: Hi there, We have 3000MT of plastic pellets to move from Mumbai to Miami. Could you please provide a quote for this shipment? Thanks, Jim.

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry - Miami to La Plata
email_chain.body: Hello, I am looking to move 1,000MT of goods from Miami to La Plata, Argentina. Could you please provide your shipping rates for this route? Thanks, Juan.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Haulage Charges and Spot Rates
email_chain.body:
Hello Disha,

We have received a shipment of 12,000MT of rock salt from Dammam. Could you please provide the haulage charges to Mumbai, and also inform us of the current spot rate for transporting to Nagpur?

Regards,
Ronnie

email_chain.subject: Branch & Office Closures and Notice
email_chain.body:
Dear All,

Please be informed that our branches in Bengaluru and Chennai, as well as the Sales Office in Kolkata, will be closed on account of the Ganesh Chaturthi Festival and Independence Day, respectively. The Sales Office in Chennai will resume operations from 10th September.

Due to unprecedented and widespread rains triggered by the southwest monsoon in Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, and Kerala, all transport to and from these regions has been suspended until further notice. We have notified our customers in these areas that we are currently unable to source consignments due to the ongoing floods.

Regards,
Team

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Next Laycan Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Patti,

Please advise on your next open laycan for 10,000MT of palm oil from Kelang to Gibraltar.

Regards,
Roxanna

email_chain.subject: FW: Feed Request (SGS)
email_chain.body:
Good Day,

Could you please update me on the new laycan for the shipment of 10,000 MT of Palm Oil for SGS Group.

email_chain.subject: RE: EAIOT - re-offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Amanda,

Please see the below proposal.

Thank you.

Kind regards,
Ria

email_chain.subject: RE: EAIOT - re-offer
email_chain.body:
Received proposal is too high. I was asked by my buyer for offers at 65.48/67.36/68.24 respectively. May I request you to quote accordingly?

Thank you,
Jeanette

email_chain.subject: Availability for Shipping 20,000MT Containerized Goods?
email_chain.body:
Hello Jemma,

Do you have any slots available next week for the shipment of 20,000MT of containerized goods from Salalah to Port Said? Your feedback would be appreciated.

Sincerely,
Eryn

email_chain.subject: Hope You Had a Good Trip!
email_chain.body:
Hey Eryn!

Hope your journey was smooth. Sorry for the late response, I’ve been catching up on rest! Just letting you know that I’ve sent off the company-required check to your inbox. Hope you're taking leisure time for yourself after the long haul. Can't wait to catch up at our next meetup!

Take care,
Nicole

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for LPG Shipment from Dahej to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hi Ken,

I'm looking to arrange the shipment of about 80,000MT of LPG from Dahej, India to Busan, Korea. We need a laycan starting around 15th May, and we are somewhat flexible on cargo specifications. Please let me know your thoughts.

Regards,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for LPG Shipment from Dahej to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hi Anthony,

Thank you for reaching out. We would be happy to assist with your delivery needs. Could you specify whether you prefer a new or secondhand vessel, and confirm whether your clients require a firm charter? Additionally, could you clarify if your clients would like us to handle the logistics on a FOB or CIF basis, and if they have a preference for a vessel registered under Chinese registry or if other registries are acceptable?

I will discuss potential options with our local manager in Singapore and await your detailed preferences.

Thank you,
Ken

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for LPG Shipment from Dahej to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hi Ken,

Thank you for your prompt response. Our client prefers a newbuild vessel and a firm charter. For the charter agreement, they would like to use the Norwegian Shipbrokers' Standard Form. It would be best if you coordinate the shipment on a CIF basis, and they are flexible regarding the vessel's registry.

Looking forward to your proposals.

Best regards,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Submission of Our Collaborative Pre-print
email_chain.body: Dear Denis and Michael, I have finalized our joint paper and am ready to proceed with the submission. Please let me know your final thoughts. Best, Raphael.

email_chain.subject: Review and Updates on Our Paper
email_chain.body: Hello Raphael and Michael, I agree with the final version prepared. Let's proceed with the submission to Ann. Pol. Math by May 13th. I've made minor amendments that enhance our argumentation on the main theorems. Regards, Denis.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Access Details
email_chain.body: Team, I've submitted our paper to the journal and it's currently under review. You can access the document using this link (registration required). I'll keep you updated on the progress. Best, Michael.

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Theorems
email_chain.body: Denis, Michael, could we discuss some details regarding Theorem 4.1 and Theorem 5.1? I feel there are still gaps in our argumentation that need addressing. Regards, Raphael.

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment Inquiry: Ho Chi Minh to Busan
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Ms. Orlov,
Could you arrange shipment for 7,500MT of coffee beans from Ho Chi Minh to Busan by mid-month? Additionally, I would like to inquire if there are extra charges for reefer plugs.
Respectfully,
Kurt

email_chain.subject: Re: [USFOODMIDDLEMEN] Program Participation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Team,
Please refer to the attached Special Program document detailing our company’s involvement this year. I look forward to exploring potential cooperation opportunities.
Yours Sincerely,
Oleksandr Kuzin
To further discuss, please reach out or visit our website.

email_chain.subject: Re: [USFOODMIDDLEMEN] Inquiry About Halal Certification Standards
email_chain.body:
[Automated Message]
This is an automated response confirming the receipt of your inquiry about Halal certification standards. Please refer to the detailed standards and criteria attached with this email. For further assistance, contact US Food Market Middleman Researchers.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Gasoline Cargo Shipment from Sikka to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Kim,

We have 13kMT of gasoline to be shipped from Sikka to Singapore. Could you please share your best offer? Also, is there any discount if the laytime is under 36 hours?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Gasoline Cargo Shipment from Sikka to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your inquiry. Before proceeding, could you please confirm the cargo terms, provide details of the cargo, and specify which vessel will be used?

Best regards,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Request for Additional Information Regarding Gasoline Shipment
Re: Request for Additional Information Regarding Gasoline Shipment
Gasoline Shipment Pricing Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Kim,

Thank you for your assistance. Based on the details provided, we would like to receive your offer at US$59.80 per mt.

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Counter Offer - Gasoline Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

My offer is US$58.20 per mt. Also, could you clarify how do you prefer the offer and payment terms to be handled with regards to your location in Greenland?

Best regards,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Fiberglass Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Yang,

We intend to move approximately 1,250MT of fiberglass from Ningbo to Tangier Med. Can you confirm if this amount, which we estimate is around 120 containers, could be accommodated on one of your vessels? Please provide a freight estimate and any applicable in-port fees as well.

Regards,
Xavier

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Update and Documentation for Ningbo-Tangier Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

The agent in Tangier Med is requesting an updated bill of lading (B/L) or other sufficient proof of the full set of B/Ls to expedite clearance procedures. Could you provide that at your earliest convenience?

Regards,
Xavier

email_chain.subject: Proof of Cargo Arrival in Tangier
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Our shipper in Ningbo requests that you forward him proof of the cargo's arrival in Tangier. He needs this documentation to provide to his bank as evidence that the bill of lading should be cashed for payment.

Regards,
Xavier

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Cargo Container Status
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Yang,

Our cargo is currently still at anchor, and our shipping company is indicating that they do not have a container ready for our shipment at this time. How can we proceed to ensure that the container is released on time? Furthermore, the shipper is asking for proof that the cargo was indeed loaded as planned.

Regards,
Xavier

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rates and Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hello Ed,
We’re putting together a contract for a large cargo of iron ore from Cape Town to Durban. We will provide the dimensions next week. Let’s aim to schedule loading for the 25th. Could you please send your latest rates?
Kind Regards,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rates and Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi Raj,
Is this contract specifically for your account? I would be glad to send you our rates once confirmed.
Best,
Ed

email_chain.subject: Rates Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Ed,
Yes, this contract is for our account. Please provide us with the rates at your earliest convenience.
Thanks,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Contracting and Pricing
email_chain.body:
Hello Raj,
I manage the contracting and pricing for these services at our corporation. Please address your inquiries to me going forward.
Best regards,
Sophie

email_chain.subject: Re: Contracting and Pricing
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophie,
Thanks for the clarification. How can I access your rates? I noticed your website is only available in English.
Best,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Rates Inquiry Follow-Up
email_chain.body:
Hi Raj,
Did you receive my previous email outlining who to contact for rates?
Best,
Sophie

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Need for Rates
email_chain.body:
Sophie,
Please send me your rates as soon as possible.
Regards,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Need for Rates
email_chain.body:
Raj,
I have forwarded your email to our contracts department. We are currently prioritizing another deal, but I expect to get back to you within a few days.
Regards,
Sophie

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Urgent: Need for Rates
email_chain.body:
Sophie,
Please confirm receipt of my request for rates sent earlier.
Thanks,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Rates Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Sophie,
Just following up to ensure you received my last email regarding the rates inquiry.
Regards,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Highly Urgent: Response Required
email_chain.body:
Sophie,
I have not received any acknowledgment or response regarding our high-value contract. Please update me on the status as this is becoming a pressing issue.
Best,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Purchase Inquiry for Soybeans Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Dush,

We have a 3,500MT cargo of soybeans from Santos to Durban. Are you looking to buy a similar cargo?

Best regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: RE: Purchase Inquiry for Soybeans Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello Fred,

Thank you for your inquiry. Unfortunately, this is outside my area of responsibility. I would recommend you contact Spencer Henderson for more detailed information regarding your query.

Please take care.
Bill Dush

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for LPG Tanker Availability from Ningbo to Baton Rouge
email_chain.body: Ms. Olsen, I’m in search of an LPG tanker that can carry 60,000 DWT from Ningbo, China, to Baton Rouge, LA. We need to ship 15,000 tonnes. Could you kindly inform me of any suitable options? Regards, Lukas

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Timing Constraints for Shipping Request
email_chain.body: Ms. Olsen, Good evening. I appreciate your prompt reply. We would like to depart Ningbo, China on 7 September 2020. Therefore, we require a vessel arriving by 1st September at the latest. Please confirm any options available for loading 60,000 DWT during this period. Regards, Lukas

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Size Requirement
email_chain.body: Ms. Olsen, We are not interested in the suggested vessel as it is too large for our requirements. We are looking for a smaller vessel. Could you please offer alternatives? Regards, Lukas

email_chain.subject: Additional Information Required for Vessel
email_chain.body: Ms. Olsen, Thank you for your response. If you have a vessel available between 1st September and 5th September with a DWT capacity of 50,000 for loading 7,000 DWT, please send me the preliminary vessel specifications, including the number of ballast tanks and fuel consumption. Also, if the pricing is around $17/MT, that would be suitable. Please confirm if the expected time of arrival (ETA) is approximately 35 days and ensure the price would not exceed $20/MT as we would not be interested otherwise. Regards, Lukas

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Tanker Availability for LDPE Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Loney, We require a tanker for transporting 5,000mt of LDPE from Vopak to Sidi Mabrouk, needed by the 5th of April. Could you please let me know the availability of tankers during this period and if there are any port availability restrictions? Regards, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Tanker Hire
email_chain.body: Good morning! Could you provide an update on the tanker availability for the LDPE shipment to Sidi Mabrouk? Thanks, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Tanker Hire
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Ashley, I've reviewed the availability and there is one free tanker between the 22nd and 24th of March. Please let me know if this suits your schedule? Regards, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Tanker Booking
email_chain.body: Hi, That's perfect, we'll take it! Thanks, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Query Regarding Rate for LDPE Haulage
email_chain.body: Hi, Could you please confirm that the rate for hauling LDPE from Vopak to Sidi Mabrouk is at 5000mt at 0.005 USD/M Ton? Regards, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Query Regarding Rate for LDPE Haulage
email_chain.body: Hi, I've confirmed with my colleagues and that rate is correct! Thanks, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Request for Phone Contact to Discuss Contract Terms
email_chain.body: Hi, Can you confirm your phone number so that we can discuss contract terms and the final booking? Regards, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Phone Contact
email_chain.body: Hi Ashley, I'm sorry, we are experiencing phone issues right now and can't call you. I can email over the contract terms for your review. Regards, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Query on Contract Terms Differences
email_chain.body: Hi, Can you please let me know what the differences in the contracts terms are compared to our standard contract? Thanks, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Response to Query on Contract Terms Differences
email_chain.body: Hello Ashley, Below please find the summary of the differences in terms compared with your standard contract: 1. In respect of demurrage, we will charge you our usual rate. However, this will be limited to 5 days and will not be extendable due to space constraints at Sidi Mabrouk Port.

email_chain.subject: Potential Cargoes Zhanjiang to Northern Ports
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Jones,

Are there any cargoes you would like to move from Zhanjiang to Dalian or Tianjin? We are currently awaiting greenlight from the charterers.

Kind regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Update on Hudec Cargo
email_chain.body:
They are waiting for the Hudec cargo.

Warm regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Verification Needed for Hudec Cargo Status
email_chain.body:
Can you check with your clients that Hudec has left port in Zhanjiang?

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Verification Needed for Hudec Cargo Status
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Yes, our clients confirm that Hudec has left port in Zhanjiang.

Warm regards,
Linda

email_chain.subject: Confirmation from Charterers on Hudec's Departure
email_chain.body:
I also checked with the charterers and received the same confirmation.

Kind regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Proceeding with Documentation
email_chain.body:
Ok, thanks a lot. I will issue the Bill of Lading immediately.

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Solar Panel Shipment from Shanghai to Colombo in October
email_chain.body: Hello, We are booking a shipment of solar panels from Shanghai to Colombo at the beginning of October. Could you please let me know if there is any available space on your vessel during that period, and the total costs for carriage from FOB Shanghai to Colombo? Sincerely, Anonymous

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Solar Panel Shipment from Shanghai to Colombo in October
email_chain.body: Dear Anonymous, Thank you for your inquiry. Unfortunately, our vessels are fully booked until the end of September. However, we will keep your request on file and notify you in case of any changes or cancellations with other shipments. Sincerely, Anonymous

email_chain.subject: Availability Update for Solar Panel Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Anonymous, Good news! One of our other vessels has become available for your shipment. We have reserved space for you on the departure date of 2nd October. The total costs for carriage from FOB Shanghai to Colombo will be: Freight: $1000, Additional Costs: $250, Total: $1250. Please confirm whether you can accept these terms before we proceed with the formal confirmation of booking. Sincerely, Anonymous

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability Update for Solar Panel Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Anonymous, Thank you for the update. We accept the terms provided. Please proceed with the formal booking confirmation. Sincerely, Anonymous

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation and Departure Details
email_chain.body: Dear Anonymous, Thank you for confirming. We have finalized your booking. Our vessel will depart from Shanghai on the 2nd October and is scheduled to arrive in Colombo on the 18th October. We look forward to serving you and hope to work with you again in the future. Sincerely, Anonymous

email_chain.subject: Shipment Status Update
email_chain.body: Dear Anonymous, We would like to update you on the status of your shipment. Our vessel has arrived in Shanghai on schedule and is currently in the process of loading your cargo. We expect all loading to be completed by the end of this week. We will keep you posted on any further developments. Sincerely, Anonymous

email_chain.subject: Departure Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Anonymous, We are pleased to inform you that the loading is complete and the vessel is scheduled to depart from Shanghai tomorrow. Thank you for your patience regarding the slight delay due to some technical issues with the vessel. We anticipate a smooth voyage to Colombo. Sincerely, Anonymous

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Gasoil Transportation from Rotterdam to Abu Dhabi
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Brand,

We are interested in shipping 60,000 M3 of gasoil from Rotterdam to Abu Dhabi in July. Could you please send us your proposal including demurrage terms, and let us know when you can provide a base proposal? Looking forward to your competitive offer.

Warmly,
Praveena

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Gasoil Transportation from Rotterdam to Abu Dhabi
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Brand,

Following our phone conversation today, I'd like to reiterate our interest in your proposal for transporting 60,000 M3 of gasoil from Rotterdam to Abu Dhabi. We are also looking to negotiate a shorter payment schedule, as permitted by our terms which include provisions for demurrage. We expect to make an immediate decision by Tuesday morning.

Regards,
Praveena

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Steel Coil Shipment from Yantian to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Could you advise on the availability and rates for shipping 3,600MT of steel coils from Yantian to Karachi? Additionally, could you inform me about the size of the holds on the vessel?

Kind regards,
Theo

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry About Steel Coil Shipment from Yantian to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Dear Theo,

Thank you for your inquiry. Currently, we can accommodate the shipment of 3,600MT of steel coils from Yantian to Karachi. I will need to check the specific details on the hold size and will get back to you shortly with the rates and further information.

Kind regards,
(Name of shipping coordinator)

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Adblue Containers
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Weiland,

We have an urgent requirement for two 40ft ISO containers of AdBlue for delivery to London by 1 June. If you confirm you can handle our purchase order (PO), we can send the cargo to you today. 

Kindly,
Megan

email_chain.subject: Contract and Purchase Order Confirmation for Adblue Delivery
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Patel,

Enclosed is the contract for the delivery of two 40ft containers of AdBlue in London before the 1st of June. Please sign and return the contract at your earliest convenience and don't forget to send us a copy of your purchase order.

Kindly,
Megan

See the full contract in Appendix A.

email_chain.subject: Purchase Order Received and Processing
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Patel,

Thank you for promptly sending your purchase order. We have confirmed the booking and are now in the process of preparing your shipment.

Kindly,
Megan

email_chain.subject: Shipment Arrival Notification
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Patel,

I am pleased to inform you that the shipment has arrived. Here are the details:

 * Destination Port: London
 * M/T Owner: Bridger Marine
 * Bill of Lading Number: Seaway 12345678
 * Estimated Date of Arrival at Discharge Port: 31 May 2019 at 17:00

Kindly,
Megan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Regular Customer Discounts for Steel Billets
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Brown,

Do you offer discounts to regular customers for steel billets in ballast?

Thanks in advance,
Sebastian

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry About Regular Customer Discounts for Steel Billets
email_chain.body:
Dear Sebastian,

We are unable to offer discounts for steel billets at this time, even for our regular customers.

Kind regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry About Regular Customer Discounts for Steel Billets
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thanks for your reply. Could you suggest where I might be able to secure discounts? I need to ship 40,000MT and I am requested by my suppliers to find a reduced rate given current market conditions.

Best regards,
Sebastian

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry About Discounts for 40,000MT of Steel Billets
email_chain.body:
Hi Sebastian,

Currently, we do not have any ongoing partnerships or recommendations for discounted providers of steel billets. I recommend checking with other brokers who might have different capabilities.

Kind regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Request for Assistance in Finding Discount Providers
email_chain.body:
Hi Rachel,

Given that Peter mentioned there are no discounts available, could you assist me in searching for other brokers who might offer competitive rates on steel billets? Any help would be appreciated as I need to secure these materials soon.

Thanks in advance,
Sebastian

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Assistance in Finding Discount Providers
email_chain.body:
Hi Sebastian,

I'll look into this for you right away and provide additional information by tomorrow.

Kind regards,
Rachel

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Rates and Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Gray,

Please let us know the earliest load date and current freight rates for 28,000MT of alumina to be shipped from Natal to Dar es Salaam.

Regards,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Rates and Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Jose,

The earliest available vessel for your shipment of alumina is Mv "Marco Polo", which is calling on 10/18/2001. The freight rate for a full shipload is $2,350 per MT, subject to grade and specification.

Best Regards,
Ms. Gray

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Visit Plan and Freight Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Gray,

Thank you for providing the vessel details and freight rate. Please confirm if this is the best offer available for the specified shipment from Natal to Dar es Salaam.

Regards,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Vessel Berth Allocation Confirmation for 24th April Departure
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Anderson,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to confirm the berth allocation for our vessel scheduled to depart from Porto Velho on the 24th of April. Could you please advise if the necessary arrangements have been made?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Needed for Berth Allocation on 24th April
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Simon,

Following up on my earlier message to Ms. Anderson, I would like to reiterate the need for confirmation of the berth allocation for our vessel departing from Porto Velho on April 24th. Your prompt response will be greatly appreciated to ensure a smooth operation.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Regards,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Information on Palm Kernel Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

I'm looking to ship approximately 5800 metric tons of palm kernel oil from Port Klang to Male. Could you provide details on how refrigeration is managed during transport? Our product requires specific temperature conditions.

Cheers,
Mona

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Information on Palm Kernel Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Mona,

Thank you for reaching out. Our vessels manage temperature-sensitive cargo like palm kernel oil using ventilated holds. The ventilation system cools the air via ice-cold seawater and circulates it to keep the cargo at the required temperature. Unfortunately, there are no dedicated refrigeration units in the holds.

We can load the palm kernel oil in ventilated rooms suitable for package or bulk goods. These rooms can accommodate one or two containers, with a loading rate of 7-8 tons per hour and a maximum weight limit of 1500 kg per container.

Special arrangements for loading to prevent damage to the palm kernel oil will include sealed containers. We can provide a sample of the required sealing material if needed.

Best regards,
James Kleine
Managing Director
Kleine Business Consultancy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Information on Palm Kernel Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

That sounds good. I plan to arrange the product arrival in 20 ft containers. The largest container dimensions are 140cm x 75cm x 37cm, with the heaviest weighing 1270 kg. We will need space for 5 containers. Could you please provide the dimensions of the available rooms?

Thanks again.
Mona

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Information on Palm Kernel Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Mona,

The available rooms for shipping are approximately 8.5m long, 2.9m wide, and 2.8m high. This should be sufficient for your 20 ft containers. We have arrangements to transport palm kernel oil in ISO containers efficiently.

If you encounter any issues with container arrangement, we can facilitate loading at Port Klang using our own trucks.

Please feel free to contact me if you have further questions.

Best regards,
James Kleine
Managing Director
Kleine Business Consultancy
Maritima Massey Building
41 Massey Road
Sandton
2196
Johannesburg
+27 (11) 684-3387
+27 (83) 322-5294 (mobile)
kleine@net

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Pyrophyllite Ore Shipment from Aqaba to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Matthieu, We'd like to ship 8,000MT of pyrophyllite ore from Aqaba to Mombasa next month. Could you let us know your best freight rate and available vessel for this shipment? Best regards, Ralph

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Pyrophyllite Ore Shipment from Aqaba to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Hi Ralph, Thank you for your inquiry. We are pleased to quote for this shipment as follows: Vessel: XING LING Sailing from Qingdao on or about March 28, 2009, with an ETA in Mombasa on or about April 11, 2009. Our freight rates are as follows: US$ 200/MT for a full container load on an FOB basis. US$ 180/MT for a full container load on a CIF basis. The above rate includes freighting by vessel, berthing costs in Mombasa, payment of standard port charges for clearance and handling of goods, the cost of the container, and our usual agency fee. Please note that the rate does not include the cost of shipment of goods from Suez to Qingdao or from Qingdao. Best regards, Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Clarification required: CIF Services and Door-to-Door Delivery
email_chain.body: Hi Matthieu, Thank you for the prompt response. We prefer to use containers for shipping to Mombasa and would like to handle our negotiations. We'll be purchasing the containers in Qingdao and require door-to-door service. Our agents will manage all port handling in China, the inland transportation of the containers to the door in Mombasa, and collection from the doorstep post-discharge. We prefer to arrange the shipment and freight payment ourselves. Can you provide a quote for a CIF arrangement under these conditions? Thank you, Ralph

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification required: CIF Services and Door-to-Door Delivery

David

email_chain.subject: RE: Purchase of Grains from Cartagena

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Quote Confirmation and Additional Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Jerry, Mr. Williams has a question about your quote for moving his cargo from Latrobe to Los Angeles with transshipment through Houston and Long Beach. Please confirm the accuracy of the following information:
- Amount: 9,700MT
- Delivery Date: March 25
- Bill of Lading No.: 0556591
- Cargo Type: base oils
- Price per MT: $38.67
- Shipping Time: 38 days
- Total Cost: $377,801.66
Additionally, could you provide details about your freight forwarders’ experience in the US market? If there are any other questions you'd like to ask, feel free to call (617) 555-1234. Thank you, Melissa

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Quote Confirmation and Additional Information
email_chain.body: Dear Melissa, Thank you for your inquiry. I have confirmed with our customer service team that all the provided details are correct. Enclosed, you'll find the requested documents demonstrating our freight forwarders' experience in the US market for the years 2015-2016, a list of our clients in the US, and a sample contract for shipping oil. Should you have any questions about these documents or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. We appreciate your interest and look forward to your prompt response. Best regards, Jerry

email_chain.subject: Delay in Vessel Loading
email_chain.body:
Greetings,

We encountered unexpected delays at the pier, and as a result, we were unable to load your vessel on time. Please be assured that we are actively working to resolve this issue and will notify you as soon as loading is completed. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

Thank you,
Jason Moore

email_chain.subject: Update on Vessel Loading Status
email_chain.body:
Greetings,

The vessel was discharged on time at the pier. However, the loading process is taking longer than anticipated. We are making every effort to expedite this process and will keep you updated on our progress.

Thank you,
Jason Moore

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry: Bunker Strategy and Additional Surcharges

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: Bunker Strategy and Additional Surcharges
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email. Please ensure this information is sent directly to me for verification, as we aim to maintain precise communication. It is crucial to notify us of any changes promptly.

Regards,
Angie

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: Bunker Strategy and Additional Surcharges
email_chain.body:
Dear Angie,

Yours sincerely,
Ana

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: Bunker Strategy and Additional Surcharges
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your clarification, Ana. Please ensure that all future communications include all necessary details and respect professionalism.

Regards,
Angie

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed: Shipping Details

Zhang

email_chain.subject: Further Clarifications Provided

Yours sincerely,
Zhang

email_chain.subject: Urgent Clarification Required
email_chain.body:

We appreciate your continuous feedback but require further clarification on specific points you mentioned. We are a growing enterprise keen on establishing robust procedures.

Yours sincerely,
Zhang

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Cereal Shipment from New Orleans to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Jenks,
Could you transport a 4,500MT shipment of cereals from New Orleans to Istanbul by 30 May? Please provide a quote based on our target $80 per mt freight rate. Also, could you advise if your operation has insurance?
Regards,
Dan

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request for Cereal Shipment from New Orleans to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Jenks,
Thank you for your enquiry. A reply will be sent to you this evening.
Best regards,
Annette

email_chain.subject: Quote for Shipping Cereal from New Orleans to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Jenks,
We have reviewed your request to ship a 4,500MT shipment of cereals from New Orleans to Istanbul by 30 May. Please accept our quotation for this service at $115 per mt FOB New Orleans. This quote includes our $35 per mt fuel surcharge and a $10 per mt surcharge for loading at New Orleans. Moreover, please note that this shipment will require insurance cover for General Average, Warranties, Freight Risk, and War Risks. We advise you confirm with your insurers that the vessels used have the appropriate cover. We are ready to provide you with the relevant documentation for your shipment and look forward to your response.
Best regards,
Annette

email_chain.body:

Patrick

What is the minimum tonnage your yard can handle? Additionally, how many different locations are there available for discharging activities like bunkering?

email_chain.subject: Further Discussions on Survey and Yard Inspection
email_chain.body:

We look forward to further discussions on this project when we meet with your surveyor and visit your yard.

Best regards,
Patrick

email_chain.body:

I have been in touch with New Fortress Energy this morning, who have expressed their interest in visiting our yard next week. They're based in Tel Aviv and have a tight schedule, but they will try to fit us in. Can you send us your operational procedures via fax, particularly regarding dredging in rivers, loading, and bunkering processes?

Thanks,
Patrick

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability and Fixture Confirmation

Jerry

email_chain.subject: Charter Availability Inquiry for Fertilizer Transport
email_chain.body:

Best regards,
Bryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Availability Inquiry for Fertilizer Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

I'm not sure if my previous email was received. I have a buyer interested in your cargo, and they have made a very competitive offer. Please let me know if the charter for the 1500MT of fertilizer from Singapore to Kuala Lumpur is still open.

Best regards,
Bryan

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Buyer's Legitimacy and Charter Status
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

Best regards,
Bryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Availability and Offer Consideration
email_chain.body:
Hi Bryan,

I'm sorry, but your offer will not be considered at this moment. That does not mean you can't have the charter; I just need to verify a few details first. Could you provide more information about this buyer?

Best,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Response Required
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

Is everything okay? I haven't been able to reach you. Could you please call me to clarify the current situation?

Best regards,
Bryan

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Current Status Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

How did everything turn out? I have not heard from you in a few days, and I am concerned there might be a problem. Please let me know the status at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Bryan

Ramón

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Cargo Allocation for Vessel GDDT-101
email_chain.body:
Dear Ramón,

I am puzzled regarding the sea cargo volume aboard my vessel, GDDT-101. According to our agreement, we were to ship 3,000 tons of Liquefied Petroleum Gas and 5,000 tons of oil. However, the current total seems to be 7,800 tons, excluding any cargo of rice which was also supposed to be part of the shipment. There appears to be a discrepancy in what was loaded compared to what has been documented.

Could you please weigh the hull and get back to me immediately regarding this? Are there any updates on the vessel's rating, and was there any consideration to offload some of the oil to adjust the cargo weight?

Best regards,
Camille

labels.commodity: Steel, Liquefied Petroleum Gas, Oil, Rice

email_chain.subject: Availability and Demurrage Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:

We have a requirement to ship 5,000MT of fertilizer from Charleston to San Francisco. Could you please let me know if you have a vessel available in the next week, as well as your standard demurrage rates?

Kind regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability and Demurrage Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I am pleased to inform you that we have a vessel available for your specified shipment timeframe. Our standard demurrage rate is $200 per day for a maximum of 7 days, or $5,000 per month.

Please let me know if this is acceptable to you or if you need further information.

Kind regards,
Jessica

labels.demurrage: 200 per day for up to 7 days, or 5000 per month

email_chain.subject: Vessel Berth Confirmation at Lagos

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Berth Confirmation at Lagos

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Berth Confirmation at Lagos

email_chain.subject: Vessel Arrival Details

Vessel name & POA number 2. Booking number 3. Master's name and contact number Let me know if you require anything further. Regards, Maya

email_chain.subject: Vessel Arrival Confirmation

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Methanol Shipment Handling Capacity
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Yamaguchi,
Could you handle 3,700MT of methanol from Hamriyah to Mumbai this weekend? Also, do you anticipate any demurrage charges beyond 48 hours of laytime?
Best,
Suraj

email_chain.subject: Query on Historical Demurrage Data
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Yamaguchi,
What was the shortest demurrage duration encountered by your vessel between January 20 to February 3, 2018?
Best,
Suraj

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Methanol Shipment Handling Capacity and Historical Demurrage Data
email_chain.body:
Dear Suraj,
Unfortunately, I do not have a specific document for the "lowest demurrage", but I can inform you about a relevant instance. Our vessel once transported 3,700 MT of methanol from Sharjah to Mumbai on January 20, 2018. It sailed at 7:30 AM on January 23, 2018, from Sharjah and had approximately 5 hours of demurrage in Dubai. You can view the location here: http://goo.gl/maps/PgmWT

For the upcoming shipment, demurrage will be minimal and all terms will adhere strictly to the Maritime Service Agreement (MSA).

Best regards,
Yamaguchi

email_chain.subject: Request for Semi-submersible Transport of Metal Pellets

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Semi-submersible Transport of Metal Pellets
email_chain.body: Dear Adam, Thanks for your inquiry. I have a vessel with a deadweight tonnage of 33,000DWT available for charter from the 7th of May. This multipurpose vessel meets both type 1 and 2 ISL standards. Can you confirm if this suits the capacity requirements for your shipment? Thanks in advance. Best regards, Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Semi-submersible Transport of Metal Pellets
email_chain.body: Dear Joe, Thank you for the prompt response. I will review the specifications of your vessel and get back to you within a week with confirmation. Best regards, Adam

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Diesel Transport from Shanghai to Kaohsiung

email_chain.subject: Accounts Receivable
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Jones,
I am writing to clarify a credit note raised for invoice number 1234567 (STG 456.78). This credit note relates to a service provided to Red Star Logistics in January 2013. It appears there was an underpayment initially, which has now been rectified. However, the full payment of the correct amount was not possible at that time. Previously, the customer service team was unable to provide a full explanation for this issue. I believe issuing a credit note was the correct action to address this discrepancy.
Kind regards,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Business in the 21st Century
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,
We are considering integrating new technology into our business systems, specifically transitioning our current telephone setups to VoIP services. I am interested in understanding your opinion on VoIP services and the potential advantages and costs associated with implementing such systems.
I would be grateful for your insights.
Best regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Service Status
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Hackett,
Please find attached a summary of the service status for our web servers as of 1st February 2012. I would like to remind you that this information is confidential and intended solely for internal use. It should not be disseminated or published in any manner.
Sincerely,
James

email_chain.subject: Legal News Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Kate,
I am enclosing the latest legal news updates and would like to highlight that the new immigration regulations will come into effect on the 1st July 2012. Please be aware that this change affects the immigration status of some of our employees. I will attach a revised copy of the necessary application form for your review and action.
Kind regards,

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Sugar Shipment from Asia to Europe
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Happy,

I would like to place an order for 12,000MT of sugar from Asia to Europe. Could you please advise on available vessels? I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Tanisha

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sugar Shipment from Asia to Europe
email_chain.body:
Dear Tanisha,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have a vessel available that will be ready on 19th October. Loading will commence at Singapore and discharge at Amsterdam Port.

Please review my terms for this shipment. 40% of the price is payable at the time of signing the agreement and the balance upon delivery. I await your confirmation.

Best Regards,
Rami

email_chain.subject: Request for Official Offer and Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Rami,

I would like to receive an official offer. Could you please provide the details of the terms and the vessel?

Best regards,
Tanisha

email_chain.subject: Official Offer for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Tanisha,

I confirm the price at $840/MT for CIF Amsterdam. Payment terms are as follows: 40% payable at the time of the agreement and the balance upon delivery. The L/C will be issued on 1st November 2023. The vessel available for your cargo is MV Eleftheria.

Upon receipt of a signed copy of the agreement, I will provide additional details as required.

Best Regards,
Rami

email_chain.subject: Freight Request for Salt Shipment from Dubai to Miami

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Request for Salt Shipment from Dubai to Miami

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Request for Salt Shipment from Dubai to Miami

email_chain.subject: Important Information and Resources
email_chain.body: The main site for official documents can be found at the National COPP.COM Defense Fund. Visit http://copp.com for more information. If you have an interest in law enforcement or the technical side of investigations, this resource will be invaluable.

email_chain.subject: Re: Important Information and Resources
email_chain.body: I appreciate the resources provided. I didn't change or delete anything from the given links, and I'm sure you didn't either. This documentation is particularly interesting for individuals researching email communication around significant events. For additional archives and information, check out https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2013/11/post-9-11-censorship-post-9-11-censorship-and-right-know and https://www.eff.org/overview.

email_chain.subject: Experience at the Forefront of Digital Reporting
email_chain.body: As someone who has been at the forefront of digital journalism, I've had firsthand experiences with situations where reporters bridge the gap between the public and obscure or difficult topics. Conversations like these greatly contribute to our understanding.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for UAN Shipment from New Orleans to Mersin

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for New Zealand Apples
email_chain.body:

Deborah

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for New Zealand Apples
email_chain.body:
Dear Deborah,

Thank you for the referral. Unfortunately, Peter informed me that there are no apple stocks available in Zhangzhou. However, I found some options in the wholesale market with the following prices: factory price at USD 50, retailer's price at USD 60, and wholesaler's price at USD 100 per ton.

Best wishes,
Marian

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for New Zealand Apples

Best,
Deborah

email_chain.subject: Request for Updated Cargo Manifest
email_chain.body: Good Morning, Could you please send an updated cargo manifest for our container No. 07123? It is currently listed as containing 'Coal', but we need to know the specific type of coal. Yours Sincerely, Yve Morgan

email_chain.subject: Updated Cargo Manifest & Proposal for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello, Your inquiry was received, and I have updated the cargo manifest as requested. I am also forwarding a copy of it, along with our proposal for the 100 car coal shipment, to our export contacts in Quesling and your contacts in Pyongyang. Please review it and let me know if you have any questions. The original email is attached for your reference. Regards

email_chain.subject: Error in Cargo Manifest
email_chain.body: It appears there is an error in your recently updated cargo manifest. The document indicates an unknown quantity of coal, and the container number is missing. Please review and provide the correct container number so we can proceed with transport. Yours Sincerely, Marc Churchill

email_chain.subject: Clarification and Correction in Cargo Manifest
email_chain.body: Thank you for your concern. There has been a misunderstanding; the item in question is intended for pharmaceutical use, not coal. The incorrect description was an error, and we are currently working to rectify it. I appreciate your patience while we update the program, which is not very flexible. Additionally, would it be possible for your engineering team to assist by creating a detailed list of the contents for each container? This would greatly facilitate our updates.

John

email_chain.subject: Communication on Professional Network
email_chain.body:

Thank you for trying to connect on the professional network. Unfortunately, I do not have my email address listed on that profile. Please let's continue our communication via email.
Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Communication on Professional Network
email_chain.body:
Dear John,
It seems challenging to locate a reliable URL for continuous online interaction. Agree that we should keep our communication through emails as suggested.
Best regards,
Andre

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed
email_chain.body:
Dear Andre,
I wanted to inform you that I have not registered any email address under any unknown domain. If there was any confusion regarding URLs or domain names, please disregard it and continue to reach me at this email.
Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Crude Cargo from Cyprus to Piraeus
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Jacobs,

We have a cargo of 18,000MT of crude from Cyprus to Piraeus, scheduled for loading on the 8th of September. We will need a guarantee for this shipment. Can you confirm your availability and intention for this transport?

Thanks,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Crude Cargo from Cyprus to Piraeus
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,

Could you provide more details about the conditions of the cargo? I’m particularly interested in the arrival timeframe and whether we can expect the cargo in Piraeus approximately 20 days after loading.

Kind regards,
Thomas Jacobs

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Crude Cargo from Cyprus to Piraeus
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

Thank you for getting back to us. Here are the details of the offer from our side:

Delivery: In 20 days after loading (sea delivery).
Payment: The price is set at $220 per tonne. Please note, as per directive from my management, this price is final and non-negotiable.

Please let me know your thoughts on this offer.

Best regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Crude Cargo from Cyprus to Piraeus
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

We find the terms of the offer, especially the fixed rate of $220 per tonne, challenging. We will consider this and potentially craft an alternative proposal.

Best, 
Thomas

email_chain.subject: Invitation to Year End Party

email_chain.subject: Re: Invitation to Year End Party
email_chain.body: Dear Hiroko, Thanks for the invitation! I'd love to be there. Regarding the party arrangements, have you confirmed the food and drinks to be served? If you're still open to suggestions, I'd love to share some ideas. Thanks for your cooperation. Best Regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Invitation to Year End Party
email_chain.body: Dear guest, Thanks for confirming your attendance. The party is indeed on December 25th, not on the 20th or the 30th as was potentially miscommunicated earlier. I've chosen some food and drink options but would love to hear your suggestions before finalizing everything. Please let me know. Kindest Regards, Hiroko

email_chain.subject: Re: Party Arrangements
email_chain.body: Dear Hiroko, Thanks for clarifying the date. The options you've picked out sound great, but I'll send over some additional suggestions by tomorrow. Looking forward to celebrating together! Best Regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalizing Party Details
email_chain.body: Dear Hiroko, Here are my suggestions for the food and drinks. [List of suggestions]. Please review and let me know if these can be incorporated into the final plan. Best Regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalizing Party Details
email_chain.body: Dear guest, I've reviewed your suggestions and they are fantastic! I've integrated them with our original plan. Thanks and see you on the 25th! Can't wait for the celebration. Warmest regards, Hiroko

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Timecharter Options for 3,500MT from San Juan to Guayaquil

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Timecharter Options for 3,500MT from San Juan to Guayaquil
email_chain.body:
Hi Kadir,

Thank you for your inquiry. Below are the details of our timecharter options:
- Cargo capacity: Up to 5,000MT with an open hatch, expandable to 7,000MT.
- Charter type: 1-month spot charter.
- Availability for delivery: Between October 23rd and 30th, latest.
- Cargo types: Acceptable for both bulk or container shipments.
- Charter party: Governed by BIMCO terms.
- Redelivery: Anticipated between November 28th and December 28th.

Please find our latest availability below:
- October: 23, 24, 25, 26, 28, 29, 30
- November: 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 13, 14

Best regards,
John Lopez

Kind regards,

Best regards,
Lilla Tomsen

Thanks,
Lilla Tomsen

email_chain.subject: Load Planning Confirmation
email_chain.body:

Yes, loading is indeed what we were planning. I am expecting a call from Xavier today for the final update. I'm confident all will proceed as planned. Separately, I'm preparing for another sugar shipment arrival from Alabama.

Best wishes,
Lilla Barnhill

email_chain.subject: Kudos and Thanks
email_chain.body:

You really are on top of things. A master at your work, indeed!

Regards,
Lilla Barnhill

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Far East Shipment Loading Schedule
email_chain.body:

Peter

email_chain.subject: Demurrage Rate Inquiry for Jakarta Delivery

Thank you for confirming the demurrage rate. I have a few additional questions:

Appreciate your insights,
Holly

email_chain.subject: Demurrage Rates Inquiry for Multiple Ports in Indonesia

- Pelabuhan Umum Tanjung Priok
- Pelabuhan International
- Batamindo Batu Besi Port (near Batam Airport)
- Pelabuhan Internasional Tanjung Priok, Teluk Gadung, Bekasi
Could you also provide the average waiting time and the procedure for securing slots at these ports? For shipments directed to Palembang or Jambi, what would be the logistics costs?
Many thanks,
Holly

email_chain.subject: Re: Demurrage Rates Inquiry for Multiple Ports in Indonesia
email_chain.body:
Dear Holly,
Thank you for reaching out. I will gather the required information and get back to you shortly.
Best regards,
Mr. Hutchinson

email_chain.subject: Request for Bitumen Quotation for CIF Durban

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed on Product Requirements

email_chain.subject: Provisional Quotation for Bitumen

email_chain.subject: Review of Quote and Contract

email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Gari,

This letter is to confirm that I have received your purchase order dated March 12, 2013 for the goods listed in your purchase order. I am writing this letter in order to confirm receipt of your purchase order and in compliance with the Nairobi City County Supply Chain Policy 2013. The terms of the purchase order are agreed upon by all parties and any subsequent request for changes will have to be confirmed in writing by all parties in accordance with the Nairobi City County Supply Chain Policy 2013.

The delivery address and contact details of the purchaser can be found in the purchase order.

The Purchaser is to make all payments in accordance with the Nairobi City County Finance Policy 2013.

Please confirm this acknowledgment.

labels.vessel: Tanker, UBC Tanker, Dry Dock Vessel

email_chain.subject: Request for Assistance with Shoe Material Issues
email_chain.body:
I’m looking for some help, and I was hoping you could point me in the right direction. I work for a company that produces orthopedic shoes, and we’ve been getting a lot of complaints about our shoes falling apart. It seems to happen whenever a patient uses our shoes to do a heavy activity, like basketball or soccer. Our shoes are made with the same materials as other brands, so I don’t understand why our shoes would be falling apart faster. I’m wondering if there’s something wrong with our manufacturing process, or if there’s some other reason that our shoes would be breaking more easily. Can you help me out?

Many thanks,
Jim

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Assistance with Shoe Material Issues
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the situation with your orthopedic shoes. It is concerning to hear that your shoes are deteriorating under heavy activities such as basketball or soccer. Even if the materials are the same as other brands, there could be numerous factors affecting the durability, from the quality of the input materials to the specific techniques used in your manufacturing process. We recommend conducting a thorough review of your entire production process and inspecting your material supplies. Additionally, consider whether these activities are recommended for the specific design of your orthopedic shoes.

Best regards,
Customer Support Team

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Timber Transportation from Skopje to Suez

The vessel assigned is the 'Star of India' with an ETA in Suez on April 3rd. The shipment is expected to arrive at the Port of Suez. Enclosed are the necessary documents for customs clearance. We appreciate your business and look forward to finalizing this shipment with you. Sincerely, Tom

email_chain.body: Dear Enzo, I have arranged for the vessel ORIFLAMM to make a stop at Bimini next week for the scheduled survey. Her current schedule is: Week 1 - load cargo in Houston, refuel in New Orleans, and voyage to Cuxhaven; Week 2 - load cargo in Cuxhaven, voyage to Halifax, load additional cargo in Halifax, voyage to Boston, and offload cargo in Boston. There are a few issues with the vessel that are a cause for concern, namely a cracked main engine bearing housing and the state of some of the steering equipment. It is advisable to have these issues examined by a professional marine surveyor. Please review this document and advise whether we should proceed to purchase the vessel. Sincerely, Stella

email_chain.subject: Clearing Mr. Abraham's Reputation
email_chain.body:
Dear Friends,
First of all, I would like to thank everyone who expressed their concern following the recent article about Mr. Abraham on 6th July. The portrayal in the media does not reflect reality, and we have notified Mr. Abraham's legal team to take appropriate steps to correct this misinformation. The New York court has already issued an interim order that prohibits the publisher from releasing further articles about Mr. Abraham in any form. Thank you all once again and best wishes for your holiday.
Yours faithfully,
Mr. Edmund Taylor

email_chain.subject: Fact-check Required: Article Misrepresentation Concern
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,
A recent article by Mr. Eoghan Rice titled 'Abraham wrote of tax fraud after release' published on 6 July, misrepresents facts about Mr. Maurice Abraham, who has been incarcerated in a U.S. federal prison for the past 5 years. The piece inaccurately reported that the person referred as 'H' and 'O’Toole' wrote the last two letters to 'The Irish Independent' just before the murder of Stephen Trew in 1998. These were allegedly from Mr. Abraham. Furthermore, the article mentioned that Mr. Abraham’s communication privileges were revoked by prison authorities upon discovering his plans to write an exposé on tax fraud, which requires verification.
Best Regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Fact-check Required: Article Misrepresentation Concern
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,
The information published by Mr. Eoghan Rice regarding Mr. Maurice Abraham appears to be partially investigated and potentially misleading. Mr. Rice's article claims activities and correspondences involving 'H' and 'O'Toole' that allegedly took place weeks before Stephen Trew’s 1998 murder, attributed to Mr. Abraham. Additional checks are necessary to validate these claims, especially regarding the alleged restriction of Mr. Abraham’s writing privileges by prison authorities.
Regards.

Have a good day!

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request
email_chain.body: Greetings, Sir. We have a cargo requirement of ____MT of ________________ from _______________ to _______________. Could you please provide your best freight estimate for this shipment? Will there be any additional fees if we miss the narrow laycan? Kind regards, ____________________________

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request
email_chain.body: Hello, Unfortunately, due to the lack of necessary documents upon cargo arrival, we are unable to provide a freight estimate at this time. Please note that the container will be released within 5 business days, and you will be provided with the B/L number and a copy of the B/L. Post this period, should the cargo not be collected, it will be considered as a new shipment, with the new ETA set for October __, 2017. We will arrange a re-booking agent to inspect and release the cargo. If your carrier cannot wait until the updated ETA, we recommend arranging storage for the cargo. Kind regards.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Vessel Arrival in Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Request for Update on MS Mangrovia's Arrival

email_chain.subject: Reminder for Update on Previous Request
email_chain.body: Dear Steven, I have been waiting for an update since May 29 as we need to arrange further logistics. I sent you a reminder e-mail on that date, but I have not yet received an answer. Could you kindly clarify the status? Regards, Seppo
