email_chain.subject: Inquiry about D6 Propylene Glycol for July Shipment
email_chain.body: I’m inquiring about oil field chemicals for shipment to Fos-sur-Mer. We have a tight laycan for July. Can you confirm the availability of D6 Propylene Glycol and provide details on required documentation? Regards, Lina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about D6 Propylene Glycol for July Shipment
email_chain.body: Thank you for your inquiry. Our forwarders in Marseille will collect the shipment from the port and handle the paperwork. We provide a small packshot of KEPHNIT, our D6 Propylene Glycol, which can be found here: https://www.munzing.com/products/acids-and-glycols/d6-propylene-glycol. Our office is based in France, and our forwarders are located in Marseille. We look forward to your response. Best regards, Lina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about D6 Propylene Glycol for July Shipment
email_chain.body: Thank you for the packshot. We will review the details and get back to you as soon as possible. Best regards, Marine

email_chain.subject: Request for Further Information on D6 Propylene Glycol
email_chain.body: Could you please confirm the availability of D6 Propylene Glycol and provide its CAS number? Also, is there a substitute for this product? We would appreciate if you could provide an electronic version of the data sheets listed in the annex pages 14 and 15. An official quote would also be helpful. Thank you. Best regards, Lina

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Further Information on D6 Propylene Glycol
email_chain.body: Thank you for your request. We have forwarded the required documents to the GSO on page 13. The electronic version is available here: https://business.gov.il/Regulations/Documents/%D7%93%D7%AA%20%D7%9B%D7%95%D7%AA%D7%97%20%D7%9C%D7%99%D7%A4%D7%9D%20%D7%91%D7%AA%D7%A1%D7%A8%D7%99%D7. We will provide an official quote and confirm availability shortly. Best regards, Lina

email_chain.subject: Request for Sample Charter Contract
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. García,

Our customer is seeking to charter a medium-sized vessel for transporting 6,000MT of rice from Manila to Lagos. Could you please provide us with a sample contract including your standard terms and conditions?

Thank you,
Hector

email_chain.subject: Need Assistance with Reliable Shipping Broker
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Congratulations on your recent success and new position at Voyaca.com. I came across your LinkedIn profile and believe you're well-suited to advise me in a pressing matter. Previously, I hired Brian Hopkin of Thomas Hopkin & Co for chartering a vessel to transport produce from Panama to the West Coast of the USA. The vessel unfortunately ran aground shortly after departure, resulting in a total loss. Brian misrepresented the ship owner's reputation and arranged an insurance policy to his advantage while under the influence of alcohol. He colluded with the insurance firm to secure his profit after the incident, but my company has yet to receive its share. 

I wonder if you might help me find a trustworthy ship broker for a new shipment from Greece to Rotterdam, and perhaps advise on the ideal route and legal safeguards to prevent further mishaps.

Thank you for your consideration.
Best regards,
Cieran

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Sample Charter Contract & Finding Reliable Brokers
email_chain.body:
Hello Hector and Cieran,

Thank you for your enquiries. For Hector, attached please find the draft of our Charter Party Terms & Conditions.

Cieran, I would recommend connecting with a vetted shipping broker through our professional network to avoid further complications. I can assist in facilitating an introduction.

I hope this addresses both of your needs effectively.
Regards,
García

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Ammonium Sulphate Shipment
email_chain.body:
Cher Monsieur/Madame,

We are exploring options for shipping approximately 10,000 MT of Ammonium Sulphate, with the possibility of including an additional 30,000 MT of different fertilizer, from Damietta to Qingdao. We understand that you work closely with China Ocean Shipping Company Limited (COSCO) and would appreciate your guidance on arranging this. Could we discuss this at your earliest convenience?

Cordially,
Firstname Surname
Business Manager at Glencore International AG

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Ammonium Sulphate Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Firstname,

Thank you for reaching out with your shipping needs. We can certainly assist you with the shipment from Damietta to Qingdao. I will coordinate with our broker in Qingdao and ensure we find the best solution for your cargo, including the potential additional 30,000 MT. Can we arrange a meeting this week to go over the details and specifications?

Best regards,
Mr. Firstname
Marine Manager at Glencore

email_chain.subject: Re: Invitation Letter for Conference
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Firstname,

Alongside the shipping discussions, I'd like to acknowledge receipt of your invitation to the Conference on Cooperation and Sustainable Development in a Changing World: An Asia-Pacific Perspective, scheduled for 17-19 October 2017 in Qingdao, China. We appreciate the invitation and will confirm our participation soon.

Sincerely,
Firstname Surname
Business Manager at Glencore International AG

email_chain.subject: Query about Cocoa Powder Shipment
email_chain.body:

My company is ready to buy 4,500MT of cocoa powder from São Paulo to Vancouver. Would it be possible to have the ship stop at one of our cocoa processing plants in New York?

email_chain.subject: Re: Query about Cocoa Powder Shipment
email_chain.body:

We would be happy to accommodate your cargo from São Paulo as indicated. Could you please let us know when you would like to begin the booking process?

We look forward to your response,
Sally

email_chain.subject: Cargo Processing in New York
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Our factory in New York will be able to receive the cargo as discussed. I will call you this afternoon to go over the details.

Best,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Processing in New York
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

I'm calling to confirm our delivery schedule. The boat will stop in New York on Thursday at 10am. Please ensure that all the necessary paperwork has been received as previously discussed.

Best regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Cargo Arrival at New York Facility
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

I am pleased to inform you that the cargo has arrived at our New York facility and has been safely stored at our dock. We have arranged for a team to meet the truck with the cargo at 12:30pm tomorrow at the dock. Could you please confirm if this time is convenient for you?

Looking forward to your confirmation,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Arrival at New York Facility
email_chain.body:
Dear Steve,

Thank you for the update. The scheduled time tomorrow at 12:30pm works well for us. Please let us know the specific dock number upon arrival of the truck.

Best,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.subject: Availability Inquiry for Rice Shipping in July
email_chain.body:

Could you please let me know if you have any space in July for shipping 1,400MT of rice from Houston to New York? The exact ETA is flexible, so I can adjust to available slots in July if possible.
Kind regards,
Sridhar

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability Inquiry for Rice Shipping in July
email_chain.body:
Dear Sridhar,
Do you still have cargo from Houston to New York for July, or was your inquiry for a backup in case June arrangements fell through? Please confirm if you need scheduling for July or if there are unscheduled shipments from June that need to be addressed.
Kind regards,
Martin

David Brand
Strategic Alliance - Exxon Mobil
Deputy Head of Supply - Rosneft
+97155 175 5399

email_chain.subject: Offer for Crude Oil Trade
email_chain.body:
David,

We have a crude oil offer available under the following terms:
- Product: Crude oil, originated from Kazakhstan, CAS No: 64741-43-3
- Quantity: 30,000 M/T
- Vessel: IMO III Tanker, clean, untraded

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Glycerol Transport from Houston to Felixstowe
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Jackson, We are currently evaluating proposals for the transport of glycerol from Houston to Felixstowe. Can you provide details of your shipping capacity, your approximate freight rate, and the financial terms for payment? Regards, Amelia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Glycerol Transport from Houston to Felixstowe
email_chain.body: Hi Amelia, I'm pleased to assist you. We have 100 MT of glycerol ready to ship now, with space to take 1000 MT more. Our freight rate is £5,000/MT, plus all standard shipping fees. Payments can be processed via bank transfer, but other options are available upon discussion. Please let me know if you need any more information. Best regards, Tracy

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Glycerol Transport from Houston to Felixstowe
email_chain.body: Thanks for your offer, Tracy. We can take the full shipment of 1000 MT of glycerol as soon as possible. Please invoice me now, and I will arrange payment immediately. Looking forward to doing business with you, Amelia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Glycerol Transport from Houston to Felixstowe
email_chain.body: I'm glad we can do business together, Amelia. I've emailed you the invoice for 1000 MT of glycerol and will follow up with shipping details soon. Best regards, Tracy

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Glycerol Transport from Houston to Felixstowe
email_chain.body: Perfect, Tracy. I've arranged the payment and am now looking forward to receiving the shipment. Can you confirm that our payment has been received? Amelia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Glycerol Transport from Houston to Felixstowe
email_chain.body: I've received confirmation of payment, Amelia. We'll be delivering the glycerol to Felixstowe in 7-10 days. Is that suitable for your requirements? Best regards, Tracy

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Glycerol Transport from Houston to Felixstowe
email_chain.body: That's great news. Thank you very much, Tracy. We'll be expecting your shipment in 7-10 days, as agreed. If you need any further information, please let me know. Best regards, Amelia

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Details and Demurrage Rates
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Green, Could you find a vessel to transport 1,600MT of toasters from Plymouth to Rotterdam that will be ready to load the cargo on the 12th? Additionally, could you provide the weekly demurrage rates? Sincerely, Renée

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Details and Demurrage Rates
email_chain.body: Hello Renée, The transit time from Plymouth to Rotterdam is approximately 10 days, costing 600 USD. You are welcome to load in Plymouth earlier; however, please inform your buyer about potential demurrage costs due to early loading. The weekly demurrage rate is 100 USD per week, and storage charges are 25 USD per day. Let me know if this information is helpful or if you need further assistance. Thank you, Sam

email_chain.subject: Clarification and Invoice Request
email_chain.body: Dear Renée, I apologize for the delayed response; I have been occupied with multiple interviews last week. Concerning our previous correspondence, it has come to my attention that you need the vessel loaded by the 6th. Please confirm so I can arrange the invoice by the 3rd to facilitate internal approvals. This will also allow you to secure alternate arrangements if our rates are unsatisfactory. Regards, Sam

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wheat Shipping from Piraeus to Mersin

Kind regards,
Hans

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipping from Piraeus to Mersin
email_chain.body:
Dear Hans,

Regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipping from Piraeus to Mersin
email_chain.body:
Dear Ulf,

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Proposed Shipping Terms for Wheat Transport
email_chain.body:
Hans,

Here are the proposed terms for the wheat transport:
- 200 MT Bulk Wheat at a rate of USD 5,000 - 6,000 fob Piraeus PMA

- CFR Mersin

Please call me to discuss or finalize the arrangements.

Best, Ulf

email_chain.subject: Request for Diesel Fuel Shipping Quote from Fujairah to Singapore
email_chain.body: Hello, We are looking to ship 8,000MT of diesel fuel from Fujairah to Singapore. Can you please send me a quote and also confirm your documentation requirements? Best regards, Kate

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Diesel Fuel Shipping Quote from Fujairah to Singapore
email_chain.body: Thank you for your email. Could you please specify if you require a CIF or term price? Additionally, could you share the density of the diesel fuel you intend to ship? We urgently need to arrange marine fuel for our vessel and will provide finalized data as soon as possible. Thanks, Nimo

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Diesel Fuel Quote
email_chain.body: I would like to clarify that my quote will cover the term price to discharge in Singapore. The fuel density is 0.843 SG. Regards, Kate

email_chain.subject: Diesel Fuel Pricing and Specifications
email_chain.body: Following up on your query, the CIF Singapore price is USD 386 and term is USD 360. Does that align with your budget? Specifically, are you looking for VLSFO 0.5%S, or 0.1%S? Regards, Kate

email_chain.subject: Logistics and Specifications for Diesel Fuel
email_chain.body: We require the 0.5%S VLSFO fuel to be available for discharge by or before the 25th of August. Could you confirm the earliest possible supply date? Additionally, please provide the FOB Fujairah price for this arrangement. Regards, Nimo

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Fuel Supply and Pricing
email_chain.body: For the 0.5%S VLSFO, I can ensure availability around the 23rd of August. The price will be USD 350 FOB Fujairah, with an additional USD 1.50 to cover the forward fixing of the MGO purchased on the spot market at the time of discharge. Please confirm if this is acceptable for you to proceed. Regards, Kate

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation and Documentation
email_chain.body: The price you've quoted is acceptable. If we can proceed, could you please send me the necessary documentation I will need to prepare to load this cargo? Regards, Nimo

email_chain.subject: Required Documentation for Diesel Cargo
email_chain.body: For proceeding with the cargo loading, we require the following documentation: 1) Bank Guarantee (BG) for the diesel payment in USD at Fujairah (Palladium recommended). Regards, Kate

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Alternative Shipping Routes
email_chain.body:
Mr. Everest,
You are working on a cargo from Mina Al Ahmadi to Ho Chi Minh City. I can offer your client an attractive contract if you ship from Gothenburg and Daesan. Could you please let me know if these are viable options?
Regards,
Tabitha

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Alternative Shipping Routes
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Tabitha,
Your offer is interesting, but it must be tailored individually for each shipment to the customer. Please provide more details about the route, the terms and conditions, and the port of loading. Could you also specify more about the products that you offer?
Best regards,
Oscar Everest

email_chain.subject: Further Details on Shipping Routes
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Everest,
We would be happy to provide you with more details. Our products can be of several types, although we do not specify brands. If you can specify the port of destination, we can define the most interesting directions for you.
Yours truly,
Vladimir

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Details on Shipping Routes
email_chain.body:
Dear Vladimir,
Thank you for your kind reply. Unfortunately, I cannot provide you with the port of destination as we are still in the proposal stage and plan to conduct a survey of our potential customers.
Best regards,
Oscar Everest

email_chain.subject: Assistance with Direction Selection
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Everest,
We always take into account our partners' needs and preferences. Once you provide the list of potential customers interested in these directions, we can choose the most suitable route. Please send me the list at your earliest convenience, and we will be happy to assist you.
Yours sincerely,
Vladimir

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance with Direction Selection
email_chain.body:
Dear Vladimir,
Thank you for your letter. Our company is interested in the contract. The company was founded in the Russian Federation and has production sites in Germany and China. The cost of the cargo will be set individually for each shipment to our partner. In general, the cost of transportation is calculated on individual shipment bases.
Best regards,
Oscar Everest

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Business Collaboration
email_chain.body: Dear Rob, We would like to discuss a potential deal involving your company. Could you please share your account details at your earliest convenience? Best regards, Jorge

email_chain.subject: Seeking Patterns
email_chain.body: I've been reflecting on common themes and would appreciate your insights. Consider the following topics: favorite movies, favorite websites, personal lifestyle questions, preferences in pets and food, experience with online services, favorite color, and music preferences. What underlying theme connects these inquiries? Hint: Think about the nature of personal preference and relational environments.

email_chain.subject: Expressions of Love and Anticipation
email_chain.body: To the love of my life, may our life be filled with love. We're destined to reunite soon. Recall the days of our youth and the love songs we enjoyed on the radio. Despite walking the same road, our room still feels spacious, and our family sends their regards. Holding you in my thoughts always, yet the physical distance challenges us. Remember, I love you and look forward to our next meeting, hoping it's not postponed. Take care, my beloved.

email_chain.subject: Job Proposal for Consulting Services
email_chain.body: We are impressed with your skills and would like to offer you a consulting position. Please share your rates and availability. We propose a starting salary of $1,000 per month plus expenses. We look forward to your response. Best, Quan

email_chain.subject: Collaboration Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Kristy, We are interested in establishing a partnership with your company. Could you please send us your account details at your earliest convenience? Best regards, Monica

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for Urea Transportation

We would need the cargo to arrive by December 15th. Could you provide the freight rate for this? Also, please inform us if loading on weekends is permissible. Many thanks, Joan

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Urea Transportation

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Needed for Urea Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Singh, we urgently need your confirmation on the freight rate and the possibility of weekend loading to proceed with the charter agreement. Thank you, Joan

email_chain.subject: Request for Competitive Shipping Rates from Rotterdam to Antwerp

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Shipping Arrangements and Contact Information

Fred

email_chain.subject: Forwarder and Sales Contact Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Fred,

Here is a link to connect with our Antwerp Sales Rep: http://bit.ly/Antwerp-Sales-Rep. Feel free to contact him at 0031 (0)62776XXXX; he will assist you with the rate.

Best regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Introduction and Shipping Requirements

Joe

email_chain.subject: RE: Santos Soya Meal

email_chain.subject: FW: Santos Soya Meal

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Sugar Delivery from Los Angeles to Seattle
email_chain.body: Please find attached a quotation for the delivery of 4,500 MT of granulated sugar from Los Angeles to Seattle. You are required to make a bank to bank transfer of 30% of the value in advance and the balance against the Bill of Lading within three working days from the date of this offer. Should you require any further details, please do not hesitate to contact me. Yours sincerely, Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Quotation for Sugar Delivery from Los Angeles to Seattle
email_chain.body: Hi Frank, I am pleased to proceed with this transaction at the quoted price of $2,600/MT for granulated sugar. Our credit terms are 30% deposit plus 70% on sight payment against the Bill of Lading. My colleague, George, is ready to finalize the formal contract and schedule the vessel. Looking forward to hearing from you soon. Yours sincerely, John

email_chain.subject: Insurance Details and Payment Structure Query
email_chain.body: Hi Frank, Thank you for your prompt communications. Could you provide more details about the insurance? Also, is there a possibility that we can split the payment to 30% upfront and the remaining 70% at the time of vessel loading? Best regards, Kelsey

email_chain.subject: Proceeding with Bank Transfer
email_chain.body: Frank, Thank you for clarifying the details over email. We will now proceed with the bank to bank transfer as discussed. Looking forward to a successful business relationship. Regards, Kelsey

email_chain.subject: Awaiting Further Instruction
email_chain.body: Hello Frank, Thank you for the prompt reply. I am awaiting your further instructions or confirmation to finalize our arrangements. Best regards, Kelsey

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for MEG Spot Voyage Rate from Houston
email_chain.body: Hi Alex, my buyer in Oslo is interested in purchasing 600MT of MEG from Houston. Could you provide an estimate for a spot voyage rate and advise on when we can sign a charter party?

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for MEG Spot Voyage Rate from Houston
email_chain.body: Hi Kristina, the current FOB New Orleans rate is around $90/ton. Rates are firm at this level due to limited tonnage availability. Additionally, due to port congestion in Houston, we will only sign a charter party once we have finalized the deal. If the charter party needs a destination clause, it can be signed after we confirm the final details.

email_chain.subject: Re: MEG Rate and Contract Details
email_chain.body: Thanks for the update, Alex. Here in Norway, we deal in Krone. Thus, the local equivalent price is 3,300,000 NOK/MT (approx. $90/MT translated) (FOB Nola). We can draft a charter party with these terms and provisions for storage if the MEG arrives earlier than needed.

email_chain.subject: Comparison of MEG Rates
email_chain.body: Hello Alex, I've received a quotation from a Singaporean trader for 12,000MT of MEG FOB New Orleans at 3,300,000 NOK/MT, USD equivalent of $90/ton. Their offer includes destination clause: 'Bill of Lading to be issued only for Norwegian ports'. Their total calculation with an estimated delivery cost of $20,000, charter party fee of $200,000, and insurance of $350,000 amounts to $3,890,000. Could you let me know how your rate compares? P.S. According to a contact at a major Norwegian oil company, the current port congestion in Houston is due to Hurricane Gustav.

email_chain.subject: Booking for 6,000 MT of Steel
email_chain.body: Hey Greg, I'm looking to book 6,000 MT of steel to arrive in Miami in 2 weeks. Can you take the booking and finalize the rate within 48 hours? Thanks, Chase

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking for 6,000 MT of Steel
email_chain.body: Hi Chase, My offer is still valid but please be aware that the rate was initially off by $5/MMT. I've corrected this error in the updated rate attached. All other terms and conditions of the deal remain the same. Please review and let me know if you have any questions, otherwise you can proceed with signing the attached contract. Thank you, Greg, Spot Steel Trader

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking for 6,000 MT of Steel
email_chain.body: Hi Greg, Thank you for the update. I'm reviewing the corrected rates and will proceed accordingly. Please hold the booking as I finalize things on my end. Thanks, Chase

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking for 6,000 MT of Steel
email_chain.body: Hi Chase, Just a reminder that the rate has changed due to market fluctuations. The new rate is detailed in the most recent attachment sent yesterday. All other terms and conditions remain unchanged. Please confirm your acceptance so we can finalize the booking. Thank you, Greg, Spot Steel Trader

email_chain.subject: MV Virginia Express Freight rate inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Jacobsen, 

We have an inquiry for a suitable vessel to load 3,000MT of Urea at Arzew to discharge at Barcelona. Could you please send me a suitable freight rate for this cargo?

Thank you.
Best regards,
Stephan

email_chain.subject: RE: MV Virginia Express Freight rate inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Stephan,

Thank you for your inquiry. To provide you with an accurate freight quote, could you please specify whether your vessel is under a time charter or a voyage charter? Additionally, for a time charter, please specify the duration and for a voyage charter, the charter conditions such as BIMCO Vessel-Partner, Vessel-Space Charter party, a specific named Charter Party, or other relevant clauses.

Best regards,
Christian Jacobsen

email_chain.subject: RE: MV Virginia Express Freight rate inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Stephan,

Following up on my previous email, your information regarding the charter type and conditions is crucial for finalizing the freight quote. Please provide the requested details at your earliest convenience.

Kind regards,
Christian Jacobsen

email_chain.subject: RE: MV Virginia Express Freight rate inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Stephan,

I would like to remind you of the information needed regarding the charter type of your vessel as specified in my previous emails. This is necessary to proceed with your request for a freight quote.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.
Best regards,
Christian Jacobsen

email_chain.subject: SHIP NAME – Grangemouth Slot
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr Barlow,

We are delighted to be able to offer the following slot for SHIP NAME’s voyage into Grangemouth on 19 August:

Ship           : SHIP NAME
IMDG No.       : 2287

ETA Grangemouth: 21:00 (19/08/2020)

Best Regards,
Marco

email_chain.subject: Re: SHIP NAME – Grangemouth Slot
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr Barlow,

Could you confirm the slot booking for our next voyage? I would also like to discuss the appointment time and duration for the visit.

Best regards,
Marco

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Loading Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Marco,

Thank you for your inquiry. Apologies for the delayed response; I have just returned from 3 months leave. The vessel will be loaded with Polymers and Visco polymer. Generally, the cargo would take up the entire space, but as mentioned earlier, we are able to accommodate smaller sized cargo if possible.

Best regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Berth and Crane Queries
email_chain.body:
Hello Tony,

Are you able to advise on your normal laycan for this vessel? And your usual berth use at Grangemouth? Is this vessel restricted only to cranes that can handle 50 metric tonnes?

Many thanks,
Marco

email_chain.subject: Re: Laycan and Berth Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr Tosco,

Laycan wise, this vessel is always flexible and will try to accommodate as much as possible. Berths are not usually allocated until 24-30 hours prior to arrival, especially during peak season. 50 MT cranes are usually suitable for any cargo carried on board.

Best regards,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Laycan Request Adjustment Needed
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

I have just received a request from other parties for a laycan between the 19th and 25th August, within the same slot. They are represented by their broker only. Could we adjust our laycan to better accommodate them as well?

Best,
Marco

email_chain.subject: Cargo and POL Load Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr Tosco,

Thank you for your kind offer. Please confirm:
1. The total capacity in cubic meters that can be loaded. Maximum POL volume is 4900 cbm.
2. On full loading, the volume of POL that can be accommodated. Also, how many cubic meters of POL can be loaded in the forward (viscopol) hold.

The following are pending your confirmation:
1. MCT: 40 tons.
2. Lead time to build a POL hatch: 24 hours from confirmation.
3. Access to MOORFIX for our inspection: pending on the availability of the terminal.

Best regards,
Ms Rook

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Bunker Tanker Availability for MSC Cristiana
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Bridget, Could we utilize your bunker tankers for the upcoming voyages of MSC Cristiana? We are interested in scheduling two supplies, each 5,000MT in August and September. Additionally, we are considering planning for 8,000MT voyages. Could you please provide us with the details on terms and conditions?

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Bunker Tanker Availability for MSC Cristiana
email_chain.body: Hi David, Thank you for reaching out. We can indeed provide bunker tankers for your MSC Cristiana voyages in the specified amounts of 5,000MT and possibly 8,000MT. Please let us know more about your requirements to finalize the terms and conditions. Kind regards, Bridget

email_chain.subject: Bunkering Service Availability
email_chain.body: Hi Srdjan, Following our recent phone conversation regarding bunkering services, could you please confirm your interest in bunker fuel, offshore, and marine fuels, including those with low sulphur content? What is your preferred schedule and volume for delivery? Regards, Bridget

email_chain.subject: Available Fuel Options and Destinations
email_chain.body: Hey there, As per our ongoing discussions, we have two options available for you: 1. 5,000MT of High-Sulphur Fuel Oil (HSFO) at 3.5% - Available in 3-4 days. 2. 3,000MT of Marine Gas Oil (MGO) at 0.5% - Available in 4-5 days. Please let us know your preference. Looking forward to collaborating. Kind regards, Bridget

email_chain.subject: Freight Request from Hamburg to Tehran
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Elsner,

Could you provide a 1,500MT cargo of freight from Hamburg to Tehran before June 14th? Please share your typical demurrage and dispatch rates.

Thanks,
Serafina

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Request from Hamburg to Tehran
email_chain.body:
Dear Serafina,

We can offer a logistic solution with available 1,500 MT freight capacity on the Hamburg to Tehran route. The cargo will first be transported to Istanbul and then via Ahvaz to Tehran, with planned stops in each city. The cargo transit from Manila to Hamburg will land in Istanbul on May 31st.  Our freight rates are $750 per 20' container for demurrage and $500 per 20' container for dispatch.

Please confirm if this arrangement suits your needs. Thank you!

Best regards,
Johann

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Request from Hamburg to Tehran
email_chain.body:
Dear Johann,

Thank you for your offer, but the route described is not what we are seeking. We would like a more direct shipment option from Hamburg to Tehran, without additional stops if possible. Please let me know if such direct service is feasible.

Best regards,
Serafina

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Request from Hamburg to Tehran
email_chain.body:
Dear Serafina,

Acknowledging your preference for a direct route, I would like to confirm that we can arrange for your cargo to be transported directly from Hamburg to Tehran with only a single necessary stop in Istanbul for operational purposes. The cargo will be loaded on our vessel ETERNAL DREAM, proceeding from Istanbul to Ahvaz and then Tehran on our vessel METAPHYSICS. Each transfer will be managed to maintain schedule and efficiency.

Thank you for your consideration.

Kind regards,
Johann

email_chain.subject: Vessel Loading Inquiry from China to Egypt
email_chain.body: John, I am planning a shipment consisting of 11,000MT of zinc from China to Egypt, and we are considering loading dates of either 22nd August or 29th August. Could any of these dates align with your charter schedule? Many thanks, Min-Jeong

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Loading Inquiry from China to Egypt
email_chain.body: Hi Min-Jeong, The vessel can accommodate 11,000mt, and we have a loading window from 20th to 24th August. Post this, the vessel is scheduled to move to the next port for loading corn between September 1st and 3rd. Please confirm if these dates work for you. Hope this helps, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Loading Inquiry from China to Egypt
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for the information. I will check with the ship's owner and confirm soon. Regards, Min-Jeong.

email_chain.subject: Charter Confirmation and Vessel Details Required
email_chain.body: Hi John, Hope you had a pleasant holiday. Can you confirm the charter arrangements and provide the vessel details for the planned loading of Zinc from China to Egypt scheduled for September 3rd? Regards, Min-Jeong.

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Confirmation and Vessel Details Required
email_chain.body:
Hi Min-Jeong, Yes, the charter is confirmed. The vessel details are as follows:
Vessel Type: A1, 7 years old, built in 2009, Registered in Bahamas, Class +100A1, Flag: Marshall Islands, 26,804 DWT, Draft: 11.20 M, Grain capacity: 44,163.00 CBM, LOA: 180.0 M, BEAM: 28.0 M, Holds: 2 Hatches each 6.00M X 12.00M, and cargo holds: 5.00M X 12.00M. Regards, John.

labels.vessel: Marshall Islands registered, Bahamas class +100A1, A1 type

email_chain.subject: Availability of Vessel for Trip from Port Darien to Port Dauphin

email_chain.subject: Clarification - Final Destination off Guadeloupe

Do you know anyone who might be able to help us with this route, or perhaps another shipowner who can accommodate this change? Best wishes, Jessica

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Maritime Services in the Region

Could you possibly provide any information on shipping agencies in the area as we noticed many big ships do not have their cargo listed online? It would be greatly appreciated. Kind regards, Jessica

email_chain.subject: Cancellation of Shipbuilding Project

email_chain.subject: Need for Shipowners with Large Vessels for Work in the Caribbean
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Richards, We are currently looking for a shipowner who has a large vessel available for work in the Caribbean. It appears that vessels under 20,000 tons are not available for cargo transport, even when docked. The ships listed in the Maritime Database are apparently not for sale — do you know of any shipowners with available vessels for sale, or are they listed in any other databases? Best regards, Jessica

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Vessel Charter

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability Confirmation Needed

email_chain.subject: Potential Collaboration Discussion

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation - Tungsten Carbide Buttons
email_chain.body:
Dear Jacob,

I hope this message finds you well. Below are our company details for your reference:
- Name: ExportCo
- Tel: +962-6-56xxxxxx
- Mobile: +962-7-9xxxxxx
- Fax: +962-6-56xxxxxx

We have a production facility in Bahrain but our exports are primarily handled from Jordan. We typically export quantities in the range of 50 to 150 kilograms. Given your budget and requirements, I'm confident we can prepare a competitive offer and coordinate shipment directly from Bahrain.

email_chain.subject: Introduction and Product Range
email_chain.body:
Dear Jacob,

We are Spectra, an Amman-based importer and distributor of mining chemicals, including product names like CŁpim™ 41 (75% Sodium Cyanide), Satyam M3, Kengal® M, TMAA, DCTA, and Hexamine. Most of our products are imported from Europe and supplied either in bulk drums (50kg or 125kg) or smaller packaging like jerry cans and pouches, catering to various industries.

Our warehouse and offices are located in the Abdali area, Amman, conveniently close to Queen Alia International Airport and King Hussein Bridge.

Warm regards,
Spectra Chemicals

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Base Oil Shipment from Falmouth to Port Kembla
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Raith, As mentioned over the phone, we are interested in transporting 12,500MT of Base Oil from Falmouth to Port Kembla. Could you please send a firm offer for a full laycan? Many thanks, Hector

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Laycan Dates
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Raith, After speaking with our customer, they require confirmation of laycan. They need the following dates: 01 July, 15 August, 15 October, 15 December, 15 February, 15 April, 15 June, 15 August, and 15 October. These dates are strict; no alternatives will be accepted. Can you advise if these dates are available? Best regards, Hector

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation Details
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Taylor, Regarding your enquiry for the shipment of 12,500MT of base oil from Falmouth to Port Kembla, we would appreciate if you could provide your quotation with the following details: 1. Name of the base grade, 2. Quantity of the base grade, 3. Basis of the quotation, 4. Delivery period, 5. Freight exclusive or inclusive, 6. MOA, HBA, BAF, and whether BAF is included in freight or billed separately, 7. Any special terms and conditions. Looking forward to your reply. Regards, Hannah

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Freight and Load Readiness
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Nair, Thank you for your offer. Please confirm if the freight includes BAF, and if BAF is invoiced monthly to the buyer. Additionally, could you please confirm: 1. If the load will be ready by 15th August, 2. Your Incoterms. Looking forward to your response. Regards, Hannah

email_chain.subject: Terms and Conditions for Base Oil Transaction
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Taylor, Thank you for your enquiry regarding the base oil transaction. Please find attached our terms and conditions. We await your comments. Yours sincerely, Brian.

email_chain.subject: Vessel Position and Berth Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body: Mr. Li, We plan to load 2,000MT of iron ore from Tianjin to Port Hedland next month. Could you please confirm your vessel position and berth availability? Thanks, Charlie

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Position and Berth Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Charlie, According to your email, your vessel will load iron ore from China and discharge at Port Hedland. Our yard is usually full of steel sheet during this time of year. Could you let us know your deadline? Best regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Berthing and Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Charlie, There are vessels waiting for their berthing at the dock. If the berth is available for your vessel, our shipowners plan to offer us at USD1.00/MMT and also wish to extend the payment terms to 60 days. Your advice would be very much appreciated. Best regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Berthing and Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Tom, Our cargo is on schedule and the load port is planning to allocate the vessel berth to us. We accept the freight rate of USD1.00/MMT as proposed. Could you please sign the letter of indemnity for our shipowner? Also, our commercial team in the load port confirms that the steel sheet is in the iron ore range. Regards, Charlie

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Further Actions
email_chain.body: Dear Charlie, As you know, our shipowners agreed to offer the price of USD1.00/MMT and also wish to extend the payment terms to 60 days. Could you please sign the letter of indemnity and the indemnity agreement for our shipowners? Best regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation and Further Actions
email_chain.body: Dear Tom, Please confirm if we have reached an agreement on the terms outlined in your last email? Best regards, Charlie

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation and Document Dispatch
email_chain.body: Dear Charlie, We have prepared the documents and are going to send them to you by courier. Could you please confirm that you are expecting the documents? Regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Fixing - Lubricants Transportation from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body:

Is it possible for you to fix a vessel this Friday for 3,300 MT of lubricants from Genoa to Haifa? Also, by when would you need the charter party signed? Additionally, I am expecting a rate offer for this shipment. The best offer I have so far is $80 per MT from WFS Energy, received just this morning.
I look forward to receiving a competitive offer from your esteemed company.

Kind regards,
Sam Montgomery,
Group Procurement Manager,
John Robb Ltd

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Fixing - Lubricants Transportation from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam,

Thank you for your email. Could you please confirm the following details to proceed?
1. Main cargo: lubricants
2. Preferred loading date: 21 June, though we have some flexibility around this date.
3. No earlier discharge date than 22 June.
4. Trade route: Genoa to Haifa.
5. Preferred vessel size.
6. Any flexibility regarding the loading or discharge ports?
7. Can you be flexible with the bunker date? If so, what are your preferred ranges?

Thanks,
Justine Smith,
Vessel Procurement,
Bolla Ltd

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Fixing - Lubricants Transportation from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body:
Hi Justine,

Thank you for your prompt response. Here are the confirmations for our requirement:
1. The main cargo is lubricants.
2. I can commit to a loading date of 21 June.
3. The discharge date should be no earlier than 22 June.
4. The trade route is confirmed as Genoa to Haifa.
5. I would prefer a vessel no larger than 25,000 DWT.
6. We are flexible with both loading and discharge ports.
7. The bunker date should be on 22 June.

Kind regards,
Sam Montgomery

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Fixing - Lubricants Transportation from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam,

Thank you for your detailed reply. Based on your specifications, we would like to offer our client a rate of $90 per MT for a shipment scheduled for a bunker date of 22 June, based on a voyage from Genoa to Haifa.

Kind regards,
Justine Smith,
Vessel Procurement,
Bolla Ltd

email_chain.body:

1. Security: $50 USD
2. Terminal Handling: $150 USD
3. Peak period fee: $100 USD
Total: $300 USD
All fees are inclusive of tax and insurance. If you want to add an inspection by an independent agency, that will be an additional $100 USD per container.

Let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
Krystyna

email_chain.subject: Market Updates and University Inquiries
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,
Greetings from Tez and Cengiz.
It's great to hear you're back from London. We hope you had an enjoyable trip. We would like to inform you about some recent developments that could impact our market. Also, could you update us on the course and structure changes at the English University and the University of Chicago, especially regarding their current student admissions policies?

email_chain.subject: Re: University Updates
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,
The University of Chicago no longer admits graduate students to its study abroad programs.
Best regards,
Cengiz

email_chain.subject: University Admission Conditions and Suggestions
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,
It will be challenging to get you admitted to a university program within six weeks. Check the university websites and thoroughly read their admission conditions. Meanwhile, I've found some potential residential schools which could be useful for your summer studies. You can find the list here: http://www.thegatewayus.com/Study/Subject/Summer-School.aspx
Best regards,
Cengiz

email_chain.subject: On Education and Credit Transferring
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,
Regarding transferring credits, talk to the university as they might offer a flexible program that allows you to take some courses over the summer. This approach could help in obtaining the necessary transfer credits. I will send you some additional links to schools known for their competitive residential courses soon.
Best,
Cengiz

email_chain.subject: Contract Update and Further Assistance
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,
We've successfully set up the contract with Halime Çiftçi. Looking forward to your feedback and let us know if you need further assistance.
Best regards,
Cengiz

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Availability and Capacity
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Availability and Capacity
email_chain.body:
Dear Oleg,

Thank you for your inquiry. We would be able to accommodate your shipment of steel. There is no ship departing on the 21st, but we have space available on a vessel departing on the 26th of April.

Best regards,
Margaret Cragie

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry about Shipping Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Cragie,

Thank you for the information. We are now considering shipping about 500MT of the initial 3,000MT. Could you please provide the rates and terms for this shipment?

Regards,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: Shipping Offer for 500MT to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Gabriel,

We are pleased to arrange the shipment of 500MT for you. The shipment will sail to Durban on the MV Asahi. Please find the details below:

- Ship Name: MV Asahi
- Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) Aqaba: 26/4
- ETA Durban: 16/5
- Type of Ship: Container Vessel
- Container Sizes & Rates: 20 Feet - USD 170.00 per unit, 40 Feet - USD 150.00 per unit

Please ensure that the cargo is ready for loading by the 26th of April. If the cargo release occurs on this day, the vessel will proceed as scheduled. If not, there may be a delay, and cargo will need to be trucked to the port by the 28th.

Thank you,
Margaret Cragie

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Dimensions and Total Pricing
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Cragie,

Thank you for the shipment details. The shipment will consist of units approximately 6m x 2.5m x 1m, each weighing around 500kg. We have noted the total prices and will ensure logistics from our side are arranged as per the given dates.

Regards,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Capability and Time Requirement for MGO Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Capt. Hu, We are organizing a cargo shipment of 200,000mt of MGO from Gijon, Spain, to Japan. It's a sizable shipment, and I would like to consult whether all our suppliers are equipped to handle such a large volume. Additionally, could you advise on the expected loading time? Many thanks, Timothy

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Capability and Time Requirement for MGO Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Timothy, Referring to previous discussions, while we have experience handling shipments exceeding 100,000mt through our parent company to major traders, a 200,000mt order remains substantial. Such orders are typically split, with each part approximating 100,000mt. The timeframe, including shipping documentation and payment schedules, can be negotiated directly between the supplier and the buyer. A crucial factor is finding a supplier capable of fulfilling such a vast quantity. Regards, Capt. Hu

email_chain.subject: Additional Details on Shipping Vessels
email_chain.body: I’d like to add that the largest vessels available for this route have a capacity limit of 130,000mt, suggesting the necessity for two ships. The average delivery duration is roughly 45 days, although it varies based on the chosen route and vessel availability. Shipping costs are estimated between USD 10 to USD 20 per mt. Splitting the shipment seems the most prudent strategy. Regards, Capt. Hu

email_chain.subject: Supplier and Vessel Information
email_chain.body: Continuing from our prior exchanges, I recommend contacting local trade associations or missions for supplier references. In the absence of local options, these bodies can also refer to international sources. Multiple vessel types, including bulk carriers and tankers, suit this cargo size. The most traveled route between Europe and Japan spans approximately 7,000 nautical miles, with the typical journey lasting about 30 days depending on maritime conditions. Regards, Capt. Hu

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Freight Rate for Hamburg to Aarhus Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Let’s confirm that our 4,500MT fixture from Hamburg to Aarhus is settled at an all-in rate of $300/MT. Can you confirm that this rate includes all costs with no additional charges?

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Freight Rate for Hamburg to Aarhus Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

Indeed, the agreed quotation is $300/MT. I want to point out that the vessel owner had initially considered a lower rate of $250/MT, but given your preference, we will stick to the all-in rate of $300/MT.

Regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Freight Rate for Hamburg to Aarhus Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Thank you for the clarification. It's imperative that we agree on the $300/MT as an all-in rate, and I appreciate your confirmation that the vessel owner will accept this rate with no additional costs.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Further Discussion on Freight Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

Please note that while I mentioned a possible lower rate, the final decision is yours. I'm here to facilitate the agreement as per your business needs and ensure clear communication. Let's maintain the $300/MT rate as confirmed unless you advise otherwise.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Offer to Discuss Freight Rate Further
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

I want to ensure you're aware that discussion is key in business and we're open to further talks. If you're interested, I’d be happy to arrange a call to go over the details once more and answer any remaining questions you may have.

Cheers,
David

email_chain.body:

Thank you for your email. Our rates for your shipment of 1,500MT of palm oil to Ponta Delgada are as follows:
- L/C for 300,000 MTB: $85.00/MT
- L/C for 100,000 MTB: $75.00/MT
We are based in Valencia and have updated storage facilities. Please let us know if you have any queries.
Best regards,
José

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Purchase of Storage Tanks
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Jocelyn,
We are planning to buy second-hand storage tanks for our facilities. The tanks would be used to store hydrocarbons for our refinery in Marseille. We need tanks of the following capacities: 100,000 bbl, 300,000 bbl, and 600,000 bbl. Our preferred locations for these tanks are Spain and France.
Best regards

email_chain.subject: Offer for 150,000 MTB LPG Tanker
email_chain.body:
Good day,
We have identified a 150,000 MTB LPG tanker that may suit your requirements. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with further details.
Best regards

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for logistics space for multiple shipments
email_chain.body:
Hi Shah,
Do you have any competitors with space available for consolidating the following shipments? We need to ship:
- 12,000 mt of PS Foam Pellets
- 10,000 mt of Diethylene Glycol
- 1,000 mt of PTA
- 2,000 mt of EVA
- 12,000 mt of Benzyl Benzoate
The consolidation is from Shanghai to Colombo totaling 20,000 mt. Your assistance is greatly appreciated.
Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for logistics space for multiple shipments
email_chain.body:
Hello M. Alagappan,
We can provide space for the movement of the commodities mentioned. We are currently setting up a new weekly service from the Middle East to the Africa market. Could you please send a copy of the shipping position so I can review it in detail? You might also want to share this information via relevant shipping mailing lists.
Regards,
Shah

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for logistics space for multiple shipments
email_chain.body:
Dear Shah,
Thanks for your response. Please find the new weekly shipping position attached, starting from 14/09/01. Please let me know if you can assist with any of the cargoes mentioned.
Thanks & Regards,
M. Alagappan
m.p.o. 99 Havelock Road
Singapore 161990
Email: alagappan@nexuslogistics.com.sg
Fax: 65 6221 0226
T/L: 65 6221 0220

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for logistics space for multiple shipments
email_chain.body:
Hello M. Alagappan,
We are currently managing the following routes:
- Bangkok to Dhaka: 12,000 mt PS Foam Pellets
- Dhaka to Mersin: 12,000 mt PS Foam Pellets
- Mersin to Abu Dhabi: 10,000 mt Diethylene Glycol

We have available space for your shipments. Please advise on your space requirements and provide your offer for these shipments. Looking forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
Shah

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Details from Antwerp to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Olsen, We need to transport goods from Antwerp to Rotterdam and require pickup on or before February 15th. Could you please confirm when you'll provide the completed HS code and the delivery address of the goods? Thank you, Patrick

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Details from Antwerp to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Patrick, Apologies for the delay in response. The vessel’s estimated time of arrival is January 15th, so we need the HS code and delivery address by January 10th at the latest. Please send the documents to Joan at joan@importexport.com. Best regards, Ms. Olsen

email_chain.subject: Shipping Details Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Patrick, We will ensure delivery at the port on the specified dates. The cargo is 3 tonnes and will be contained. Could you please let us know the expected arrival time of the container? Thanks, Stephen

email_chain.subject: Regarding Your Regular Customer Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Kiriil, We are pleased to hear about your interest in becoming a regular customer. Unfortunately, we do not issue regular customer cards as our company utilizes a credit rating system for customer loyalty. In the future, we could offer you a tailored credit line. We look forward to our continued cooperation. Yours sincerely, Maria

email_chain.subject: Notification of Business Relationship Termination
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Christopher, We regret to inform you that we cannot continue our business relationship. The quality of products and after-sales service have consistently failed to meet our expectations. Sincerely, Client Relations Service

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment Space Availability for MS Irene
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Taylor, We need to arrange a shipment of coal for the vessel MS Irene. The intended port of loading is Richards Bay, and the intended port of discharge is Maputo. Could you please confirm the available space for coal on this ship and whether it's suitable for carrying such cargo? Thank you, Rohan

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Space Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Douala to Maputo
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Taylor, I urgently need to confirm the availability for a second shipment of coal from West Africa. Our port of loading has been determined as Douala, Cameroon, while the port of discharge will remain as Maputo. Can you verify if there is sufficient space on the ship and if it is appropriate for this cargo type? Thank you, Rohan

email_chain.subject: Availability Check for Wheat Shipment from Colombo to Port Louis
email_chain.body: Good afternoon Ms. Taylor, I have a shipment of 7000 metric tons of wheat ready for loading at Colombo, with Port Louis set as the discharge destination. Could you please inform us about the ship's availability and suitability for this wheat shipment? Thanks, Rohan

email_chain.subject: Space Confirmation Required for Cashew Shipment from Lagos to Port Louis
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Taylor, A shipment of 3500 metric tons of cashew nuts is prepared for loading in Lagos, scheduled to be discharged in Port Louis. Please can you confirm if the space is available on the designated ship and if it is suited for our cargo? Thanks, Rohan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about shipping schedule and rates
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Santos,

I hope this message finds you well. We are experiencing difficulties organizing vessel space on the Senegal to Cameroon route and would appreciate your assistance. Could you please send your current shipping schedule in PDF format, along with your rates for transporting 2,500MT of bauxite ore?

I will also forward this request to my colleague, Mrs. Boyer, for her records. We plan to discuss this further after the weekend.

Best regards,
Hameedah

email_chain.subject: Update on Vessel Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Boyer,

Mr. Santos has confirmed that the vessel 'Pelagos' is scheduled to depart from Senegal for Douala, Cameroon on June 25. Could you please confirm your final freight quote for the shipment?

We will notify you if there are any issues with the cargo specified.

Best regards,
Hameedah

email_chain.subject: Request for Letter of Credit Preparation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Santos,

We have received your final order confirmations. Could you please prepare a letter of credit with instructions to pay the sellers upon their presentation of a clean on-board bill of lading? The details for the account are as follows: Indemnity Co. Account - Freddy's Freight Acceptance Limited c/o Head Office of Banque Commerciale Congolaise, Bank Address: BP 150, Mavili Road, Pointe-Noire, Republic of Congo, Swift: BCCORCO, Account Number: 000000.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Hameedah

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Scrap Shipment to China
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Singh,

We have a 1,500MT shipment of scrap ready to be dispatched from Alang to China. Are you interested in this opportunity? If so, could you please provide us your best freight rate?

Thank you,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Details on Scrap Inventory at Alang
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Jack,

Following your recent communication, we would like to inform you about our current scrap inventory. We have approximately 10,000MT of high-quality steel and machinery available at our warehouse and storage facility in Alang, Gujarat, India. We plan to start shipments soon by bulk carrier vessel.

Could you confirm whether this pertains to the same transaction, or is there a different arrangement in place?

Best regards,
Frederic Nijhoff

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability and Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Lisa,

A gas oil charterer wants to place a 50,000MT order for a vessel to work the following schedule:
Tuesday, 2nd April – 14.00 hours Urumchi Departure
Friday, 5th April – 14.00 hours Xingang Arrival
Can you please check your availability for this time slot?

Regards,
Gregory

email_chain.subject: Additional Information Requested for Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

Following up on my previous email, can you provide us with the vessel details, including estimated costs, owners details, and voyage rate for the 50,000MT gas oil shipment from Urumchi to Xingang?

Regards,
Gregory

email_chain.subject: Request for Voyage Offer on Dem/Char Basis
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

Please quote an offer for the following voyage which we would like to charter on a Dem/Char basis, barge to barge:
Vessel: Oil/Ore Dredger/Smaller Vessels
Details:
Loading: Urumchi
Destination: Xingang
ETA/ETD: 3-4 April – time to be confirmed
ETA/ETD: 5 April – time to be confirmed

Regards,
Gregory

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Charterparty Conditions
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

Can you please confirm the charterparty conditions that you use, as we would like to review them prior to finalizing the charter details?

Regards,
Gregory

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Julie, Could you provide a freight quote for 2,000MT of frozen raspberries from the USA to the UK, sailing in mid-February? Also, do you see any risk of port congestion on your end? Many thanks, Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Sam, We have received several inquiries this month for shipping frozen raspberries from the USA to the UK. Could you please confirm the destination port in the UK? Thank you, Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Julie, The destination is London Gateway. Thanks, Sam

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Frozen Raspberries
email_chain.body: Dear Sam, Thanks for providing the destination port. As per your request, I am sending you the quotation for transporting 2,000MT of frozen raspberries from the USA to London Gateway. The price is 450USD/MT FOB. If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact me. Kind regards, Julie

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up: Freight Quote for Frozen Raspberries
email_chain.body: Hi Sam, Hope you’re keeping well. Just following up to see if you received my last email containing the freight quote and if you have any further questions. Regards, Julie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Crude Oil Shipment from New Orleans to Puerto Bolivar
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Fennell, We are interested in shipping a load of crude oil from New Orleans to Puerto Bolivar. Do you handle bunkers for your customers? Also, what would the demurrage be for exceeding the agreed laytime? Kind regards, Felicia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Crude Oil Shipment from New Orleans to Puerto Bolivar
email_chain.body: Dear Felicia, It's not everyday someone inquires about bunkers. Unfortunately, we do not have them available at the terminal. Instead, if your schedule allows, please consider stopping in St. Johns, Florida where facilities are available. We look forward to assisting you further. Regards, Mr. Fennell

email_chain.subject: Fabled Treasure Clue in Rocky Mountains
email_chain.body: Hello Felicia, Following the Hidden Cash series on Netflix, a clue suggesting a $10 million stash buried by Fenn in the Rocky Mountains caught my attention. Specifically, going to Wyoming on March 14, hiking to a summit, you will see a rock with a spider web and a dated stone from 2014. Nearby, an aboriginal map provides further instructions. Best of luck, Malloys

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Treasure Clues
email_chain.body: I will neither confirm nor deny your suppositions regarding the treasure clues. Should you decide to undertake this quest for the $10 billion treasure, be aware that accepting such a prize from the Bounty Board means relinquishing any further claims to it. Thank you for your interest. Regards, Mr. Fenn

email_chain.subject: Request for Details on Bitcoin Miner and Ransom Payment
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Fennell, I'm eager to learn more about the $10 billion treasure. Could you provide details about the Bitcoin miner possessing the clues and whether a ransom payment is required for finding this bit of treasure? Kind Regards, Felicia

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About June Shipment Arrivals and Demurrage Rates
email_chain.body: Hey Bruce, I'm hoping you can assist with a few quick questions about our scheduled June shipment. We have a 300 MT slot arranged from Dhaka to Tejing, departing on the 13th of June. Could you please tell us the suggested arrival time at Tejing port? Additionally, what would be the daily demurrage rate at that port? Thanks for your help! Best, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About June Shipment Arrivals and Demurrage Rates
email_chain.body: Hi Alex, Thanks for reaching out. Your shipment is scheduled to arrive at Tejing port on the 29th of June. The demurrage rate there is $500 per day. As for the best arrival time at the port, it generally varies depending on when your truck reaches and on the operational efficiency on that day. Normally, the optimal timeframe is around 10-11 AM, especially considering the hot summer temperatures in China. Let me know if there's anything else you need. Best regards, Bruce

email_chain.subject: Request for Information on Sending More Containers to China
email_chain.body: Hi Bruce, We're considering increasing our container shipments from Dhaka to China and are exploring the best options. Could you provide some advice on the process? Additionally, is there an option to send these by air instead of by sea? If so, what are the general cost differences? Please send us the best rates and relevant details to make an informed decision. Thanks! Best, Ibrahim

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Information on Sending More Containers to China
email_chain.body: Hello Ibrahim, Thanks for contacting me! To provide you with the most accurate quote and details, I need to know the size and location of the intended shipment. Please send me those details, and I'll get back to you with the best options and rates. Best, Bruce

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cargo Shipment from Pakistan to China
email_chain.body: Dear Bruce, We are planning to send a 20 ft container weighing 11 MTs from Pakistan to China and are looking for the most cost-effective yet quick transit options. Could you please provide an estimated cost for this shipment and the demurrage rate at the destination port? I appreciate your assistance with this matter. Regards, Mark Huang

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cargo Shipment from Pakistan to China
email_chain.body: Hi Mark, Thanks for your inquiry. I'll need a few additional details to provide an accurate estimate, including the destination port in China. Once I have that information, I can give you a detailed quote for the shipment and demurrage rates. Looking forward to hearing from you. Best regards, Bruce

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Vessel Availability for Laycan Period
email_chain.body: Good morning Mr. Roja, We have received confirmation that the vessel is available for laycan between the 5th and the 9th of November. We want to confirm if your client is still prepared to meet the originally planned laycan from the 5th to the 9th of October. Could you please advise on the latest date by which you can confirm? Kind regards, Francois

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Vessel Availability for Laycan Period
email_chain.body: Dear Francois, I have forwarded your request to my Charterers. Should there be any issues, I will provide feedback as soon as possible. Kind regards, Pungyen

email_chain.subject: Continuation of Chartering Discussions
email_chain.body: Hello, I was given your email and am happy to continue with the chartering. However, we need to clarify some further details first, and would require your formal submission of the tender. Kind regards, [Name]

email_chain.subject: Re: Continuation of Chartering Discussions
email_chain.body: Dear [Name], Thank you for your email. Regarding the further details you've mentioned, I will confirm these with our Charterers and revert shortly. Thanks a lot. Kind regards, Pungyen

email_chain.subject: Request for Soybean Meal Transport from Dalian to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hello Alexei, We are looking to transport 1,300MT of soybean meal from Dalian to Qingdao next week. Can you provide an ISPM 15 certificate along with this service? Kind regards, Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Soybean Meal Transport from Dalian to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi Julie, The ISPM15 certificate will be issued at the discharge port in Qingdao. Regarding costs, I can offer a CIF price ranging between 670,000 to 680,000 Yuan/MT. Have a great day. Alexei

email_chain.subject: Re: CIF Pricing Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Alexei, Yes, received. So the CIF quote includes loading costs at Dalian port? Additionally, I'd like to ask about options for Dalian-Beijing and Qingdao-Beijing CIF, which would need loadings costs added. Regards, Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Additional CIF Options
email_chain.body: Hi Julie, Yes, the CIF quotation for Dalian-Qingdao includes loading costs at Dalian. Regarding your inquiry for additional routes - the Qingdao-Beijing CIF price would be about 3,000 to 3,200 Yuan/MT, covering loading, customs clearance, and logistics. Thank you, Alexei

email_chain.subject: Clarification on ISPM15 Certificate
email_chain.body: Hi Julie, Just a quick note regarding the ISPM15 certificate – it does not cover Dalian port, but we can arrange it if required. Regards, Alexei

email_chain.subject: Re: ISPM15 Certificate at Dalian
email_chain.body: Hi Alexei, It’s quite costly to obtain the ISPM15 certificate for Dalian, and handling it has been problematic. We prefer to let another party organize it. We will manage the shipment logistics from our factory in Qingdao. Regards, Julie

email_chain.subject: Enquiry for Chemicals Shipment

Rose

Please provide your best FOB price per ton for delivery in November/December 2013. We are eager to finalize our budget soon and await your earliest confirmation. email_chain.subject: Request for Price: Soya Oil and Soya Beans CIF China

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Shipping Request for Crude Oil

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear [NAME],

Could you handle a cargo of [Cargo] from [Load Port] to [Discharge Port] during [Period]? Additionally, what would be your demurrage rate after 72 hours of laytime?

Regards,
[NAME]

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear [NAME],

Thank you for your inquiry. We are interested in handling the shipment of [Cargo] from [Load Port] to [Discharge Port], scheduled 3 to 4 weeks from now under the condition that we will be the shipper, holder of bills of lading, and disponent owners of the cargo onboard. Please find below the terms we require:

1. Letter of Indemnity (LOI) with a validity of three weeks.
2. The basic rate aligning with the original liner tariff, including amendment clauses for short sea voyages.
3. Please indicate if any premium rates (2nd or 3rd) apply; if not, quote accordingly.
4. Should you wish to use our charterer's name and flag in the charterparty, kindly confirm.

Looking forward to your confirmation and the signed LOI.

Best regards,
[NAME]

email_chain.subject: Offer for Shipping Gasoline from Fujairah to Seattle
email_chain.body: Hey Jean, We have 10,000MT of gasoline ready for shipment from Fujairah to Seattle. We can hold the offer open until November 20th if you require further time to decide. Kind regards, Jani

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Shipping Gasoline from Fujairah to Seattle
email_chain.body: Dear Jani, Many thanks for your offer. The prices look good for that period of time. Could you kindly send me a confirmatory email with the price and volume details? My best wishes, Alex

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Gasoline Shipment Details from Fujairah to Seattle
email_chain.body: Dear Alex, As per your request, I am sending you the details: We offer 10,000MT of gasoline at the current market rate, shipping from Fujairah with tentative delivery in Seattle around mid-November. We await your final decision. Regards, Jani

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Gasoline Shipment Details from Fujairah to Seattle
email_chain.body: Dear Jani, Many thanks for sending over the confirmatory email, it has been very helpful. However, after reviewing our current business strategy, I am afraid we are unable to proceed with this transaction. My best wishes, Alex

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rate Estimate for Petrochemicals

Hello Mr. Lim,

We are looking at shipping 9,200MT of petrochemicals from Singapore to Antwerp. Will you be able to accommodate this on your shipping schedule? If so, could you please provide me with a preliminary rate estimate, including all extras, port charges, and any early payment discounts that may apply?

Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rate Estimate for Petrochemicals
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Lim,

Further to my earlier email, I would like to stress the urgency of this request, as we need to finalize our logistics plan soon. Your prompt response would be greatly appreciated.

Best regards,
Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rate Estimate for Petrochemicals
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Lim,

I just wanted to follow up on my previous emails regarding the shipping of petrochemicals from Singapore to Antwerp. Please let us know at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
Andy

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipping Rate Inquiry for 9,200MT of Petrochemicals
email_chain.body:
Hi,

I'm reaching out to follow up on the emails sent by my colleague regarding the shipment of 9,200MT of petrochemicals from Singapore to Antwerp. Could you please provide us with the rate details including all applicable charges?

Many thanks,
Andrew Smith

email_chain.subject: Final Request: Shipping Rate Estimate for 9,200MT of Petrochemicals
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Lim,

This is a final reminder about our request to ship 9,200MT of petrochemicals from Singapore to Antwerp. We are eager to receive your rate estimate to proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Andy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about MOP Shipment from US Gulf to China

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about MOP Shipment from US Gulf to China

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about MOP Shipment from US Gulf to China

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of Vessel for MOP Program

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of Vessel for MOP Program
