email_chain.subject: Freight Quotation Request for Bauxite Shipment from Vietnam to Japan
email_chain.body:
Hey Jonny,

We are looking to move 7,000 metric tons of bulk bauxite from Vietnam to Japan. Could you please provide an EXW freight indication in USD per ton for low cube and low deadweight tonnage vessels?

Sincerely,
Zara

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Quotation Request for Bauxite Shipment from Vietnam to Japan
email_chain.body:
Hello Zara,

I have looked into the current rates for the shipment. For the cargo of bauxite using low deadweight tonnage containers, the estimate is approximately USD 18,000 per TEU. For low cube vessels, the estimation is about USD 17,500 per TEU.

Thanks,
Jonny

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Naphtha Shipment from Houston to Santos in Mid-June
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Ullrich,

We’re considering a naphtha shipment from Houston to Santos in mid-June. Could you let us know your availability and if there are any opportunities to reduce the time that we’d be subject to demurrage?

Regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry about Naphtha Shipment from Houston to Santos in Mid-June
email_chain.body:
Good morning Alice,

The longer you can charter the ship for, the lower the rates will be, but there are several trips around that time which will include this berth. I’ll check with the terminal manager to see what can be done.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry about Naphtha Shipment from Houston to Santos in Mid-June
email_chain.body:
Morning Michael,

Thanks very much. Yes, I’m aware the rates are higher in June, but we really need to be out of that port ASAP to get to the next charter to the US. We'll let you know once we’re done with the other leg of the trip and confirm that we can provide the vessel with the right crude grades.

Regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: RE: RE: Inquiry about Naphtha Shipment from Houston to Santos in Mid-June
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Sorry for the delay in response, I was on vacation last week and just got back to the office. Unfortunately, I’m unable to extend the charter duration beyond our scheduled plans.

Best,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Need for LPG Transportation from Bahrain to Mina Al Ahmadi
email_chain.body:
Hello Adi,

We need a vessel for 6,900MT of LPG from Bahrain to Mina Al Ahmadi. Our broker MNTA will organize the fixtures. Do you accept lumpsum deals?

Regards,
Anwa

email_chain.subject: Re: Need for LPG Transportation from Bahrain to Mina Al Ahmadi
email_chain.body:
Dear Anwa,

Thank you for your query. Kindly provide the following details to proceed further:
1. LPG name and percentage
2. Quantity
3. Point of discharge
4. Estimated time of arrival
5. Specifics of vessel needed
6. Other relevant details for pricing and scheduling.

Kindly let us know if you have any questions or need more information.

Thank you.
Respectfully yours,
Adi Rashid
Liquid Petroleum Gas Division

email_chain.subject: Re: Need for LPG Transportation from Bahrain to Mina Al Ahmadi
email_chain.body:
Greetings Adi,

We would like to move forward with the shipment of 6,900MT of LPG with the following composition: Butane - 75%, Propane - 25%. The point of discharge is Mina Al Ahmadi, Kuwait. Kindly provide your schedule of prices for this specific grade of LPG and other requested details.

Please let us know your best available dates for the next fixture and the specifications of the vessel you would be able to provide.

Thank you.
Anwa

email_chain.subject: Re: Need for LPG Transportation from Bahrain to Mina Al Ahmadi
email_chain.body:
Dear Anwa,

Thank you for providing the details. We will prepare a quote based on the specifications given and revert back to you shortly with our best prices and further details on vessel specifications and availability.

Warm regards,
Adi

email_chain.subject: ETA Inquiry for MV Mangrove
email_chain.body:
Dear Andrea,

We are planning to ship a consignment of boric acid from Busan to La Guayra on board the MV "Mangrove", which is currently anchored at Busan. The scheduled loading date is 27th October. Could you please provide the estimated time of arrival (ETA) for the "Mangrove" at La Guayra? We are looking to discharge the cargo around 18th November.

Thank you,
Luca

email_chain.subject: Re: ETA Inquiry for MV Mangrove
email_chain.body:
Dear Luca,

Thank you for your inquiry. In October 2019, we handled a similar shipment of boric acid via La Guayra on the MV "Mangrove" with an ETA of 18th November 2019. We are interested in understanding more about your current shipment to assist better. Could you provide the following details:

- Date of shipment
- Confirmation if you are the owner of this shipment
- If not, the name of the owner
- Bill of lading
- If applicable, confirmation that this shipment is destined for the US, along with the vessel’s name, its call sign, and ship details such as dimensions and gross tonnage.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Andrea

email_chain.subject: RE: Date of delivery
email_chain.body: Dear all, Date of delivery - please advise. Best Regards, Klaus

email_chain.subject: RE: Date of delivery
email_chain.body: Klaus, Delivery is scheduled for tomorrow, March 30. Best, Mary

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Cargo Booking from Rio to Algeciras
email_chain.body: Hello Kathy, We have learned of a cargo opportunity for our principals involving 10k crude from Rio to Algeciras, and they are keen to have it fixed and covered on their books by this afternoon. Regards, Tabitha

email_chain.subject: Cargo Loading Enquiry for Houston to Tianjin Route
email_chain.body:
Mr. Taylor,

Can your vessel load 3,000MT of crude oil from Houston to Tianjin by mid-May? Also, what kind of off-hire provisions do you typically include in the contract of affreightment (CP)?

Best regards,
Andy

email_chain.subject: RE: Cargo Loading Enquiry for Houston to Tianjin Route
email_chain.body:
Hi Andy,

Regarding your query, we can arrange for the required cargo loading. Concerning off-hire, our typical provisions mandate continuous operation as long as the vessel's tanks are full; the vessel will remain alongside the bunkering/cargo barge throughout the operation.

Best regards,
Mr. Taylor

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Vessel Transit Time
email_chain.body:
Hi All,

I need to confirm the criteria for setting the vessel’s estimated arrival time versus the actual arrival time. How many days does the vessel take for this voyage?

Looking forward to your replies.
Best Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: RE: Clarification Needed on Vessel Transit Time
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your query. The transit from Houston, USA, to Tianjin, China generally takes about 40 days, subject to weather conditions and global navigational circumstances.

Best regards,
Mr. Taylor

email_chain.subject: Discharge Confirmation and Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Taylor,

Please confirm if you are able to discharge the cargo using a cargo/bunker barge. Also, ensure barge has access to the New Territories Container Terminals for cargo transfer and is able to call at Tianjin to unload. Confirm if these terms are acceptable to include in the charter party.

Best,
Andy

email_chain.subject: RE: Discharge Confirmation and Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Andy,

We are capable of discharging as per the specified method and confirm that the barge can access the necessary terminals. This arrangement is acceptable and will form part of our charter party agreement.

Best regards,
Mr. Taylor

email_chain.subject: Charter Requirement from Las Palmas to Casablanca

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Quote Request for Urea Cargoes
email_chain.body: Hi Tony, I have not yet received your quote for the urea cargoes we discussed. Please send it at your earliest convenience. Kind Regards, James

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Request for Urea Shipment Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Tony, I need a quotation for the charter of one vessel from Las Palmas to Casablanca at 9.5 knots with a cargo of 8500MT Urea FOB. Can you please provide the quote? Thanks, Sasha

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Follow-up on Shipping Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Tony, Thank you for your latest communication; however, I have yet to receive your quotes for the urgently required charter from Las Palmas to Casablanca. We need to finalize this soon. Kindly provide us with your pricing for the shipment mentioned. Regards, Sasha

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Tanker Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Cheng,

We have an urgent requirement for a tanker to carry 25,000MT of LNG from Lagos to Hong Kong. Could you please provide your best freight rate, and clarify if you allow laytime reinstatement beyond 96 hours?

Thank you,
Damian

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Requirement for Tanker Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Damian,

The freight rate is FOB USD 540.00/MT. This rate does not include the lightering fee, which is applicable for max 5,000MT at $300/MT. The port time for vessel operations is approximately 4 days, and transit time from Lagos to Hong Kong is estimated at 27 days.

Reinstatement of laytime for both arrival and departure must be pre-approved. After the vessel departs, reinstatement cannot exceed 48 hours following the 96-hour mark. For arrivals, if the vessel does not arrive on schedule, laytime reinstatement can be granted for up to an additional 24 hours. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with signing the Charter Party, and kindly send the following documents at your earliest convenience:

1. Company profile, scope of operation, address, fax number, phone number.
2. Certification of insurance.

Thank you,
Ms. Cheng

email_chain.subject: Query About Methanol Shipment Handling
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Ryan, Can you handle a methanol shipment from Mumbai to Osaka and then a reshipment from Osaka to Canada? Regards, Ulysses

email_chain.subject: Re: Query About Methanol Shipment Handling
email_chain.body: Hi Ulysses, I will handle the methanol shipment. When the cargo arrives in Osaka, please ensure to submit an SF-478 (Item 16) and send it to the PBO Warehouse. Subsequently, I will arrange for its transfer from Osaka to Canada. Regards, Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Query About Methanol Shipment Handling
email_chain.body: Ryan, as far as I know, methanol is classified as a hazardous material. Please confirm the shipping protocol. Best, Ulysses

email_chain.subject: Re: Query About Methanol Shipment Handling
email_chain.body: Ulysses, you are correct; methanol is a hazardous material. Consequently, I will coordinate with the Military Sealift Command for transportation since they handle such materials safely. Regards, Ryan

email_chain.subject: C++ Course Request Form Received
email_chain.body:
Dear Amy,

This is just to inform you that we have received your C++ course request form. We are currently forwarding this to our Human Resources department for approval. You can expect to be contacted within the next 48 hours. Thank you for your submission, and have a nice day!

Best Regards,
Steven

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Your C++ Course Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Amy,

I hope this message finds you well! It has been a few days since we received your C++ course request form. I wanted to check in to see if you have any questions or need further assistance with the process. Please let me know how I can help facilitate this for you. Thank you and have a great day!

Best regards,
Steven

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Truck Management at LA and LB Ports
email_chain.body:

I hope this message finds you well. We are currently evaluating the operational capacities at both the Port of Los Angeles and Long Beach. Could you please provide information on how many trucks each system can manage weekly? Additionally, if you have any insights about the efficiency and congestion at these terminals, they would be greatly appreciated.

Looking forward to your insight.

Regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up: Weekly Truck Management at LA and LB Ports
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Langley,

How are you? I'm following up on the truck management capabilities of both Port of Los Angeles and Long Beach that we discussed previously. Could you confirm the number of trucks managed weekly at each port? Also, if there are any additional suggestions or remarks to optimize our operations, it would be valuable to hear your perspective.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Daniel
P.S. Your efforts in sharing information are highly appreciated!

email_chain.subject: Request for Further Information on Truck Management
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Langley,

I'm writing to reiterate our request for detailed information regarding the weekly truck management at the Port of Los Angeles and Long Beach. Insights into the expected truck handling for both this year and monthly data would be helpful for our investment considerations.

We appreciate your guidance and look forward to your valuable suggestions.

Kind regards,
Paul

labels.load_port: Port of Los Angeles, Long Beach

email_chain.subject: Request for Coal Quotation
email_chain.body: Dear Sir/Madam, I am seeking a quotation for 1,500 MT of coal from the following ports: Tokyo - JR Kawasaki Railway Terminal (Trading Port), Durban - Richard's Bay (Trading Port), Ras-Al-Khaima - Mina Rashid Port (Trading Port). Could you please send us a quotation at your earliest convenience? We plan to commence shipment from the end of July or early August. Kind Regards.

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Updated Coal Quotation

I would like to request an updated quotation with additional specifications and updated prices so I can forward this to our clients. This will enable us to finalize our coal delivery arrangements. Please send me the details to my email as soon as possible. Thank you. Best regards, Kobo

email_chain.subject: RE: Updated Quotation Request for 1,500 MT of Coal
email_chain.body: Dear Kobo, As per your request, please find the updated quotation below for 1,500 Metric Tons of coal from the specified ports: Tokyo - JR Kawasaki Railway Terminal, Durban - Richard's Bay, Ras-Al-Khaima - Mina Rashid Port, Shanghai - Pudong Quay Terminal, Rizhao - Port, and Gladstone - Port. We look forward to your confirmation to proceed with the arrangements. Regards, Shinobu Kawakami

email_chain.subject: Preparation for Meeting
email_chain.body:
Hi Samantha!
What information do you need from a client before starting your meeting? I found that sample email A and B are very formal. I would like to make email C more casual, just like an informal call, while still maintaining professionalism. Any tips for my next email C? Thanks!! +1 (870) 432-1609

email_chain.subject: Re: Preparation for Meeting
email_chain.body:
If I am able to answer your questions and address your concerns about working with me, I'd love to have a brief phone conversation on Monday at 12:00 pm. If this doesn't work for you, just let me know and I'd be happy to find another time that works for both of us.
What do you think about this? Let me know!
Is this enough to cover it? If not, just let me know which topics you'd like to cover before we meet.

Cheers,
Samantha
Sent from my iPhone

email_chain.subject: Booking Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Hello,
We spoke yesterday, and I wanted to follow up on our conversation and make sure you have everything you need to book your upcoming appointment with me.

I am available on the following dates:
Wed, December 16: 12:30 - 4:30 pm
Thurs, December 17: 8:30 am - 12:30 pm
Friday, December 18: 12:30 - 4:30 pm
Wed, December 23: 8:30 am - 12:30 pm
Please let me know which time(s) work for you and your crew.

To book your appointment, we'll need:
1. A confirmed booking time for your crew and for me
2. Any special equipment your crew will need
3. A list of any foods or props that need to be provided
4. A signed agreement

Best Regards,
Regina

email_chain.subject: Follow Up on Phone Call
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon!
I'm emailing to follow up on our phone call yesterday, and to see if I can help you in any way. Please let me know if you have any questions.

Regarding our phone call:
On Wednesday, we spoke about your interest in photography services. You mentioned that you'd like to learn more about our services, and I'd love to help. Are you free for a short phone conversation?

Is Monday, November 2, 2020 at 12:00 pm a good time for you? If not, just let me know and I'd be happy to find another time that works for both of us.

Best,
Samantha
You can reach me at <phone number>

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow Up on Interest in Services
email_chain.body:
Dear Samantha,
I wanted to reach out to you today because of our conversation yesterday. I know we talked about your interest in photography services and we went over the details, so I wanted to see if you had any questions.

Regards,
Regina

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Quotation for Phosphate Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mrs. Barlow,

We’re scheduling a 1,100MT cargo of phosphates from Casablanca to Lisbon. Can you quote a vessel with a laycan period starting after the 20th of June? Also, could you please inform if you can provide options for Russian or Lithuanian vessels?

Regards,
Ethan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Quotation for Phosphate Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ethan,

Thank you for your inquiry. I have forwarded your request to our affiliate company worldwide, who will assist with the vessel options. Please be advised that for a precise quote, we need additional details:
1. Confirm the pickup (Casablanca) and delivery (Lisbon) locations.
2. Container size and weight specifications.
3. Nature and any special handling requirements of the cargo.

I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Julia Barlow
Administrative Director, Trading LTD
Global Commodity and Energy Traders

email_chain.subject: Additional Details for Vessel Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Barlow,

Thank you for your prompt response. Here are the details for the proposed shipment:
1. The phosphates will be picked up in Casablanca and delivered to Lisbon.
2. The cargo weighs 1,100 MT.
3. There are no special handling requirements.

Please proceed with securing the best vessel option available and provide us with the schedule and laytime offer (LMO).

Best regards,
Ethan

email_chain.subject: Vessel and Charter Details for Your Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Ethan,

I appreciate your detailed response. I have confirmed the cargo details and will provide you the schedule for your approval along with the laytime offer as soon as possible. We will check for both Russian and Lithuanian vessel availability per your request.

Best regards,
Julia Barlow

email_chain.subject: Tasks for Today's English Email Writing Lesson
email_chain.body: In today's lesson, you will focus on responding to emailed enquiries. The tasks include: writing two responses (one for each of the scenarios provided), practicing the use of English in different email contexts, ensuring that your emails contain all the basic elements of an effective business email, understanding the elements that enhance email effectiveness, and using correct grammar. These activities will help you use emails as a tool to further your English proficiency.

email_chain.subject: Re: Tasks for Today's English Email Writing Lesson
email_chain.body: Thank you for the details. Could you please confirm if there's a specific format or template you would prefer for the email responses? Also, are there particular aspects of grammar you want us to focus on in this activity?

email_chain.subject: Re: Tasks for Today's English Email Writing Lesson
email_chain.body: You're welcome! There's no specific format required—feel free to use a standard professional layout for your responses. I suggest focusing on politeness strategies, clear subject lines, and concise language. Make sure the grammar is accurate, and use the scenario inputs to tailor your responses to different situations appropriately.

email_chain.subject: Submission of Email Responses Based on Scenarios
email_chain.body: I have attached the responses to the two email scenarios as per the instructions. I focused on using clear and polite language, and I have ensured the grammatical accuracy. Could you please review them and provide feedback?

email_chain.subject: Details Required for the Agreement
email_chain.body: Please insert your details into the provided template for our records. Looking forward to finalizing the details soon. Regards, Your Name

email_chain.subject: Re: Details Required for the Agreement
email_chain.body: I have included my details as requested. Please confirm receipt. Thank you, Recipient

email_chain.subject: Decision to Proceed with Freight Arrangement

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Space Availability and Document Submission

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Storage Capacity and Demurrage Rates
email_chain.body: Dear Jenny, We do have capacity for the sugar shipments. Our demurrage rates are USD 2.00/MT in ARA for the initial 72 hours, and USD 3.00/MT thereafter. Could you please provide a sample contract for this arrangement? Warm Regards, Claire

email_chain.subject: Further Details Required on Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Claire, Thank you for your rates. Please clarify the details of your coverage and the documents required for the shipment. Could you also confirm whether this deal is CIF or FOB? Additionally, we are not brokers and would like to understand the timeframe available in ARA to load the sugar onto a barge. Regards, Jenny

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Details Required on Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Jenny, Thank you for your questions. I will check with our agent and get back to you shortly. Meanwhile, can you provide a sample contract for this operation? Best regards, Claire

email_chain.subject: Clarifications Needed for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Claire, Thank you for your prompt response. We look forward to your clarification on the following: 1. The duration of the time charter for the vessel. 2. Please confirm the required documents for sugar export: Certificate of Origin, Export License, License from the exporter country, Exchange Control Permit, and Letter of Denial. 3. Please confirm the price for the port duties. Regards, Jenny

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Vessel Availability and Laytime Policy for Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Ship Manager,

We are looking to ship 11,400MT of Wheat Flour from Haiphong to Singapore shortly. Can you please confirm if your vessel is available in the next 3 days? Additionally, we would appreciate details on your policy regarding laytime extensions.

Thank you.
Sincerely,
Mandy

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Load and Discharge Ports for Wheat Flour Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Ship Manager,

I would like to clarify the details of our intended cargo transfer. We plan to load 11,400MT of Wheat Flour at Haiphong and discharge at Singapore, not Port Bellingham as erroneously mentioned in my previous email. Could you confirm the loading capacity and provide a freight quote per metric ton?

Best regards,
Mandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Capacity and Draft Details at Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Hello Mandy,

Thank you for your questions. Our vessel can handle up to 11,900MT at Haiphong, with a maximum draft of 15.5 m. The draft upon arrival would be approximately 14.5 m. Given the cargo specifications you provided, we are able to accommodate the full 11,900MT. Thus, the invoice would reflect a net payable amount for 11,900MT. Please confirm if you would like to proceed with this adjustment.

Best regards,
Ship Manager

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Services
email_chain.body:
Dear Capt. Gong,

I hope this message finds you well. I have been approached by a company seeking a supplier and they are interested in learning more about your services, the availability of your vessels, and would also like to receive a price quote. Could you provide me with an estimated timeframe for a response to this inquiry? Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Alan

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up: Request for Information
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Cho,

I'm following up on Alan's previous email concerning the company seeking shipping services. Could you please provide any updates or additional insights regarding this request?

Best regards,
Amit

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Update on Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Cho,

We have made several inquiries regarding our need for shipping services but have not yet received a response. Can you please provide a status update on the matter at your earliest convenience?

Thank you,
Amit

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Update on Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

We have not yet received any communication regarding our previous requests. Could you kindly provide an update on the original inquiry for shipping services as soon as possible?

Regards,
Amit

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Response Needed on Shipping Services Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello,

We are still awaiting a response regarding our inquiry about shipping services. Your prompt reply would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,
Amit

email_chain.subject: Second Reminder: Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon,

I would like to remind you once again about our outstanding inquiry. Can you please provide a status update at your earliest convenience?

Regards,
Amit

email_chain.subject: Final Request for Update on Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon,

Despite our repeated attempts to reach you, we have not received any updates on our inquiry. We urgently require a response in order to proceed with our planning.

Please respond as soon as possible.

Kind regards,
Amit

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipping Palm Oil to Italy
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

We are interested in shipping 21,000MT of palm oil from India to Italy. Currently, we are unable to supply the US dollar shipping currency before we confirm the order. Could you please let us know your next open laycan? Also, are you open to discussing lump sum deals?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Request for Long-Term Charter for Red River Beans
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

We are looking to load 100,000MT of Red River beans on a long-term charter. Could you please forward your Letter of Intent (LOI) for further discussions?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Charter and Capacity Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

We would like to charter your vessel for an upcoming voyage, and have some inquiries regarding the trip. Could you advise on the expected weather conditions for the voyage? Does your crew include a stable hand, and is your captain experienced in navigating through reefs? Additionally, we are interested in transporting goods. Could you please inform us about the container capacity of your vessel?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Cardboard Shipping from Gothenburg to Busan
email_chain.body: We have 1500MT of cardboard from Gothenburg to Busan. What’s the best forwarder to use? Best regards, Blanca

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Cardboard Shipping from Gothenburg to Busan
email_chain.body: Blanca, can you please tell me if this is import or export cargo? Have you loaded the containers? It’s going to be used for carton boxes. Best regards, David

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed: Origin of Cargo
email_chain.body: Can you clarify the point of origin for the cardboard cargo, is it Gothenburg, Sweden or Cartagena, Spain? Best regards, Lauren

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed: Origin of Cargo
email_chain.body: Thanks Lauren. The cargo is from Gothenburg, Sweden. Best regards, Blanca

email_chain.subject: Additional Information Required for Freight Quotation
email_chain.body: Hi Blanca, To further assist you, please provide the following: 1. Confirmation of the port of loading. 2. Number of 20-foot containers needed. 3. Whether all containers need to be loaded and ready for departure. 4. If you are seeking a door to door quotation. 5. Confirmation of the port of destination. Best regards, David

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation and Details Requested for White Paper Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Anderson, We have a booking for transporting 5,000MT of white paper from Shanghai to Krishnapatnam. Our loading dates are between April 11-25. Could you please inform me of the estimated time of arrival (ETA) at Krishnapatnam and provide the stowage plans? Looking forward to your response, Zachary

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation and Details Requested for White Paper Shipment
email_chain.body: Hallo, Andreas! We have a booking for 5,000MT of white paper from Shanghai to Krishnapatnam. Our loading dates are between April 11-25. Could you send me your estimated time of arrival (ETA) and the stowage plan? Looking forward to your response, Zachary

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking Confirmation and Details Requested for White Paper Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Zachary, We are pleased to confirm our booking for the shipment of 5,000MT of white paper via the vessel mentioned in your inquiry. Could you please confirm your estimated time of arrival (ETA) at Krishnapatnam? Also, kindly advise on the required packing for the goods and any special equipment needed for this consignment. We look forward to your confirmation. Yours faithfully, Mr. Yuan

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking Confirmation and Details Requested for White Paper Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Zachary, Following up on your request, we have confirmed the booking for 5,000MT of white paper. Please provide your estimated time of arrival (ETA) at Krishnapatnam and details regarding packing requirements and any special equipment for this consignment. Looking forward to finalizing the shipment details. Best regards, Mr. Yuan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wheat Transport
email_chain.body: Hi Ella, can you accept the loading of 13,000MT of wheat from Pusan to Rio de Janeiro? Best wishes, Lucila

email_chain.subject: Clarification: Wheat Transport Contract
email_chain.body: By 13,000MT of wheat, we mean a new contract for the shipment. Regards, Paul

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Wheat Order
email_chain.body: Dear Ella, This email is to confirm that we wish to order 13,000 MT of wheat at the price of $175/mt. Delivery is to be made to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, which is our main market. We would appreciate it if you could send the contract to us as soon as possible once you confirm this order. We look forward to hearing from you and dealing with your company in the future. Yours sincerely, Lucila

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Steel Cargo Acceptance and Transportation
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Smith,
We have 3,500MT of steel available in Kamsar. We intend to transport it in 4 lots of approximately 800MT each. Could you please confirm if you can accept the cargo on 14 December at 16:00?

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Required on Steel Cargo
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Smith,
Could you please confirm if you have received our previous email regarding the steel cargo arrangement? Looking forward to your prompt response.
Sincerely,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Response Pending for Steel Cargo Emails
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Lucas,
Unfortunately, we are still awaiting a response from Mr. Smith about the steel cargo emails. Are you available for a quick discussion right now?
Sincerely,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Enquiry for Vessel Charter: Santos, Brazil to Lomé, Togo
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Would you mind assisting us with the charter for transporting 22,000MT of Ro-Ro Iron Ore from Santos, Brazil to Lomé, Togo?

Here are the details:
- Port of Loading: Santos, Brazil
- Discharge Port: Lomé, Togo
- Loading date: September 16, 2016
- Discharge date: September 30, 2016
- Laycan: October/November 2016
- Vessel required: Handysize bulk carrier for single vessel transportation.
- Special equipment or requirement: Deck load of 20MT/m2 with 4.5 m on centre line and 2 m side shift.

Owners will manage all charter party and commercial documents. The minimum charter period is 18 days.

Could you please confirm your availability and provide your earliest and best offer?

Regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry for Vessel Charter: Santos, Brazil to Lomé, Togo
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

Thank you for your inquiry. We are based in Singapore and offer extensive services in cargo brokerage and chartering. For further processing of your request, could you please confirm if the information below is correct?
- Port of Loading: Santos, Brazil
- Discharge Port: Lomé, Togo
- Estimated Loading & Discharge Dates: September 16, 2016 & September 30, 2016 respectively 
- Vessel Type: Handysize bulk carrier
- Could you also provide the B/L copy and load port documentation?
- Is there any insurance or marine pollution risk involved with the cargo?
- Minimum charter period: 18 days
- Any specific instructions for cargo handling & delivery?

Looking forward to your confirmation to proceed.

Best regards,
Cargotrans Team

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Vessel Charter Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

Greetings from the CARGOTRANS team in Shenzhen, China!

Thank you for your email. We have reviewed the provided information and can proceed with the following terms:
- Loading Port: Santos, Brazil
- Discharging Port: Lomé, Togo
- Loading Date: September 16, 2016
- Discharging Date: October 17, 2016 (revised from your original request)
- Vessel Type: Handysize Bulker
- Cargo Type: Ro-Ro Iron Ore
- The owner will handle all charter party & commercial documents.
- Deck Load Specification: 20MT/m2 with space for 4.5 m on the centerline and 2 m side shift.

Please review and let us know if you have any changes or additional requests.

Best regards,
Jun Wu

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Vessel Charter Details
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Thank you for the details. I've noted the adjusted discharging date and will discuss it internally. Meanwhile, I have forwarded your information to our team in Shanghai. They will follow up with you directly. I am also sending you a business card for future reference.

Thank you.
Fred

email_chain.subject: Request for Fuel Oil Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Sangho,

We require 10,000MT of Fuel Oil to be shipped from China to Port Louis in July. Could you please provide us with a quote at your earliest convenience?

Thank you,
Alena

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Fuel Oil Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Alena,

Thank you for your email. To proceed with your request for 10,000MT of Fuel Oil, could you please confirm if there are specific requirements or details needed alongside the quote?

Best regards,
Ms. Sangho

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Fuel Oil Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Sangho,

Thank you for the swift response. There are no additional requirements at this stage. I just need the quote to proceed.

Thank you,
Alena

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Fuel Oil Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Alena,

We will prepare the quote and send it to you shortly.

Best regards,
Ms. Sangho

email_chain.subject: Request for Iron Ore Charter Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Brett,

A client needs 7,200MT of iron ore transported from Boston to Baltimore. Are you open to a 28th July laycan? What is your most competitive freight market price in USD/MT?

Best regards,
Sara

email_chain.subject: Details for Iron Ore Transportation
email_chain.body:
Brett,

Could you confirm if you have availability for transporting 7,200MT of iron ore from Boston to Baltimore, with the following details?

Name: Rio Tinto
Vessel Type: UMS
Vessel Length: 290M
Quantity: 7,200MT
Destination: Baltimore
Laycan: 28th July

Please respond with your best available charter rate.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best Regards,
Sara

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Pricing Inquiry for Iron Ore Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Brett,

Can we discuss your pricing on the transport? I have a client who is currently waiting for details regarding the vessel type UMS and particularly the charges for a laycan scheduled for 15th July 2014.

Regards,
Brenda

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Pricing Inquiry for Iron Ore Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Brenda,

Thanks for your response. How many vessels are available for these criteria?

Best Regards,
Sara

email_chain.subject: Cargo Space Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipping from Ashgabat to HCM
email_chain.body:
Dear Shipping Executive,

Could you please confirm if there is availability to transport 27,000MT of crude oil from Ashgabat to HCM with the loading scheduled for this Friday? Your prompt response will be highly appreciated. 

Kindest Regards,
Saleem

email_chain.subject: RE: Cargo Space Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipping from Ashgabat to HCM
email_chain.body:
Dear Saleem,

We regret to inform you that currently, there is no available capacity on our tankers operating through the Suez route for a transshipment to Vung Tau. We will notify you should the situation change.

Best Regards,
Bintang Sejahtera Shipping Co.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Pharmaceuticals from Riga to Dubai
email_chain.body: Dear Max, We are planning to ship 700MT of pharmaceuticals from Riga to Dubai. Can you please let me know how much time you would need to find a suitable vessel? Regards, Grace

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Pharmaceuticals from Riga to Dubai
email_chain.body: Hello Grace, I can start searching for a suitable vessel. However, before I proceed, could you provide more details about the shipment? - How will the goods be loaded (LCL or FCL)? - What is the nature of the pharmaceutical cargo? - What is the preferred mode of shipment? - When do you expect to move the cargo? - Is it an urgent shipment? Please forward any relevant documents. Regards, Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Pharmaceuticals from Riga to Dubai
email_chain.body: Dear Max, We plan to use a mix of FCL and LCL for loading the goods at the departure warehouse in Riga. The cargo consists of various pharmaceutical products. We prefer sea shipment and aim to move the cargo by the end of this month. It is somewhat urgent, so your swift response would be appreciated. I will send the necessary documents shortly. Please proceed to give me a quote for the shipment. Regards, Grace

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Pharmaceuticals from Riga to Dubai
email_chain.body: Hi Grace, Thank you for providing the details. I've confirmed that the goods can be packed as either FCL or LCL at the Riga warehouse, depending on your final decision. I am now proceeding to find a suitable vessel that meets these requirements and will revert with a quote. Regards, Max

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Loading Capability and Schedule for Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Yung,

We have cargo about 7500 MT of crude palm oil from Teluk Bayur to Port Kelang, with an arrival period set for the 27th of June, and delivery by the 28th of June. Could you let me know if you are able to load this cargo? Could you also please confirm your weekly and weekend loading dates?

Thank you and have a good day,
Arik

email_chain.subject: Handling Recommendations for Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi there.

Do you have a recommendation for handling the palm oil during transport?

Thank you,
Vincenta

email_chain.subject: Palm Oil Purchase Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Are you looking to sell palm oil? If so, may I ask where are you based?

Cheers,
Steven

email_chain.subject: Interest in Purchasing Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
May I know if you are interested in selling palm oil?

Thank you.
Alex

email_chain.subject: Palm Oil Supply Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Do you sell palm oil?

Thank you,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Looking for Palm Oil Offers
email_chain.body:
Hello.

I'm interested in palm oil; do you have any offers currently available?

Thank you,
Vicky

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Palm Oil Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi there.

Any palm oil to sell?

Thank you,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Bunker Prices in Tokyo
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Paulo, Could you please provide us with the latest prices for LPG and MGO in Tokyo? Thank you, Matias

email_chain.subject: Bunker Prices Update
email_chain.body: Dear Matias, Here are the current prices for our products: RGO: 425.00 USD/MT, DMA: 440.00 USD/MT, HSFO: 230.00 USD/MT, FOB: 360.00 USD/MT, MGO: 520.00 USD/MT, MGO FOB: 530.00 USD/MT. These prices are valid as of May 4, 2023. Please let us know if you plan to purchase around 05-06 May, as prices may be updated. Regards, Clara Liu

email_chain.subject: Purchase Confirmation and Price Update Request
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Liu, We are interested in purchasing the following: RGO: 425.00 USD/MT, DMA: 440.00 USD/MT, HSFO: 230.00 USD/MT, FOB: 360.00 USD/MT, MGO: 520.00 USD/MT, MGO FOB: 530.00 USD/MT. The purchase will be made on an LBS basis with delivery expected on 05-06 May. Could you please update the prices and provide me with a quote? Thank you, Matias

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Dates and Product Quantities
email_chain.body: Dear Matias, Can you please confirm the shipment for May 05-06? Also, would you need the products in one single quantity or two separate shipments? Thank you, Best regards, Lucas

email_chain.subject: Order Details Confirmed
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Paulo, Below are the details of the order placed. Order Detail: No: 1, Product: MGO, Quantity: 25,000 MT, Price: 530 USD/MT, Total: USD 13,250. Delivery Term: 5-6 May, Vessel loading at 10-12 May, FOB Port of Tokyo. Your order has been processed. Thank you, Ms. Rosita, Lu Bio Oil Trading CO., LTD.

labels.broker: Lu Bio Oil Trading CO., LTD.

email_chain.subject: Status Update Needed on Vessel
email_chain.body:
What's the current status of the vessel? Any news you can share?
Best,
Nada

email_chain.subject: Re: Status Update Needed on Vessel
email_chain.body:
Hello Nada,

Here are the latest developments regarding the vessel Almarakib:

The vessel is currently outward bound, and there are two main reasons for this development:
1. The Captain, who is Pakistani, is low on funds. He has decided to transport items from our port to Pakistan as a freelance venture to quickly earn some cash. He insists on receiving $30,000 upfront.
2. To accommodate his upfront payment request, we would need to take out a loan. Unfortunately, we cannot afford to cover this loan on our own. I'm considering selling my share of the ship to repay the loan.

I'm currently at the bank handling these affairs and have agreed to let the bank claim your share of the ship and use it to handle the loan repayment.

Best regards,
Sada

email_chain.subject: Offer for Bulk Sugar Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Good day Kris, We have 8kMT of bulk sugar ready in Santos for shipment to Wanganui. Could you please share your best offer? Also, will there be any discount if the laytime is under 12 hours? Regards, Anil

email_chain.subject: Further Details on the Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Kris, I would like to confirm the sale of 8kMT of sugar for Wanganui, with an expected arrival in Jan/Feb and a FOB price of USD 345/MT. Please let me know your thoughts so we can discuss further or try to sign some purchase orders. Regards, Anil

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Required for Bulk Sugar Deal
email_chain.body: Hi Kris, Thank you for your response. I have a great offer for Wanganui. Can the buyer accept the entire shipment? If not, we could potentially split the sugar among different buyers to ensure all shipments are loaded efficiently. Regards, Anil

email_chain.subject: Proposal of Unit Rates and Quantities for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Kris, As per our discussion, below are the details for your analysis: - 10kMT total Sugar Qty (divided as 3500MT, 2500MT, 500MT, with an overall quantity of 5500MT, plus containerized Sugar Qty divided as 3550MT, 2950MT, 200MT, totaling 4700MT). Overall Average Unit Rate is USD 330, converted from USD 345/MT. Are you okay with this rate? If so, I can proceed with preparing the first contract to speed up the process. Regards, Anil

email_chain.subject: Urgency in Finalizing the Contract
email_chain.body: Hi Kris, I need to finalize your sugar purchase offer as soon as possible and sign the contract. I will deliver the first payment of USD 50K once the contract is received. I hope to hear from you soon. Regards, Anil

email_chain.subject: Request for Contract Details and Terms
email_chain.body: Hi Kris, Could you please send me the contract details so I can share them with my director for approval? Also, if possible, please send the terms and conditions to ensure all parties involved are agreeable. Thanks for your assistance. Regards, Anil

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about FOB price for Urea shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Mike, I'm looking to ship 3,600mt of urea from Rabigh to Port Moresby by 31st July. Could you provide the FOB price for this shipment? Best regards, Guy

email_chain.subject: Arranging Delivery to Port Moresby
email_chain.body: I'm arranging delivery of the 3,600mt urea shipment to Port Moresby. Best regards, Dave

email_chain.subject: Rabigh-Sabine Strait Pipeline Documents
email_chain.body: I've just reviewed the Rabigh-Sabine Strait pipeline documents. Do you need me to send them over? Best regards, Dave

email_chain.subject: Documents Availability
email_chain.body: When would you like to see the documents? Best regards, Dave

email_chain.subject: Sending Pipeline Documents
email_chain.body: Mike, I'm sending the documents to you now. Is there anything specific you're looking for? Best regards, Dave

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body: Mr. Anderson, Would you please provide a quote for our shipment of 10,000MT of M.G. wheat from Dalian to Durban. Can you include any extra charges for overweight or additional services? Thank you, Olivia

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry - Dalian to Durban
email_chain.body: Mr. Martin, Thank you for your quote of $7,350. Considering the premium quality of our MG wheat, this offers great value. I understand your vessel is currently scheduled to head to Australia, but could we arrange for it to load from your current location, possibly London, and then proceed to Dalian? This arrangement could significantly reduce our costs. Look forward to your advice. Regards, Olivia

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry - Dalian to Durban
email_chain.body: Ms. Olivia, Thank you for considering our service. Unfortunately, rerouting from London to Dalian directly isn't feasible at the moment due to our commitments. However, I'm exploring alternatives and will update you soon. Best, Martin

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Consideration
email_chain.body: Mr. Anderson, We find your quote for $6,500 very attractive. We are holding the quote open until the end of the week to allow time for our enquiry to be approved. Thank you, James

email_chain.subject: Revised Quote Follow-Up
email_chain.body: Mr. Martin, We note your revised quote is less competitive than your original quote of $7,350. As per our initial enquiry, we are striving for the best value for our wheat shipment. We still hold your initial quote of $7,350 open for the time being. Regards, Olivia

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Vessel Availability
email_chain.body: Mr. Anderson, Please confirm the availability of a suitable vessel to load at Dalian to deliver to Durban. Can you provide us with your General Conditions of Charter and Charter Party for our approval? Thank you, Daniel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel Availability for Clinker Transport
email_chain.body:
Peter,

Would your vessel be able to transport 8,000MT of clinker from Dubai to Dar es Salaam in early August? Can you also provide how much time in advance we need to book the ship? Additionally, will you be able to handle a return load to Dubai?

Regards,
Carina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel Availability for Clinker Transport
email_chain.body:
Carina,

Hi. Thank you for reaching out. Can you confirm the value per MT for the clinker? Also, yes, arranging a return load to Dubai after unloading at Dar es Salaam is possible.

Best,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel Availability for Clinker Transport
email_chain.body:
Peter,

The clinker is valued at about 2,500 USD per MT. Thanks for confirming the return load. I look forward to your vessel availability details.

Regards,
Carina

email_chain.subject: Additional Details: Clinker Storage and Transport
email_chain.body:
Peter,

To clarify, the clinker will be stored in bulk. Please consider this for the vessel arrangements.

Thanks,
Carina

email_chain.subject: Further Details: Clinker Transport Requirement
email_chain.body:
Peter,

To further specify, we will need a 25,000 dwt vessel. Would you be able to load 10,000MT at the beginning in Dubai and then complete the loading with 8,000MT at Dar es Salaam?

Regards,
Carina

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Details: Clinker Transport Requirement
email_chain.body:
Carina,

I apologize for the delayed response as I am currently attending a conference. I need to check the availability of a suitable 25,000 dwt vessel. I will get back to you as soon as possible.

Regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Bauxite Shipment from Wando to Cagliari
email_chain.body: Hi Terrence, Do you have any availability to ship 120,000 tons of bauxite from Wando to Cagliari? Regards, Fiona

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bauxite Shipment from Wando to Cagliari
email_chain.body: Hi Fiona, Unfortunately, we cannot supply bauxite from Wando to Cagliari at the moment. Hope you are well! Regards, Terrence

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Future Plans for Bauxite Shipment
email_chain.body: Terrence, What are your next plans to supply bauxite from Wando to Cagliari? Regards, Fiona

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Future Plans for Bauxite Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Fiona, Sorry for the delay, I have been traveling back from a trip to Indonesia. I will get in touch with my team and get back to you as soon as possible. Regards, Terrence

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for C-Flex 1100 Vessels
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Your new C-Flex 1100 vessels have arrived at Ningbo Port. I am interested in chartering one for our next shipment of cargo from Ningbo to Hai Phong. The shipment consists of 4,000 tons of polystyrene. Could you please let us know the earliest possible start date for delivery?

Regards,
Violet

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for C-Flex 1100 Vessels
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Violet,

Thank you for your inquiry. Our C-Flex 1100 vessels are indeed available and can be chartered for your shipment from Ningbo to Hai Phong. To provide you with a detailed quotation, could you please provide the following additional details about the shipment?

- Shipment Volume (in cubic meters)
- Presence of any hazardous materials
- Detailed cargo description
- Cargo value
- Requirements for lashing to secure the cargo
- Any specific requirements such as reefer containers, etc.

I'll be waiting for your reply to proceed with the quotation.

Regards,
Alwin

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rates and Dates
email_chain.body:
Hi Daniel,
Could you let us know the earliest possible dates for shipping 3000MT of turpentine from Durban to Alexandria? We don’t need FOB terms, but we’d like to fix the rates as soon as possible.
Best regards,
Andre

email_chain.subject: Re: Receipt of Your Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Andre,
Just to confirm, I have received your email regarding the shipping of turpentine. I was at my office in South Africa when I received it, and there has been no delay in this correspondence. I will review the details and get back to you shortly with the available shipping dates and rates.
Best regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed
email_chain.body:
Hi Daniel,
Just to clarify, my initial email is the only one I sent. I believe there's been a misunderstanding because there seems to be a reference to another email, which I did not send. Could you please confirm?
Thanks,
Andre

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed
email_chain.body:
Hi Andre,
Apologies for any confusion. I understand now that you did not send another email. Thank you for the clarification. I will proceed with your initial request and provide the necessary information on shipping rates and possible dates as soon as possible.
Thank you for your patience,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Request for Polyester Trade Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Khan,

Could you please provide a quotation for the transport of 4,500MT of polyester from Saudi Arabia to Maputo, including all related costs?

Thank you,
Rosa

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Polyester Trade Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Rosa,

I would appreciate a response to my previous email regarding the details of your latest project.

Warm regards,

Regards,
Paul Cuenca
JDP Transportation Inc.
Tel: 604-557-3643 x225
Fax: 604-557-3644
Email: pcuenca@jdptransportation.com
Website: http://www.jdptransportation.com

email_chain.subject: RE: Free 50ft Container
email_chain.body:

Great to hear about the 50-foot container booking. I want to clarify our involvement with this container since it is crucial for our operations. Could you also specify what you mean by 'book' in this context? It's essential for our records and future coordination.

Regards,
Neeta Bhojwani
President
Asia-USA Logistics Inc
Ph: 604-568-1058

email_chain.subject: Re: Free 50ft Container
email_chain.body:
Hi Neeta,

By 'book', I meant that the reservation for the container has been confirmed under your name. Regarding the 20ft container, it needs to be moved from Shanghai to Keelung for OOCL to pick it up there. We've also provisioned a 20-foot container for you from Shanghai to Laem Chabang, pending receipt of the original BL or an amendment.

Thank you,
Paul
JDP Transportation Inc.

email_chain.subject: FW: Free 50ft Container

Before proceeding further, I need to see the agreement. Our company policy requires a formal agreement for booking containers. Additionally, we were not notified about the 20-foot container deal; please explain this discrepancy.

Regards,
Neeta
Neeta Bhojwani
President
Asia-USA Logistics Inc
Ph: 604-568-1058

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Vincente, Based on last year's grain harvest insights, we expect a lower wheat supply this year. I can arrange a shipment for early August from Odessa to Barcelona. Our usual demurrage clause applies, set at 300,000 USD. I look forward to your feedback. Best regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Tom, It's good to hear from you. I anticipate the demurrage fee might be higher than usual, plus the insurance premium is expected to increase by 5%. I am optimistic about finalizing this transaction in early August. Awaiting your further details. Regards, Vincente

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Wheat Shipment Discussion
email_chain.body: Dear Vincente, This is a gentle reminder concerning our previous discussions about the wheat shipment. Do you foresee a strong demand for this shipment in early August? I look forward to your swift response. Best, Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Reminder: Wheat Shipment Discussion
email_chain.body: Dear Tom, I apologize for the delay in my response. We are currently addressing some concerns with the banks regarding market fluctuations and guarantee issues. We're inclined to proceed if we can ensure a mutually beneficial agreement post-transaction. Warm regards, Vincente

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment Arrangements
email_chain.body: Hi Vincente, Thanks for your prompt update. Please be assured that we have a contingency plan to address any issues raised by the banks. Looking forward to a successful collaboration. Best, Tom

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Contract Confirmation for Wheat Shipment

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Contract Confirmation for Wheat Shipment

email_chain.subject: Re: Contract Signing Confirmation
email_chain.body: Fantastic news, Eddie! I'm looking forward to this transaction. Best, Tom

email_chain.subject: Final Steps for Wheat Shipment Contract
email_chain.body: Dear Tom, Please proceed with signing the contract and send a confirmation email once complete. If there are any concerns, feel free to contact me. Best regards, Vincente

email_chain.body:
Hi Martin,

How are you? I hope all is well. How was your trip? I trust you had a great time in London! I'm doing well myself but I miss our conversations. I wanted to ask about the procedure for obtaining a student visa. Could you provide some guidance on this?

Thanks!

George

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Student Visa
email_chain.body:
Hello George,

It's great to hear from you! I am well and truly enjoyed my trip to England. Regarding your question about the student visa, please remember to bring the necessary documentation when you visit the office for further discussion. Our office is located next to the Barnes and Noble bookstore downtown, and offers a beautiful view of the city which I think you'll enjoy.

I look forward to seeing you soon and discussing this in person.

Best regards,
Martin Stewart

For airfreight shipment specifics from Singapore to Hong Kong, please review your latest quotation attached. Any queries, please feel free to contact us. Best Regards, Carol

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Readiness - Shipment from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

Please advise on vessel readiness for 3,300MT of lubricants from Genoa to Haifa this Friday. Could you let me know as soon as you receive this email?

Kind regards,
Giulia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Readiness - Shipment from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body:
Dear Giulia,

Which type of vessel are you considering? Please provide DWT and ETA details. If it's a container ship, do you have all the vessel instructions in a PDF format that can be attached to your reply?

If you haven’t arranged any space with the shipping line yet, once arranged, kindly send me details so I can confirm our rate. Also, does your company have existing VLCC business with any major oil companies? If so, please advise rates.

Please ensure to send me a copy of the B/L or OBL upon completion of the shipment. The original B/L or OBL should be forwarded to our agent in Haifa for buyer delivery.

I look forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Readiness - Shipment from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Gomez,

Thank you for your prompt response. We are still deciding on the shipping line and will update you as soon as a decision is made. Could you please confirm which types of vessels you normally handle, including DWT range, age, and agency?

Best regards,
Giulia

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Rates and Service for Shipment of 3300MT Lubricants from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body:
Dear Giulia,

As per your email from yesterday, we have sufficient, fixed VLCC cargo space for 3,300 MT of lubricants. We can facilitate transport from the port of Genoa to Haifa by truck, rail, or barge.

The carriage by sea is quoted at EUR 14,000 per MT. Our total estimated charges are EUR 20,000 and an additional fee of USD 400. Please review the attached files, Exhibits A and B, for our commission rates and general terms, respectively.

The term for this shipment is CIF, consistent with our standard bill of lading.

Best regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Request for Transportation Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Sven,

We are seeking transportation solutions for shipping 5,500MT of wood panels from Bordeaux to Bilbao. Please provide your rate ideas along with a preliminary quote and let me know if you have specific questions regarding the shipment.

Sincerely,
Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Transportation Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Jeremy,

Thank you for reaching out with your request to transport wood panels from Bordeaux to Bilbao. Could you confirm the volume and dimensions of the panels? Typically, a wood pallet of 1.6 cubic meters with a thickness of about 2.5cm weighs approximately 1,000kg/m3 with a density of 1.7. Are there any other measurements or specifications I should be aware of?

Regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Transportation Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Susan,

Yes, all panels are 1.6 cubic meters and 2.5cm thick, conforming to your estimates of weight. Regarding our transport deal, could you provide information on how many cubic meters your truck can hold and how many trips the vehicle will make? Also, what would be the total cost for this transport?

Thanks!
Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Transportation Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Jeremy,

Our truck can transport up to 24 cubic meters at a time from Bordeaux to Bilbao. The total cost for transporting 5,500MT of your panels would be 10,000 euros, which covers all customs costs and administrative fees in the EU and at the destination. Do you need any special equipment or have additional requirements for transportation?

Best regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Transportation Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Susan,

I'm excited about progressing with our deal on the wood panels! I have a few more questions regarding the transport. Can we discuss these details over a phone call or video chat today if you're available?

Thanks,
Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Transportation Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Jeremy,

Yes, we can definitely discuss the details further. Meeting at the cargo port in Bordeaux, coordinates 44.8370° N, 0.5980° W, might be beneficial. Would this location work for you?

Regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Please Recheck the Previous Email
email_chain.body:
Mr. Maier,

Thanks for the prompt reply. However, it seems there might be a misunderstanding. We are arranging to purchase palm oil from Calabar, not Brazil. Could you please recheck the details and confirm the freight accordingly?

Thanks,
Gary

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Freight Rate Inquiry for Palm Oil from Calabar to Santa Marta
email_chain.body:

Hope you're well. I would like to inquire about the freight idea for a cargo of palm oil from Calabar to Santa Marta, with a mid-June laycan. Your assistance will be much appreciated.

Best Regards,
Gary

P.S. I'm really looking forward to our networking luncheon next week.

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Household Chemicals Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Betsy, We’re expecting a shipment of 6,600MT of household chemicals to depart from Antwerp this Friday. Could you please confirm your final freight rate so we can proceed with the booking? Thank you, David

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Household Chemicals Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi David, I can confirm that the rate I previously quoted remains the same: US$2.00 per ton FOB Antwerp, with an additional charge of US$10 per package if the dimensions vary. Please let me know if you need further details. Best wishes, Betsy

email_chain.subject: Regarding our Email Strategy
email_chain.body: Hi Dave, I suggest we offer David a clear rate per ton and allow him the opportunity to accept it or propose an alternative. As we learned in our training, our goal in email communications is to assist the recipient in making informed decisions. David seems a little hesitant; a straightforward offer might help him to decide. Best wishes, Betsy

email_chain.subject: Urgent Need for Petroleum Coke Transport
email_chain.body: Hello Ali, I heard you urgently need to transport 3,000MT of petroleum coke to Cape Town. Seems like you don't have space on the F/A ABLYN currently at Latakia. Are you planning to wait for its next stop after turning around in Sudan, or is your situation desperate? - Sid

email_chain.subject: Offer to Transport Your Cargo
email_chain.body: Hi again, I have a proposition regarding your petroleum coke transport to South Africa that may interest you. Though I initially planned the Sudan turnaround, the business is now managed by my cousin, who is much less lenient. However, I will ensure your transport needs are met. - Sid

email_chain.subject: Transport Offer for Petroleum Coke
email_chain.body: Salam Ali, remember our times in Dubai? I'm now settled in Cape Town and have an opportunity to offer: 3,000 metric tons of sapphire black petroleum coke stored on a tanker in the Black Sea. Here’s my offer: $500,000 for the lot, or $150,000 per metric ton. - Sid

email_chain.subject: Urgent Confirmation Needed
email_chain.body: Salam, let me know if you're interested in the deal. The price stands at $150,000 per metric ton. We need to close this deal swiftly; signing contracts will follow and funds will be secured via an independent bank post-transaction. - Sid

email_chain.subject: Response Required Soon: Offer Expiry
email_chain.body: Salam, the offer is still standing but I'd advise not to delay. If we don’t hear from you soon, chances are the petroleum may be redirected elsewhere. - Sid

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Loading Inquiry for 2,200MT to Puerto Madryn
email_chain.body:
Hi Anne Marie,

The cargo you have quoted will fit comfortably on the MV ACATENANGO. This ship will load in Aviles, Spain on March 13th and sail the following day to Madryn, Argentina. The expected discharge date in Madryn is March 26th, giving you approximately two weeks of transit time.

Please confirm the delivery to Madryn, ARG.

Best regards,
Ms. Mendoza

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Milestones for MV ACATENANGO Shipment
email_chain.body:
Milestones to be completed between March 14th and March 20th:
- March 14th: Automatically notify principals upon completion of the 'Report of Findings'
- March 18th: Automatically notify the vessel owner of the completion of the preliminary D/D
- March 18th: Vessel owner should approve the D/D within 24 hours
- March 18th: Vessel owner is required to download the preliminary D/D and secure the vessel
- March 20th: The first week of the pre-laycan D/D expires

Regards,
Operations Team

Could you please clarify whether you will arrange the unloading vessel at our port, or should we handle it? Also, could you provide your preferred working days for unloading?

Following our earlier correspondences, could you please confirm if you will handle the vessel arrangements for unloading at our port, or should we proceed to organize it ourselves? Your prompt response will be greatly appreciated as we need to make the necessary operational adjustments.

Regards,

email_chain.subject: Port dues and additional charges for cargo loading
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ferris,

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Samuel, and I am currently the vessel broker for a Chinese bulk carrier in Chittagong, Bangladesh.

We have been assigned to load 3,800 MT of heavy plates, destined for Port Louis, Mauritius. We were informed of several port dues and fees, including:

- General Cargo Port Dues: USD 3,256.00
- Coast Guard Charges: USD 164.00
- MFAF (Mauritius Free Airport Fee): USD 112.80
- Port Corporation: USD 159.84
- Generator Rental: USD 1.92 (USD 0.16/Hour for 12 hours)
- Empty Tank Cleaning: USD 20.00 (USD 10.00 per tank for 2 tanks)

Could you kindly consider this breakdown when submitting your invoice? We'd appreciate acknowledging these charges in our agreement.

Best regards,

Samuel

email_chain.subject: Re: Port dues and additional charges for cargo loading
email_chain.body:
Dear Samuel,

Thank you for your detailed email.

It is important to clarify that passing on such charges to the cargo owners requires their prior consent. If there is documentation (e.g., a bill of lading with a specific clause) that assigns these charges to the owners, we can consider these in our rate discussion. Otherwise, unauthorized charge transfers are not permitted.

Additionally, to provide a more accurate freight quote, could you please supply more details regarding the cargo such as its origin, grade, and product code?

The more comprehensive the information you provide, the quicker we can process it, and the smoother our transaction will be.

Kind regards,

Alain Ferris

P.S. Please send the necessary cargo details at your earliest convenience.

email_chain.subject: Submission of MBL and Shipper Information
email_chain.body: Hi Name, can you please submit the Master Bill of Lading (MBL) for the shipment of 1,600 metric tons of cocoa beans and send the shipper's information to the brokers? Regards, Lorraine

email_chain.subject: Re: Submission of MBL and Shipper Information

email_chain.subject: Re: Submission of MBL and Shipper Information
email_chain.body: Hi Name, the MBL or Master Bill of Lading is a document issued by a carrier to acknowledge receipt of cargo for shipment. The shipping company is located in the Ivory Coast, and the brokers are based in the United States, New Jersey. Let me know if you need more details. Regards, Lorraine

email_chain.subject: Attached MBL for Shipment of Cocoa Beans
email_chain.body: Lorraine, please find the attached MBL document for the shipment of 1,600MT of cocoa beans. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Thanks, Sally

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Soybean Meal from Chongqing to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain X,
Could you please provide a freight quote for 30,000MT of soybean meal for a September delivery from Chongqing to Dalian?
Regards,
Sulek

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Soybean Meal from Chongqing to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Dear Sulek,
Our cargo agent has confirmed the rates for 30,000MT of soybean meal from Chongqing to Dalian. The details are as follows:
-	Build Chongqing: $10,000 (Spot period), $9,750 (September delivery)
-	Bunkering at Chongqing: $80
-	FOB Dalian: $60 (Spot period), $75 (September delivery)
-	Bunkering at Dalian: $30
Our vessel is available for September delivery. Please let us know your shipment details whenever you're ready, and we'll quote you accordingly.
Thanks!
Captain X

email_chain.subject: Change of Destination to Shantou
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain X,
Thanks for your prompt reply. Could you please quote the same shipment but with the destination changed to Shantou instead of Dalian?
Additionally, I would like to book the cargo as per your email, with the following details:
-	Quantity: 30,000MT
-	Commodity: Soybean meal
-	Packaging: 50kg jumbo bags
-	Containers: 1,200 bags per 40'HC container
-	Destination: Shantou
-	Loading Port: Chongqing
In June, my company agreed on a selling and buying price of $1,300 per MT for this soybean meal. Is it still possible to ship at that price in September?
Thanks in advance.
Sulek

email_chain.subject: Re: Change of Destination to Shantou
email_chain.body:
Dear Sulek,
Unfortunately, the rate you inquired about in July is no longer available. Due to increases in freight costs since your inquiry, the new rate for September would be approximately $12,000 for 30,000MT. This is significantly higher compared to your initial contract price of $1,300 per MT. Selling your soybean meal at this new freight cost may not be economically feasible.
Regards,
Captain X

email_chain.subject: Cancellation of the Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain X,
That's unfortunate news. It appears we cannot proceed under these conditions, as the contract price was only $1,300 per MT. Reducing the price further would result in a significant loss. I will need to inform the client and consider alternative cargo options. I appreciate your assistance but will close this deal with the seller.
Thanks for your help.
Sulek

email_chain.subject: Re: Cancellation of the Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Sulek,
It's indeed a pity that we could not proceed. If you change your mind or find alternative solutions, feel free to contact us. We'll be here to assist in any way we can.
Best regards,
Captain X

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Potential Delays through Suez Canal
email_chain.body: Hi, I have heard that some vessels are experiencing longer than usual passage times through the locks at the Suez Canal. Can you confirm if this is correct, and whether it might delay my shipment from China to Long Beach? Sincerely, Donald

email_chain.subject: Impact of Suez Canal Delays on Shipments
email_chain.body: Hello, I have also heard reports of vessels taking longer than expected to pass through the Suez Canal. Could you explain how this might affect my shipments? Sincerely, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Impact of Suez Canal Delays on Shipments
email_chain.body: Dear Sarah, Thank you for reaching out. Indeed, the Suez Canal faced severe disruptions due to the Ever Given ship getting stuck in March. While the ship was dislodged on March 29th and cleared from the canal, it is currently being refueled and prepared for towing to another location for repairs. The backlog of vessels has caused some delays, but traffic flow is steadily returning to normal. Please rest assured we are closely monitoring the situation and will keep you updated on any potential impacts on your shipments. Regards, Shipping Company

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Sulphuric Acid Transport from Aqaba to Khor Fakkan
email_chain.body:
Good day Ms. Kelly,

I am inquiring about transporting 3,400MT of sulphuric acid from Aqaba to Khor Fakkan. Are you able to handle a shipment with a late-July laycan? Additionally, please let me know if you can accommodate a short loading window.

Best regards,
J. Pye

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Sulphuric Acid Transport from Aqaba to Khor Fakkan
email_chain.body:
Hi J. Pye,

Thank you for reaching out. We can handle the late July load date for your sulphuric acid shipment. Please be aware that securing the necessary permits might take a few weeks. You can expedite the process by engaging a third party to handle permit arrangements on your behalf. Additionally, the substance's noxious nature might have led to previous denials, so this must be approached carefully. The loading window could be limited to 3-4 days, which we'll need to include in the permit applications.

Best,
Kelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Sulphuric Acid Grade Clarification
email_chain.body:

[Sender's Name]

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Arrangements Needed for Adhesives to Liverpool
email_chain.body:

To proceed, please place an order for your shipment on our website at www.ocean-imports.co.uk. Once registered, you can follow the straightforward instructions to plan the schedule and confirm the pricing details.

Patrick

email_chain.subject: Rye Miley (a garbage company) email
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

We’re scheduling a 3000MT cargo of garbage from New York to Venice. Can you quote a vessel with laycan dates after the 16th of May?

Regards,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Rye Miley (a garbage company) email
email_chain.body:
Hello Ashley,

We can accommodate a shipment of 3000MT of rubbish. However, I noticed your suggestion to use a boxship. While it can transport the garbage, the costs could be significantly higher. Might I suggest considering other less expensive options? Let me know how you wish to proceed.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Rye Miley (a garbage company) email
email_chain.body:
Hello Ashley,

Before we proceed, I need to know more about your trade, intended final destination, and what happens to the garbage at the end. We need to ensure compliance with environmental regulations. Also, could you confirm if you are considering a conventional cargo vessel as it indeed resembles a 'boxship'?

Looking forward to your reply,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Rye Miley (a garbage company) email
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

We are definitely not disposing of the garbage into the sea. We plan to ship it to Lome for recycling. The vessel can have laycan from May 19 to May 23. What would be the total cost to ship 3000MT to Lome?

Thanks,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Rye Miley (a garbage company) email
email_chain.body:
Hello Ashley,

Unfortunately, we cannot route shipments to Lome as we are a humanitarian charity and only operate in specific ports such as in Belgium, Austria, and Switzerland. Could this work for you or do you have alternative destinations in mind?

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Rye Miley (a garbage company) email
email_chain.body:
Ashley,

I'm a bit confused about the specifics of your needs. Are you needing help with standard garbage disposal operations or something more? We must clarify as our organization doesn't engage in any practices that could harm the marine environment.

Please clarify.
James

email_chain.subject: Updates and Interesting Projects to Check Out
email_chain.body:
Hey All,

Since I'm currently out of the office, I’ve compiled some interesting projects and news for everyone to look over:

* Learn about the Fertilizer Institute’s new Code of Conduct, featuring nine guiding principles. It's essential for those dealing with anhydrous ammonia or other fertilizers. Director of Regulatory Affairs, Brian Jennings, advises all stakeholders to read this and disseminate it among their teams.

* A recent meeting with the CARB discussed the 2013 Renewable Fuel Standard proposed by the U.S. EPA in California. As a result, a bill was introduced in the state legislature aimed at providing a tax incentive to enhance renewable fuel blending.

Best,
Steve

Regards,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent Cargo Load Inquiry for Odessa
email_chain.body:

Regards,
Riku

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent Cargo Load Inquiry for Odessa
email_chain.body:
Hello Riku,

I'm afraid we can't reduce the total quantity at this time as we have already sent the shipping notice which cannot be changed. We need to stick to the original 7,000MT if possible.

Regards,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent Cargo Load Inquiry for Odessa
email_chain.body:
Dear Gabriel,

We need an answer by the 8th regarding the arrangement for the remainder of the cargo, otherwise, we will have to find another port that can accommodate the full quantity.

Regards,
Riku

email_chain.subject: Query about Equipment Use for Shipment from Colombo to South Africa

email_chain.subject: RE: Query about Equipment Use for Shipment from Colombo to South Africa
