email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment: Port Elizabeth to Venice
email_chain.body: Hey Jeremy, I have a 5,000MT cargo of coal from Port Elizabeth to Venice ready to load in the first week of March. I don’t have any preference on the vessel. Let me know if you have any openings next month as I'd like to proceed with you. Please note, the vessel’s turnaround time in Venice is only 3 days. Regards, Brian

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment: Port Elizabeth to Venice
email_chain.body: Hi Brian, No issues, I can arrange for a mid-March shipment. The vessel will be at Port Elizabeth on March 9th, loading on the 10th, and will sail immediately thereafter. We can meet on March 9th as the vessel will be anchored outside the port ready for your cargo. Could you provide the terminal requirements? Thanks, Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment: Port Elizabeth to Venice
email_chain.body: Hey Jeremy, That sounds good. Could you please send me the details of the vessel? Thanks, Brian

email_chain.subject: Vessel Details: MV WIDE BEAM 01
email_chain.body: Hi Brian, Sure thing. The vessel assigned is Coal Coal Chartering MV WIDE BEAM 01, built in 2013. The general layout includes a coal bunker and berth load carpet areas. Regards, Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Terminal Requirements: Port Elizabeth
email_chain.body: Hi Jeremy, Thank you for the details. The Port of Elizabeth mostly uses side-loading facilities which are somewhat rustic. Most coal is stored up the hill or by the water’s edge. The loading is facilitated from ash ponds filled by barges, loaded from stockpiles or through rail. Given this setup and with no draft restrictions or berthing limitations, we expect to load at an average rate of 1,500 mt/h, potentially up to 2,000 mt/h if coal delivery is swift. Be advised, the water levels in the port will be very low in March. Regards, Brian

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Transloading Fee for Book Shipment from France to NYC
email_chain.body: Hi Jess, We’d like to discuss our next shipment of books from France to NYC. What's your transloading fee and does it apply to private parties too? Regards, Donna

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Transloading Fee for Book Shipment from France to NYC
email_chain.body: Hi Donna, The fee is the same regardless of the client type. We offer the following three options: Option 1: Pickup from train station to warehouse in Texas. Cost: $325.00. Please note, all packaging materials and costs are not included. Option 2: From pickup at train station to delivery in NYC. Cost: $550.00. Like the first, packaging costs are excluded. Option 3: Similar to option 2, but including packaging materials. Cost: $800.00. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me. Thank you, Jess

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Transloading Fee for Book Shipment from France to NYC
email_chain.body: Hi Jess, Can you specify the number of books and their dimensions? Thanks, Donna

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Transloading Fee for Book Shipment from France to NYC
email_chain.body: Hi Donna, As per the consignment agreement, the consignee is responsible for packing and documentation costs. Regards, Jess

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Transloading Fee for Book Shipment from France to NYC
email_chain.body: Hi Jess, How can we appropriately pack a 16th century illuminated manuscript? Regards, Donna

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Transloading Fee for Book Shipment from France to NYC
email_chain.body: Hello Donna, The manuscript is about 27” long, 8” wide and 6” deep. Sincerely, Jess

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Transloading Fee for Book Shipment from France to NYC
email_chain.body: Hi Jess, Given its dimensions and historical value, how should it be packed? Regards, Donna

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Transloading Fee for Book Shipment from France to NYC
email_chain.body: Hi Donna, The consignee remains responsible for ensuring appropriate packaging for the manuscript. Regards, Jess

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Transloading Fee for Book Shipment from France to NYC
email_chain.body: Hi Jess, Why didn't you respond to my previous email about the packaging requirements for the manuscript? Regards, Donna

Dreamstime

Stavroula Papadaki
Marine Coordinator
GAC SG International Ltd

Further to our arrangements, the polymer shipment will be delivered to Apapa, Lagos, Nigeria. Below are the cargo details:

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for FCL Delivery Service from the US to Nigeria
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassia,

We require a Full Container Load (FCL) delivery service for transporting cargo from the US to Nigeria. We intend to ship a total of 400 TEUs. The terms offered by previous suppliers were unsatisfactory. Could you please advise on how to secure the best prices and reliable, on-time service? Additionally, what alternatives do you suggest if FCL delivery is not feasible?

Thanks for your advice,
Vassily

email_chain.subject: Request for CFR Quote for Cement Shipment from Malpensa to Marseilles
email_chain.body:
Dear Tomas,

I am writing on behalf of my client, a UK-based manufacturer, who is seeking a preferred supplier for the shipment of bulk cement. They require the transportation of 10,000 MT of cement per month for a duration of 6 months from Malpensa to Marseilles. Could you please provide a cost estimate based on CFR terms?

Additionally, we would appreciate details regarding reliable delivery timelines and information on the unloading process at Marseilles.

Thank you,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for CFR Quote for Cement Shipment from Malpensa to Marseilles - Negotiation Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Tomas,

Regarding our earlier discussion on the cement shipment from Malpensa to Marseilles, I have received a preliminary quote from my supplier that is higher than expected. Is there any possibility to negotiate a better rate?

Moreover, insights on the customs clearance process at Marseilles would be highly valuable.

Looking forward to your response,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for CFR Quote for Cement Shipment from Malpensa to Marseilles - Updated Information and Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Tomas,

Thank you for your inquiry about the bulk cement shipment. I've confirmed with my supplier the availability of the required volume for the next 6 months. They have also provided details about the unloading process at the destination port.

There has been a slight adjustment in the pricing due to recent market fluctuations. I will send over the updated quote including the transportation costs as soon as it's finalized.

Additionally, I've attached a document detailing the customs clearance process at Marseilles.

Looking forward to your feedback,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Final Quote for Cement Shipment from Malpensa to Marseilles
email_chain.body:
Hello Tomas,

Following our recent communications, I've received confirmation from my supplier regarding the increased market prices for bulk cement, which has affected our initial quote. The new transportation cost estimate will be provided to you shortly.

My supplier has reiterated their capability to manage the stipulated volume and provided additional insights on the handling and customs processes at Marseilles.

Thank you for your patience. I look forward to concluding this arrangement satisfactorily.

Best regards,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request from Gdańsk to Tanger
email_chain.body: Dear Trader, Could you provide a quote to move my 8,500MT cargo from Gdańsk to Tanger as soon as possible? Please also provide an estimate of the freight costs. Thanks, Kunal

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request from Gdańsk to Tanger
email_chain.body: Hello Kunal, In response to your query, the freight rate is estimated between USD 3.50 - USD 3.75 per metric ton, depending on the equipment selected. For a confirmed rate, please provide details about your ship and its specifications. Additionally, are you able to charter the ship for a two-week period, possibly to Rijeka for loading or discharge? Please let us know how you wish to proceed. Regards, S. M. F.

email_chain.subject: Additional Cargo Query
email_chain.body: Hello Trader, We have an additional 5,000 MT of cargo that we want to send to Tanger. Could you confirm the freight and availability of the ship for such trips in the near future? Thanks, Kunal

email_chain.subject: Re: Additional Cargo Query
email_chain.body: Thanks for your interest in our service. We can confirm the freight at USD 3.75 per metric ton for a two-week charter trip to Rijeka (Croatia). Please let us know when you would like to book the vessel. We will follow up with your schedule and ship details. If you have any other questions, please let us know. Regards, S. M. F.

labels.cargo_size: 8500MT for the first shipment, 5000MT for the second

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Crane Capacity and Service Time
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Bennett, As a stevedore, you have access to ample cranes and loading equipment. I'm aware that most shipping companies prefer to hire their own personnel for discharge operations. Our company is known for efficient berthing and cargo handling, ensuring smooth operations. Could you share your experience with crane capacities at your ports and provide an estimate on service time for ships with dimensions of 2,600 meters and a cargo capacity of 6,500m³? Thank you, Edward

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Crane Capacity and Service Time
email_chain.body: Hi Edward, Thank you for reaching out. Unfortunately, neither our terminal nor yours has cranes capable enough for such large ships. However, we do share common interests with the island of Grande Comore, benefiting from a reputable port with quality equipment and avoiding overloading. Shall we explore third-party companies with the capability to handle these large ships? Looking forward to your suggestions. Best regards, Cory

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Crane Capacity and Service Time
email_chain.body: Hi Cory, What do you think about using a multi-purpose dock like Port Natal? They have advanced docking equipment and experienced crews, boasting an average unloading time of 15 minutes per ship. Alternatively, we could consider a third-party company such as 'Aloha Stevedoring' who are reputable in handling large ship requirements. Regards, Edward

email_chain.subject: Re: Third-party option [Port of Bicheno]
email_chain.body: Hi Edward, That sounds like a solid option. A friend just mentioned a new terminal in the Philippines, designed to handle ships with a capacity of 2,600 meters and 6,500m³. They're currently seeking quality partnerships and might be a good match for handling our cargo needs. If the location works for you, I can facilitate a direct conversation. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Cory

email_chain.subject: Re: New Terminal in the Philippines [Port of Bicheno]
email_chain.body: Hello Cory, It's great to hear about the new terminal. The Philippines could be a strategic location for us. Please, could you arrange direct communication with the terminal to discuss further details like rates and service quality? I appreciate your effort in coordinating this. Looking forward to your response. Best regards, Edward

However, I need to know whether the cargo is bulk or containerized, and your preferred departure and arrival dates. Do you have the CIF prices from Lagos available? Best regards, Alen

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Joseph, Following our recent discussion regarding your shipment of palm oil from Nigeria to Antwerp, I am pleased to confirm that the cost would be 1300 USD per metric ton (excluding transportation from your factory to Lagos port and from Antwerp port to the final destination). This quote is CIF. It would be beneficial to discuss any additional specifics and receive confirmation of your transport costs to compute the total cost accurately. Our shipping department in Antwerp is ready to assist with the process upon your confirmation. I look forward to your reply to finalize the terms. Best regards, Jonny

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability and Discharge Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi, We’re planning to ship 8,000 MT of glass from Chicago to Qingdao. Do you have an available vessel, and do you offer a low discharge rate if our container is discharged early? Sincerely, Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability and Discharge Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Michael, We have the available capacity to ship the glass. The estimated cost will be USD 6500 per 40HC, USD 4750 per 20HC or USD 1550 per 40HC FOB Qingdao port. Payment will be T/T 100% at sight, and the container will be loaded by our team. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability and Discharge Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi, Thank you for your quotation. Could you please provide more details about your discharge rates at Qingdao port, and confirm the payment terms? Sincerely, Michael

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability for Glycol Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Agent, We require transportation for a total capacity of 36,000 metric tonnes of glycol from Mexico to Luanda, Angola. Do you have any suitable vessels available? Best regards, Your Name

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability for Glycol Transport
email_chain.body: Hello, Following up on your request, I have a ship available that can carry 5,500,000 liters, which converts to approximately 5,500 m3. The corresponding load for your requirement, 36,000 MT of glycol, equals 3,600 m3 at the standard density of 1 ton/m3. The shipping cost will be US$100,000. Please confirm if this arrangement suits your needs. Regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability for Glycol Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Agent, Can you clarify the pricing per liter/m3 for the shipment? This would be crucial for our budgeting. Best regards, Your Name

email_chain.subject: Clarifications on Pricing and Commissions
email_chain.body: Hello, The estimated value of 5,500 m3 of glycol, based on a rate of $10 per liter, would total approximately US$55,000. Accounting for the shipping costs, the net profit stands at minus US$45,000. As a shipping agent, my commission on the net profit would be 5%, which in this case, denotes adjusting against potential future earnings. Please revisit our arrangement or pricing per liter as needed. Regards.

email_chain.subject: Revised Arrangement Needed
email_chain.body: Dear Agent, The indicated figures lead to a net loss. We must re-evaluate the shipping cost or the price per liter to ensure a feasible project. Let's discuss this further. Please prepare a revised contract or pricing structure. Best regards, Your Name

email_chain.subject: Revised Pricing and Contract
email_chain.body: Hello, I understand the concern. Let us revisit the pricing and come up with a viable solution. I will draft a revised contract and send it to you shortly for your review and signature. Regards.

email_chain.subject: Contract Signed and Further Steps
email_chain.body: Dear Agent, We have reviewed and signed the revised contract. Please provide the bank details for the transaction, and we shall proceed with the deposit of the agreed amount. Best regards, Your Name

email_chain.subject: Bank Details and Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hello, Thank you for returning the signed contract. I have provided the bank details in the attachment. Please confirm once the payment is made to the shippers. Regards.

email_chain.subject: Offer for Linseed Oil Shipment to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Hello Karl, We have received your recent interest in a Linseed oil shipment destined for Hamburg. Below is the initial information for your consideration: Origin: South America, Port of Loading: Paranagua, Quantity: 10,000MT, Vessel: Feeder Vessel, Discharge Port: Hamburg, Discharge Date: Immediate. We are eager to handle your requirements for this shipment. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this offer. Feel free to contact us should you have any queries. Best regards, David

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Linseed Oil Shipment to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Dear David, We are interested in proceeding with the offer for the shipment of Linseed Oil to Hamburg. Please send us your freight proposal. For our records, kindly confirm these details: Company Name: Nommetex Import/Export GmbH, Shipper: Industry de Ingreindes, Charterer: IBI Commodity Trade Limited, Quantity: 10,000MT. Also, please find our account details attached for billing purposes. We await your proposal and appreciate your prompt assistance. Best regards, Karl

email_chain.subject: Freight Proposal for Linseed Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Karl, Attached is our freight proposal for the shipment of 10,000MT of Linseed oil to Hamburg, including proposed DAP FOB pricing. Thank you for your cooperation. We await your confirmation of receipt. Best Regards, David

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Freight Proposal and Invoice Request
email_chain.body: Dear David, We confirm receipt of the freight proposal and accept the terms outlined therein. Please proceed with issuing the invoice for the Linseed Oil shipment. Thank you for your prompt assistance. Best Regards, Karl

email_chain.subject: Invoice for Linseed Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Karl, Attached is the invoice for the Linseed Oil shipment. Please proceed with the payment via wire transfer as per the attached billing details. We look forward to confirming receipt of payment. Kind regards, David Moreno

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Payment for Linseed Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello David, We have proceeded with the wire transfer payment as per the invoice. Please confirm when you receive the payment. Looking forward to our ongoing business. Best, Karl

email_chain.subject: Rate Confirmation and Vessel Readiness
email_chain.body: Thanks for your reply, Ms. Jenkins, and for the details provided. We are now expecting the vessel to be ready around the 7th of May. According to your earlier quotation, we would need a rate of $95/MT to ship from Damieta to Mersin. Please confirm if this is agreeable.

email_chain.subject: Clarifications Required for Bill of Lading and Other Details
email_chain.body: Thank you, Jon. Before proceeding, I need some clarifications for the bill of lading, which will be multi-user. Please ensure all shipping marks are clearly stated and confirm the delivery terms. Specifically, we need details on: A. Specifications for clean fuel (EN590). B. Total quantity agreed. C. Port of loading. D. Port of discharge. E. Latest Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) for the receiving vessel. F. Confirmed final quantity. G. Exact loading date. H. Payment terms. Please include these terms on the bill of lading along with the exact loading date. Payment will be processed upon receipt of the official signed bill of lading.

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarifications Required for Bill of Lading and Other Details
email_chain.body: Right, thanks for the clarification.

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation of Details
email_chain.body: Excellent, thank you for your confirmation. As previously agreed upon, payment will be processed upon receipt of the vessel’s draft survey from your vessel’s captain. This document is required for customs clearance and payment will be made via Western Union.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping 20,000MT Iron Ore from Sumatra to Suez in August
email_chain.body:
Hey Jake,

Let’s plan to ship 20,000MT of iron ore from Sumatra to Suez, targeting a four-week laycan starting on 1st August. Could you provide an estimate on the freight and the expected duration of the voyage?

Regards,
Stanley

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping 20,000MT Iron Ore from Sumatra to Suez in August
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Steffes,

We're ready to transport the 20,000MT of iron ore from Indonesia to your specified destination. We invite you to submit your offer based on FOB Hamburg iron ore prices, currently at US$78/MT. Please note:
- Load origin: Sumatra region
- Commodity: Iron ore, Fe 62%
- Discharge port to be confirmed by you

All financial offers must be in USD, non-negotiable and ex-works. Kindly include the freight and sailing costs as well.

Looking forward to your response.

Best,
Jake

email_chain.subject: Update on Bill of Lading and Cargo Inspection
email_chain.body:
Hi Stanley,

Apologies for the delayed response; we've been sorting out issues with our vessel's bill of lading. Your cargo will need an inspection upon arrival at the discharge port, and this is managed locally. Please coordinate directly with your broker to meet inspection requirements. We have updated the bill of lading to specify that the buyer (your client) holds responsibility for merchandise clearance post-inspection. If any documentation hurdles arise, don’t hesitate to reach out.

Regards,
Jake

email_chain.subject: Change of Discharge Port and Documentation
email_chain.body:
Hello Stanley,

I hope this message finds you well. There has been a change - the client has updated the discharge port from Hamburg to Antwerp, Belgium. Due to timing constraints with the sailing schedule, we went ahead with the change without prior notification and have updated the bill of lading accordingly. We're coordinating with our Antwerp agent to ensure all necessary documentation is in place for customs clearance.

I'll send over the revised bill of lading and confirm the inspection schedule shortly.

Best regards,
Jake

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Clearance and Inspection
email_chain.body:
Hi Stanley,

Great news—our agent in Antwerp has confirmed that all necessary documentation for your cargo has been successfully filed and cleared. The inspection is scheduled to start tomorrow morning at 9 am. I'm forwarding a copy of the bill of lading to you shortly.

Warm regards,
Jake

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Logistics Details for Rice Transportation
email_chain.body: Hello, Are you the logistics contact at Tandag, Davao? I am arranging a move of 8,400MT of milled rice from Narita to Tandag and require some assistance in understanding the logistics involved. Can you confirm if you handle these arrangements or direct me to the right person? Kind Regards, James

email_chain.subject: Fw: Inquiry About Logistics Details for Rice Transportation
email_chain.body: Dear Friends, Please refer to the email above. James, who handles logistics at our company Belle, is trying to coordinate a delivery. Your assistance in this matter would be appreciated. Many thanks, Terry

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Logistics Details for Rice Transportation
email_chain.body: Yes, I am the responsible person for logistics in Tandag. Please provide more details about the shipment, and I will assist you further.

email_chain.subject: Details of Rice Shipment from Narita to Tandag
email_chain.body: Thank you for your prompt response. We are planning to move 8,400MT of rice from Narita, Japan to Tandag, Davao. The cargo is expected to arrive around May 22nd, 2014. We intend to use Tandag Airport for unloading and subsequently distribute the load to various clients via local ports. Could you please advise on the unloading charges at the airport, choices of ports for delivery, and the cost of hiring a truck for further distribution? Regards, James

email_chain.subject: Re: Details of Rice Shipment from Narita to Tandag
email_chain.body: James, thank you for providing the shipment details. I will be confirming the unloading charges, available ports, and truck-hire costs shortly. Meanwhile, can you confirm the exact volume and expected time of arrival? Best, JAC

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Container Ship Investment
email_chain.body:
Hello Sir,

I hope this message finds you well. I am curious about the construction of large container ships in China and wish to understand the better investment option between owning a small container ship and owning a partial interest in a larger one.

Thank you,
Andre

email_chain.subject: Further Insights on Container Ship Investments
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Following our previous correspondence, I have further educated myself by reading more on the container ship business. This research leads me to ask whether you think a significant container ship project is underway in China. Considering the robust state of the shipping market, I am evaluating the merits of differing investment scales in this industry.

From my readings and current market analysis, I lean towards the recommendation that owning a small container ship is more advantageous than holding an interest in a large vessel. Our strategic focus should continue to rest on this belief.

Thank you,
Andre

email_chain.subject: Conclusion on Container Ship Investment Strategy
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Further contemplation and research on our discussion about container ship investments have solidified my viewpoint. Holding ownership of a small container ship presents a more stable, long-term benefit compared to a partial stake in a larger ship. This conclusion stems from both market trends and the strategic positioning it offers.

Please consider my advice as you make future investment decisions in this area. I look forward to your thoughts or any decisions you might lean towards.

Thank you,
Andre

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Acetic Acid Shipment
email_chain.body: Greetings, Can you offer a freight estimate for 12,000MT of acetic acid from Antwerp to Kuantan? Regards, Mia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Acetic Acid Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Mia, Thank you for reaching out. Unfortunately, we need the CIF price before we can offer a freight estimate. It may be best for you to discuss this with your supplier. Once you have the CIF price, we can provide a freight estimate accordingly. This step is just to check the feasibility of the shipment without commitment. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Acetic Acid Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, Please provide me the CIF of the shipment. Regards, Mia

email_chain.subject: CIF Details Attached
email_chain.body: Hi Mia, Please find the CIF details attached for the shipment. Should you have any questions, you can contact us at 016 4144 XXXX. Best Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Supplier's Confirmation and Additional Terms
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, Our supplier has agreed to proceed with your offer. However, we need to include an additional term where our company adds 30% of the total CIF price as a consignment amount. Regards, Mia

email_chain.subject: Supplier Agreement and Next Steps
email_chain.body: Dear Mia, I will prepare and send you the modified offer with the new terms included. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Modifications to the Shipping Offer
email_chain.body: Hi Jane, Thank you for the offer. We would like to request the following modifications: 1. The vessel must be Stalift. 2. It would be acceptable for the cargo to have a China origin or to be transshipped via China. Regards, Mia

email_chain.subject: Re: Modifications to the Shipping Offer
email_chain.body: Hi Mia, We can accommodate the requested changes. I will update the offer and forward it to you shortly. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Request from Jeddah to Port Said
email_chain.body:
Hi Abdullah,

Could you please arrange the shipment of the following materials from Jeddah to Port Said at your earliest convenience?
1. 100,000MT of 92-octane gasoline
2. 1,500MT of wax
3. 500MT of acetone

Additionally, could you inform me if your demurrage rate would be lower after 60 days of laytime?

Thanks,
Ramesh

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipping Request from Jeddah to Port Said
email_chain.body:
Dear Ramesh,

Our current demurrage rate is 14,000 Saudi Riyals per day, which reduces to 10,000 Saudi Riyals per day after 30 days of laytime. Your shipment qualifies for this reduced rate. I will proceed with arranging the charter.

Thanks and regards,
Abdullah

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry: Delivery to Tehran
email_chain.body: Can you please arrange for the shipment to be delivered to Tehran as well?

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Inquiry: Delivery to Tehran
email_chain.body: Of course. I will provide you a price for transshipment on short notice. Could you please clarify if you will also require ocean freight services?

email_chain.subject: Ocean Freight and Transshipment Request
email_chain.body: Yes, please send us your quotation for both ocean freight and transshipment.

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Ocean Freight and Transshipment
email_chain.body: The total price for ocean freight and transshipment will be 200,000 Saudi Riyals. Is this acceptable?

email_chain.subject: Request for Price Reduction
email_chain.body: The price quoted is too high. Please provide a lower price within the next 12 hours.

email_chain.subject: Revised Quotation for Services
email_chain.body: I have revised the total cost to 150,000 Saudi Riyals. Please confirm your acceptance by Monday evening.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Revised Quote
email_chain.body: Thank you for your assistance. I accept your offer of 150,000 Saudi Riyals.

email_chain.subject: Final Arrangements and Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body: Thank you very much. I am awaiting the funds transfer. Please keep me updated on the progress.

email_chain.subject: Update on Transaction Status
email_chain.body: Yes, of course. The transaction should complete within one week. I have requested the bank to keep us updated on the status.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Sourcing Dalian Steel From Karachi to Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Vasquez,

I am new to shipping and am looking to source Dalian steel from Karachi for shipment to Vietnam. Could you possibly recommend some options or provide guidance on how to proceed? Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Omar

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Sourcing Dalian Steel From Karachi to Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Hello Omar,

Thank you for reaching out. To better assist you, could you please provide more details about the quantity of Dalian steel you intend to ship and any specific logistic preferences you have? This will help me recommend the most appropriate options.

Best, 
Ms. Vasquez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Sourcing Dalian Steel From Karachi to Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Hey Ms. Vasquez,

Thank you for the quick response. I am looking to ship approximately 100 metric tons of Dalian steel. I don't have specific preferences for logistics as I'm quite new to this, so any general advice would also be appreciated.

Thanks again,
Omar

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Sourcing Dalian Steel From Karachi to Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Good day Omar,

With the details you've provided, I would suggest contacting Karachi Steel Logistics Co. They are experienced in handling shipments of Dalian steel and can assist in ensuring the steel is shipped efficiently and safely to Vietnam. I'm also forwarding some general shipping guidelines to help you get started.

Best regards,
Ms. Vasquez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Sourcing Dalian Steel From Karachi to Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Morning Ms. Vasquez,

Thank you for the recommendation and the resources. I will get in touch with Karachi Steel Logistics Co. and follow your advice. I appreciate your help in guiding a beginner in the field of shipping!

Best wishes,
Omar

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request from Rotterdam to Mexico City in August
email_chain.body:
Dear Anne-Marie,

I hope this email finds you well. We need to transport some polymers from Rotterdam to Mexico City at the beginning of August. Could you please provide us with a freight rate for this shipment?

Best regards,
Thor

email_chain.subject: Competitive Freight Rate Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Anne-Marie,

I have found another company offering sea transport from Rotterdam to Mexico City. Before moving forward, I wanted to check if you can offer a better rate than theirs. Could you please confirm?

Best regards,
Thor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request from Rotterdam to Mexico City in August
email_chain.body:
Hello Thor,

Thank you for your inquiry. To give an accurate estimate, I need to confirm that the pickup and delivery dates for your 25 CBM shipment are from July 10, 2017, to July 20, 2017. If this has changed, please update your shipment details using the support icon on our site. Our base rate is $0.05 per CBM per day.

Best regards,
Anne-Marie

email_chain.subject: Experience and Contact Information
email_chain.body:
Hi Thor,

Yes, we have extensive experience in transporting polymers and I assure you that our quotes are competitive. Should you need further assistance, feel free to contact me at 314-567-345 or via email at annemarie@example.com.

Regards,
Anne-Marie

email_chain.subject: Adjustment of Freight Terms
email_chain.body:
Hello Anne-Marie,

It appears there was a misunderstanding; our intended shipment is in August, not July. Could you please provide a revised quote for the period within August?

Best regards,
Thor

email_chain.subject: Revised Shipping Quote for August
email_chain.body:
Hello Thor,

I understand the correction to the shipment dates. Our quote remains the same for the month of August. Please let us know your preferred shipping dates, and if high, consider splitting the shipment.

Regards,
Anne-Marie

email_chain.subject: Availability of Laycan Slots and Demurrage Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Marco,
Quick question: are there any laycan slots left in the first week of July for 9,500MT of crude palm oil from Medan to Manila? Also, what daily demurrage rate are you proposing?
Best,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of Laycan Slots and Demurrage Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,
Unfortunately, there are no available slots in the first week of July for a shipment of 9,500 MT from Medan to Manila. There are, however, available slots in the week of July 3. Regarding the demurrage, the rate proposed is $100 per day, but we can offer it at $70 per day.
Best,
Marco

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of Laycan Slots and Demurrage Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hey Marco,
Thanks for checking. I will discuss with our charterers tomorrow and get back to you. Could you please clarify who the cargo is consigned to and if the cargo will be bunkered on board the vessel? It would also help to know if the cargo is new or residue and whether it is clean or oil-contaminated.
Best,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Request for Loading Sugar at Your Port
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Jackson,

Can you please confirm the loading of 100 MT of sugar at your port on 01.01.2006? We are prepared to cover all related transportation costs and would like to proceed with the shipment at your earliest convenience.

Yours sincerely,
Adam Smith

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Clarification Needed on Sugar Shipment Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Jackson,

I understand there has been some confusion regarding our previous communications. As stated in my email dated June 6, the terms offered were the best we can provide under the current circumstances. Please let me know if you can accept our terms or if you have a counteroffer.

Kind regards,
Jim Cox

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Clarification Needed on Sugar Shipment Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim Cox,

Thank you for your email. I am currently unable to confirm the loading of 100 MT of sugar as proposed. Could we perhaps discuss this further over a phone conference at your earliest convenience? This remains our only point of contact on this matter.

Yours sincerely,
Anne Jackson

email_chain.subject: Request for Additional Details on Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cox,

Thank you for your prompt response. As previously mentioned, I cannot confirm the shipment quantity of 100MT as of now. Please explain further what you meant by 'our offer to load 100 MT on 01.01.06'.

Regards,
Anne Jackson

email_chain.subject: Request for Bulk Carrier Charter from U.S. to Vladivostok
email_chain.body: We are looking to charter a bulk carrier for transporting black coal. The required cargo capacity is about 15,000 tons. Preferred delivery between 17th September and mid-October 2020 from the U.S. to Vladivostok. The vessel should handle a deadweight of 9,000 to 12,000 DWT. Please let me know your available options and terms.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Bulk Carrier Charter from U.S. to Vladivostok
email_chain.body: Thank you for reaching out with your requirements. It’s good to hear from you. I will review the available options and revert back soon with the possible charter terms and ship availabilities that meet your criteria.

email_chain.subject: Assistance with Your Transportation Reservation

Customer Service Team
Adhesive Transportation

Adhesive Transportation

Customer Service Team
Adhesive Transportation

email_chain.subject: Freight Requirement from Colombo to Port Hedland
email_chain.body:
Hello Terry,

We are planning to ship 7,000MT of cement from Colombo to Port Hedland. Could you provide the latest updates on the freight market and the last available time charter information?

Thank you,
Galika

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Requirement from Colombo to Port Hedland
email_chain.body:

There are two suitable vessels available, the SEABOURN PRESTIGE and the DOURO, both of which are slated to go to Dubai. Please let me know additional details about the ships' age, safety, and technical aspects that you might require.

Thank you,
Terry

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Availability and Rates for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: We're considering shipping 9,000MT of crude oil from Jingtang to Spain. Could you please let me know your earliest availability and your rates? Thanks, Tim

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Availability and Rates for Crude Oil Shipment

We can load the cargo at Jingtang Oil Terminal between 12th and 15th December, with an estimated arrival in Spain between 17th and 25th December. Please confirm the charter today or not later than tomorrow. Looking forward to your response. Thanks!

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Coal Shipment Arrival

email_chain.subject: Urgent Vessel Requirement for Scrap Metal Shipment to China
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Rudolph, Our customer has instructed us to proceed with the shipment of 1,800MT of scrap metal to China next week. Could you please confirm the availability of any vessels to charter for this task? Regards, Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Vessel Requirement for Scrap Metal Shipment to China
email_chain.body: Hello Chris, Thank you for reaching out. I am currently checking vessel availability and will revert shortly with options. Best, Rudolph

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Vessel Costs and Loading Capacity
email_chain.body: Dear Rudolph, To clarify, will the vessel that arrived first cost 18 million naira due to a delivery delay? Additionally, can you confirm the number of containers that will be loaded on this vessel? Regards, Chris

email_chain.subject: Vessel Details and Inquiry Responses
email_chain.body: Hi Chris, Here are answers to your inquiries: 1. The ship returned in 14 days. 2. The total trip length was 28 days. 3. We chartered a bulk carrier. 4. The vessel's name is 'Ocean Voyager.' 5. ETA of the vessel is March 10, 2023. 6. Expected arrival time is 08:00 AM. 7. There could be a delay of up to 3 days. 8. The delay charges will be discussed upon confirmation of delay. 9. After discharging in the Philippines, the vessel will anchor at Port of Singapore. 10. It will take approximately 5 days to reach our port from there. 11. The vessel performed a voyage from India to the Philippines prior to this. 12. Gross weight capacity of the vessel is 50,000 tonnes. Please let me know if you need more details. Best, Rudolph

email_chain.subject: Additional Information Requested

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Tank Cleaning Services for 20,000MT Feed Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Shipping Manager,

I am contacting you to inquire about your tank cleaning services for a shipment of 20,000 metric tons of feed oil. Could you please confirm if you can provide a 5-day notice for operations in Rotterdam? Additionally, can you provide the pricing for the past three months for this service?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Tank Cleaning Services for 20,000MT Feed Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello [Your Name],

Thank you for your inquiry. We can indeed provide a tank cleaning service with a 5-day notice in Rotterdam. Attached are the pricing details for the past three months. Additionally, we have another operational location in Rotterdam where shipments can be received.

Please let us know if you need further information or assistance.

Best regards,
[Shipping Manager's Name]

email_chain.subject: Further Details Needed on Tank Cleaning and Additional Services
email_chain.body:
Dear [Shipping Manager's Name],

Thank you for the prompt reply and the detailed pricing information. Could you also send the latest data on container shipping rates for the same period? We are evaluating all logistics options for our operation.

Additionally, could you provide information regarding the process and duties performed by ships' crew during customs clearance at your facilities?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Details Needed on Tank Cleaning and Additional Services
email_chain.body:
Hello [Your Name],

I've attached the requested container shipping rates for the past three months. Regarding the customs clearance, our crew performs standard duties which include documentation processing and ensuring compliance with all local and international regulations.

If there are any further details you require or if you wish to proceed with scheduling the services, please let us know.

Best regards,
[Shipping Manager's Name]

email_chain.subject: Request for Methanol Shipment New Orleans to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:

We’re seeking a vessel to transport 1,000MT of methanol from New Orleans to Hong Kong. Can your vessel accommodate our 20-day laycan schedule, and would a split discharge be possible?

All the best,
Pete

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Methanol Shipment New Orleans to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Dear Pete,

Sounds good! How about two trips, each carrying 1,000MT within a 10-day laycan? We can arrange a split discharge with 65% on the North American coast and 35% in Hong Kong or possibly Japan.

Let us know your thoughts.
Amanda

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Methanol Shipment New Orleans to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Dear Amanda,

That proposal sounds suitable. For the first voyage, we'll go with the 65-35 split delivery, adjusting to 35-65 for the second voyage. Does this meet your operational requirements?

All the best,
Pete

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Methanol Shipment New Orleans to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Dear Pete,

Perfect! I'll proceed with sending the fixture confirmation now.

Regards,
Amanda

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Freight Booking from Jubail to Haldia
email_chain.body:
Hello Susan,

Thank you for reaching out. Our current volume for shipments to Haldia port is 2000MT. This increase is due to the industrialization of West Bengal, enhanced port handling capabilities at the new Haldia Dock Complex, and increasing ship size accommodations. We are intending to further double these volumes due to our own expansion in East Coast plants in India. We primarily source the bitumen from Jubail. Here are the shipment details for your request:

- Vessel: Capesize
- Quantity: 2000MT
- Arrival Date: 20-Oct-2014
- Discharge Date: 24-Oct-2014
- Location: Haldia Port

Looking forward to your response.

Regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Previous Cargo Detention
email_chain.body: Greetings, my name is Mary Wells. As a financial advisor to the Wilson family, I appreciate the efficiency of your operations previously. I need to discuss an issue concerning the personal effects of my clients, Mrs. Glenda Wilson and Mr. Michael Wilson, which have been detained by Liberian authorities due to improper customs documents. These goods, including a Rolls Royce and household items, were shipped on May 10, 2008, and have incurred significant fees. Best regards, Mary Wells

email_chain.subject: Re: Previous Cargo Detention
email_chain.body: Thanks for your email, Mary. The cargo you mentioned is no longer onboard our vessel, but I've sent you a document from the shipping line that could assist in resolving the situation in Liberia. There appears to be a bureaucratic issue, and it might be helpful to engage a local solicitor. Do you have any ideas about this? Best regards, Scott

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability
email_chain.body: Hi Scott, unfortunately, we do not have any vessels available at the moment for your Rotterdam to Dakar shipment. Regards, Steve

email_chain.subject: Assistance With Liberian Authorities
email_chain.body: Scott, I have arranged assistance with the Liberia International Trade and Transportation Secretariat for the cargo's release. A document of authority signed by the director of the importation department at the Customs Department of Liberia will be sent to you. Let us know if you need local representation. Regards, Steve

email_chain.subject: Updated Load Proposal

In my previous communication, I mentioned they were seeking a shipping company to transport the cargo from Colombo, Sri Lanka to Busan, Korea. While we have a proposal from a US company, the FOB price is steep. My client has asked me to consult with local shipping companies in Colombo for a more cost-effective solution. Could Cargolocks offer a competitive rate?

Looking forward to your proposal.

Kind Regards,
David Young
Manager, Man Industries Limited

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Cost-Effective Shipping Solution from Colombo to Busan
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Young,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm pleased to inform you that we have availability for a 35' x 20' container departing from Colombo, Sri Lanka, on Thursday, December 10th, 2020, and arriving in Busan, Korea, on Wednesday, December 23rd, 2020. Attached, please find the details of our shipping company, rates, and customs clearance procedures for Korea.

We believe our offer will meet your needs and look forward to a potential partnership.

Sincerely,
Harsha J. R.
Manager, Cargolocks

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Vessel Charter and Shipment Details

email_chain.subject: Incomplete Email
email_chain.body: Apologies, but it seems there was an error with my previous email. Please disregard.

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for Petroleum Coke Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good day Ms. Young,

We are arranging a shipment of 5,000MT of petroleum coke from St. Petersburg to Boston. Could you please provide us with a freight quote?

Best regards,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request for Petroleum Coke Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Elena,

Please find attached the freight quote for the shipment of 5,000MT of petroleum coke from St. Petersburg to Boston. We look forward to your response.

Regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about cargo loading in Dover
email_chain.body: Dear Geraldine, We’d like to transport 300MT of caprolactam from Cotonou to Dover. Could you inform us if after-hours berthing is available at the South Container Terminal, and if it’s possible to schedule a load on a vessel currently berthed there? Regards, Pauline

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about cargo loading in Dover
email_chain.body: Thanks Pauline, Upon checking the schedules, it appears you are referring to our service ‘Commodore’, which operates weekly cargo shipments to France. Unfortunately, the South Container Terminal cannot facilitate berthing for the Commodore this week due to full occupancy. The berths are currently assigned in this order: 5, 1, 2, 4, 7, 3, 6. The Commodore will berth at 6 South having arrived from Kingston on Wednesday, departing for Cherbourg on Friday night. I hope this information helps. Regards, Geraldine

email_chain.subject: Booking early berth for the next Commodore rotation
email_chain.body: Dear Geraldine, Can you provide details on which berth and slot the next Commodore will occupy? We have cargo already arriving and need to coordinate further shipments. Early booking would be advantageous. Regards, Nigel

email_chain.subject: Advice needed for free berths
email_chain.body: Dear Geraldine, Could you let us know of any berths that will be available next week? We need to plan some bulk cargo loading soon. Thanks, Simon

email_chain.subject: Discussion on Current Business Situation
email_chain.body: Deidra, I thought it would be useful to start a dialogue about our current stagnating sales volumes. Do you agree that the sales levels we witnessed in January are unsustainable? If so, what steps do you think we should consider to boost our business? With best regards, Teo

email_chain.subject: Re: Discussion on Current Business Situation
email_chain.body: Teo, At this point, I cannot provide a detailed response, but I suggest we discuss the possibility of reducing prices to spur a significant increase in sales volumes. What are your thoughts on this approach? With best regards, Deidra

email_chain.subject: Re: Discussion on Current Business Situation - Further Considerations
email_chain.body: Teo, I'm open to the idea of reducing prices, but I need more convincing that it will be beneficial for us in the long term. It's clear that January's sales figures are untenable, and I'd rather we explore price adjustments to boost sales than consider reductions in our workforce. With best regards, Deidra

email_chain.subject: Re: Discussion on Current Business Situation - Strategic Planning
email_chain.body: Deidra, Let's continue our conversation to define what our business levels could look like in both the short and long term under a scenario of sustained price reductions. What is your current stance on this? Regards, Teo

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation: 150MT Steam Coal Shipment to Tocopilla, Chile
email_chain.body: Could you provide us with the best rates for a 150MT shipment of steam coal to Tocopilla, Chile? Please include a complete quotation covering all freight, brokerage, storage, and other relevant charges. Regards, Jon

email_chain.subject: Coal Specification Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Jon, My name is Douglas Brown, director of Romco Mining Ltd. Our steam coal meets the following specifications: Sulphur: 1.5% max, Calorific Value: 6000 kcal/kg min, Ash Content: 15% max, Moisture Content: 5% max, Volatile Matter: 23% max, Other Minerals: 18% max, Fines: 5% max. We ensure premium quality coal that meets global market standards. Please send us your price per ton CIF to the port of Antofagasta. We will review it and get back to you. Regards, Douglas Brown

email_chain.subject: Explore Our Updated Website
email_chain.body: We invite you to explore our newly updated website where you can find extensive information about Romco Mining and take a virtual tour of our facilities. We believe this will give you a deeper insight into the quality and safety standards we uphold at our mining sites. Regards, Ron Skye

email_chain.subject: Feedback and Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Ron, I've reviewed your site and am impressed by the intuitive layout and detailed information available, particularly in the Product, Quality, Health and Safety, and Environment sections. The virtual tour of the mining and processing plants was particularly enlightening. Could you please send us the prices and complete specifications of your steam coal? Regards, Jon

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Specification and Price Request
email_chain.body: Hello Jon, We appreciate your interest but regret to inform you that we can’t meet your product specification at this point. Please feel free to check other offers. Best regards, Ron Skye

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Coal Specifications
email_chain.body: Hi Ron, Could you elaborate on why our specifications regarding the 18% maximum for other minerals cannot be met? Best regards, Douglas Brown

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability and Conditions for Upcoming Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Batra,

We expect to ship 3,000MT of motors from Singapore to Colombo by April 1st. Could you please confirm if your vessel is available for a short term voyage around these dates, and are you flexible on the ballast condition?

Best regards,
Ernest

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability and Conditions for Upcoming Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ernest,

The 'Coastline' is currently berthed at Kakinada on the Indian coast. I expect to receive her draft survey report by about March 25th. Her charterers are assessing the bunkers needed for the voyage to Singapore, but we might be able to depart for Singapore as early as March 26th. Regarding ballast conditions, try coordinating with 'Coastline's' current charterers, 'Sambalino', as they may be able to arrange the vessel immediately for loading at your specified port. Alternatively, you may proceed in ballast and arrange fuel in advance of loading.

Please let me know if you need more information.

Regards,
Mr. Batra

email_chain.subject: Options for Vessel Deployment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Batra,

Could you assist us in exploring the following options with your owners for our shipment?

1. Deploy the 'Coastline' from Kakinada to our discharge port to arrive in 6 days time.
2. Deploy the 'Coastline' from Kakinada to our discharge port to arrive in 10 days time.
3. Send the 'Sambalino' from your discharge port to the Singapore loading port to arrive in 6 days time.
4. Send the 'Sambalino' from your discharge port to the Singapore loading port to arrive in 10 days time.

I will forward you the draft survey as soon as it is received. In the meantime, please let me know if there's any further information you need.

Thanks,
Ernest

email_chain.subject: Update on Vessel Draft Survey and Schedule Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Batra,

Thank you for sending the 'Sambalino' draft survey. I am pleased to confirm that 'Sambalino' will arrive at the Singapore loading port in 6 days. Please let me know if there are any further details needed. We are expecting to send the draft survey for 'Coastline' shortly.

Best regards,
Ernest

email_chain.subject: Urgent Charter Inquiry for Animal Feed Transportation from Mukah to Iloilo
email_chain.body:
Hi Vidyasagar,

I hope this message finds you well. We urgently need to charter a vessel to transport 24,000MT of animal feed from Mukah to Iloilo next month. Could you please let us know if you have any available vessels? Additionally, could you provide the rates, including your usual demurrage rate?

Many thanks,
Laura

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent Charter Inquiry for Animal Feed Transportation from Mukah to Iloilo
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for reaching out. We have the AHTS Legend - POA available, which is an AHTS vessel, DP2, Ice Class 1C, with a gross tonnage of 3205t and a DWT of 4142t, suitable for your cargo. Full details have been sent in a follow-up email.

Regards,
Vidyasagar

email_chain.subject: Vessel Details: AHTS Legend - POA
email_chain.body:
Vessel Detailed Information:

- Vessel Name: AHTS Legend - POA
- Vessel Year: 2009
- Type of Vessel: AHTS, DP2, Ice Class 1C
- Class: KR
- Hull ID: JZ2 1702
- Machinery: HTG-Diesel
- Gross Tonnage: 3205t
- Net Tonnage: 959t
- DWT: 4142t
- Length Overall (LOA): 90.40m
- Length Between Perpendiculars (LBP): 85.40m
- Beam: 18.20m
- Depth: 7.50m
- Draft: 5.4m
- TEU Capacity: 50
- Heavy Fuel Oil (HFO) Capacity: 1300 tons
- Fuel consumption: 6 mt/hr
- Speed: 13 Knots
- Cargo Deck Area: 1200 square meters
- Cargo Tanks: 3 x

Please let me know if you need further information.

Best regards,
Vidyasagar

email_chain.subject: Fertilizer Shipment from Yabou to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Your inputs would be valuable in sending a shipping inquiry to various carriers for 1,700MT of ammonium sulfate from Yabou to Melbourne. Please let us know the availability of carriers from 18th to 30th May. Best regards, Arthur

email_chain.subject: Planned Sailings from Shanghai
email_chain.body: On 7 Jun, we intend to load 8000 MT of bagged fertilizer in Yabtou and another 8000 MT the following week in Qinzhou. Please kindly provide the ETA for Shanghai, the name of the intended vessel, and verify the electronic tanks. Best regards, Arthur

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation and Terms - Shanghai to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Please send the booking confirmation and Packing List/Cargo Release instructions for the shipment from Shanghai to Melbourne, including the terms and conditions, as early as possible. On 7 Jun, we intend to load 8000 MT of bagged fertilizer in Yabtou and another 8000 MT the following week in Qinzhou. Kindly advise the Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) at Shanghai, the intended vessel name, and confirm the condition of electronic tanks. Best regards, Arthur

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Connors,

Can you arrange for 12,000 MT of palm oil to be shipped from Laem Chabang to Hamilton? Looking forward to your response.

Regards,
Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Jeremy,

We are coordinating with a large capacity trading house in Malaysia for your request. We have already sent samples to their lab to confirm that the palm oil meets our specifications and expect to place an order soon.

All the best,
Jay

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Soybean Specifications and Stock
email_chain.body:
Dear Jeremy,

I need more information about the soybeans. Could you please provide the amount you have in stock and the specifications you require? Additionally, I am ready to provide you with our samples to ensure they meet your standards.

Kind Regards,
Mr. Kumar

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Soybean Specifications and Stock
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kumar,

Thank you for your message. Could you please provide more details about the price and shipping conditions for the soybeans?

I am looking forward to your response.

Sincerely,
Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Soybean Specifications and Stock
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Kumar,

Thank you for considering our inquiry. I look forward to our collaboration.

Best,
Jeremy

email_chain.subject: Offer to Ship Oil from St. Petersburg to Ankara
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ahmed,

I'm writing on behalf of Mr. Kane to present our offer for shipping your oil from St. Petersburg to Ankara. We have considerable experience in handling similar cargoes within the required timelines. Please find below our proposed terms:

Date of Shipment: 15.06.2021
Product: M-1000
Origin: St. Petersburg, Russia
Destination: Ankara, Turkey
Quantity: 55,000 MT
Payment Terms: CIF + HLD
Payment Mode: 20% IFT / 80% TT

This offer is valid until 05.06.2021. Should you wish to discuss further, please feel free to contact us.

Best regards,
Felix

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer to Ship Oil from St. Petersburg to Ankara
email_chain.body:
Dear Felix,

Thank you for your email and the detailed offer. We value our long-standing relationship with your company and acknowledge your reliability as one of our preferred shippers.

Please proceed with a formal quote based on the terms you listed.

Kindest regards,
Mr. Ahmed

email_chain.subject: Submission of Formal Quote for Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ahmed,

As per your request, I am submitting the formal quote for shipping the oil cargo. We guarantee efficient handling and compliance with Russian regulatory requirements, given our 6+ years of experience in this region. Below are the details:

Date of Shipment: 15.06.2021
Product: M-1000
Origin: St. Petersburg, Russia
Destination: Ankara, Turkey
Quantity: 55,000 MT
Payment Terms: CIF + HLD
Payment Mode: 20% IFT / 80% TT

We are open to adjusting the destination to either Dammam or Bandar Abbas if deemed more suitable.

Please confirm the validation of this offer so we may proceed with the contractual process.

Best regards,
Felix

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Aluminum Billets from Port Klang to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Hi Susan,

Could you arrange the shipment of 8,000MT of aluminum billets from Port Klang to Karachi? Additionally, I would like to confirm the reliability of your ship chandlers.

Sincerely,
Gert

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Aluminum Billets from Port Klang to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Hi Gert,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can assist with loading these cargoes on a ship scheduled to sail from Port Klang in May.
The last shipment we managed to Karachi was on the vessel 'Midas Glory', where we successfully loaded 300MT (6 x 50MT billets). Besides, we can supply bunker, provisions, and ship's stores as needed.
Please visit our website at http://www.singarama.com.sg for more information, or send me an email with further details of the cargo and ship so we can proceed.

Regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Request for Ship Agency in Chittagong
email_chain.body:
Hi Susan,

I am a ship agent in India, and we operate regular services from Chittagong to various Indian ports. Could you provide ship agency services for us in Chittagong, Bangladesh?

Thanking you,
[Name]

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Ship Agency in Chittagong
email_chain.body:
Dear [Name],

I will contact our branch office in Chittagong, Bangladesh, and have them get in touch with you. Please provide them with the details necessary to facilitate your request.

Regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Oil Cargo Shipment to Nigeria
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

We require a shipment of oil cargo amounting to 120,000 metric tons for Nigeria, set for April 15, 2010. Kindly confirm if you can supply this and please revert back.

Sincerely,
[Name]

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about broking teams' interest
email_chain.body: James, I’m coordinating with three broking teams on refinery contracts. Are you receiving any inquiries from the US Gulf? We are not focusing on the Mediterranean/Rotterdam markets at this moment. Kind regards, Felix

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about broking teams' interest
email_chain.body: Hi Felix, We have a few other broking teams we can touch base with regarding your inquiry. Could you clarify why you specified no interest in Mediterranean or Rotterdam markets? Regards, Myles

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about broking teams' interest
email_chain.body: Hi Felix, I have just forwarded your query to our commercial team to see if we can be of any assistance. Best regards, Nicole

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about broking teams' interest
email_chain.body: Felix, I have prompted the relevant teams working on this. Will revert with updates soon. Regards, Myles

email_chain.subject: Clarification on broking teams
email_chain.body: Hi Nicole, To clarify, I was referring to teams not interested in covering the Mediterranean. I've escalated this matter to my supervisor and will get back to you with more details as soon as possible. Kind regards, Felix

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about broking teams' interest
email_chain.body: Hello Felix, I've sent you a response through the work email network regarding this topic. I trust you will find the necessary details there. Best regards, Tatiana

email_chain.subject: Update on the broking teams' activities
email_chain.body: Hello Myles, I have discussed your inquiry with the team. They are currently working on it, but have no specifics on the refinery yet. Best, Tatiana

email_chain.subject: Difficulties finding suitable broking teams
email_chain.body: Hello Felix, I talked to the commercial team, but unfortunately, I have to dissociate myself as I haven't been able to acquire useful information to proceed with your request. Regards, Nicole

email_chain.subject: Laycan Extension and Trade Terms Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Xander,

Could you advise the status of our previous conversation? Our buyer wants to go for a laycan extension on the cargo. Additionally, could you specify if we should declare CIF or FOB? This will help us finalize the trade price.

Sincerely,
Liz

email_chain.subject: Re: Laycan Extension and Trade Terms Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Liz,

Please check with the buyer to see if they need us to declare CIF or FOB. We can provide a trade price on an FOB basis. If they need CIF, additional costs will be incurred. Please let me know their preference as soon as possible.

Thanks,
Xander

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Laycan Extension and Trade Terms Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Xander,

The buyer agrees to FOB at USD 11,375.68. We can offer CIF for USD 13,513.55. Additionally, the buyer wishes to increase the quantity to 8,000 metric tons. Please confirm the laycan extension as well.

Regards,
Liz

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Re: Laycan Extension and Trade Terms Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Thanks Liz,

I will confirm the CIF and laycan extension with the supplier and get back to you shortly.

Regards,
Xander

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Steel from Nagoya to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Sohal,

Could you advise on a price for us to ship 3,200MT of steel from Nagoya to Singapore? I understand we'll need to negotiate some carry terms.

Regards,
Richard

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability and Strategic Decisions
email_chain.body:
Dear All,

Sometimes we are not getting good sailings of our vessels due to tonnage/delivery date issues. What should we do in such circumstances? Is it important to send our vessels on voyages, or is it better to keep the vessels waiting for better tonnages/best delivery? Please also let me know your experience in this regard.

Regards,
Dinesh

email_chain.subject: Broker Cooperation with Cargo Owner
email_chain.body:
Dear Colleague,

The current vessel broker we are using has insurance dealings with multiple companies but is not expected to work directly with the cargo owner, entailing further discussions and approvals if brokers engage directly post-prepaying IMO charges.

Regards,
The Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Steel from Nagoya to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Our ship is currently docked at SOHAR for discharging cargo of urea and will soon be available for the next cargo. We are ready to carry any type of cargo as per vessel capacity and can accommodate up to 40 days in ballast. If you need to transport any cargo, please send details directly to the owner's email, which could facilitate quicker arrangements and save on agency fees.

Kindly advise.

Regards

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Man Overboard Incident Report
email_chain.body:
Hello Muthiah,

Vessel 24 has reported a man overboard incident at 14:30 on 8th March with the location at 55-10N 156-50E. Notably, the last man overboard drill was conducted two days before the incident. Please advise on any specific protocols or actions to be undertaken immediately concerning this.

Regards,
Vessel 24

email_chain.subject: Notification of Shipment Departure
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Erskine, As per our previous communication, I'm writing to confirm that the container of goods we discussed has departed from Busan on schedule. The estimated arrival date in Jeddah is next Thursday, 3rd January 2025. Should there be any changes, I will keep you updated accordingly. Regards, Kamila

email_chain.subject: Shipping Confirmation and Expected Date of Arrival
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Erskine, Following up on my previous email, I would like to confirm that our shipment has indeed left port on Friday the 28th of December. We anticipate the shipment to arrive in Jeddah by next Wednesday, 2nd January 2025. I will continue to monitor the shipment and inform you of any updates. Regards, Kamila

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for LPG Shipping Rates
email_chain.body: Hi Peter, How's your day going? Could you share your prices for CIF 5,000MT shipping LPG from Dalian to Busan next week? We'd be able to cover the shipping and insurance costs, if interested. Thanks! Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for LPG Shipping Rates
email_chain.body: Hello Anthony, Unfortunately, the vessel is already loading today. We have another vessel available for discharging end of March or early April. Could you kindly quote the cargo for that period? Thanks! Mike

email_chain.subject: Request for CIF Busan LPG Loading
email_chain.body: Dear Anthony, Following up on behalf of my colleague Mike, I'm also interested in acquiring rates for LPG loading at the end of March or early April for CIF Busan. Could you provide us with your current rates? Thanks! Eddie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about LPG Load CIF Busan
email_chain.body: Hello Anthony, Can you provide a quotation for loading CIF Busan at the end of March for approximately 5,000MT? Thank you! Dori

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for LPG Shipping Rates
email_chain.body: Dear Anthony, Thank you for getting in touch. Unfortunately, our schedule does not permit us to fulfill this request for loading cargo. Best regards, Peter.

email_chain.subject: Unable to meet request
email_chain.body: Dear Mike, Unfortunately, based on Peter's latest response, we're unable to meet the request for the March/April LPG cargo load to Busan. Let's touch base again for future opportunities. Best, Anthony

email_chain.subject: Cargoes on DFRA vessels
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Cullen, I am sorry that we were unable to reach an agreement regarding the cargoes on the DFRA vessels. If my offer of $5.25 is unsatisfactory, I am open to discussing alternative freight costs that match your expectations. I look forward to receiving your proposal. Many thanks, Ed

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargoes on DFRA vessels
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Ed, We regret that DFRA could not meet the commitments as expected, and we understand the difficulties this has caused your company. We are open to discussions for future contracts and any necessary adjustments concerning current cargoes onboard at the rate quoted, i.e., $5.25. We await your instructions. With best wishes, Mr. Cullen

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Financial Assistance Request
email_chain.body: Mr. Cullen, regrettably, I must inform you that we are in a precarious financial situation which might affect our ability to meet our payroll obligations next week. I sincerely hope for some flexibility on your part regarding the use of your ship at the previously discussed rates. A deferred payment plan would be immensely helpful. Thank you for considering our situation, Ed

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Financial Assistance Request
email_chain.body: Hello Ed, I'm truly sorry to hear about your financial difficulties. Unfortunately, the terms of our contract are quite strict, and I’m unable to offer the flexibility you require. I hope you find a way to resolve your payroll issues soon. Best, Mr. Cullen

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote - Mumbai to Miami
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

I am looking to transport 45,000 kg of high-density polyethylene pellets from Mumbai to Miami. Could you please let me know if your vessel is available for such a shipment? Additionally, I would appreciate it if you can provide a freight quote based on CFR terms.

Thank you,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About International Shipping Capabilities and Rates
email_chain.body:
Dear Logistics Team,

I am interested in your transport logistics services, particularly for international shipments. Do you have experience in shipping large items, such as trucks or ships globally? I would also like to know more about your freight rates for both international and domestic services. Please include any applicable details and whether you offer any special deals or discounts.

Looking forward to your detailed response.
Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About International Shipping Capabilities and Rates
email_chain.body:
Hello Peter,

Thank you for your inquiry about our shipping services. We indeed specialize in both domestic and international freight, including large-scale items such as trucks or ships. We offer competitive international shipping rates and occasionally have special deals available. All our vessels are equipped with real-time tracking capabilities, ensuring you can monitor your shipment at every step.

Please let us know if you need more specific information or a customized quote.

Best regards,
Logistics Corp Customer Service

email_chain.subject: Arrangement for Petrol Shipment from Fujairah to Durban
email_chain.body: I'm arranging to ship 7000MT of refined petrol from Fujairah to Durban, scheduled for 10 March. Could you confirm your estimated time of arrival in Durban? Regards, Rudi

email_chain.subject: Re: Arrangement for Petrol Shipment from Fujairah to Durban
email_chain.body: Hi Rudi, thanks for considering our services. Unfortunately, we're no longer in a position to offer our shipping services. Kind regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Previous Payment for Services
email_chain.body: Peter, some time ago you agreed to transport goods on my behalf to Durban, for which I paid you US$2800. I have not heard back from you or your company since making the payment. Can you please confirm if you've received the money and update me on the status? I'd appreciate a swift response. Thanks, Rudi

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Previous Payment for Services
email_chain.body: Rudi, thank you for your patience. We faced an issue with customs clearance in South Africa, which prevented us from processing your request initially. After resolving the issue with the customs, your funds are now accessible. I assure you that the funds will be forwarded to you shortly, and I will keep you updated on the progress. Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed Regarding Customs Issue
email_chain.body: Hi Peter, thank you for your explanation. Could you clarify what specifically went wrong with the customs process? I'm keen to understand the details as this delay is concerning. Thanks, Rudi

email_chain.subject: Vehicle Shipment Request from Houston to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Martinez,

We would like to request shipment for the following types of vehicles totaling 4,300 MT:
- Passenger Car: 6,180 units
- Passenger Van: 3,048 units
- SUV: 1,860 units
- Pickup Truck: 1,080 units
- 4x4 Car: 2,160 units
- 4x4 Van: 1,290 units
- 4x4 SUV: 3,570 units
- 4x4 Pickup: 2,160 units
- Trailer: 2,160 units

Can you accommodate shipping these from Houston to Long Beach?

Sincerely,
Neil

email_chain.subject: Re: Vehicle Shipment Request from Houston to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hello Neil,

Your shipment request has been escalated to me for further review. Currently, we are experiencing difficulty in coordinating with our warehouse operations. I will notify you as soon as there is an update on your request. Thank you for your patience.

Best regards,
Lina O'Neil

email_chain.subject: Re: Vehicle Shipment Request from Houston to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Neil,

After further review, our warehouse staff cannot support the requirements for your shipment as requested. Unfortunately, I do not have additional information at this time. Please contact Mr. Brian Brady, the warehouse manager in Houston, as he might be able to assist you further.

Regards,
Lina O'Neil

email_chain.subject: Need Assistance with Vehicle Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Support Team,

I need assistance with processing an order for a vehicle shipment from Houston to Long Beach, as there seem to be issues with warehouse capabilities. Can you help me?

Thanks,
Neil

email_chain.subject: Re: Need Assistance with Vehicle Shipment
email_chain.body:
Neil,

We have received your request and escalated the issue further to ensure it is addressed promptly. Please monitor your email for updates.

Regards,
Shipping Co. Support Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Need Assistance with Vehicle Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Support Team,

I wanted to follow up on my earlier request regarding the vehicle shipment. The order seems not to be processed yet. Could you please update me on the status?

Thanks,
Neil

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Transporting Used Milkers from Lydenburg to Gaborone
email_chain.body:
Hey Jane, 

We are interested in transporting a cargo of used milkers from Lydenburg, RSA to Gaborone, Botswana. Could you provide us with the details for loading in Lydenburg and unloading in Gaborone, as well as a complete logistics and transport plan?

Sincerely,
Karen

email_chain.subject: Details on Milker Arrival in Lydenburg from Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Hello Jane, 

Our used milkers are scheduled to arrive in Lydenburg from Cape Town by ship on July 28, 2016. Please let us know if you can handle the road transport from Lydenburg to Gaborone, and provide us with your transportation plan and cost estimate.

Sincerely,
Aaron

email_chain.subject: Details on Milker Arrival in Lydenburg from Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Dear Karen, 

Yes, we can manage the pickup of the milkers from Lydenburg upon their arrival and transport them to Gaborone. We plan to use our tippers and 40ft containers for this journey. The cost for transportation will be R7000 per tipper, and the total for loading, transport, and discharge in Gaborone will be R12,000 per container.

Please confirm the arrival time of the milkers in Lydenburg so we can finalize our arrangements.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Milkers' Arrival Time and Transport Preferences
email_chain.body:
Hello Jane,

Thank you for the logistics plan. The milkers will arrive in Lydenburg on 27 July 2016 at 09:00. The ship will be ready for unloading immediately upon receiving customs clearance, which is anticipated shortly before that time. Please plan to pick up the milkers at 09:00, as the ship will depart for Cape Town at 13:00 on the same day.

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Rubber Shipment from Guangzhou to Manila
email_chain.body:
