email_chain.subject: Inquiry about shipping fertilizer from Savusavu to Majuro
email_chain.body: Hello, We are looking to ship 1,600MT of fertilizer from Savusavu to Majuro. Could you confirm your earliest laycan slot and clarify if you quote on a CIF basis? Kind regards, Mariette Bosman

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about shipping fertilizer from Savusavu to Majuro
email_chain.body: Hello Mariette, I received your email regarding the 1,600MT of fertilizer. Please note the following terms of business: 1) Shipment will be under CIF terms. 2) Expected delivery timeframe is November/December. 3) Pricing will initially be based on FOB Savusavu. 4) Moisture content will be at the buyer's account, as no moisture guarantee is provided. 5) Product quality is to be analyzed in Savusavu post-loading. 6) Any issues regarding quality will be the responsibility of the buyer. Kind regards, Nicholas Juma, Reedmar Trading

email_chain.subject: RE: Organic fertilizer
email_chain.body: Thanks for your response and we are glad that the above terms are acceptable to you. Regards, Nicholas Juma

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Information
email_chain.body: Good evening, Can you please send me some information about this vessel? Regards, Ivan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Information
email_chain.body: Hello Ivan, I noticed your quick response. Before proceeding, please ensure you use our secure service for future communications to maintain data secrecy. Looking forward to more interactions!

email_chain.subject: Confirm Your Identity
email_chain.body: Before proceeding, Ivan, I need to verify your identity. Could you please confirm by replying with 'Hello, I know you are Yoda'?

email_chain.subject: Identity Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hello, I know you are Yoda

email_chain.subject: Final Verification
email_chain.body: Great Ivan, thank you for confirming your identity. Please type 'Sign -TjamIovnOy' exactly as it appears here and send it back to me to complete the verification process.

email_chain.subject: Complete Verification
email_chain.body: Sign -TjamIovnOy

email_chain.subject: Verification Complete
email_chain.body: Thank you, Ivan, for your cooperation and patience throughout the verification process. We will now proceed with your initial request for vessel information.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Docking Delays and Fees at Port Tampa
email_chain.body:

Are you experiencing any docking delays or incurring extra fees at port Tampa?
Have a nice day,
Marco

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Docking Delays and Fees at Port Tampa
email_chain.body:
Dear Marco,
Hope you are keeping well. We have received your email regarding the current status of container shipments related to XARA company.
Please advise on the next shipment after successful clearance of these containers, as you can verify the container number from our shipping records.
Details of the outgoing container:
- Container Number: LXX
- Shipper: [Vendor Name]
- Consignee: [Recipient]
- Origin: [Origin]
- Destination: [Destination]
- Entered into Port: [Date]
- Actual Shipment Date: [Date]
Looking forward to your guidance on the next steps.
Warm regards,
[Xara Support Team]

email_chain.subject: Container Delivery Confirmation
email_chain.body:

Today, I have checked the container numbers that are scheduled for delivery to you. To proceed further, I request confirmation for the reception of these containers. Please note that the costs involved are considerable, hence, kindly consider a timeframe of 3 months for the settlement of these costs.

KINKI Trading Inc.

I am directed by my company to contact you regarding your client’s consignment. We have been informed that your client wishes the consignment to be delivered to his specified destination. Please find the details below:
- Client Name: John W. Adams
- Client Address: 209 Lincoln Street, Rockville, Maine 02345
We look forward to your confirmation to proceed with the delivery.
Kind regards,
Michelle B. Wilson

email_chain.subject: Query regarding vessel availability and laytime flexibility

email_chain.subject: Re: Query regarding vessel availability and laytime flexibility
email_chain.body: Hi Hamad, Thank you for your inquiry. Here are the details: 1. Please confirm the cargo details. 2. Our vessel is available to load on 9th September, departing from Constanța. 3. We are currently on open call, but can offer flexibility with laytime. Can you please specify the actual delivery period and confirm your flexibility on laytime? We can reach an agreement after further discussion. Please do not hesitate to contact me for more information. Best regards, Daisuke

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Laytime and Loading Schedule

Our vessel is ready to load on the 9th September from Constanța Port. We appreciate your flexibility and look forward to your confirmation. Best, Daisuke

email_chain.body:

email_chain.body:

Best regards,
Luen Marine Shipping Company

email_chain.subject: Review of Proposal from Luen Marine
email_chain.body:
Dear Team,

We are currently assessing the proposal from Luen Marine. It looks promising but please review the contract details to ensure they meet our needs for shipping almonds. Your feedback is needed by January 20th. Thank you.

Best regards,
Phil

email_chain.subject: Re: Review of Proposal from Luen Marine
email_chain.body:
Dear Phil,

I discussed the offer with the team, and we are negotiating to get a better ETA from Luen Marine. This will help us with detailed planning and communication about vessel chartering or scheduling. Please update us with any new developments.

Thanks,
Muffy

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on ETA for Almond Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Muffy,

Thank you for the update. I will ensure you're informed as soon as Luen Marine provides us with a better ETA. Let's aim to finalize our decisions based on this information soon.

Best,
Phil

email_chain.subject: Offer of Newbuildings for Crude Delivery from Far East to South America
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Yang,

I’m handling the bookings from the Far East to South America. We are scheduled to take delivery of 450,000 barrels of crude at Port Quay. I would like to offer a group of newbuildings for this purpose. I am currently out of the office, so please direct all replies to Jenna at jenna@example.com.

Regards,
Daniella

email_chain.subject: Request for Daniella's Information on Newbuildings
email_chain.body:
Hello Jenna,

Could you please share Daniella’s email details regarding the newbuildings? Specifically, I need the line brochures and the shipping schedule, as well as a list of the type of cargo they can carry. I will forward the information to the concerned party upon receipt.

Thanks!
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rates from Marseille to Blackpool
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Garcia,

Hope you are well. As a final request, could you please send us the shipping rates for 150,000 barrels of crude from Marseilles (France) to Blackpool (UK). Our laycan period is from August 10 to August 15. Your prompt response would be appreciated.

Best regards,
Danel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Urea from Panama to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Hi Franco,

I hope this email finds you well. We need to transport 30,000 bags of urea from Panama to Liverpool. Could you please let me know if you have availability on your current voyage for this cargo? Additionally, could you provide details on your usual LMA clause?

Best regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Urea from Panama to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Hi Kate,

Apologies for the delay in response. Our vessel is loading in Trincomalee on Sunday and will proceed via Amsterdam, Rotterdam, and Aalborg, before reaching Liverpool. We can certainly accommodate your cargo. Our usual LMA clause involves a surcharge of $2.0. We also have good bunker availability for stops in Aalborg and Rotterdam.

Looking forward to your reply.
Best regards,
Franco

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Urea from Panama to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Hi Kate,

Just a friendly reminder to let me know if you could make your booking decision this week, as we'll be starting our voyage this Sunday.

Best regards,
Franco

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Urea from Panama to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Hi Franco,

Thank you for the details. I will need a bit more time to examine our volume requirements more closely. I appreciate your help and look forward to finalizing the arrangements soon.

Best regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Review and Respond to MOA
email_chain.body: Good morning, As per our conversation earlier this week, please see the attached MOA. We expect your response within the next 24 hours. Kind regards, Dan

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Review and Respond to MOA
email_chain.body: Good morning, This MOA was just received by one of our legal contacts. As we discussed yesterday, the terms do not meet our agreed specifications. Kindly revise it as soon as possible. Best regards, Marissa

email_chain.subject: MOA Expected to Be Signed by UK Top Management
email_chain.body: Good morning, Thank you very much for the MOA. It will be reviewed and signed by our UK top management. Please send the final draft as soon as possible. Best regards, Nick

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Detailed Amendments Needed for Attached Contract
email_chain.body: Good morning, As per our last conversation, we need to amend the attached contract to include specific provisions: a. No Transfer b. Owner Responsibilities c. Cost Recovery, and d. No Escrow. Please attach the revised document to your response as soon as possible. Best regards, Marissa

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipment from Sohar to Colombo
email_chain.body: Matthieu, we'd like to fix 4,500MT of bitumen from Sohar to Colombo next month. Could you share your best freight idea and vessel name? Thanks, Caroline

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipment from Sohar to Colombo
email_chain.body: Caroline, can you confirm if the bitumen shipment can be done at 6MT per drum?

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipment from Sohar to Colombo
email_chain.body: Matthieu, I tried to find some data but couldn't. I remember that you mentioned the bitumen will be shipped in drums of 220L and 200L with configurations of 5MT, 6MT, 7MT, and 8MT. Can we finalize it at 6MT per drum? Please confirm.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipment from Sohar to Colombo
email_chain.body: Caroline, I've checked and confirming the shipment can be done at 6MT per drum. I have also found a suitable vessel, the 'Nantong Happiness V', with a DWT of 2200Te. Please confirm if this meets your needs.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipment from Sohar to Colombo
email_chain.body: Matthieu, the vessel and the shipment configuration sound good. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements for the 'Nantong Happiness V'. Thanks.

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: Ethylene Glycol to La Guaira, Venezuela
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Preece,

We need to ship 4,000 mt of Ethylene glycol from Houston to La Guaira, Venezuela. We would like a quote on FOB including your suggested loading port and terms. Additionally, could you please inform us if you handle the insurance for such shipments?

Thanks,
Ursula

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote: Ethylene Glycol to La Guaira, Venezuela
email_chain.body:
Good morning, Ursula,

Attached please find our shipment quote as requested. If you have any additional questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me.

Sincerely,
Jimmy

email_chain.subject: Terms of Sale and Shipping Rates
email_chain.body:
Dear Ursula,

Please find attached a copy of the Terms of Sale as agreed in our discussion today. Please note that we will be shipping via ocean and have attached the applicable rates and fees. If you have any questions, please let me know.

Thank you,
Larry

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Order and Rates
email_chain.body:
Dear Ursula,

Attached, please find our official confirmation of order and rates per our discussion this morning.

Thank you,
Lawrence Preece

email_chain.subject: Order Quote and Product Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Ursula,

Please see the attached document for our quote regarding your order and further product information. Should you have any further inquiries, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Lawrence Preece

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Capacity from Richards Bay to Maputo
email_chain.body: Hi, We need a shipping capacity of 7,600MT for coal from Richards Bay to Maputo this upcoming weekend. Do you have availability? Regards, Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Capacity from Richards Bay to Maputo
email_chain.body:
Hi Adrian, We can offer a capacity of 7,000MT. Here are our rates:

Price FCA: US$150.00 per MT
Price CIF: US$175.00 per MT

The terms are subject to export LOI and Bill of Exchange (non-negotiable). Ocean Freight is included in the FCA price. Vessel will be loaded at RBCT with cargo packed in bags and tags, and wheel barrows are required for loading. Payment terms are 100% 30 days net from loading at the port. The vessel is scheduled to sail this Friday. Please confirm if this meets your requirements. Regards, Sheldon

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Capacity from Richards Bay to Maputo
email_chain.body: Good morning Sheldon, The cargo is ready for loading. Could you please provide the vessel details for loading in Richards Bay? Regards, Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Capacity from Richards Bay to Maputo
email_chain.body: Hello Adrian, Your cargo will be loaded on our vessel <Vessel Name>. Please note: A BL is required for booking and the rate confirmation. The cargo will be discharged at your nominated port in Mozambique, where your representative will be responsible for the collection and delivery. Payment is by TT and must be 100% prepaid upon the receipt of the original invoice based on the actual consumption. All additional costs will be your responsibility. The cargo will be de-bagged at a predetermined spot in the discharge port, agreed with your nominated port. I'll provide the contact details of your nominated port agent and keep you posted when your cargo has been loaded. Please ensure to meet these conditions. Best, Sheldon

email_chain.subject: Request for Space Confirmation on Vessel
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Lin,

I'd like to book a 4,500MT cargo of methanol from Montevideo to Rotterdam for the 8th. I know you mentioned in our previous email that you'd have space for us, can you confirm?

Kind regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Space Confirmation on Vessel
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thanks for getting back to me. I checked with the charterer and we do not have availability for the 8th. Can you let me know more details about the cargo you would like to move?

Best regards,
Lin

email_chain.subject: Additional Details for Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Lin,

Thank you for your quick response. Regarding the methanol transport, we need to ship 4,500MT from Montevideo to Rotterdam. We have flexibility in shipment dates, so please let us know the next available dates.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Additional Details for Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Michael,

We received your request and we are searching for an available freighter for your cargo of methanol. We'll inform you when the ship we are interested in becomes available.

Hope to hear from you soon.

Kind regards,
Lin

email_chain.subject: Vessel Status Update and ETA
email_chain.body:
Good morning Robert,

I hope this email finds you well. Our vessel just arrived in port yesterday and has been off-hire since 2pm. I understand that other vessels are also being loaded on a first-come, first-served basis, which may impact our estimated time of arrival. Could you please confirm the current status and let me know if there are any further updates?

Best regards,
Stefan

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Status Update and ETA
email_chain.body:
Hello Stefan,

Thank you for your message. As per the last communication, our vessel is at berth 1 and our estimated time of arrival is on Friday. At this moment, I do not have additional updates. I will ensure to contact you as soon as possible if the situation changes.

Could we arrange a phone call later today to discuss further?

Best regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Security Check and Coordination
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

We are scheduled to go through security tonight at 22:00. I have received updates that the ETA is now at 06:30 on Thursday. Please keep us informed if there are any changes or requirements for a blast job that might be necessary.

Thank you,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About GMS Arrival
email_chain.body:
Hello,

We have received our GMS and are currently waiting for them to arrive. Could you please provide us with a time estimate for when they will arrive?

Best regards,
Will

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About GMS Arrival
email_chain.body:
Hi Will,

Thank you for the update. We have not yet received a GMS. As soon as we do, I will keep you posted.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Inquiry for Cotton Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Sir/Madam, I am seeking to transport 2,900MT of cotton from Huangpu to Ghent. Could you please provide your best available rate? Furthermore, do you offer services on a Free Carrier Agreement (FCA) basis? Thank you for your time, Henry.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Inquiry for Cotton Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Henry, Thank you for your email. I will consult our cargo department to obtain the necessary information and revert shortly. Best regards, Clark Chen.

email_chain.subject: Additional Information on Cargo Handling
email_chain.body: Dear Clark Chen, Thank you for your swift response. Just to clarify, we typically transport our cotton in containers rather than using conventional trucking methods, due to the sensitive nature of the goods. Please feel free to consider any carrier that may have available space. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. Regards, Henry.

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Container Usage
email_chain.body: Dear Clark Chen, Thanks for your continuous assistance. Could you advise whether it is more optimal for us to ship using full containers or shipper’s owned containers, especially considering the volume (at least 100,000 tons annually)? I appreciate your guidance. Sincerely, Henry.

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification on Container Usage
email_chain.body: Dear Henry, Thank you for following up. Apologies for the delayed response. I will gather the specifics concerning container options and revert as soon as possible. Best regards, Clark.

email_chain.subject: Cargo Loading Inquiry for 1st April
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. An, If you still have room on your 1st Apr laycan to Kaohsiung, can we load 5,000MT of blue crystalline sodium nitrate from Kaohsiung to Xiamen next week? Regards, Phil

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Loading Inquiry for 1st April
email_chain.body: Hi Phil, Thank you for your e-mail. I cannot finalize the charter today, but please confirm with me again on Wednesday. Regards, Jenny An

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Loading Inquiry for 1st April
email_chain.body: Thanks, Jenny! We appreciate it. Phil

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Loading Inquiry for 1st April
email_chain.body: Hi Phil, Just checked the charter contract again. It is available for loading your cargo. Best regards, Jenny

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Loading Inquiry for 1st April
email_chain.body: Thank you for the quick reply! Can we have your voyage details so we can organize the delivery of our cargo? Also, what is your departure date? Regards, Phil

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Loading Inquiry for 1st April
email_chain.body: Phil, Please provide this information to me and I can forward it to the ship agents. Also, for your information, our vessel will call in Kaohsiung on 1st Apr and will load about 12,000 MT of blue crystalline sodium nitrate from Kaohsiung to Xiamen. Best regards, Jenny

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Loading Inquiry for 1st April
email_chain.body: Thanks! Our buyer would like to load 5,000MT on the vessel next week. If you can handle the cargo on the specified dates, we can proceed with the necessary arrangements. Please confirm. Regards, Phil

email_chain.subject: Request for Sorghum Shipment Proposal
email_chain.body: Dominic, Please send a proposal to ship 5,000MT of sorghum from Abidjan to Rotterdam. The ETA is within a month. Thanks, Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Sorghum Shipment Proposal
email_chain.body: Dear Peter, I am considering your proposal and would need further details regarding: 1) The USD price per metric ton for the sorghum. 2) Exact availability date for shipping from Abidjan. 3) The volume of sorghum in cubic meters required. 4) Total handling, shipping, insurance, and additional fees in USD. 5) Expected shipping duration from Abidjan to Rotterdam. Thanks for your assistance, and looking forward to your prompt reply. Regards, Dominic

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Sorghum Shipment Proposal
email_chain.body: Dominic, Thank you for your quick response. Here are the details: 1) USD $100 per MT. 2) The sorghum is available to ship within a month. 3) The shipment volume is approximately 5000 cubic meters. 4) The total fees including handling, shipping, and insurance will amount to USD $100,000. 5) Normal delivery time from Abidjan to Rotterdam is about 20 days. Appreciate your assistance, Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Sorghum Shipment Proposal Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Peter, I acknowledge the receipt of the provided details and am eager to proceed with this transaction. Could you please re-confirm the following for record accuracy: 1) Expected time of arrival in Rotterdam. 2) Ensure sufficient credit is available for this transaction. 3) Your email for official records: peter@example.com. 4) Your official address: Queen 1003, Hangzhou City, China. Thanks again for your attention. Regards, Dominic

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Sorghum Shipment Proposal Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dominic, Thank you for your continuing interest. Here are the confirmations: 1) The cargoes are expected to arrive at Rotterdam approximately 20 days post-departure. 2) We have sufficient credit and are prepared for this business transaction. 3) My email is correct as peter@example.com. 4) My address is confirmed as Queen 1003, Hangzhou City, China. Looking forward to finalizing this soon. Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Availability of fuel oil in ARA for mid-April
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Brown,

I have 4,500 MT of fuel oil available from ARA. Do you have a vessel that is scheduled to load mid-April?

Thanks,
Michelle

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of fuel oil in ARA for mid-April
email_chain.body:
Jason,

I was recently forwarded your email. I have a vessel, MT EVROS V, scheduled to load in ARA mid-April. What price are you offering?

Best regards,
Mr. Brown

email_chain.subject: Fuel Oil Offer for MT EVROS V in ARA
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Brown,

I am glad to hear of your interest. My company is offering the fuel at $3.20 per MT FOB for your vessel. Please let me know if you would like to accept this offer. If so, I can forward you a contract to formalize our agreement.

I look forward to your response.

Regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Revised Offer for Fuel Supply
email_chain.body:
Mr. Brown,

Based on further assessments, we would like to make you a better offer. What terms are you looking for?

Regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Contract for Fuel Supply
email_chain.body:
Mr. Brown,

I hope you're doing well. Have you had a chance to review the new contract I sent over? If you have any questions or require further details, please feel free to reach out. Also, could you please confirm if you are still interested in receiving the fuel as per our updated offer?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Required for Fuel Provision
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Brown,

Just reaching out again to ensure you have reviewed the contract and to confirm your interest in procuring the fuel from us. A prompt response would be greatly appreciated so we can finalize the preparations.

Best regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Liner Shipment From San Diego to Auckland, NZ
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Susan,

We are planning a shipment of 1,000 cartons from San Diego to Auckland, NZ. We anticipate this 40 ft HC container will be ready for shipment by the end of this month. Our client requests the 'GENTLE' special handling service throughout the voyage. Could you please provide a quote for the freight rate and demurrage cost for this shipment?

Regards,
Jeanette

email_chain.subject: RE: Liner Shipment From San Diego to Auckland, NZ
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Our company specializes in GPS tracker devices, and we have a customer in San Diego requiring a shipment of these devices in a 40ft container to Auckland, NZ. This shipment demands 'GENTLE' handling. Could you provide us with a pricing estimate for this service?

Thanks,
Michael

email_chain.subject: RE: Liner Shipment From San Diego to Auckland, NZ
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I am pleased to provide a quotation for the shipment of 1 x 40 ft HC container (1,000 cartons of GPS Trackers) from San Diego, CA to Auckland, NZ with the requested 'GENTLE' handling. Our FOB rate is $1,250 per container. Payment terms are L/C.

Please let me know if there's anything else you need or if you would like to proceed with this quote.

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: RE: Liner Shipment From San Diego to Auckland, NZ
email_chain.body:
Hi Susan,

Following our request, we have received a freight quote of $1,250 per container for the GPS tracker shipment. This includes the special handling required. Could you please confirm if this aligns with the client's expectations or if we need to negotiate further?

Thank you,
Michael

email_chain.subject: RE: Liner Shipment From San Diego to Auckland, NZ
email_chain.body:
Dear Jeanette,

I have reviewed the quote of $1,250 for the shipment of the 40 ft container with special handling and can confirm this is acceptable. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements. Let's finalize the booking and discuss the demurrage terms in further detail.

Best regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Rice Shipment from Vietnam to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Hi, We are looking to ship approximately 30,000 MT of rice from Vietnam to Mombasa as soon as possible. We are seeking a lump sum delivery price for the entire quantity. Best regards, Tina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Rice Shipment from Vietnam to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Thank you for your prompt response. We would like to clarify that the rice would be shipped over several months, and we require a fixed price for the entire period. Additionally, please provide the FOB price that could apply from Ho Chi Minh City, Da Nang, or Cai Mep ports. Note that we will not consider Vung Tau as a loading port. The tentative plan is to start loading in September, with flexibility on the exact timing as our delivery schedule spans multiple months. Best regards, Tina

labels.load_port: Ho Chi Minh City, Da Nang, Cai Mep

email_chain.subject: Request for Transportation Rates and Terms for Molybdenum Oxide
email_chain.body:
Hi Miguel,

We need to transport 4,000MT of molybdenum oxide from New York to Guadalajara. Could you please send me your best rates as soon as possible and confirm if you offer a standard laycan, including terms for demurrage and dispatch?

Thanks,
Tracy

email_chain.subject: Submission of Purchase Order
email_chain.body:
Hi Miguel,

As requested, we have attached our Purchase Order. We are expecting a draft agreement from your side shortly.

Thanks,
Tracy

email_chain.subject: Re: Submission of Purchase Order
email_chain.body:
Hi Tracy,

Thanks for submitting the Purchase Order. We will need a pre-booking deposit of USD 15,000, refundable after contract execution, to cover our expenses and your insurance. The estimated delivery date is March 14, 2017. We can offer our standard FOB laycan along with the terms for demurrage and dispatch as requested.

Kind regards,
Miguel

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Terms and Request for Further Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Miguel,

Thanks for the contract details and invoice. We confirm that we would like to proceed with the transportation of molybdenum oxide under the market freight of USD 9,000 on an FOB basis. We have seen your total invoice including the commission deposit of USD 15,000. The payment will be processed by our bank today. Additionally, we have received a quote for insurance of USD 500 from XYZ Insurance Company. Could you confirm whether you are coordinating with them? We need to ensure their reliability as they have been handling large claims lately.

Thanks,
Tracy

email_chain.subject: Insurance and Bank Draft Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Tracy,

Thanks for your prompt response and handling of the invoice. I will contact your bank on Friday regarding the draft. We confirm that we will use XYZ Insurance Company and will send you the insurance documentation this Friday.

Kind regards,
Miguel

email_chain.subject: Insurance Statement
email_chain.body:
Dear Miguel,

We confirm receipt of the insurance for the shipment of 4,000MT of molybdenum oxide from New York to Guadalajara, including:
1. All Risk Cargo Insurance - $9,000 premium
2. Airborne Container Loss - $1,000 premium
We will also cover any additional insurance premium resulting from the non-disclosure of the dangerous goods declaration.

With regards,
The AM Line Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: LNG from Melbourne to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Strauch,

As part of our annual logistics plan, we are scheduling a port visit to transport LNG. Could you provide a freight quote for transporting 11,700MT of LNG from Melbourne to Halifax in early May?

Thank you,
Mckenzie

email_chain.subject: Offer: Crude Oil Availability for May
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to check if you might be interested in acquiring 35,000MT of crude oil. We will have it available on our shuttle tanker next month, with a price set at $26,400 per MT. I’ll be in Dubai then and would appreciate any interest.

Best regards,
Conrad

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote: LNG from Melbourne to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Morgan,

We can accommodate your request for port access. However, we'll need a two-day advance notice prior to loading to avoid any operational difficulties.

Regards,
Mr. Stanley

email_chain.subject: Shipment Departure Inquiry from Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Carmona,

Could you please update us on when we can expect your shipment to depart from Jeddah? We need to arrange a release order for our bulk carrier. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Kind regards,
Colleen

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Departure Inquiry from Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Colleen,

As of now, the container is still at the yard and has not been shipped out. Could you please confirm the scheduled departure of your goods from Jeddah? This information is crucial for us to proceed.

Best regards,
Mr. Carmona

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Departure Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Carmona,

Is the container ready and in condition for shipment? Kindly confirm at your earliest convenience.

Thanks,
Colleen

email_chain.subject: Goods Arrival Update at Port
email_chain.body:
Hello,

We expect the goods to arrive at your port by next week. Please let us know if there are specific issues that need to be addressed prior to their arrival.

Best regards,
Mr. Carmona

email_chain.subject: Re: Goods Arrival Update at Port
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Carmona,

Thank you for the update on the goods arrival. Could you specify which port they will be dispatched to and confirm if any additional documentation is required from our end?

Best regards,
[NAME]

email_chain.subject: Request for Crude Oil Transportation
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Smith,

I need to arrange for the transportation of 1500 m3 of crude oil from New York to London by August 1st. Could you please provide your demurrage rate for a 15 minutes delay? Thank you.

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Requirement of 250 m3 Crude Oil Transport by July 25th
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Smith,

I am contacting you on behalf of American Fuel Corporation based in New York. We require the transportation of 250 m3 of crude oil to London, scheduled for July 25th. Please inform us about the demurrage charge in case of a one-hour delay.

Kind regards,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Requirement of 250 m3 Crude Oil Transport by July 25th
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

Thank you for your email. Please confirm the following details so we can proceed:

- Port of loading: (Please provide the name)
- Quantity of crude oil to be sent: 250 m3
- Loading date: July 25th
- Port of discharge: London
- Demurrage charge for one-hour delay: (To be advised)

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.subject: Travel Time Estimation for Oil Transport from New York to London
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Based on the data provided, the distance from New York to London by water is approximately 4550 miles. If the vessel travels at a speed of 100 miles per day, it would typically require about 64 hours to reach London. Consequently, a delay of one hour would result in an arrival time of 65 hours.

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Arrangements and Payment for Sodium Chloride
email_chain.body:
Dear Valued Partner,

We are planning to ship 700MT of sodium chloride from Guangzhou to Kuching on 1st December. Could you please confirm if you handle port dues under FOB terms, and if you accept payment via telegraphic transfers?

Kind regards,
Faizal

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Arrangements and Payment for Sodium Chloride
email_chain.body:
Dear Faizal,

Thank you for reaching out. We do handle port dues under FOB terms and accept payment through telegraphic transfers. Could you provide the date you would like the invoice to be issued to ensure timely settlement?

Best regards,
[Partner's Name]

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Arrangements and Payment for Sodium Chloride
email_chain.body:
Dear Partner,

Thanks for your quick response. We will advise on the date of the invoice issuance once we receive the necessary shipment documents, which are expected to be issued this week.

Kind regards,
Faizal

email_chain.subject: Further Details Required on Port Dues and Payment Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Partner,

I would like to confirm the specific terms of your offer regarding our upcoming shipment. Specifically, we need to know:
(i) The value of port dues
(ii) Payment methods available (Telegraphic transfer or ACH)
(iii) The exact time of issuance for the port dues invoice
Please advise.

Thank you,
Faizal

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Awaiting Confirmation on Port Dues Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Partner,

We would greatly appreciate your prompt response as we need to make a decision on whether to instruct you to manage the port dues. Thank you.

Kind regards,
Faizal

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Details Required on Port Dues and Payment Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Faizal,

Thank you for your inquiries. We will compile the required details and get back to you with a comprehensive proposal shortly.

Best regards,
[Partner's Name]

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on MS Mangrovia ETA & Laycan Window
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Vargas, I'm following up regarding the ETA for MS Mangrovia and if there has been an update on the laycan window. I understand there is an issue with a Cargotec crane in Busan. Could this impact the schedule for the Mangrovia? If it doesn't, I need to know the chartering activity date for this ship to proceed with FCL for the cargo and hire the charterer's agency. Thanks for your help. Regards, Letitia

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on MS Mangrovia ETA & Laycan Window
email_chain.body: Dear Letitia, Thanks for your follow-up. The laycan window is set for June 30th, coinciding with the vessel MVB. Unfortunately, the problems are present at multiple ports including Ubon Ratchathani, Muang district Chiang Rai, and Busan. Expected dates at Busan and Yangon are July 10th along with repositioning fees due to the charterer. The vessel is sub-chartered to another party. Yours sincerely, Yupaporn

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on MS Mangrovia ETA & Laycan Window
email_chain.body: Thanks for your quick response, Yupaporn. When can we expect the sailaway? The chartering date is today, and it seems there won't be any issue regarding the potential charterer. Please let me know so I can inform the rest of the chartering team. Thanks again. Best, Letitia

email_chain.subject: Update on Sub-chartered Vessel Mangrovia Out of Singapore
email_chain.body: Dear Letitia, The sub-charterer has informed us that the vessel Mangrovia out of Singapore will face a delay. The first cargo delivery, initially scheduled on July 5th, will be postponed until the sailaway is assured. I hope you understand the situation. Yours sincerely, Pong

email_chain.subject: Taka Loading Impact Due to Updated Laycan Window
email_chain.body: I noticed that Chong of ABC Brokerage has emailed his updated laycan window, and his vessel is now ahead of yours. Does this affect your plans concerning the charterer? Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Shipping Enquiry for Silicon Cargo from Pipavav to Southampton
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Robinson,

We have recently shipped 1,000MT of mercury from Singapore to Bahrain on the 'Magellan'. I would now like to inquire if you can arrange the shipment of 12,000MT of silicon from Pipavav to Southampton aboard the 'Fitzroy'. Please let us know your availability.

Kind regards,
Kirsten

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Enquiry for Silicon Cargo from Pipavav to Southampton
email_chain.body:
Dear Kirsten,

Thank you for your request. We will be engaged with operations in Singapore until July 15th, followed by a scheduled stop in Dili before reaching Pipavav. Would it be possible to schedule your shipment for a later date?

Best wishes,
Sue

email_chain.subject: Possible New Order from Mombasa
email_chain.body:
Dear Sue,

We have redirected our earlier consignment to Makassar. Could we possibly arrange a new shipment from Mombasa later this season? Let us know your availability.

Kind regards,
Stewart

email_chain.subject: Re: Possible New Order from Mombasa
email_chain.body:
Dear Stewart,

Acknowledging your email regarding the Mombasa shipment. Can you please confirm the cargo details? We would like to ensure our availability to support your needs.

Best,
Taniwe

labels.commodity: Silicon and Mercury initially, new order unspecified
labels.cargo_size: 12,000MT for Silicon, unspecified for subsequent order

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Kerosene Shipment
email_chain.body: Could you please check for availability and slots for transporting 7,100MT of kerosene from Rotterdam to Las Palmas this coming Tuesday, 15 September? Many thanks, Chris

email_chain.subject: Request Update: LPG Cargoes
email_chain.body: Dear Chris, I've updated your cargo request to 2 x 10,000 mt of LPG (Ethane / Propane) from Bayonne or the Western Mediterranean to the Mediterranean-Mediterranean route for April / May. Please confirm the updated details and let us know the vessel availability. Thanks, Regards, Navtej

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Export Options
email_chain.body: Chris, Thank you for your inquiry. Regarding LNG Export Options: 1. Unfortunately, there are currently no charters available for immediate action. However, we do have one refueling LNG carrier registered at Lloyds with Korean Register, NOTB, YB, ICE Class that has a capacity of 400,000 cbm, 550 TEU (20 feet), and a draft of 11.2 meters. 2. For your charter inquiry between Houston and Suez from 15 December to 15 January 2008, please further inquire on both public and private market options. 3. Regarding the barge filling scheduled for tomorrow, the client requested to shift the start to Wednesday, 16th with an expectation to achieve a full barge by Thursday morning, 18th of October. I'm reviewing both scenarios to provide the best recommendation for the client. Regards.

labels.load_port: Rotterdam, Bayonne, or Western Mediterranean, Houston
labels.vessel: LNG Carrier of Lloyds - Korean Register, NOTB, YB, ICE Class

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Suitability and Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Rose, We are looking to ship 11,000MT of thermal coal from Taiwan to Huizhou next month. Could you please confirm if your vessel is available for this route? Additionally, could you provide your best freight quote for the same? Regards, Jun

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Offer Received
email_chain.body: Hi Jun, We have received your invoice related to our recent transaction. Thank you for your continued support. Best regards, Kelvin

email_chain.subject: Offer for Thermal Coal Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Kelvin, We have an opportunity for a shipment of 27,000 mt of thermal coal from Indonesia to Shekou, targeted for late May. We encourage you to visit our loading port in Kalimantan to inspect our facilities and discuss further details. Our minimum shipment amount is set at 27,000 mt. Warm regards, Vincent

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Thermal Coal Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Vincent, Can we discuss the possibility of arranging a 27,000 mt shipment of 30,000 kcal thermal coal from Indonesia to Shekou, using Kalimantan as the loading port? Looking forward to your feedback. Best regards, Kelvin

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipment Possibility Today
email_chain.body: Hi Kelvin, There's a high likelihood that we can manage to complete the shipment today thanks to advantageous timing. Please note, there might be an addition of 4 more containers. Let me know your thoughts. Regards, Vincent

email_chain.subject: Parcel delivery from Norway
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Matthews,
A client in Luton sent a parcel from the USA that we have delivered today to Norway. They're inquiring about its status; please update them accordingly. Could you reply to this email with their next steps? Thank you!
Best regards,
Wren

email_chain.subject: RE: Parcel delivery from Norway
email_chain.body:
Hello,
Thank you for your quick reply. We're still a bit confused as to how our package ended up in Norway, but at least we now know where it is. Please let us know the next steps. We should be able to collect it as soon as possible.
Sincerely,
Joe Parr

email_chain.subject: Re: Parcel delivery from Norway
email_chain.body:
Hello,
We have just received a message from our client in the US about their parcel in Norway. Although we received it today, we would also appreciate your advice on the origin of the package and further steps.
Best regards,
Iain Mitchell
Business Unit Manager
Brownblazes & Smith
CC: Ceris Adams <Ceris@blazesbrownsmith.co.uk>, Malcolm Williams <Malcolm@blazesbrownsmith.co.uk>

email_chain.subject: **SECURITY WARNING**
email_chain.body: This message was flagged as it originated from an unfamiliar sender through Rapid Mailer (Mandrill). The sender's profile appears to be empty. However, it did provide a tracking number for an item reportedly sent from the USA. Consequently, this automated message has been generated. The attachments contain several files which appear to be non-executable; potentially containing user data.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Voyage SMMACV2749 Capacity and Charter Party
email_chain.body:
Hello Farid,

I would like to inquire about the possibility of shipping 2,700MT of ammonium sulfate from Damietta to Koper next week. Could you confirm if you have the capacity available and if we can finalize a charter party with minimal laycan buffer? Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Karen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Voyage SMMACV2749 Capacity and Charter Party
email_chain.body:
Dear Karen,

Thank you for reaching out. As of now, we have not yet received a formal proposal from your end regarding this voyage, even though we have provided our best available charter party terms previously. Could you please send your detailed proposal so we may proceed accordingly?

Best regards,
Farid

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Proposal Submission for Ammonium Sulfate Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Karen,

As a reminder, please send your proposal as soon as possible. We are aiming to proceed with the loading of the cargo next week. Although we do not have the exact date for the vessel yet, the schedule will be confirmed by Monday.

Regards,
Farid

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Proposal Needed for Ammonium Sulfate Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Lisa,

I appreciate your assistance in coordinating this deal. Please facilitate the sending of a proposal for 2,700 MT of Ammonium Sulfate from Damietta to Koper. We need to finalize the terms as we have already extended our best charter party for this voyage.

Best regards,
Farid

email_chain.subject: Re: Reminder: Proposal Submission for Ammonium Sulfate Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your patience, Farid.

Regarding the charter party from Damietta to Koper, I see that the rate is significantly lower compared to the route from Rotterdam to Damietta. Given that the owner's offer only extends until next week and does not cover the entire laycan, I am unable to amend the current terms on the charter party. Please advise on how we might move forward.

Best regards,
Karen

email_chain.subject: Re: Market Update and Proposal Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Karen,

Thank you for your reply. Unfortunately, the market for ammonium sulfate has declined further, which contrasts with the rise in ammonium nitrate prices. This may impact our negotiations. Please let us know your thoughts on adjusting the proposal accordingly.

Best regards,
Farid

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Naphtha Shipments
email_chain.body: Hey Rahul, I'd like to check on some shipdates for this month. Could you send me some details on 1,200MT of naphtha loading from Cochin to Vizag? Thank you, Nicholas

email_chain.subject: Offer for Dry Bulk Capacity
email_chain.body: Hello, I'm looking to charter in some dry bulk capacity. Could you please send me an offer. Thanks,

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Bio-Ethanol Products
email_chain.body: Dear, It's been a while since I last sent an enquiry for your company, so I thought I'd follow up. If you could send me some information regarding your bio-ethanol products I would appreciate it. Regards,

email_chain.subject: Crude Oil Cargo Offer
email_chain.body: Hello, I would like to contact you regarding a Cargo of Crude Oil, 1 million barrels, for m/v Taurus King, discharge spot November/ December 2019. Taurus Tankers is a Ship Manager owning approximately 15 chemical and product tankers between 15000 DWT and 50000 DWT. Thanks and Best Regards

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Rate and Laytime Negotiation for Ethanol Transport
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Ms. Navarro,

We require a tanker to carry 4,000MT of ethanol from Santos to New York. Could you please provide your best freight rate? Additionally, is it possible to negotiate the laytime beyond the standard 72 hours?

Warm regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Query Regarding Potential Merger with Broker Inc
email_chain.body:
Hi Rob,

I've heard rumors about potential merger discussions between your company and Broker Inc. Can you confirm if this is true?

Thanks,
Jorge

email_chain.subject: Catch Up and Coffee?
email_chain.body:
Dear Mary,

How are you? Do you still enjoy coffee? I love the roasts from WBC. Also, are you still fond of wild berries? It would be lovely to catch up over a drink sometime. How is your wedding planning going?

Best,
Carmen

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi, we’re seeking a vessel with a capacity of 14,000DWT for a bulk cement cargo. The port of loading is Quezon and the discharge port is Sabang, aiming for departure within the next week. Please let us know if you have any suitable vessel available or if you would like to discuss the details of a potential charter fixture.
Kind regards,
Graham

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Graham, please provide updates on new fixtures every Monday starting today until the end of the month. I will also forward the same request the last Friday of this month.
Regards,
Rafael

email_chain.subject: Coal Transportation Requirement
email_chain.body:
Hi, we have 28,000DWT of coal that needs to be delivered to Puerto San Martin by 13 May.
Regards,
S

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Bulk Carrier Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi, we are in the market for a 40,000DWT bulk carrier. Please let us know about available options for the last week of April and the first week of May.
Best regards,
Kevin

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Additional Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi, we are now looking for a 30,000DWT vessel to load bulk fertilizer at Beira, Mozambique between 24 and 26 April. The discharge will take place in Abu Dhabi in mid-May. Please let me know if you have any suitable vessels available.
Kind regards,
Graham

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Lumber Shipment from East Coast to Europe
email_chain.body: Dear Boris, How would you like to handle a bulk cargo of lumber from the East Coast to Europe? Looking forward to your prompt reply. Regards, Fernando

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Proposal for Lumber Shipment from East Coast to Europe
email_chain.body: Hi Marius, Please see the forwarded message below from Fernando regarding an East Coast shipment. Since this isn't my area, could you handle this inquiry? Thanks, Boris

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Lumber Shipment from East Coast to Europe
email_chain.body: Hi Fernando, Thank you for reaching out. Unfortunately, I do not handle East Coast shipments currently. Please contact my colleague, julia@globalshipping.com, who specializes in that market. Regards, Marius

email_chain.subject: West Coast Lumber Shipments
email_chain.body: Hi Fernando, Sorry for my earlier reply, but I noticed a mistake. Are you actually looking for shipments from the West Coast? We are the exclusive transporter for West Coast lumber. Let me know if you need any details or assistance. Regards, Marius

email_chain.subject: Re: West Coast Lumber Shipments
email_chain.body: Dear Marius, That's excellent to hear, as I actually need a transporter for West Coast shipments. Can you provide more specifics regarding your services? Thanks, Fernando

email_chain.subject: Shipping Enquiry for o-Phenanthroline
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Malik,

How do you feel about scheduling a shipment of 10,000MT of o-phenanthroline from Ras Al-Khaimah to Richards Bay on the 9th of May? Are there any additional port charges we should be aware of?

Sincerely,
Danny

email_chain.subject: RE: Meeting with the CEO
email_chain.body:
Hi Mike,

I'm going to take a break this afternoon, so please stop in to see me then. You can run anything by me at that time.

Regards,
Virginia Cheung

email_chain.subject: Follow Up: Meeting with the CEO
email_chain.body:
Dear Mike,

Following our earlier discussion, remember you can stop by to see me during my break this afternoon to discuss any issues. Please do not hesitate to bring any files or documents you need my advice on.

Best,
Virginia Cheung

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Slots and Demurrage Rates
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Rivera,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to check if there are any available laycan slots in the first week of July for shipping 9,500MT of crude palm oil from Medan to Manila. Additionally, could you please inform me about the daily demurrage rates you are proposing?

Best regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Slots and Demurrage Rates
email_chain.body:
Hello Tom,

Great connecting with you. I run a trading business with partners across global markets including Houston, Rio de Janeiro, Shanghai, Dubai, and many others.

Could you elaborate on how palm oil fits as a value proposition in your business? Specifically, are there port-related opportunities you are exploring?

Looking forward to our discussion.
Cheers,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Slots and Demurrage Rates
email_chain.body:
Hi Adam,

Thanks for your email. Regarding your question on palm oil, are you asking about market trends or specific data like price and production figures? If you need detailed reports or articles, please let me know so I can provide relevant information.

Best,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Slots and Demurrage Rates
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

Apologies for the delayed response; it's been a busy period. I’ve discussed with our partners, and I can confirm that we have slots available in the first week of July. Concerning the demurrage, our rate stands at $25,000 per day.

Please let me know if you need further details or if you want to proceed with booking.

Regards,
Mr. Rivera

email_chain.subject: LDPE Shipment Inquiry from Rome to Tangier
email_chain.body: Could you provide details and feasibility to ship 50 metric tons of LDPE from Rome to Tangier next week? We prefer using the vessel Davy J for this route.

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability at Point Pelle
email_chain.body: It seems our usual service vessel at Point Pelle might be occupied. We are evaluating other ports such as UK and UK/Antwerp for availability starting from three weeks from now.

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Flour and Chutney
email_chain.body: We offer Flour and Chutney with prices beginning at US$ 140 plus freight, covering additional costs up to 40 cents per unit. The price may extend up to 180 cents per unit depending on backland services and other logistics.

email_chain.subject: Brain Synthesis Inquiry
email_chain.body: Our team is exploring the feasibility of reverse engineering a fully functional organic brain on a micro scale. Given that we understand the basic process of how light triggers neural pathway functions in the eye, could we synthesize the essential components required to replicate this process organically?

email_chain.subject: Request for Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body: Greetings, I request information concerning your demurrage rates from 02/02/2015 to 08/02/2015 for our vessel navigating near the Suez Canal area. The vessel specifics are as follows: Vessel Draft: 15.5 meters; Arrival Port: Bandar Mahshahr (400 km from Tehran with navigation clearance); Approximate Arrival Time: Friday, 06/02/2015. Kind regards.

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body: Good morning, Thank you for your inquiry dated 19th February 2015 regarding demurrage rates for our vessels at Bandar Abbas. For clarification, the information you requested was for Bandar Mahshahr. Details as follows: Date of Arrival: 08/02/2015; Position of Vessel: Offshore of Bandar Mahshahr, waiting for tug; Type of Vessel: 105,000 DWT, Crude Oil Tanker; Draft of Vessel: 15.50 meters. Please note that our rates apply when a vessel is delayed while awaiting services such as tugboats. Regards.

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body: Thank you for your response. With reference to your email dated 23/02/2015, I would like to add that we are concerned about potential delays and the quality of service. As per the Authority of Iran Ministry of Maritime & Ports letter No X dated 23/02/2015, local service providers such as KOTTE are responsible for maintaining service quality as per international standards, especially for handling vessels like ours with a draft of 15.50 meters and 105,000 DWT. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body: We acknowledge your concerns outlined in your email and the referenced letter from the Ministry of Maritime & Ports. Rest assured, KOTTE is responsible for upholding contract obligations for navigational services and the standards thereof. This includes handling of vessels up to 120,000 MT+ deadweight. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Oil Product Shipment Delivery Costs
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Yim,

We have a shipment of 7,000MT of oil products that is scheduled to arrive in Vancouver on the 8th. We’d like to get a price for delivery to the port, and a second price for transporting the oil to some tanks near the dock.

Thank you,
Kevin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Oil Product Shipment Delivery Costs
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Kevin,

I’m responding to your email regarding the logistics of your upcoming shipment. We would be happy to assist with your project, and here is our proposal for your review.

Product: Oil Products
The cost to deliver this product to the port will be $XXXX. The cost to transport to some tanks near the dock will be $YYYY.

Thank you,
Ms. Yim

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Oil Product Shipment Delivery Costs - Request for Total Cost
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Ms. Yim,

Thank you for your proposal; it looks good. Can you provide me with a separate quote for the total cost combining both services? I’ll need to consolidate this into a proposal for my customer.

Thank you,
Kevin

email_chain.subject: Query about EVA Resin Shipment from India to Turkey
email_chain.body: Hey Nick, We’re trying to move 8,000MT of EVA resin from India to Turkey. Would you have the space? What’s your freight rate? Best, Andreas

email_chain.subject: Re: Query about EVA Resin Shipment from India to Turkey
email_chain.body: Hi Andreas, Unfortunately, we don't have the space for 8,000MT to Turkey at the moment. However, we can accommodate 15,000MT to Taiwan if that's an option for you. As for the freight rate, it would be approximately $10.5 per MT. Best regards, Nick

email_chain.subject: Re: Query about EVA Resin Shipment from India to Turkey
email_chain.body: Hi Nick, That's interesting news. There's a twist though - the customer in Turkey and the customer in Taiwan are from the same company but different offices. I'm concerned they might not need 15,000MT in total. Could there by any risk of order cancellation? Regards, Andreas

email_chain.subject: Shipment Division between Turkey and Taiwan Offices
email_chain.body: Nick, I've discussed with my customer, and it turns out that each office operates independently with a limit of 10,000MT. We need to split the shipment between the two offices. Can we accommodate this? Also, for such a volume split, could we negotiate a better freight rate? Thanks, Andreas.

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Division between Turkey and Taiwan Offices
email_chain.body: Hi Andreas, Splitting the shipment and adjusting the freight rate should be feasible. Could you confirm the specific quantities for each office so we can finalize the details? Regards, Nick

email_chain.subject: Confirmation on Split Quantities and Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Nick, Thanks for the update. We'll proceed with 7,000MT to Taiwan and 6,000MT to Turkey, based on each office's capacity. Could you confirm if $10.5 per MT is achievable? Also, please provide the names of the ports we will be using. Best, Andreas

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment from Yokohama to Perth
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Suleman,

Can you arrange the shipment of 2,800 metric tons of bulk water from Yokohama to Perth? We intend to pay by banker’s draft upon delivery. Please confirm the inclusion of the necessary legal agreements in the contract.

Thanks in advance,
Lorena

email_chain.subject: Legal Agreement Inclusion in Contract
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I have asked Mr. Suleman to include the requisite legal agreement in our contract for the water shipment. Please ensure we receive the same level of service as our previous consignments, and confirm the cargo will be delivered to Brisbane instead of Perth on the specified date.

Best,
Lorena

email_chain.subject: Re: Legal Agreement Inclusion in Contract
email_chain.body:
Hi Lorena,

Thank you for your email. I have added the legal agreement to the contract as per your request. I will make sure the shipment is scheduled to be delivered to Brisbane on the agreed date.

Best regards,
[Colleague's Name]

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Ethylene Dichloride Transportation Urgency
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Sardesai,

We are looking for a vessel to transport 2,000MT of ethylene dichloride from Karasburg to Salalah. Given our tight deadline, I wanted to check if you would be able to accommodate this request, or should we consider other options?

Yours truly,
Karen Klein

email_chain.subject: Re: Ethylene Dichloride Transportation Urgency
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Klein,

Unfortunately, our vessel suited for your specified cargo will not be ready until the 10th of next month as it is currently undergoing repairs which were last completed on the 1st of March. We can reschedule for the 12th of the next month, however, we would need your confirmation by the 7th of next month to proceed.

Yours truly,
Krishna Sardesai

email_chain.subject: Re: Ethylene Dichloride Transportation Urgency
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Sardesai,

Thank you for the swift response. Unfortunately, given our tight deadlines, we cannot afford any delay beyond our originally planned schedule. Please inform us immediately once your vessel is available before March.

Best regards,
Karen Klein

email_chain.subject: Request for Information on Recent Shipments from La Cruz to Tacna

email_chain.subject: Additional Information: Loads from La Cruz to Tacna

Matthew,

email_chain.subject: Final Clarification

Just to confirm, the last load details finalized out of South America to the US are as mentioned in the previous emails. If you need more specific information or further details, please let me know.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipment from Antwerp to Liverpool
email_chain.body: Hello, I hope you're doing well. We have a shipment of 5,000 MT base chemicals needing transportation from Antwerp to Liverpool. Can your vessel accommodate this for a mid-April laycan? What would the cost be? Kind regards, Lorena

email_chain.subject: Offer of Fertilizer NPK20-20-20
email_chain.body: We are offering our Fertilizer NPK20-20-20 suitable for various ships originating from any country. If interested, please contact us for information on prices and capacity. Let's discuss potential business opportunities together.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Fertilizer NPK20-20-20
email_chain.body: Hello, I'm seeking Fertilizer NPK20-20-20 for a requirement of approximately 1,000MT. Are you able to supply this amount?

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Fertilizer Supply
email_chain.body: We can arrange a shipment of 1,000MT fertilizer for a China-based transaction. Please let us know your CIF price and port of destination if you're interested. Thank you, Forwarder Fertilizer Unit 13, Wigan Business Centre Westleigh Industrial Estate, Standish Wigan, Lancashire, WN6 0XB T: 01942 253998

email_chain.subject: Further Details on Fertilizer Proposal

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice for Fertilizer 1,000MT
email_chain.body: Attached is our Proforma invoice for the 1,000MT of fertilizer. Please confirm if all details are correct before we proceed. Kindest Regards, Forwarder Fertilizer

email_chain.subject: Finalizing Fertilizer Purchase
email_chain.body: Hi, we are closely working to finalize the deal for serious buyers interested in the fertilizer granule. We will wait to hear from you. Regards.

email_chain.subject: Shipping 400MT of Seafood from Surabaya to Qingdao in July
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Lee,

We are looking to ship 400MT of seafood from Surabaya to Qingdao in July. Could you accommodate a mid-July laycan, and what is your detention and demurrage clause?

Thank you,
Maya

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping 400MT of Seafood from Surabaya to Qingdao in July
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Maya,

Thank you for your email. Please see our proposal for your shipment as follows:
1. We can offer the M/V MISC 'DECCAN STAR' for your cargo.
2. Estimated laycan is set between 25th - 27th July, 2013.
3. The loading port is Qingdao, and unloading port is Qingdao.
4. Loading is scheduled from 16th - 19th July, 2013.
5. The vessel type is Reefer, with a 8,000 CW capacity.
6. FIO/TFO terms will be applied.
7. Available refrigerated space totals 13,380 cubic meters.
8. We have 20 x 40' refrigerated containers, totaling 800 cubic meters of space.

Best regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Invoice for Shipment of Seafood - Surabaya to Qingdao

Thanks and best regards,
Frank

Maya,

Could you please reconfirm the Bill of Lading as below for your reference:

- Consignee: Qingdao China - 400 MT

Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment from Surabaya to Qingdao

Thanks very much for all the details.

We will confirm our rates and get back to you promptly.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Request for Loading 4,000MT of Corn Oil
email_chain.body: Hello Jane, Can your vessel accommodate loading 4,000MT of corn oil from Galveston to Qingdao by the end of May? We are looking for an LC/TC with a 15-day expiry. Best regards, Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Loading 4,000MT of Corn Oil
email_chain.body: Hi Chris, our vessel arrived in Qingdao on 16 May and is prepared for discharge. However, we can't initiate unloading before 19 May. Please send an amended voyage estimate to our agent to expedite approval. Looking forward to your swift response. Best, Jane

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Vessel’s Idle Time at Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi Jane, Please provide the contact information for your appointed agent in Qingdao. Also, the prospect of the vessel being idle until 19 May is unfeasible for us. If discharging cannot commence before 18 May, we will need to explore other options. Thank you, Chris

email_chain.subject: Agent Information and Discharge Date
email_chain.body: Dear Chris, We've appointed JPT International as our agent in Qingdao. Their contact details are: Address: Block A, Room 802, No.10 DongHaiNan Road, Qingdao, P.R.China. Phone: 86-532-80780378/80780379. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Concerns Regarding Delays and Demurrage
email_chain.body: Dear Chris, We are concerned about potential delays in loading in Galveston. Please ensure the charterer completes loading before the vessel's arrival in Qingdao to avoid demurrage charges. According to our contract, your charterer is also responsible for costs related to shifting between berths. Attached is a copy of the voyage estimate for your reference. Best regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Loading Schedule Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Jane, Please note that the vessel will conduct loading of light and mid oil products in Galveston from 13 May to 16 May. A 10% variance is accounted for by 15P/15S if required. We strive to comply with the schedule as planned. Regards, Chris

email_chain.subject: Potential Buyers for Rice Shipments to Africa
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr.Kim,
I was informed about potential buyers interested in your rice shipments to Africa. I have excellent connections with Brazilian rice exporters and can compile some competitive pricing for you. Please let me know if you have other requirements as well. Looking forward to your response.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Potential Buyers for Rice Shipments to Africa
email_chain.body:
Hi John,
Thanks for your message. I would be interested in exploring this further. Could you arrange a meeting to discuss the details with your contacts? Please let me know a suitable time.
Best regards,
Yusang Kim

email_chain.subject: Details on the Rice Shipment Transaction
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Hong,
I am glad to hear that you want to work with me. Here are the details of what needs to be done:
- Please go to the bank and secure the credits as soon as possible, about US $13.5 million.
- We will need approximately 5 containers of rice in three shipments from one Brazilian company.
- I understand this can't be finalized all at once; initially, we need at least US $1.5 million within a week. This process will be repeated with larger amounts subsequently.
- Kindly send me the pricing information before proceeding to the bank.
Your prompt handling of these tasks will be appreciated.
Best regards,
Yusang Kim

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Cargo Shipment from Kaohsiung to Yantian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Cargo Shipment from Kaohsiung to Yantian
email_chain.body:
Dear Mabel,

- Capacity:
- Expected Time of Arrival:

We will prepare to issue the Letter of Intent upon confirmation.

Sanjiv

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Ship Details

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed on Ship Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Emsie,
