- Ship Name: JIN HAI JIA NO.3
- DWT: 7,763
- ETA: 27th June

The capacity to transport 850MT each week is approved.

Regards,
Sanjiv

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Isopropanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Jonas,

Please provide a rate estimate for 4,800 MT of isopropanol from Houston to Cartagena. We aim to start production as soon as possible. Could you also provide information on cargo insurance under DAP terms?

Regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Additional Details on Isopropanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Jonas,

I'm following up on my previous email regarding the 4,800 MT of isopropanol shipment. For your information, the shipment comprises 3x20' containers and 2x40' containers, totaling 96 TEUs.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request for Isopropanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your inquiry. I'm pleased to provide you with a preliminary quote for your shipment. Please note that a 25% deposit is required to secure the space. Upon confirmation, we will furnish detailed instructions for payment through your local bank, including information on cargo insurance and bill of lading particulars. Once the insurance setup is complete and the deposit received, we will initiate the shipment process and keep you updated.

Best regards,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment Availability from Australia to Bangkok
email_chain.body:
We are in need of arranging a shipment for 4,000 metric tonnes of wheat flour from Australia to Bangkok. Could you please inform us of your next available shipping position? Our chartering manager will subsequently get in touch to finalize the arrangements. Looking forward to a fruitful collaboration.

Sincerely,
Patrick Mitchell
Technical Coordinator

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipment Availability from Australia to Bangkok
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your inquiry. We currently manage the cargo WS562, which will soon arrive in Australia. After unloading, the vessel is scheduled to head to London. If this aligns with your timing, we would be pleased to discuss further possibilities.

Sincerely,
Zane Griffin
Assistant to Sales

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed for Wheat Flour Shipment to Bangkok
email_chain.body:
I understand you're planning to ship 4,000mt of wheat flour from Australia to Bangkok. Could you please provide details about your required vessel draft and any other specific chartering requirements? This will assist us in better matching a vessel to your needs.

Sincerely,
Ray Mendoza
Chartering Manager

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Shipment Requirements
email_chain.body:
It would be our pleasure to serve your transportation needs. As we progress in finalizing the shipping arrangements, could you kindly provide us with more detailed information regarding your chartering specifications, including the berthing draft?

Sincerely,
Zane Griffin

email_chain.subject: Change in Point of Contact and Meeting Request
email_chain.body: Dear friend, Please note that Dr. Alexander will leave our brokering firm at the end of the month. In light of this, I will take over our ongoing contract. I would be happy to discuss this transition and any other pertinent matters with you. Do you have any availability early next week? Many thanks in advance and best regards, Angela

email_chain.subject: Regarding Future Collaboration
email_chain.body: Hi Angela, Thank you for your prompt response. We recently arranged a meeting with Patrick Winkelmayer, who has shown great interest in our portfolio in the past. I am interested in understanding his plans for future collaborations. Patrick recently sent me an email which I believe could be beneficial for our discussion. Best regards, Felicia

email_chain.subject: Feedback on Proposal
email_chain.body: Dear Patrick, I received the proposal from Paul Spangler's firm. As discussed, please find my comments below. 1) I propose reducing the number of projects we aim to broker initially. It’s not a reflection on your capabilities but a strategic decision to assess our partnership with a focus on the deal with the American electronics firm, which is our top priority. 2) Regarding the electronics deal, I recommend advancing the timeline. This adjustment reflects the urgency due to American firms seeking collaborations with British businesses, likely due to competitive tax rates. 3) Concerning the rate you quoted for the electronics firm, adjustments might be necessary. Best, Felicia

email_chain.subject: Decision on Electronics Firm Deal
email_chain.body: Dear Felicia, I regret to inform you that we will not be able to proceed with the electronics firm deal. Certain aspects of the negotiations exceed the current scope of consideration by the company. It was a pleasure working with you. Sincerely, Patrick

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Bauxite Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Brown,

We have a load of Bauxite coming out of Port Beni, Peru, approximately 40,000MT, FOB. Please advise your best freight estimate.

Sincerely,
John Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Bauxite Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I’m assuming you're with Sigi Sanaa Shipping Corp. If that is correct, your freight rates are as follows:
HK: USD 2.20/MT
TZ: USD 3.40/MT
SK: USD 1.10/MT
CW: USD 2.00/MT
RH: USD 0.90/MT
JO: USD 1.90/MT

As per Custom clearance, cargo will be delivered at Sidong Railway/Terminal. Freight and railway charges depend on load and transportation and will be included at spot rate, subject to railway cooperation and availability of wagons, which cannot be guaranteed until we receive your loading instructions.

This is a freight estimate; let me know if you want an FOB to CIF estimate. For cargo destined for...

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Acceptance and Additional Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Roger,

Thank you for your email. I agree to your prices at USD 3.40/MT only for TZ. I was wondering if you will charge an extra amount to include another 11,600 MT of the same Bauxite to our freight. Also, we have another similar shipment with the same rate as above to FRSA, Hook with FOB of May 29th, 2006. Please advise.

Sincerely,
John Paul

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Inquiry for 25,000MT Bauxite Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Brown,

We are a union of buyers, can you provide your best freight estimate for a shipment of 25,000MT Bauxite FOB originating from Hong Kong for delivery at the end of April 2006, destination TZ?

Sincerely,
Myra

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Inquiry for 25,000MT Bauxite Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Myra,

You're with Agri-Tech, correct? All charges are FOB, origin is Hong Kong. Here's my estimate for HK: USD 2.20/MT, and for TZ: USD 3.40/MT.

Please let me know the best way to remit payment to our bank.

Sincerely,
Roger Brown

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rates
email_chain.body: Jitendra, We’re interested in shipping 6,000MT of oilseed cake from Kandla to Durban in July or August. Could you provide us with some shipping rates by the end of this week? Thanks, Vivian

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rates
email_chain.body: Vivian, I can offer a competitive price for shipping 1,000MT of oilseed cake from Mumbai to South Africa instead. Regards, Jitendra Singh

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Cargo Content
email_chain.body: Jitendra, You have mentioned shipping 1,000MT oilseed cake from Mumbai, but we need 6,000MT from Kandla, and it should only include oilseed cake, not oil. Can this be arranged? Please advise. Vivian

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed on Cargo Content
email_chain.body: Vivian, I have adjusted the booking to meet your requirements: The shipment will indeed include only 6,000MT of oilseed cake from Kandla as you requested. The cargo is currently being loaded, so no worries. Regards, Jitendra Singh

email_chain.subject: Lack of Communication on Shipment Details
email_chain.body: Jitendra, I have not received any further details about the shipment since your last update. I previously provided my contact details for updates. Can you please continue to communicate any further progress or requirements with me? Regards, Vivian

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping Cost and Dispatch Time
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Young,

Can you tell me the cost to ship 300MT of fertilizer from Dalian to Nassau? Also, what is the typical dispatch time?

Thanks,
Hannah

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Cost and Dispatch Time
email_chain.body:
Dear Hannah,

It is approximately USD 100,000 for CIF terms from Dalian port. Our delivery time is usually about 30 days.

Please provide your full name for invoicing purposes.

Thank you,
Annie

email_chain.subject: Regarding: Quote Request Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear Annie,

Based on the details provided, I will ensure the team offers the best rate. Please could you provide me with your full name for the invoicing?

Thanks,
Molly

email_chain.subject: Updated Price List
email_chain.body:
Dear Hannah,

Please find the updated price list attached.

Thanks,
Molly

email_chain.subject: Clarification: Currency in Price List
email_chain.body:
Dear Molly,

Thank you for the price list. Could you confirm whether the prices listed are in RMB (Chinese Yuan) or USD (United States Dollar)?

Regards,
Hannah

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification: Currency in Price List
email_chain.body:
Dear Hannah,

The prices are in USD as it tends to be more stable compared to RMB.

Best regards,
Molly

email_chain.subject: Quote Inquiry: CIF instead of FOB Price?
email_chain.body:
Dear Molly,

Would it be possible for you to provide the CIF price instead of the FOB price? Also, which would you recommend as the better option for our needs?

Thanks,
Hannah

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Inquiry: CIF instead of FOB Price?
email_chain.body:
Dear Hannah,

It generally depends on your specific needs, but it's typically more comprehensive to opt for CIF prices. For further details on the differences between CIF and FOB terms, you may visit our guide here: http://www.costpacific.co/cif-vs-fob

Best regards,
Molly

email_chain.subject: Quote for Bulk Corn Starch Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Zara,

Glad to provide you with a quote for your bulk corn starch shipment from Bangkok to Haiphong.

Seafreight CFR Haiphong: $1081.25 /MT
Demurrage rate: $150.00 / day

Can you let me know your exact size, quality, Expected Time of Arrival (ETA), and type of packaging?

Looking forward to working with you,
Al

email_chain.subject: Advance Payment and Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Al,

Please provide your bank details so that I can transfer $15,000 as an advance payment. This amount resonates with my desire to honor my late mother's philanthropic legacy by ensuring our business commitments are met promptly.

Thank you,
Zara

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgment of Advance Payment
email_chain.body:
Dear Zara,

What a thoughtful gesture! I appreciate your desire to continue your mother's philanthropic work through your actions. Your advance payment of $15,000 is much appreciated and will be allocated towards the transportation costs of your shipment. Please be assured that your shipment will be handled with utmost care and delivered to you promptly and safely.

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to me. Looking forward to a long-lasting and fruitful business relationship with you.

Best regards,
Al

email_chain.subject: Change of Delivery Point and Updated Booking Number
email_chain.body:
Dear Al,

I would like to request a change in the delivery point of our shipment to Ho Chi Minh City instead of Haiphong. Additionally, the booking number for the shipment has been updated. Please let me know if this adjustment can be accommodated.

Thank you,
Zara

email_chain.subject: Challenges with Changing Delivery Point
email_chain.body:
Dear Zara,

We're having a hard time switching the delivery point. I've consulted with the shipping line, and the only solution they offered is to send the shipment back to Bangkok, so it can be re-routed correctly to Ho Chi Minh City. Unfortunately, this incurs a significantly high cost.

Please advise on how you would like to proceed.

Best regards,
Al

email_chain.subject: Update on Delivery Point Change
email_chain.body:
Dear Zara,

After further negotiations, the shipping line has agreed to make the necessary changes to the shipment so it can be directly delivered to Ho Chi Minh City instead of Haiphong. However, please be aware that the cost of this adjustment is still quite high. We need to discuss how to handle these additional costs.

Looking forward to your guidance.

Best regards,
Al

email_chain.subject: Request for Feedback before Your Vacation
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Are you free for a few words before you go on vacation? If you are, please confirm your availability via email or call us back at +1 612 239 5823.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Feedback before Your Vacation
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Thank you for reaching out. I am available on 2019-08-10 at 12:00 to discuss the project. Please feel free to call me then.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Discussion Scheduled
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for confirming your availability on 2019-08-10 at 12:00. I am looking forward to discussing your feedback and impressions on the project. We believe there might be room for improvements based on the preliminary insights.

Talk to you tomorrow,

Best regards

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up Meeting Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Can we schedule a follow-up discussion to talk about your progress on the project? How about 2019-09-15 at 14:00? Please confirm your availability.

Thanks!

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Discussion Timing
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Your feedback is crucial to us. Could you please confirm your availability to discuss further on 2019-10-11 at 12:00?

We appreciate your input tremendously.

Best regards

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Lack of Communication
email_chain.body:
Ms. Lindberg,

Please update us on the current situation as our representative has not received any replies from your end.

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Shipping 15,000 MT of Soybeans
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Lindberg,

We are ready to begin negotiations for the shipment of 15,000 MT of soybeans from Montreal to Rio de Janeiro. It appears that there has been no response on your part to our prior communications. Can we proceed with the details?

email_chain.body:

My client is interested in shipping 15,000 MT of soybeans from Montreal to Rio de Janeiro in April. Your earlier proposal was quite promising. Could we commence the process as soon as possible?

email_chain.subject: Ready to Conclude Negotiations for Shipping 15,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Naji,

Regards,
Ms. Lindberg

email_chain.subject: Offer to Sell Cheese- 10 Tons
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnathan,

I am reaching out to offer 10 tons of cheese currently available in our stock. Could you please let me know the best price you can offer for this quantity?

Thank you,

Henry Williams
Managing Director
John Foods Ltd.
Tel: 020-7283-9567

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer to Sell Cheese- 10 Tons
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Williams,

Thank you for your offer. We usually purchase cheese at a rate of €2.5 per kilo. Are you able to provide the 10 tons at this rate? Please let me know if this works for you or if there are any other conditions.

Best regards,

Johnathan
Johnstone Foods Ltd.
Tel: 020-7447-5128

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer to Sell Cheese- 10 Tons
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnathan,

Thank you for your prompt response. I can confirm our ability to supply the cheese at €2.5 per kilo for a minimum order of 10 tons. However, since this is a substantial quantity, could you possibly offer a better price?

Best regards,

Henry Williams
Managing Director
John Foods Ltd.
Tel: 020-7283-9567

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer to Sell Cheese- 10 Tons
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Williams,

We appreciate your willingness to work on this. Given the volume, let's finalize the price at €2.7 per kilo. Does this sound acceptable to you?

Kind regards,

Johnathan
Johnstone Foods Ltd.
Tel: 020-7447-5128

email_chain.subject: TENDER FOR 6000MT MALABO TO CAPE TOWN
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Li, We have a cargo of 6,000MT to be loaded in Malabo. It must be delivered in Cape Town by 11 May. Would your company be interested in tendering? Thanks, Kris

email_chain.subject: Re: TENDER FOR 6000MT MALABO TO CAPE TOWN
email_chain.body: Dear Kris, Thank you for your inquiry. Our rate for this shipment is USD 1,500. Looking forward to your reply. Regards, Ms. Li

email_chain.subject: Re: TENDER FOR 6000MT MALABO TO CAPE TOWN
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Li, The rate is acceptable to us. However, I need to confirm the estimated time of arrival as the transit time might be a concern for my customer. We are willing to pay more if you can guarantee an earlier delivery. Please advise. Thanks, Kris

email_chain.subject: Re: TENDER FOR 6000MT MALABO TO CAPE TOWN
email_chain.body: Dear Kris, Unfortunately, guaranteeing an earlier ETA is challenging. Our vessel has optimal speed, but if it arrives in ballast in Malabo, the earliest loading can begin is within 16 days. Please let us know how you would like to proceed. Regards, Ms. Li

email_chain.subject: Bulk Corn Shipment Inquiry

Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Bulk Corn Shipment Inquiry

Warmest regards,
Ir. Jackie Hain K.C.
Senior Executive, Commercial
P T Flourimor Catur Nusantara
Jl. Taman Bhakti III/37/3, RT.13, RW.07, Cikarang Permai, Bekasi, 17510, Indonesia
Tel. 62-21 8260 5750, Ext. 1017, 58

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Terms and Conditions

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Vessel Availability for Muriate of Potash
email_chain.body: Hi Davin, We're planning to ship 10,500 MT of Muriate of Potash from Los Angeles to Maizuru. Can you advise on your available laycan dates, and do you currently have any vessel available for this route? Thanks, Tamara

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Rates for Multiple Locations

email_chain.subject: Confirmation on Vessel Availability at Los Angeles
email_chain.body: Hi Davin, Following up to see if there is still an available vessel at Los Angeles for our discussed opportunity. Please confirm. Best, Tamara

email_chain.subject: Laycan Confirmation for Singapore Discharge

email_chain.subject: Business Cooperation Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Davin, It would be great to extend our business relations. Can you advise on your upcoming voyage plans? Warm regards, Tamara

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Availability
email_chain.body:
Hey Mark,

We’re sourcing a 6,000MT cargo of refined copper wire from the Bay of Bengal to Karachi. Please let me know when you’ll have an opening next month.

Many thanks,
Chloe

email_chain.subject: Service Overview Request
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Can you please send an overview of your service? I have a 6,000MT cargo of refined copper wire to load from the Bay of Bengal to Karachi on April 14th.

Kind Regards,
Claire

email_chain.subject: Chemical Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good day,

We are interested in moving 10 containers of chemicals from the Bay of Bengal to Karachi in early May.

Kind Regards,
Lesley

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your enquiry. Unfortunately, we are not running services on the Bay of Bengal route in the near future. We will keep you updated if this changes.

Best Wishes,

email_chain.subject: Cargo Movement Follow-Up
email_chain.body:
Hi Barbara,

As mentioned in our previous emails, we are looking to move a cargo of wood pallets from the Bay of Bengal to Karachi. The cargo size is 5,000MT. Please confirm the timing and any specific requirements.

Regards,
Chloe

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

We have 6,000MT of bitumen from IADC to Maputo. Could you share your available windows and dispatch incentives?

Best regards,
Harry

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Harry,

Hi, I apologize for any confusion but our trade limits only allow us to work with a small network that includes petroleum engineers strictly within our company hierarchy. As shared on our website, we are not agents of any refineries and hence, our trucks cannot transfer goods from other refineries.

Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
Jelena

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Jelena,

Good afternoon, I am sorry if there was any misunderstanding in our previous correspondence. I wanted to clarify that there is no other refinery involved besides IADC. The deal is strictly between IADC and us. The CIF price mentioned is specifically for Maputo.

Sincerely,
Harry

email_chain.subject: Clarification Regarding Bitumen Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Greetings and thank you for your clarification. I would like to inform you that we are not a refinery. We are an Oil Services Company, and the trucks belong to us. We have entered into a recent contract with the IADC refinery to ship 6,000MT of bitumen to Maputo and are interested to know if you have any buyers in this location.

Regards,
Jelena

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Shalini,

A client is requesting a suitable feeder in the 18,000MT to 25,000MT range to load refined sugar in Lagos and discharge in Kingston. The departure is scheduled for the 9th of January 2020. The client requires any vessel that can achieve a ballast speed of minimum 13 knots. I look forward to your feedback and thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best regards,
Nitin Singhal
Assistant Sales Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Singhal,

Best regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Dry Bulk Vessel Capacity
email_chain.body:

My client has requested an 11,000MT dry bulk vessel for loading at Bremer River and discharging at a Brazilian river. Please view the potential vessels via the links below:

- https://www.seasearcher.com/vessel/10676
We prefer vessels in excess of 1000MT DWT, and please note the correct spelling is 'GRANE' not 'GRANY'. Unfortunately, this current budget is constrained, hence we will not proceed with the vessel.

Best regards,
Nitin

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nishikawa,

I have an urgent shipment of 20,000MT of grey iron ore from Sorel-Tracy to Charleroi. Could you please update me on the current status of your vessel and confirm if you are able to depart immediately?

Regards,
Betsy

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nishikawa,

Following up on Betsy’s message, we are very eager to confirm the shipping details as soon as possible for the aforementioned iron ore shipment. Please let us know the readiness of your vessel.

Regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Urgent Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nishikawa,

I wanted to touch base once again to ensure the 20,000MT of grey iron ore is scheduled for transport from Sorel-Tracy to Charleroi. Your confirmation on the vessel status would be greatly appreciated as we need to finalize the logistics ASAP.

Regards,
Betsy

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Re: Urgent Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nishikawa,

To echo Betsy’s previous emails, could you provide us with an update at your earliest convenience? The urgency of this shipment dictates prompt action, so your immediate response would be highly valuable.

Regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Coffee Beans
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Kobayashi,

Could you handle the shipment of 3,100MT of coffee beans from Ho Chi Minh to Busan next week? Additionally, do you typically charge extra for reefer plugs?

Regards,
Gene

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for Coffee Beans
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email, Gene.

Before proceeding, could you please clarify the charge for a 50ft reefer container? We only ship one container per voyage and the cargo volume is approximately 3,100MT.

Please find the estimated shipping schedule below:
Origin: Ho Chi Minh
Destination: Busan
Departure Date: November 8, 2018
Arrival Date: November 13, 2018

Regards,
Mr. Kobayashi

email_chain.subject: Naphtha Shipment from Murmansk to Lisbon
email_chain.body:
Hello Tom,

As you have offered in your proposal, we would like your tankers to be available to transport 4,000MT of naphtha under the following terms: FOB from Murmansk (Russia) to Lisbon (Portugal). We need the ship to be at Murmansk by August 10th and to arrive in Lisbon by September 20th. Could you please confirm the laycan for this transaction? Let me know if you have any questions, and I will relay the details to my client.

Thanks,
Vivian

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Terms and Letter of Intent Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Tom,

If you can accept the terms outlined for the naphtha transport, please send me your letter of intent at your earliest convenience.

Thanks,
Vivian

email_chain.subject: Re: Naphtha Shipment from Murmansk to Lisbon
email_chain.body:
Hello Vivian,

I agree to the terms stated and will be available to sign the letter of intent on August 1st. Would you be interested in discussing this over lunch that day?

Thanks,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Laycan and Scheduling
Freight Estimate Request for Ethanol Cargo
email_chain.body: Good morning, Could you provide a freight estimate for 3,900MT of ethanol from Maceió to Houston in late August? Also, is laytime counted on arrival or upon NOR? Thanks for your help, Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Ethanol Cargo
email_chain.body: Hi Jane, Are you sure of your metric tonne (MT) readings? These readings seem to be off. It will likely be several months until the ethanol is completed being stored in the tanks. Could you check and let me know, please? Thanks, X

email_chain.subject: RE: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Ethanol Cargo
email_chain.body: I just looked up prices for ethanol in Houston from Singapore, Brazil, and Egypt. They are all pretty much the same, with a 3 USD difference. In July, Brazil was cheaper, now in August, Egypt is slightly cheaper. However, you know how quickly that could change. Now I know that I've tried everything and I will go back to requesting a quote for 1 USD delivered from Maceió and maybe try again later. Could you please provide the MT readings? I'm going to base my decision on them. I need this to estimate how much gas it will take for the sale to be profitable. Thank you for all your help. You are a great addition to the company.

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Ethanol Transport
email_chain.body: Hi Zoe, Could you estimate freight for 2,500MT from Maceió to Houston in late June/early July? Also, would you be willing to cover the 10% buyer's commission? Best, Aimee

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Naphtha Availability
email_chain.body: Hi Nancy, I'm currently at China Merchants Port Terminal. Could you please confirm if 9,000MT of naphtha is ready for loading from this berth? Looking forward to your swift response. Best regards, Brandon

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Naphtha Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Brandon, The vessel will be at the berth seven days earlier than planned, and no ships are currently at berth 305. We can proceed with the loading immediately. Can you confirm the vessel's name and estimated time of arrival (ETA)? Thanks, Nancy

email_chain.subject: Vessel Berthing Details
email_chain.body: Dear Brandon, Thank you for your message regarding the tender. The vessel has been in port since November 6, and the discharge operations commenced at Terminal 1. The loading is scheduled to start on November 7. Currently, there is only one vessel discharging at this terminal, which will continue until November 22. Please confirm the ETA of your vessel and verify if the berth will be available on the scheduled date. Regards, Tony

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about October Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Zoe,

We are interested in loading 7000MT of methanol from various sources. Can you confirm if an October laycan works for you, and could you provide the current market freight?

Regards,
Helder

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about October Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Helder,

Thank you for reaching out. Yes, an October laycan is feasible for us. I will need to check the latest freight rates in the current market and will update you shortly.

Best regards,
Zoe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about October Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Helder,

Following up on our earlier conversation, the current market freight for loading 7000MT of methanol in October is estimated to be around USD x per ton. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this or discuss further details.

Best regards,
Zoe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about October Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Zoe,

Thank you for the freight details. We are currently reviewing them and will confirm our booking details soon.

Regards,
Helder

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for Methanol Transport Mumbai to Nigg, Scotland
email_chain.body:
Dear Chartering Department,

I am exploring options for chartering a vessel to transport 9,000mt of Methanol from Mumbai to Nigg, Scotland. Could you please provide me with information on available slots for vessel charters in the middle of next month? Additionally, I require details on your current spot rate and BAF surcharges. 

Thank you,
Thomas

email_chain.subject: Request for Information on Methanol Shipping from Mumbai to Nigg
email_chain.body:
Dear Chartering Department,

I am similarly interested in chartering a vessel for transporting 9,000mt of Methanol from Mumbai to Nigg, Scotland, similar to a recent inquiry you may have received. Could you provide the details regarding available slots in the middle of next month, the current spot rate, and any applicable BAF surcharges? 

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vacuum Gasoil Cargo Delivery
email_chain.body: I’m sending an inquiry for 6,500MT of vacuum gasoil from Fujairah to Praia. Would you be willing to help us out and deliver this cargo around May 10, as we’re concerned about this product deteriorating on the water? Regards, Antonia

email_chain.subject: Correction of Cargo Quantity and Price Offer
email_chain.body: Please note the correction in the quantity. We need transportation for 2,500MT, not 6,500MT, from Fujairah to Praia. We aim to sail by May 5 and have the delivery around May 10. We can offer 15,000 USD/MT. Open to other origins if it is at the same price. Please feel free to propose. Regards, Antonia

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Required on Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body: Let me know if you're still interested in a cargo of vacuum gasoil to be delivered around May 10. We can offer 15,000 USD/MT, open to other origins if it matches the price. Regards

email_chain.subject: Additional Details Required
email_chain.body: Dear Antonia, Can you confirm the price range for this cargo? We need to finalize the details to proceed. Regards

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Sunflower Oil Shipment and Bunker Fuel Projections
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Sherman,

Can you help us with an offer for 5,500 MT of sunflower oil from Odessa to Shanghai? Additionally, what are your projections for the August supply of ship bunker fuel?

Warm regards,
Jorge

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Morales,

We are looking at shipping 4,700 MT of crude oil from Beira to Cape Town. Please quote for a tanker available after April 14th. Is it possible to load the cargo at Beira?

Best regards,
Margaret

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Morales,

This request for a quote, concerning 4,700 MT of crude oil from Beira to Cape Town, was previously communicated. Could you kindly provide the quote for the shipment?

Best regards,
Margaret

email_chain.subject: Review and Additional Information Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Morales,

I am considering your quote of $153,878 for the 4,700 MT of crude oil from Beira to Cape Town. Could we discuss this on the phone next Monday to confirm the details? Additionally, can you confirm if another vessel is available after April 12th?

Best regards,
Margaret

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Quote and Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Morales,

Could you please confirm if the provided quote of $153,878 for 4,700 MT of crude oil from Beira to Cape Town is accurate? Additionally, is there another vessel available shortly after April 12th?

Best regards,
Margaret

email_chain.subject: Wheat Shipment Schedule and In-port Fees Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Lee,

Please see below for a proposed schedule for moving 9,000MT of wheat from Ghent to Manila:
- 05/04/2014 02:00 ADR/Ghent, Belgium - 05/20/2014 15:00 APX/Manila, Philippines

Do you agree to this schedule? Also, could you please confirm if your in-port fees are $1,000?

Thank you,
Yang

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment Schedule and In-port Fees Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Yang,

Yes, I confirm our in-port fees are $1,000. Could you please provide the bill of lading for this shipment?

Best regards,
Ms. Lee

email_chain.subject: Bill of Lading and Payment Details Request
email_chain.body:
Good morning Ms. Lee,

Please find the attached bill of lading for the transaction detailed below:
- 05/04/2014 02:00 ADR/Ghent, Belgium - 05/20/2014 15:00 APX/Manila, Philippines

If you agree to these details, could you please send me your bank information for payment? Please let me know if you need anything else.

Regards,
Yang

email_chain.subject: Re: Bill of Lading and Payment Details Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Yang,

Please send the documents again in a clear format to avoid any confusion. Make sure all documents are saved and sent in .pdf format, ideally in one single .pdf file.

Thank you,
Ms. Lee

email_chain.subject: Remittance Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Hello Yang,

I received the invoice through my card but observed that no funds have been transferred to my account yet. Could you please provide the remittance information so I can forward the necessary documents to our supplier? Please let me know if there's anything else you need from my side.

Thank you,
Ms. Lee

email_chain.subject: Banking Information for Wire Transfer
email_chain.body:
Please see the remittance document details below:

Address Line 1: 2226 Pravom Rapida, 2nd Floor Unit 204, Makati City 1630
Country: Philippines
ZIP: 1630

For the wire transfer, please use the following account details:
Bank of the Philippine Islands, Manila
Account Name: Sandra Lee, Unit 204, 2226 Pravom Rapida 2nd Floor, Makati City, Philippines
Account number: 1282-014

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Schedule and Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Andres,

Please note that we want to ship 2,500MT of petrochemicals from Shanghai to San Juan. Can you provide your earliest laycan slot for loading and confirm your FOB terms and the latest vessel laytime?

Thanks,
Seth

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Schedule and Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Seth,

If your goods have HS code 3004, we can offer the following available slots for loading these products:

- Feb 28-Mar 03
- Mar 11-15
- Mar 18-22
- Mar 25-29

For FOB terms, we can discuss commercial terms once a tender with confidential shipping terms is received to ensure commitment feasibility. Please let me know which slot you wish to reserve and if you need confidentiality elements within the terms.

Regards,
Andres

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Schedule and Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Andres,

I need some clarification regarding the slot availability: 
1) Your vessel can load 2500MT of general cargo, including HS code 3004 cargo
2) Your vessel can make an East Coast USA call
3) Your vessel offers a laytime of 3 days at port to load 2500MT

Am I correct in these understandings?

Thanks,
Seth

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Schedule and Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Seth,

Correct, the vessel provides 3 days of port time for a full load, available any day of the week. Please inform me about the need for confidentiality, and I will arrange to send you the confidential shipping terms.

Thanks,
Andres

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Schedule and Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Andres,

Thank you for the confirmation; this is helpful. For confidentiality, I prefer using an offshore email address. I will send a request for confidentiality using that address in my next message.

Thanks,
Seth

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Methanol Shipment from Yanbu to Cape of Good Hope
email_chain.body: Good morning, We are seeking a vessel to transport 16,000MT of methanol from Yanbu to the Cape of Good Hope. Could you please provide the earliest available laycan dates and an indicative rate? Thank you, Martha

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Methanol Shipment from Yanbu to Cape of Good Hope
email_chain.body: Morning Martha, Unfortunately, we are currently unable to facilitate your methanol shipment because of restrictions resulting from the COVID-19 pandemic, which are disrupting crew changes. We hope to resolve these issues and possibly begin taking cargoes again before April. Apologies for any inconvenience. Kind regards, Sven

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Methanol Shipment from Yanbu to Cape of Good Hope
email_chain.body: Good morning, Thank you for the update. Have there been any changes to your availability for taking cargo at the beginning of April? Best regards, Martha

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Methanol Shipment from Yanbu to Cape of Good Hope
email_chain.body: Hello Martha, Unfortunately, due to ongoing issues related to the pandemic, specifically affecting our crew changes, we must cancel arrangements regarding methanol shipments to Cape Town at this time. We cannot commit to any availability at the moment. Sorry for the inconvenience. Kind regards, Sven

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Methanol Shipment from Yanbu to Cape of Good Hope
email_chain.body: Dear Sven, We acknowledge your latest update, and we understand the difficulties you are facing. Please keep us informed about any future opportunities for shipping methanol or other cargoes. Many thanks, Martha

email_chain.subject: Request for Container Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Huang,

I am reaching out to inquire about the availability of shipping containers for the upcoming period. Please let us know if there are any containers available.

Sincerely,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Container Availability Inquiry
email_chain.body:

Sincerely,

email_chain.subject: Urgency of Container Requirement
email_chain.body:

We urgently require shipping containers for our upcoming shipments. Your prompt response regarding their availability for the dates in question would be greatly appreciated.

Sincerely,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability and Freight Estimate for Sunflower Oil Transportation
email_chain.body: Hey Tyler, We’re looking to send 3,200mt of Russian sunflower oil to Surabaya and would like to know if you have an available vessel. Also, could you provide an estimate of the freight cost? Cheers, Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability and Freight Estimate for Sunflower Oil Transportation
email_chain.body: Hi Laura, We have a suitable vessel for your cargo with an ETA to Surabaya of April 3rd. Our brokers have provided us with a preliminary freight rate of USD 72,600. Could you specify the quality of the sunflower oil to fine-tune our tonnage calculations? Regards, Tyler

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability and Freight Estimate for Sunflower Oil Transportation
email_chain.body: Hi Tyler, How quickly can you confirm that we’ll charter your vessel? Cheers, Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Laura, We can confirm today that you’ll be chartering our vessel. Regards, Tyler

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Tyler, Great to hear. Could you please provide the terms you’re looking for? Cheers, Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Confirmation - Terms
email_chain.body: Hi Laura, We’re looking for payment upfront and a brokerage commission of USD 2,500. Regards, Tyler

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Confirmation - Final Approval Needed
email_chain.body: Hi Laura, We need to speak with our company to get a final confirmation on this charter. I will update you as soon as possible. Regards, Tyler

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipping Capacity from Singapore to Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Brown,
I am a sales representative at our company. We currently have excess storage capacity in Singapore and are looking to charter containers to Vietnam, approximately 2,000 TEUs. Could you please let me know your freight rates and space availability? It would be helpful to know when you can offer us the needed capacity.
Looking forward to your prompt response.
Best regards,
Melissa

email_chain.subject: Request for Warehouse Inspection Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Maria,
We intend to send a team to inspect your warehouse facilities as part of our space leasing process. Could you please provide us with available dates and times for our team to conduct the inspection? Your prompt response will be greatly appreciated.
Best regards,
Melissa

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Lease Space for a Client
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Maria,
One of our clients is looking for a lease space of approximately 3,000 sqm in the Port Klang area under a 12-month contract. We would be glad to share more detailed client information once we confirm your interest and terms.
Please let us know your requirements and conditions.
Looking forward to your reply.
Sincerely,
Melissa

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Request to China
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Boss,
I represent a client eager to ship large items to China. They seek to move 20 containers, utilizing 40' HQ containers, as the cargo contains large components each weighing approximately 21kg. The required HS Codes are 701814, 950210, and 4811. We aim for a delivery around mid-May and appreciate if you could provide your shipping capacity availability on a short notice, ideally between one week's notice and the following week.
Looking forward to your response.
Best regards,
Melissa

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Muriq Options for Cargo

I'm traveling to Dubai next month and wonder if you can give me an update on the Muriq option? Are you looking for customers or cargo from the Mideast to Europe?

Andrey

email_chain.subject: Request for Update on Muriq

Hi,

Do you have an update for me regarding the Muriq?

email_chain.subject: Re: Feedback and Update Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrey!

email_chain.subject: Thank You for Your Feedback
email_chain.body:

Thank you for the feedback.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Request: 4,200MT of Spirits from Rio to Pointe-a-Pitre
email_chain.body: Dear Daniel, Could you arrange to transport 4,200MT of spirits from Rio de Janeiro to Pointe-a-Pitre at short notice? Could you please let me know the preferred route and your charges for this shipment? Looking forward to your prompt response. Regards, Lindsay

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Air Transport
email_chain.body: Hi Daniel, We received your quotation yesterday and appreciate the quick response. Could you please inform us how many days the shipment would take if it is delivered by air? Best, Arthur

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Air Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Arthur, I apologize for the delayed response. The shipment by air would take approximately 3 days. Best, Daniel

email_chain.subject: Material Specifications and Lead Time
email_chain.body: Hi Daniel, You will find the specifications of the material in the attached Excel file. Please review it and let me know if you have any questions. Also, could you provide the average lead time for a boat to transport the 4,200MT from Rio de Janeiro to Pointe-a-Pitre? Regards, Lindsay

email_chain.subject: Payment Terms Negotiation
email_chain.body: Dear Daniel, We have received the invoice as discussed. The payment terms mentioned are negotiable. Let us finalize these terms once the shipment is confirmed. Best, Lindsay

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgement
email_chain.body: Okay. Thank you for your feedback. Lindsay

email_chain.subject: Shipping Enquiry from Baltimore to Gdansk
email_chain.body: Hello Ivan, I'm looking for an agent to ship 9,000MT of RFG from Baltimore to Gdansk in early June. Can you provide a price quote and your contact info? Regards, Nick Myers

email_chain.subject: Type of Cargo Handling at Terminal
email_chain.body: Also, what sort of cargo can you handle at your terminal? Steel, bulk, chemical?

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Enquiry from Baltimore to Gdansk
email_chain.body: Dear Nick, Thank you very much for your interest in VDB. Please find attached a copy of our offer regarding the shipment from Baltimore to Gdansk. VDB is the official representative of Baltimore port in Poland. Our terminal can handle all types of cargoes including steel, bulk, and chemicals. We are looking forward to working with you soon. Warm regards, Ivan Kostyuchenko, VDB Terminal

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipping Charges
email_chain.body: Ivan, I have been given a proposal for $9,000 shipping charges for the cargo. Does this look right? Regards, Nick Myers

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Shipping Charges
email_chain.body: Dear Nick, Yes, the $9,000 shipping charges are correct. We are looking forward to working with you soon. Warm regards, Ivan Kostyuchenko, VDB Terminal

email_chain.subject: Query Regarding Toll Application for Upcoming Shipment
email_chain.body: Hey Sam, we are interested in booking the second shipment of cotton in a 50-ton container with direct sail from Santa Cruz to Newark. Will the new C/P apply the New Panama Canal toll? Thanks, Ian

email_chain.subject: Re: Query Regarding Toll Application for Upcoming Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Ian, I couldn't find any information in the latest canal treaty regarding a new C/P. Can you please clarify what you are referring to? Thanks, Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Query Regarding Toll Application for Upcoming Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sam, here is the link to the agreement: http://www.panamaxmaritime.com/AG/Panama%20Canal%20Tolls%20Agreement.pdf. It includes the addendum related to the toll charges which should be applied to container ships like ours. Regards, Ian

email_chain.subject: Re: Query Regarding Toll Application for Upcoming Shipment
email_chain.body: Ian, after reviewing the document, it seems we might need a cargo lawyer to interpret these changes correctly. We should consider seeking legal advice to clarify the toll adjustments. Best, Sam

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for Urea Shipment from Dubai to Batam
email_chain.body:
Greetings Ms. Abukar,

Could your vessel take on 7,500MT of urea from Dubai to Batam scheduled for departure on the 20th of next month? Additionally, could you please inform us about your interest rates and the freight cap, if any, for charters exceeding a duration of 3 months?

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Urea Shipment from Dubai to Batam
email_chain.body:

Following up on our earlier communication, I have discussed with the owner who has expressed interest at your freight cap of $3,250. Please send us the confirmation including your rates for free time and demurrage, and we will be prepared to finalize the charter details.

Regards,
Judy

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Survey for Cornstarch Shipment
email_chain.body:

Can you provide a cargo survey for a shipment of 4,000MT of cornstarch from Salem to Djibouti? I appreciate your guidance on this.
Regards,
Ariel

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Survey for Cornstarch Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Ariel,
Unfortunately, we are not familiar with handling cornstarch cargoes and unsure about the specific requirements for the survey. I recommend seeking a specialist in cornstarch shipments. Alternatively, consider obtaining shipment insurance, though be aware that insurers might also be hesitant without understanding the cargo specifics.
Regards,
Brian

Brian,

Regards,
Larry

Please be advised that our vessel 'SS Jeanna' is currently loading 30,000 MT of copper concentrate in Malaysia, destined for the Port of Sual, Philippines. Tobias

email_chain.body:
Dear Captain,

Shipper: Orion Resources Sdn Bhd
Loading Details: Port of Miri,
Country: Malaysia
Cargo: 30,000 MT of non-dangerous copper concentrate
Consignee: Cebu Exporters Corp
Discharge: Sual Port, Philippines
Price: US$ 500 per MT
Packaging: 100 kg bags
Payment: L/C at sight

Original Bill of Lading is attached and will be mailed to the port of discharge. All documentation is completed for smooth sailing. You are cleared to sail at any time.

We appreciate your cooperation and await your confirmation.

Best regards,
Mr. Sze

email_chain.subject: Final Loading Confirmation for SS Jeanna

All necessary documents have been finalized to ensure a smooth journey. The Bill of Lading is attached and will be sent to your port of discharge.

We look forward to a successful delivery and appreciate your cooperation.

Best regards,
Tobias

email_chain.subject: Re: Ship's logs (Premium)
email_chain.body:
Dear Judy and Jaime,
Thank you for your interest in our global ISLA services. I appreciate the opportunity to provide some brief highlights about ISLA and our unique Global Data Relays.
At ISLA, we have been providing global telemetry data services for the last 6 years. During this time, our clients have asked us to expand our data services to include other types of monitoring data. We now offer a comprehensive suite of solutions.

email_chain.subject: Re: Ship's logs (Premium)
email_chain.body:
Dear Jaime,
Thank you for your feedback, I truly value it.
I am concerned that I may not have fully grasped your inquiry. We manage data servers and oversee the logistics of deploying our data relay receivers as a part of our global service. One of our team members has already reached out to HMA Amundsen regarding your query to ensure that we can accommodate your data needs. Unfortunately, the hard copy you provided did not specify any vessel name or owner, but we are actively addressing this oversight.

email_chain.subject: Request for Grain Shipping Quote from Sydney to Seattle
email_chain.body: Hi Rob, I am enquiring as to your ability to transport grains from your Sydney port to Seattle. We would want to use your containers to ship approximately 40,000 tons of grain. Could you advise me of the approximate cost and timing of delivery? Could you also supply me with a copy of the relevant carriage conditions? Please also include a contact number and name. Thank you. Regards, Jill

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Grain Shipping Quote from Sydney to Seattle
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Slater, Thank you for your enquiry on the transport of grains from Sydney to Seattle. As you requested, I have enclosed a schedule and conditions of carriage. The estimated cost for the shipment of 40,000 tons from Sydney to Seattle is as follows: Container service: $55,000.00, Insurance of goods: $25,000.00, Total: $80,000.00. The estimated time of arrival is 1 month from the date of departure. For insurance purposes, we need a complete list of the goods, along with an approximate value and quantity. Please provide this information at your earliest convenience. Regards, Sally

email_chain.subject: Additional Details for Grain Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Sally, Thank you for the details. I will provide the list and approximate value of the grain shortly. Regards, Jill

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: RE: Shipping Offer for Petrochemicals
email_chain.body: I'm pleased to hear that you're available for our cargo! We are prepared to offer US$65,000 for the shipment of 12,000 barrels. I'm reaching out directly since you have considerable experience with similar cargo volumes. Best regards, Mary

email_chain.subject: Clarification and Confirmation of Cargo Offer
email_chain.body: Hi Tracy, As per our earlier conversation, our offer for 12,000 barrels of petrochemicals stands at $65,000. Please confirm by sending us an acceptance letter and ensuring payment arrangements are set by 7th July. Do you have any questions about our offer? Best regards, Mary

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipping Offer Acceptance
email_chain.body: That offer sounds good, and we are ready to accept your terms and conditions! Could you kindly detail when the cargo will be ready for loading? Best regards, Tracy

email_chain.subject: Cargo Loading Schedule Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Tracy, The cargo will be loaded onto your ship on 15th July, with departure scheduled for 18th July from Qingdao. The loading is planned to take approximately 5 days. We would appreciate it if your vessel could arrive timely to facilitate this schedule. Best regards, Mary

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Availability of Soybean Oil Shipment

email_chain.subject: Availability and Pricing for LPG Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning Peter,

It's been a while, how's everything going with you? I trust you're still doing well on the ship, and I hope there are no problems! I'm really excited for your plans for the new year. I heard that you're doing very well as the 2nd Officer on your new vessel. Great work! We're sourcing a 2,500 MT shipment of LPG from Dalian to Fujairah. Do you have a vessel available that's open in the next two weeks, and at what cost?

Kindly, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability and Pricing for LPG Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning Sarah!

Thanks for your email. We just came in from our shift, and we're happy to hear from you. We're doing well on board. How about you? I heard you took a new job, congratulations!

We have a vessel available from Dalian to Fujairah that could be open in two weeks. At what rate are you looking to move the cargo?

Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability and Pricing for LPG Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning Peter!

Thanks for the response, we're doing well on our end. I'm pleased to hear you're doing well too.

We are indeed still looking for a vessel to transport the cargo. Could you please confirm availability and provide details on possible rates?

Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability and Pricing for LPG Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning Sarah,

Thank you for your email. I'm glad to hear you're doing well. We are very open for business and actually have availability now. If you could confirm your details by the end of the day, we could finalize the arrangement.

Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Immediate Cargo Movement
email_chain.body:
Hi Peter,

We're really excited for the news! We'll send over the final details later today. Thank you for the prompt responses.

Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment Quotation from Boston to Antwerp
email_chain.body:

Our new client, Macho Power, needs a specialist for relocating office supplies from Boston, USA to Antwerp. The shipment weighs 1,500MT and requires immediate transportation. Can you provide us with a ballpark quote? Thanks,
A

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Transport Modes
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
How are you? I hope you're keeping well. As we are unable to discuss over the phone, I'm reaching out via email. Our decision on whether to use airfreight, road, or ocean freight is not yet finalized. However, we need assistance in some form regardless of the transport mode, provided the quote remains competitive. I look forward to your assistance on this matter.
Thanks,
God

email_chain.subject: Urgent Quote Requirement for Various Transport Modes
email_chain.body:
Hi Ian,
We urgently need your quotation for transporting 1,500 pallets of office supplies from USA to Europe. Can you provide costs for each transportation mode: airfreight, road, and ocean freight? Also, do you offer full container loads only? Please include information about whether transportation costs also cover insurance and delivery to factory door. We need a prompt response.
Many thanks,
AA

email_chain.subject: Client Concerns Regarding Offered Pricing
email_chain.body:
Hi Ian,
The client has expressed concerns over the current pricing. They've asked if we can get an updated quote for shipping 1,500 pallets of home office furniture. Your prompt feedback would be appreciated.
Regards,
AA

email_chain.subject: Re: Rumor about Company Z and Company A

email_chain.subject: Re: Rumor about Company Z and Company A

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Weekly Dry Bulk Shipping Schedule
email_chain.body: Hi, we are providing weekly schedule services with reference to following ships and commodities. Please let us know your specific interests.

Additionally, I would like to receive your weekly product schedule so that I can plan accordingly. For assessment of your offer, I would need some information about your bank account for a possible bank transfer. Please find below my company details: [Company Info]

email_chain.subject: Change of Delivery Details for Order 310119-4424
email_chain.body: Hello, according to the latest updates on my order 310119-4424, I've changed the arrival destination of the product from the original destination to a new destination.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Delivery Destination Change

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Delivery Destination Change

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Rice Shipment from Manila to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Zou, I am looking to ship 2000MT of rice from Manila to Qingdao. Can you give me a loading rate for the next two weeks, and does your liner include daily demurrage? Thanks, Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Rice Shipment from Manila to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi Alice, The loading rate for rice from Manila to Qingdao is roughly 65 to 70 USD/MT. Please note that this rate is approximate. Our liner does not include demurrage. If you have any other questions, please feel free to ask. Sincerely, Zou

email_chain.subject: Update on Loading Rate due to New Regulations
email_chain.body: Hi Alice, Due to the new regulation on rice import to China, the loading rate for rice from Manila to Qingdao must be increased to around 80 USD/MT. Please let me know if you have any updates from your side. Sincerely, Zou

email_chain.subject: Requirement for Additional Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Zou, We have already secured a shipment from Nantong, but we need one more shipment. The cargo will be loaded in Qingdao in June. Could you please let me know if you can provide this service? Also, could you send me a quotation as soon as possible? Thanks, Alice

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Additional Shipment from Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi Alice, Thanks for your information. The rates for loading in Qingdao are as follows: 65 USD/MT with demurrage included, and 80 USD/MT without demurrage. Please confirm which option suits you best. Sincerely, Zou

email_chain.subject: Finalization and Schedule Request for HFO Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello Jin,

We are in the process of finalizing 18kt of HFO for discharging scheduled during February and March. Could you please verify the cargo’s grades and provide a schedule for discharging? Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Leo

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization and Schedule Request for HFO Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello Leo,

Thank you for your prompt details. I appreciate your cooperation and support. It's relieving to hear about the favorable oil prices. We need your continued support in promoting the sales. I understand the discount structure; can you confirm that if we sell the oil to buyers eligible for the 0.5% discount, our commission will accordingly be adjusted to 5% instead of 7%? Please confirm so we can finalize the arrangements.

Best regards,
Jin

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for a Bulk Carrier
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Chen,

We urgently require a ship, around 50,000 DWT, experienced with dry bulk or ore, for transportation of 20,000 to 25,000 MT of iron ore from Dampier to Yuan Island. Please confirm your vessel's availability, its draft and size, including the availability of existing ballast water. Additionally, we need to know the earliest date your vessel can be at sea and whether it permits 'dumping' of cargo in event of a strike. A detailed specification of your vessel including crew, safety records, and insurance policy information is requested by 7th August.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Yours faithfully,

Richard Vernon

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Requirement for a Bulk Carrier
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Vernon,

Thank you for your enquiry. We are pleased to inform you that we have an 87,000 DWT ocean-going ore carrier available, which is 12 years old and has recently passed rigorous safety inspections. It has been chartered to an oil company for the past 3 months and is available from 15th August. The vessel is capable of 'dumping' her cargo in event of a strike.

Please provide the load and discharge ports, estimated cargo quantity, loading time, and estimated number of loading / discharging crew. We look forward to your details.

Yours faithfully,
Mr. Chen

email_chain.subject: Ship Charter Details for Ore Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chen,

Thank you for your swift reply. Enclosed is an outline of the proposed charter covering the period 10th September to 31st October 2011, inclusive of a letter of inquiry we've requested from Dampier Iron Ore and Port Walling. Please review these documents and advise on any necessary corrections.

I trust the terms meet your expectations and I await your response.

Yours faithfully,
Richard Vernon

email_chain.subject: Re: Ship Charter Details for Ore Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Richard,

I have reviewed the proposed charter and can confirm our vessel will be ready at sea by 15th August, and your preferred dates are acceptable. However, I would require amendments regarding the amounts and unit prices for port charges, light dues, and insurance, including their deductions from the charter.

I hope these changes are satisfactory. Once agreed, I'll send the confirmation and insurance policy documents.

Yours faithfully,
Jin Jing

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation of Charter Agreement
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chen,

The amendments to the charter agreement are acceptable. Enclosed is a signed copy of the charter agreement, along with a draft insurance policy. Please confirm that the vessel will be ready for loading by 17th August.

Thank you.

Yours faithfully,
Richard Vernon

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, We are looking to transport a bulk cargo from Rotterdam to Shanghai next month. Could you provide us with a rough freight cost estimate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hello John, Thank you for reaching out. To provide a precise quote, I need details such as cargo size, vessel type preferred, and laycan details. Warm regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Jane, The cargo is 5000 MT of steel coils. We prefer a Panamax bulk carrier. Laycan period would ideally be from Aug 20 to Aug 30. Could you check the availability and provide a detailed cost? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Final Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear John, We’ve arranged for a Panamax vessel, MV Oceanic, 77000 DWT, LOA 225 meters. The total freight cost from Rotterdam to Shanghai will be $14.00 per MT. Laytime is confirmed from Aug 20 to Aug 30. Please confirm at your earliest convenience. Best, Jane

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Bitumen Shipping Cost from Bandar Abbas to Jubail
email_chain.body: Could you provide an estimate for the shipping cost of 4,000MT of bitumen from Bandar Abbas to Jubail? Thanks, Mary

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry about Vopak and Insurance for Bitumen Transport
email_chain.body: Thank you for your assistance. I previously contacted Vopak about transporting bitumen from Qatar but didn't receive a reply. Do you think Vopak requires contracting a vessel equipped with their gear to transport the bitumen? Your advice would be very helpful. Also, is it possible to obtain insurance for this shipment? Thank you, Mary

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hey Jon, We’re looking to transport approximately 100,000 tons of LPG from Rabigh to Karachi. Could you provide a rough estimate of the freight cost? Thanks, Connie

email_chain.subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: ORBO/coupon
email_chain.body: Hello Ed, Thank you for your email. It looks like Rabigh is currently not importing. Have you had any update from Tony regarding the information he provided earlier? Best, Carolyn

email_chain.subject: RE: Confidential Proposed Sale of PKGS – 1F, J10
email_chain.body: Vince, I’ve noted your message regarding the major cargoes headed to Karachi. Could you provide more details about these? Thanks, Michael

email_chain.subject: Request for Purchase Offer Approval
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Patel,

We are interested in purchasing 25,000MT of clay, to be shipped from China to Bangkok. Could you please provide us with a Purchase Offer Approval (POA) for this cargo? Looking forward to your prompt response.

Sincerely,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Request for POA for Additional Clay Purchase
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Patel,

In addition to our previous request, I would also like to inquire about the purchase of an additional 5,000MT of clay. Could you provide a POA for this quantity as well?

Sincerely,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Submission of Purchase Order for 25,000MT of Clay
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Patel,

Please find attached our Purchase Order for the purchase of 25,000MT of clay. We look forward to your response and moving forward with the transaction.

Sincerely,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Clay Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Patel,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on our previous conversations regarding the clay shipments. Could you please provide an estimate with all relevant information such as the quantity, price per ton, delivery location, payment terms, and any other necessary details before we can finalize our offer? Our company is interested in purchasing 50,000MT in total.

Thank you for your time and assistance. Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipping Schedule and Availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Jones,

We are looking to ship 1,100MT of shoes from Rotterdam to Boston. Can you confirm your earliest available sail date, and do you have a regular sailing schedule we can align with?

Kind regards,
Anne

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Shipping Schedule and Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi Anne,

We would be happy to assist with your shipment. Our regular schedule includes weekly sailings on the 23rd of each month. However, for your shipment, we can arrange a sailing on the 25th of March. Please confirm your delivery address in Boston, MA and let me know if you have any more questions.

Best regards,
Don

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Shipping Schedule and Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi Don,

That date works for us. The final destination for the goods will be Boston, MA and the goods will clear customs through Port Newark, NJ.

Thank you for your assistance!
Anne

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Shipping Route
email_chain.body:
Hi Don,

I’m following up about the shipping to Boston, MA. Our customs broker informed that there will be an initial handling in NJ. Will this be an issue?

Thanks,
Anne

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-Up on Shipping Route
email_chain.body:
Hi Anne,

NJ is not a problem. The vessel departs from Rotterdam, makes a stop in Houston, and NJ, before reaching Boston. The final destination is Boston, where the cargo clearance arrangements have been planned.

Let me know if you need more information.
Don

email_chain.subject: Details of Shipping Arrangement
email_chain.body:
Anne,

The carrier for this shipment will be ZIM Lines. They will manage the export from Rotterdam, and stop in Houston, before continuing to Boston. All shipments are handled under FCA terms, meaning the cargo will be delivered to their warehouse in Rotterdam. You are responsible for paying for the cargo and its customs duties post-delivery, as well as unloading or arranging unloading.

Regards,
Ed

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body:
Anne,

Could you let me know if you have any questions regarding our quote? Please be aware that we've already expended our weekly quota, hence your shipment cost would have to be adjusted to the current market price.

Regards,
Don

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Vessel Position Coordination

email_chain.subject: Styrene + Benzoate
email_chain.body: Hey Ryan, Are there any movements of styrene and/or benzoate from Singapore to Surabaya this month or early December? Please provide your best rates. All the best, Celeste

email_chain.subject: Styrene + Benzoate + MEG-1
email_chain.body: Hi Ryan, Are there any possible shipments between Singapore and Surabaya? Kindly quote your best rates. Thanks! Celeste

email_chain.subject: Vessel Space for Styrene and Benzoate
email_chain.body: Dear Ryan, It looks like we will have another vessel space for styrene and benzoate from Singapore to Surabaya in February. Could you provide the details and rates? Ideally, for vessels ready to sail in January or February, focusing on last loads of styrene and benzoate by emptying. Also, please include details about benzoate shipments as they are moving fast, along with a 4-6 month quote for both grades of styrene. We need to secure a few vessels before Christmas, so could you get back to me by Wednesday, 11/20, or Monday afternoon at the latest? Thanks, Celeste

email_chain.subject: Benzoate at Sea
email_chain.body: Dear Ryan, I've received your offer to sell Benzoate at sea. If the offer is still open, please let me know the current location of the vessel, and the estimated time of arrival at Jakarta and Surabaya. Could you also send me a copy of your offtake letter? Additionally, I'm going to need more than 30,000 bags of styrene to bring to Surabaya. Can you offer any more at the same price? Kind regards, Celeste

email_chain.subject: Meeting Confirmation: Styrene + Benzoate Trade
email_chain.body: Hi Ryan and Will, I'm looking forward to our meeting today to discuss the styrene + benzoate trade between Singapore and Surabaya. See you soon! Also, looking forward to our next meeting on Thursday to discuss the methacrylates trade. Cheers, Celeste

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Supply of Turkish Hazelnuts
email_chain.body: Is there a minimum guaranteed quantity of 15,000MT of Turkish hazelnuts, picked in 2020, that you can supply in October? We need to load it to Hong Kong. Regards, Marina

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Supply of Turkish Hazelnuts
email_chain.body: Dear Marina, What price are you considering for containerized Turkish hazelnuts? Thanks, Grace

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for High-Quality Hazelnuts
email_chain.body: Thank you for your quick reply! Please quote for a Turkish hazelnut shipment of 10-20 grams, good quality, packed in a 20'GP container, loaded in Antalya for the East Mediterranean market. Kind Regards, Marie

email_chain.subject: Introduction and Future Business Collaboration
email_chain.body: Hello John, I would like to introduce you to our business partner for nuts and dried fruits in China. As we buy your hazelnuts, walnuts, and almonds from Turkish supply and export them to China for our business partner, we are interested in establishing a direct relationship with your company. For future quotations and direct deals, please contact me directly. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out anytime. Kind Regards, Emine

email_chain.subject: Re: Introduction and Future Business Collaboration
email_chain.body: Hi Emine, Thanks for the introduction. 1. I will inform you about the pricing for the containerized Turkish hazelnuts as soon as possible. 2. Yes, we can supply a minimum quantity; please let us know the volumes you are interested in. Thanks, Grace

email_chain.subject: FOB vs CIF and Additional charges
email_chain.body: Hi Aziz, Our vessel is scheduled to discharge 11,000MT of methanol in Saudi Arabia. Your FOB pricing is promising. I'm wondering if you accept CIF terms as well? Moreover, could you clarify if there are any charges for net tankering? Best regards, Abhiraj

email_chain.subject: Transport & Additional Costs Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Abhiraj, Greetings from the sea. Our agent in Saudi will handle lift-booking and transport methanol from the Red Sea to Yanbu. Are there any additional costs on top of your FOB price that we should account for, such as bunker charges? We emphasize the safety of the cargo, but in the event of a spill, our liability will only extend to cleaning costs. Can we discuss this further? Best, Aziz

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport & Additional Costs Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Aziz, Thanks for your quick reply. The transit time from the Red Sea to Yanbu by road is 3 days, which has notably increased our costs. I would like to find a compromise to ensure that this cargo reaches Yanbu quickly and cost-efficiently. Best, Abhiraj

email_chain.subject: CIF Quote & Accepting FOB
email_chain.body: Hello Abhiraj, I've attached the CIF quote for your consideration. However, if you prefer to stick with FOB terms, that's also acceptable to us. Please let me know your preference. Regards, Aziz

email_chain.subject: Prefer to Continue with FOB
email_chain.body: Thank you, Aziz. We prefer to proceed with FOB terms. Best, Abhiraj

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Accounts Payable?
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Vincent,

I hope this message finds you well. We have noticed that the shipment of coffee beans ordered from Mexico, which was expected to arrive at your store by mid-October, has still not been paid for. Could you please confirm if you have received the shipment? Additionally, could you inform us about your plans regarding the payment?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Regards,
Tim Garson

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Accounts Payable?
email_chain.body:
Hello Tim,

Thank you for reaching out about the shipment from Mexico. Unfortunately, we have not received any shipment yet. Please proceed with canceling the order. We expect to receive a refund shortly. Let me know if there are other ways you might assist us.

Best regards,
Owen Vincent

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Accounts Payable?
email_chain.body:
Tim,

Apologies for the confusion in my previous email. I've rechecked, and it turns out we did indeed receive the shipment of coffee beans from Mexico and have already made the payment. Sorry for any confusion this may have caused.

Sincerely,
Owen Vincent

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipping 25,000MT Scrap Metal
email_chain.body: Hello, I have a question about shipping 25,000MT of Russian scrap metal from Zeebrugge to Rotterdam. Could we arrange daily demurrage under $10,000? Thanks, Sherry.

email_chain.subject: Additional Information on Scrap Metal
email_chain.body: I forgot to mention in my previous email, the material in question is specifically Russian scrap metal that we need to ship.

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Cargo Requirement
email_chain.body: Do you have specific requirements for materials or setup in Russian that could fit this quantity (25,000MT)?

email_chain.subject: Carrier Availability
email_chain.body: Thanks for your responses. I've already found carriers who possess the necessary Russian language skills to handle this deal. I'm currently trying to determine the cost details to manage the demurrage under $10,000. I will get back to you soon on the specifics.

email_chain.subject: Estimate on Space and Demurrage Cost
email_chain.body: Regarding the specification of the material you wish to ship, we are assuming it is high-density scrap metal that won't require much space for containment. In this case, the charges should be manageable. The volume of 25,000 MT isn't substantial for a capable vessel. We will work on ways to achieve your target pricing.

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: 5000 MT Frozen Beef, Johannesburg to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Good morning Cassius,

I am reaching out to inquire if you have the capacity to handle the shipment of 5000 metric tons of frozen beef from Johannesburg to Amsterdam. It is crucial that the containers maintain a maximum temperature of below 3 degrees Celsius throughout the transit. We are prepared to pay a premium for this service. Could you please provide us with a freight quote, inclusive of any specialization costs associated with the freight forwarders?

Best regards,
Chloe

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote

email_chain.subject: PPI Contract Expectations

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Needed: $360/MT FOB Qingdao for 4,500MT Soya Beans in July

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation Needed: $360/MT FOB Qingdao for 4,500MT Soya Beans in July
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Confirmation: $360/MT FOB Qingdao for 4,500MT Soya Beans in July
email_chain.body:

Lin Deng

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Transporting Steel Slabs from Shanghai to Manila

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Transporting Steel Slabs from Shanghai to Manila
